story:
DeMonaco is a modern, lightweight and super-thin wallet with innovative rubber protection mechanism, manufactured in Gucci factories from the finest leather.

We are happy to present DeMonaco, a quality, innovative leather & leatherette inexpensive and modern looking wallet inspired by the worlds richest tax haven, Principality of Monaco.

DeMonaco presents New Leatherette Wallets from highest quality leatherette at awesome price of 19 Euros!

DeMonaco is a wallet that stacks money for you! This wallet introduces a mechanism which does not allow any fallouts. There are no magnets, buttons or metal plates which usually damage your phones if together in pocket. 

DeMonaco leather wallet is completely built out of natural material, leather and includes a rubber band as fallout protection mechanism.

We are presenting BROWN DeMonaco leather wallet, completely built out of highest quality leather. 

BLACK DeMonaco wallet is the newest addition to the family! Extremely popular among business people and an excellent gift for your belowed ones. 

With your support, we ll be prepared to ship the wallets upon the campaign-end!


DeMonaco Wallet Specifications:

Two types: Highest quality leather & leatherette wallets

Leather wallets: Highest quality leather, finest precision, quality rubber

Leatherette wallets: Highest quality leatherette, finest precision, quality rubber

Size: 10cm x 8cm x 1cm

Mechanism: Rubber mechanism (extremely durable, no scratch on 11 month old prototype)

Drop test: Chance of cards falling out of DeMonaco wallet equals to zero

Colors: Black & Dark Brown

RFID protection: No

Card Pockets: Four

Which currencies fit?

DeMonaco is perfect for storing any world currency. Plus up to 8 credit/debit cards, IDs, driver licenses, and business cards.

Why do we need to raise 1,500E? 

The creation of DeMonaco wallets at affordable prices is only possible if we order large quies of material needed for wallet creation. Therefore, we would need 1,500E and in return we would offer these innovative leather wallets at awesome prices. 

Is DeMonaco wallet both for man and woman?

That is correct, DeMonaco is unisex wallet. Our target group are people between 14 - 114 of age, both male & female, both business and outgoing.

Your Support!

This is where Indiegogo come in. We need your help to transform this idea into a reality and then transport it into your pockets. We are raising funding for materials, creating, packaging, and logistics for DeMonaco wallet. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

story:
About Us:

We are setting out to create and sustain jobs in the USA while working towards a healthier planet. We are all about the dreamers changing expectations. We know it is as simple as the choice you make. You choose who you support and hold them accountable. The purchase of each of our shirts makes a difference. Not in some abstract way, but a tangible difference. We believe in a new standard for American business. This is our America and we want her back.

 

What makes us different?

It starts with the design. We collaborate with a variety of artists from musicians to painters, from photographers to sculptors to create raw unprocessed art. Then you add a shirt made in America, with American organic textiles and hand-screen print those here in the United States. Think we are done? Not yet… When those shirts are sold, we give back and make a change.

We have chosen to donate to six organizations. A portion from the sale of our products goes to each organization. These organizations include World Wildlife Fund, 1% for the Planet, VH1 Save The Music Foundation, indiegogo, Opportunity Finance Network, and Feeding America. That means that for each shirt that is sold: we will be feeding American families, planting trees, creating American jobs, helping animals, funding dreams and saving music.

We are going to do this while keeping our clothing competitively priced.

It is my pleasure to introduce to you…Proper Villain Clothing.


 
What Is The Proper Villain Story?

The first design was made using scissors, electrical tape and spray paint. It was raw and simple but Proper Villain continued to change. It has evolved into more than another image on a shirt. It's about responsibility, both socially and economically. It's about the way the business is run almost as much as the shirts. Instead of relying on heavily branded imagery, the goal became to use causes to maintain a connection with the audience while keeping as much artistic integrity as possible. It's not just about profits; it's about making an example.


What Is The Money Going To Be Used For?

I've vested my heart and soul into this brand and am ready to transform this dream into a tangible, positive difference in this world. However, I realize that to affect a greater immediate change, your help and support is what is needed. That's where you come in! With the help of IndieGoGo, I hope to raise enough money to produce the first line of shirts, as well as help with the costs of a website. Please help me make America the place that we all know it can be.



What Makes Your Shirts So Epic?

It's an amazing thing how much each shirt really does for both America and the planet. Besides the fact that we use 100% certified organic cotton grown from non-genetically altered seeds and that it flourishes without the use of chemical pesticides or fertilizers, that it's grown in the USA and keeps our farmers farming, our products are also made in the USA and we are committed to following all fair labor standards and practices. Our shirts are hand-printed using eco-friendly methods to minimize the effects on the planet. Every aspect of the creation of this shirt has the creation and sustainment of American jobs in mind, which does not even include donations. Some donations are harder to break down on per shirt level, but two things that each purchase of a shirt does is provide four meals for Americans and plant five trees! Pretty epic, wouldn't you say?


You Mentioned Donations. Could You Tell Me More?

I'm glad you asked. I'd love to tell you more!

1% For The Planet:
The idea is simple. At least 1% of sales goes to improving the planet. It's a simple pledge. We care deeply for our planet and have decided to use our donation to plant trees through an organization called Trees For The Future. We are able to plant five trees per shirt purchased.

VH1 Save The Music Foundation:
Music has always been important to me. When you do research about what learning to play music does, then you hear about music programs that are being cut, you'll want to do what you can to save it.

Indiegogo:
Indiegogo is about funding the independent creation. This is directly helping people follow their dreams. If it wasn't for Indiegogo, this would just be an impossible dream for me. Obviously the opportunity to give back and help fund dreams is something I couldn't resist.

Opportunity Finance Network:
This is an amazing cause and things like this is what America needs right now. Donations go towards investing in opportunities that benefit low-income, low-wealth and other disadvantaged communities across America. They know that community business creates jobs and have created more than 64% of new jobs in the past 15 years. Donations don't just go to creating jobs, they go to sustaining them as well.

Feeding America:
Much of what I'm donating helps to make tomorrow better. Some people are having a hard enough time today. My donations here help provide nutritious, fresh foods to Americans struggling with hunger; safe and nurturing places for children to have a meal; emergency assistance for disaster victims; as well as a chance at self-sufficiency for adults trying to break the cycle of poverty and hunger. Four meals are provided with each shirt purchase.

WWF:
Humans have had a major impact on the planet. We haven't always cared about things as much as we should have. WWF is about more than protecting wildlife. It's about finding a balance between people and nature. The number of amazing animals that are facing the possibility of extinction in our lifetime is sad. The thought of my grandchildren never having the chance to see so many amazing animals but only able to hear about them and see them in books is not acceptable to me.

 

* Please note that the donation aspect of this project is intended for future sales. No part of the money raised on indiegogo will go towards anything other than making and selling shirts.


 
On A Personal Note:

I want to thank you for taking the time to look over my project. This means a lot to me. I'm glad I was able to share my dream with you. So again, thank you. If you like what you have read and you want to get involved, please help me get the word out.

story:
It Begins...                             (official website)

A little about me:

This is the idea guy L.A. Walker...but just call me Alex if you like. I've been an Event Manager and professional DJ/host & presenter for the past 11 years for all kinds of events and shows around the world and it has been a great ride so far. I got into event management, designing and developing awesome themes and party labels for my clients, always raising the bar, designing extraordinary atmospheres, developing sick performances and shows while delivering unique experiences to the guest and my clients. 

The Archimedes Moment: 

Okay, here it is: I spend a lot of time at parties in night clubs, lounges, hotels events, concerts halls, operas, theaters, etc...and I ALWAYS see absolutely gorgeous, empty high heels on the floor or just randomly sitting on the table in the vip area and I wondered why are they are dancing barefoot??!! Are they trying to feel the beat more? Can they break it down better?? Then I realized--THEIR FEET HURT. It then became clear to me why ALL of my buddies and female friends always have to leave my events and go home--their girlfriend's/date's feet are hurting!

Guys never have this problem because we all WEAR COMFORTABLE SHOES with well cushioned soles. I saw this one woman wearing a pair of those high heels that look like sneakers and it hit me! I had that Archimedes moment in the middle of my set! I could integrate that Reebok Pump internal inflation concept into the high heels! Instead of forming a "locking" or "sealing" around the ankle, as the Reebok Pump does, the internal inflatable cushions would be strategically placed to support/relieve the Abductor Hallucis, Flexor Digitorum, Plantar Fasica, Tarsals and the Metatarsals (actually, relieve the pressure that the Metatarsals place on the "ball" of the foot) . Totally forgot to mix the next track while playing my set--was kinda embarrassing. 

      GUYS I AM NOT A DOCTOR NOR AM I STUDYING MEDICINE OR ANATOMY !! ALSO, I AM NOT A CERTIFIED PODIATRIST. SO, FOR ANYONE LOOKING TO CORRECT THE SCIENTIFIC TERMS I USED ABOVE, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DO SO.

...................................................................................................

Research, it was JUST research... :o))

I spent the next few months just randomly interviewing women in heels...getting them to show me the areas where they experienced the most soreness and discomfort. Most of them thought I was some kinda perv until I explained that my intentions were to produce a product that would alleviate that pain so they could dance all night...at which point I became their best friend. :o))

I bought a bunch of those little silicone pads that women put in their shoes to prevent soreness and blisters...found myself twisting, pinching, biting(yes I bit a few of them in the name of science) and folding them to find out how I might be able to integrate them with this idea. I know some of you reading, especially the ladies, are wondering if I actually tried walking in heels to better understand precisely WHAT women experience and just to put your minds at rest--yes, I did. FYI: it is NOT easy to find size 13 platform heels people!! Its even harder to find a pair that look half way decent :o)) :D 

(some of my early sketches)

All contributions will be used to help me: 

  • develop and realize this product, including working and promo prototypes in a few of the common sizes.
  • secure the proper resources to bring this product to market for women everywhere who enjoy dancing and looking great in their heels. 

  • cover a portion of the consulting fees (Podiatrist, Knee & Spine specialist) and legal fees. 

If the funding goal is not reached then it is ONLY FAIR that I return the contributions. It would not be wise OR fair to anyone to begin the project without proper, I should say sufficient, funding.

What we Need & What You Get

I'm bootstrapping and financing everything I can. Fortunately, travel expenses are practically zero because of all the resources available here in Berlin...its pretty awesome because this is such a start-up friendly city. :o)

  • Most of the funding will go towards the OEM & ODM development and production of the micro version of the inflation mechanism. The supplier will have to create a new mold and this costs upwards of $3000. I have a few quotes from different  suppliers and this is the lowest so far. I will keep looking for a more reasonable price. 
  • I am also favoring using a 3D printer which would help reduce the prototype development and production costs.
  • The legal fees for the Utility Patent search and using the Intellectual Property from Paul Litchfeld (<---invented the internal inflation mechanism for the Reebok Pump) will require a small portion of the funding. I have a patent lawyer that I have been using since 2007 for my ideas. Its only 5 subway stations from my apartment.

I really want everyone that contributes to have something--even the selfless contributors that don't want any recognition. It's important to me. I am a bit too concentrated on developing the prototypes so I am not very creative with the perks. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE send me some suggestions for perks that you would like to have added to the campaign!! That would be totally awesome!

Walk This Way

I will upload some media soon. I know this is very plain and boring and I promise to get some more content up and to regularly update it...but right now I am concentrating on getting the micro inflation mechanism designed and finding OEMs & ODMs with reasonable prices.

  • This project/product will not change the world but IT IS a practical application of previously existing products brought together in a different way and IT WILL benefit a large number of people. It won't replace the good 'ol foot massage but it may help reduce the need for them :o)) . No more leaving those heels in the closet because they hurt your feet...and no more going home early because your feet hurt or your special lady's feet hurt--just enjoy your night, look great in those heels and just dance...it'll be okay!

I Appreciate Any Help in Any Form!

Money helps but it is not everything. It's way more important to me that I have the people who share my vision on my side...which is why I ask myself: if money didn't exist how could I get this done? The answer is the same every time--with people who believe in me.

  • It would be cool if someone could help with short product demo vids (editing).
  • I would REALLY appreciate product illustrations from anyone with artistic talents
  • Please share the project ONLY to friends you think are interested--please don't spam anybody--it ain't cool.
  • OEMs & ODMs that might be more flexible than the ones I currently have
  • 3D modeling<---this would be totally awesome if someone skilled, in 2D & 3D CAD Software (SketchUp, Autodesk anything like that), would build working models from my designs for the micro inflation mechanism that would be located on the inner side of the Heel shaft....near the top.

story:
Starting at only $99, we bring you a beautiful five-piece earring set that you can add to your essentials to wear on the daily or nightly. Each piece is designed to complete your different styles and mood each day. "The Daily Earrings Set of 5" presented by Global Luxury Jewelry Maker, Tia Korea.

 

Common issues found with other cheaper earrings that you may already own:
 

Do these problems sound all too familiar?

Tia Korea has a solution for you! 

 

 

 

Elegant and Beautiful earrings for daily, worry-free wear. Each piece, custom made with essential designs for everyday life.

 

 

Tia's Daily Earring Set, brought to you first on Indiegogo!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What makes Tia's Daily Essential Earring Set special?

Endless styling possibilities!

 

 

 

 

Our goal is to produce affordable jewelry that is unique and creative with versatile styles that can be worn regardless of time, place and occasion.  We standby our products with great confidence, as each piece are 100% hand-made by our craftsmen to bringing quality to each of our product. We hope that our products will set a new standard for affordable jewelry amongst the overpriced market of luxury jewelry brands.

The Rose Gold Ribbon with the detachable Long Drop

 

What make TIA different from other "luxury" brands? 

The difference is quality, know-how and brand value. We want to bring you affordable jewelry without sacrificing quality and design. That is why we cut out all marketing fees, branding expenses, advertisements, so in the end you get the best deal on the market. Don't overpay for "designer" brands where you pay for their advertisements, marketing and branding. 

But that's not all. Tia Korea is truly passionate about jewelry design and making great products. Keep scrolling and to find out what were all about.

 

The Tia Daily Essential Set, why were are different from the rest? Lets take a closer look at our six design features.

 

We believe that the details make the difference. That is why we looked-over every minor detail in our products. We wanted to make earrings that can be worn on the daily. So that is why we decided to keep our designs simple yet unique. Our first design point is the drop piece, both in short and long. 

 

The Immaculately Detailed Long Drop

 

 

 

The Short Drop (4cm) and the Long Drop (7cm) in Gold, Silver, and Rose Gold

 

The drop piece will enhance and complement each of our beautifully made stud piece. Wear it classic, short or long depending on your mood or style. It's the same earring but you get completely different looks with the drops.

Can you see the difference?

 

 

 

 

 

The Gold Leaf Earring with the Detachable Long Drop

 

Our drops are detachable and can be combined with almost any stud earrings. So you can even pair it with earrings that you already own. Pair it with your favorite old earrings for a fresh new look!

Although our drops pairs perfectly with our offered studs, they were designed to pair well with almost any other stud earrings. So feel free to mix and match to create your own styles!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sketch > Rendering > Production

 

Tia Korea focuses on making simple designs that can be part of anyone's wardrobe essentials. The key is the selection of types and sizes of the gemstones and technology used to cut the gemstones to maximize light reflection. Then a creating a design for each piece to bring these pieces together to make a beautiful and unique product. 

The entire process from sketch to completion is hand-made by craftsmen with more than 30 years of experience.

We focused on designs that are simple yet unique and luxurious.

 

The Rose Gold Ribbon Earring with the Long Drop

 

 

The Pave-style stone setting process

 

Please zoom in at a TIA Daily earring...

 

Pave Set Gemstones

 

Cheaper earrings use a bonding method in which stones are attached with a bonding agent (aka glue), so the gemstones often pop off easily making the product fragile. The Tia Daily Set using the method called pave setting, only used in high-end jewelry craftmanship, hence giving each piece a luxurious and durable finish. 

In the case of pave setting, the degree of quality of the setting varies greatly on the skill of the craftsman, and it is often used for elaborate hand-made designs.

Tia Korea understands the important of craftsmanship hence uses the finest craftsmen available in the jewelry market.

*In the case of pearl earrings, due to their round nature, the pearls are set by bonding rather than paving.

All our products are crafted with pave setting techniques which allow for a significantly more durable gemstone setting and a luxurious finish.

 

Have you ever experienced discoloration and allergic reaction after wearing jewelry? This issue typically stems from cheap or thin plating, which can chip or peel off. Therefore plating is the critical component in jewelry because it is outer layer that gives protection, shine and color.

 

3 mils of gold plating and 5 mils of white gold plating are only used by the premium jewelry makers. Plating costs have risen due to the recent increases in the price of gold, hence many lower-end jewelry makers use thinner plating to reduce costs. However Tia Korea does not make compromises with plating and only uses premium plating.

 

Official Plating Thickness Certificate

 

All of Tia Korea's earrings' needles are made of 925 silver with platinum and rose/yellow gold plating to make them safe and hypoallergenic.

The earring clutch backs are also made with pure 925 engraved silver to provide comfort and safety to the users.

925 Sterling Silver Engraved Silver Clutch

 

With Tia Korea's philosophy of pursuing perfection up to the final finish, we have generously invested in quality plating and hypoallergenic materials for all our products.

*Because everyone's skin is different, please note that some people may still experience allergies with our products even when hypoallergenic materials are used.

** Due to the characteristics of long drop, the clutch is not made of silver. However it is still treated with nickel-free plating to make it hypoallergenic.

 

TIA uses the highest quality Cubic Zirconia gemstones with strong light reflection and brilliance. Below is the difference between TIA advanced Cubic Zirconia and cheaper synthetic gemstones. Can you see the difference?

 

All Cubic Zirconia used in Tia Korea earrings are triple A grade. Triple A zirconia stones are more durable than other lower grade synthetic gemstones, and have higher degrees of clarity and sparkle.

In addition to the quality of the gemstones, Tia Korea Earrings enhance the divergence and refraction of light by design. Each stone is precisely cut using facets to bring out the best features of the Zirconia Cubic.

One batch is diamonds and the other Triple A Grade Zirconia. Can you tell which is which?

 

The left side stones are the diamonds, and the right side stones are the TIA luxury cubics. Even though the photo was shot with a high-definition camera, the Zirconia Cubic used in TIA's Earrings displays the same the gloss and sparkle as the diamond. (We did a random test within our team of five to pick out which they think is the diamond. Three "incorrectly" picked the Zirconia.)

 

 

 

All products of Tia Earrings are available for free After Service for 2 years. No questions asked.

 

 

If there is any defects (e.g. discoloration, breakage) of the earring, we will repair or replace it for free. (Excluding shipping)

 

 

 

"Our goal is to produce affordable jewelry that is unique and creative with versatile styles that can be worn regardless of time, place and occasion."

The Tia Daily Earrings Set comes in two sets of three different colors to select from.

 

 

01. The Essential Set

The essential set consists of four stud earrings: The fine cut, Swarovski, Ribbon, Heart and the not too fancy but classy Short Drop. If you are looking for a set with only the essentials and a little bit of flair this is the set for you.

 

 

 02. The Daily Set

The Daily set gives you everything in the Essentials set plus the Iconic Leaf earring and the Long Drop attachment. This daily set truly gives you all the simple or luxurious combinations to wear for any time, place and occasion. If you want more ways to express yourself while keeping all the essentials this is the set for you. 

 

 

Let's take a closer look, shall we?

 

 

The Fine Cut Stud

 

Made with creativity and simplicity. Refined rectangular gemstone at the center with four cubic zirconia at the edges to express elegance and luxury.

 

 

 

The Swarovski Stud

Made with upmost attention-to-detail. The brilliant Swarovski pearl is placed in the center, and three delicately placed clusters of cubic zirconia stones pavé set on the edges.

 

 

 

The Elegant Ribbon

Inspired by the Korean "Daenggi" Knot, the curvature and fluidity can be realized in the asymmetrical design, giving the earring life and motion.

 

 

 

The Classic Heart

Classic but not soo classic. A heart earring that expresses love by biting 6 pavé set cubic zirconia stones on a heart base with a gentle volume. It is finished with a modern touch and matte plating to express a young and elegant aura.

 

 

The Iconic Leaf

Uses a unique vertical leaf earring design rather than the common horizontal leaf. Made to provide effect of light from each of the 9 pavé set cubic zirconia "stems". This is truly a unique piece.​

 

 

 

The versatile short drop tail made to provide a simple and feminine flair. A large triple A cubic zirconia stone ending gives a beautiful glow and fluidity.

 

 

Four cubic zirconia stones to express luxury and beauty. Made for the formal occasions and the glamorous evenings. The dazzling long drop will complement and enhance the full effect of your most elegant look.

 

 

Planning a gift for someone? You can add this the gift package to make for a beautiful presentation. Includes a special hard case, dust bag and gift bag. (The Gift Package can only be added with a backing of either the Essential or Daily Set)

Hi there! We are Tia Korea!

 

 

The identity of Tia Korea, which started from thoroughly researching consumer needs, is to realize a new type of luxury products that combine quality, craftsmanship, practicality and affordability. Luxury does not have to be expensive! As the brand name suggests, TIA KOREA, started in South Korea and has attracted a sensational response for its unique designs and value. We now want to bring our products to other parts of the world. We truly hope you will enjoy our products as much as we are passionate about making them.

Each piece is designed to complete your different styles and mood each day. Each piece, custom made with essential designs for everyday life.  Tia's Daily Earring Set, brought to you first on Indiegogo!       What makes Tia's Daily Essential Earring Set special?Endless styling possibilities!    Our goal is to produce affordable jewelry that is unique and creative with versatile styles that can be worn regardless of time, place and occasion.  We standby our products with great confidence, as each piece are 100% hand-made by our craftsmen to bringing quality to each of our product. Watch the below video to see how well the waterproof leather performs on a 7 mile bike ride during a rain storm!:

About Breton 

We're Breton Company. We design products that strike the perfect balance between function and style. We started our company through crowdfunding a little over two and half years ago with the Modern Day Briefcase. Since then we have launched three additional campaigns.  

We are excited to announce the waterproof leather bags as our 5th and best campaign!

The Waterproof Leather Bag Collection 
Three beautifully designed bags made out of waterproof leather. Yes, 100% genuine Italian leather that is also waterproof.

story:
Science enamel pins

Science enamel pins are designed to show your love of the sciences. I incorporated laboratory glassware and periodic elements into the design to convey my love of science in an aesthetically pleasing way. My goal is to create five designs, four of which are stretch goals.
All pins are now unlocked!

Specs

 The pins are soft enamel with silver plating. I chose 1 1/4 inch and 1 inch designs to maximize legibility without being over sized.

  • Soft enamel
  • silver plating
  • comes with butterfly clutch and backing card
  • The periodic element pins are 1 inch across (25.4mm)
  • The lab glassware pins are 1 1/4 from the widest points (31.75mm)

Stretch Goals

All stretch goals met!

 

Timeline

 

Initial Funds breakdown 

 

Risks and challenges

I already have a proof from the manufacturer. I have a lot of experience in the print industry, and have done everything I can to ensure that the pins will look as similar to the mockups as possible. I have looked through physical pantone books rather than just relying on the computer to get more accurate colors. They will probably appear more concave than convex as they appear in the mockups. Manufacturing is supposed to take 3 weeks, but I anticipate closer to 4-5 weeks. I already have a shipping plan and expect things to go smoothly.

What a great funding! It would be your valuable time this year .

story:
HeadWatch has been featured on…

…and many more!

When design and technology fit together!

A technology mutation has created a completely new way of interaction between the human being and smartphone.

UPDATE (11-MARCH-2014):

HeadWatch, a headset or a smartwatch!?

If you usually use a headset on a daily basis, you will perfectly catch the HeadWatch concept. If you don’t use, probably is for the same reasons that the persons that use don’t like to use them, so the HeadWatch is for you too.

When you think on headset, two types of images pops up: messy wires everywhere or broken wireless headset. None of these images? Well, probably you lost your headset, which is also common.

Well, it doesn't need to be like that, HeadWatch solves perfectly your problem! HeadWatch combines headset and smartwatch, so you will get all the notifications and interactions of a smartwatch with the great advantage to pull out the headset and fit on your ear.

Yes, you understood it correctly, because… receiving calls on smartwatch and talk to your wrist… is not so attractive and convenient!

HeadWatch gives you all the comfort of a smartwatch combined with the practical features of a headset for making calls. Be also aware that your smartphone is growing, literaly! Handling the smartphone is becoming trickier, probably it is not in your pocket!   Convinced? Check the video presentation!

What is the HeadWatch?

HeadWatch is a smartwatch composed by a wrist strap and a watch which could be detached and used on the ear as headset. The patent pending HeadWatch technology was created by engineers with design thinking soul. The problem to solve is simple: how can we improve the experience of the headset avoiding the situations faced by every user of losing it or just broken. The best answer was to augment the watch that we know and really create a smart watch with the design and technology capabilities to enable both usage as a smartwatch and as a headset.

Last years some new technology interactions were created and the human being evolved by their usage, example given the finger slide on the screens has just few years.

We are looking for funding to help us to make this amazing smartwatch a reality and contribute to the humanity evolution introducing a new way of interaction and the movement of sliding a technology brick from your wrist till your ear!

How does it work?

Headwatch is a smartwach that pairs with your smarphone and extends the interaction to your wrist. The Headwatch also could be detached and used on your ear as a wireless headset. You will do not need to deal again with the mess of wired headsets or loose and break your wireless headset. 

A set of features are also onboard to augment your environment through sensors to capture movements, ambient and object temperatures and luminosity sensor. RGB strip lights for notifications could be configured at your flavour to fit your own style.

The simplicity of the interface is such that the HeadWatch is button less, all the experience is though the coloured touchscreen. 

The HeadWatch is compatible with iPhone, Android and Windows devices.

UPDATE (19-MARCH-2014):

HeadWatch and the App(lication)s

The HeadWatch nature opens a new concept of integration of features that apparently has no relation but are closely related.

The HeadWatch is provided with a common applications set which includes the smartwatch notifications interface and agenda, the headset facilities and the temperature sensor that enables to measure either ambient as object temperatures.

The applications for messaging and social networks (facebook and twitter) are also onboard as the settings face for your profile customization.

The Slide show application is also included on the default applications set in addition to the visual smartphone pairing and basic Activity tracker.

Check out the HeadWatch campaign stretch goals to see the additional Apps that could be included on the default HeadWatch Software.

The 3rd parties applications development for HeadWatch is also promoted through the HeadWatch SDK that will be made available.

Under the Hood

Sketches

Here are some sketches of the HeadWatch in the early phase.

Prototyping

The funny moments of prototyping…

Development and production phase

This is the timeline to get your HeadWatch on your wrist or on your ear!

Rewards

Take a look on the available rewards:

Stretch Goals

HeadWatch intends to be disruptive in terms of design and usability but also to include technology that enables the usage grow in different frontiers. We real believe on the HeadWatch as an ecosystem for wearable technology evolution, for that we have the following stretch goals!

Our goals go beyond that but we need to start by somewhere!

Risks and Challenges

The technology adopted for HeadWatch is recommended by all the manufacturers for new designs, which means that even new technology is validated! We are in close contact with the electronics suppliers managing the procurement and hardware design review.

The disruptive mechanical design is quite mature after many engineering iterations and usability tests as smartwatch and headset. We are still working on finding the right balance in final version of the enclosure of the watch and headset conversion.

The power management is highly dependent of the software, we are still improving the HeadWatch Operating System and the Software Apps for better power optimization without performance decrease.

We think that the tools availability for new software apps creation is a key for product improvement, we are working hard to provide a set of useful and easy usable tools for third-part apps creation.

FAQ

The HeadWatch is a smartwatch or a headset?

The HeadWatch is a smartwatch which is detachable and convertible in a headset that fits your ear. Easy and clean design that enables you to do this with just one hand.

The HeadWatch has no buttons, how can I control it?

The HeadWatch interaction is by the touchscreen and movement.

How to switch ON-OFF the HeadWatch?

The HeadWatch is always ON since has battery. When the battery drops to a minimum charge, the HeadWatch is automatically switched OFF. When connected the charger, the HeadWatch will automatically switch ON again.

What is the Bluetooth visual pairing?

The Bluetooth pairing with your smartphone is just needed once on the beginning, our technology enables you to with your smartphone take a picture of the HeadWatch and automatically pair both devices. The HeadWatch will be displaying a QR code image with the necessary information to smartphone perform the pairing.

Shipping costs?

Shipping will cost an additional $15, please add them to your contribution. If you have already ordered and didn’t add $15 for shipping, we'll confirm the amount and address with you before we ship, and make any adjustments if necessary.

Will be HeadWatch confortable to use on the ear?

The HeadWatch design takes into consideration all the requirements for ergonomy of an headset. The slim design and light weight are our main focus, soon we will release the final mechanical specs. For the moment we are working hard on the best balance of functionality, design and confort. The results are very promising!

What is the information displayed while using the HeadWatch on the ear?

The face information that is presented while using the HeadWatch as headset is configurable, even to switch OFF the LCD to maintain your privacy.

Is the HeadWatch waterproof?

The HeadWatch is designed to enable the user to enjoy without any constraints on the daily life, so you can submerge up to 1 meter. Even so, we are working to increase the water resistance.

How is the HeadWatch battery charging process?

The HeadWatch battery charging is through an USB cable that could be connected to any USB charger or to your laptop.

How long does the battery last?

The HeadWatch battery is designed to last at least two days with a mixed usage as smartwatch and headset.

How many color bands has HeadWatch?

The HeadWatch will have five different colours at launch, at the end of the campaign the contributors will be involved on the fifth colour definition. For the moment we can advance the four colours already defined: black, gray, red an orange!

Are the HeadWatch bands replaceable?

The watchbands are easily replaceable. Separate watchbands will be available to you to customize your HeadWatch at your daily flavour.
story_txt:
HeadWatch has been featured on…
…and many more!

When design and technology fit together!
A technology mutation has created a completely new way of interaction between the human being and smartphone.




UPDATE (11-MARCH-2014):
HeadWatch, a headset or a smartwatch!?

If you usually use a headset on a daily basis, you will perfectly catch the HeadWatch concept. If you don’t use, probably is for the same reasons that the persons that use don’t like to use them, so the HeadWatch is for you too.
When you think on headset, two types of images pops up: messy wires everywhere or broken wireless headset. None of these images? Well, probably you lost your headset, which is also common.



Well, it doesn't need to be like that, HeadWatch solves perfectly your problem! HeadWatch combines headset and smartwatch, so you will get all the notifications and interactions of a smartwatch with the great advantage to pull out the headset and fit on your ear.
Yes, you understood it correctly, because… receiving calls on smartwatch and talk to your wrist… is not so attractive and convenient!
HeadWatch gives you all the comfort of a smartwatch combined with the practical features of a headset for making calls. Be also aware that your smartphone is growing, literaly! Handling the smartphone is becoming trickier, probably it is not in your pocket!   Convinced? Check the video presentation!



What is the HeadWatch?

HeadWatch is a smartwatch composed by a wrist strap and a watch which could be detached and used on the ear as headset. The patent pending HeadWatch technology was created by engineers with design thinking soul. The problem to solve is simple: how can we improve the experience of the headset avoiding the situations faced by every user of losing it or just broken. The best answer was to augment the watch that we know and really create a smart watch with the design and technology capabilities to enable both usage as a smartwatch and as a headset.
Last years some new technology interactions were created and the human being evolved by their usage, example given the finger slide on the screens has just few years.
We are looking for funding to help us to make this amazing smartwatch a reality and contribute to the humanity evolution introducing a new way of interaction and the movement of sliding a technology brick from your wrist till your ear!

How does it work?
Headwatch is a smartwach that pairs with your smarphone and extends the interaction to your wrist. The Headwatch also could be detached and used on your ear as a wireless headset. You will do not need to deal again with the mess of wired headsets or loose and break your wireless headset. 
A set of features are also onboard to augment your environment through sensors to capture movements, ambient and object temperatures and luminosity sensor. RGB strip lights for notifications could be configured at your flavour to fit your own style.
The simplicity of the interface is such that the HeadWatch is button less, all the experience is though the coloured touchscreen. 
The HeadWatch is compatible with iPhone, Android and Windows devices.


UPDATE (19-MARCH-2014):
HeadWatch and the App(lication)s
The HeadWatch nature opens a new concept of integration of features that apparently has no relation but are closely related.
The HeadWatch is provided with a common applications set which includes the smartwatch notifications interface and agenda, the headset facilities and the temperature sensor that enables to measure either ambient as object temperatures.


The applications for messaging and social networks (facebook and twitter) are also onboard as the settings face for your profile customization.

The Slide show application is also included on the default applications set in addition to the visual smartphone pairing and basic Activity tracker.

Check out the HeadWatch campaign stretch goals to see the additional Apps that could be included on the default HeadWatch Software.
The 3rd parties applications development for HeadWatch is also promoted through the HeadWatch SDK that will be made available.
Under the Hood





Sketches
Here are some sketches of the HeadWatch in the early phase.



Prototyping
The funny moments of prototyping…




Development and production phase
This is the timeline to get your HeadWatch on your wrist or on your ear!




Rewards
Take a look on the available rewards:



Stretch Goals
HeadWatch intends to be disruptive in terms of design and usability but also to include technology that enables the usage grow in different frontiers. We real believe on the HeadWatch as an ecosystem for wearable technology evolution, for that we have the following stretch goals!



Our goals go beyond that but we need to start by somewhere!
Risks and Challenges
The technology adopted for HeadWatch is recommended by all the manufacturers for new designs, which means that even new technology is validated! We are in close contact with the electronics suppliers managing the procurement and hardware design review.
The disruptive mechanical design is quite mature after many engineering iterations and usability tests as smartwatch and headset. We are still working on finding the right balance in final version of the enclosure of the watch and headset conversion.
The power management is highly dependent of the software, we are still improving the HeadWatch Operating System and the Software Apps for better power optimization without performance decrease.
We think that the tools availability for new software apps creation is a key for product improvement, we are working hard to provide a set of useful and easy usable tools for third-part apps creation.
FAQ
The HeadWatch is a smartwatch or a headset?
The HeadWatch is a smartwatch which is detachable and convertible in a headset that fits your ear. Easy and clean design that enables you to do this with just one hand.
The HeadWatch has no buttons, how can I control it?
The HeadWatch interaction is by the touchscreen and movement.
How to switch ON-OFF the HeadWatch?
The HeadWatch is always ON since has battery. When the battery drops to a minimum charge, the HeadWatch is automatically switched OFF. When connected the charger, the HeadWatch will automatically switch ON again.
What is the Bluetooth visual pairing?
The Bluetooth pairing with your smartphone is just needed once on the beginning, our technology enables you to with your smartphone take a picture of the HeadWatch and automatically pair both devices. The HeadWatch will be displaying a QR code image with the necessary information to smartphone perform the pairing.

Shipping costs?
Shipping will cost an additional $15, please add them to your contribution. If you have already ordered and didn’t add $15 for shipping, we'll confirm the amount and address with you before we ship, and make any adjustments if necessary.

Will be HeadWatch confortable to use on the ear?


The HeadWatch design takes into consideration all the requirements for ergonomy of an headset. The slim design and light weight are our main focus, soon we will release the final mechanical specs. For the moment we are working hard on the best balance of functionality, design and confort. The results are very promising!
What is the information displayed while using the HeadWatch on the ear?
The face information that is presented while using the HeadWatch as headset is configurable, even to switch OFF the LCD to maintain your privacy.
Is the HeadWatch waterproof?
The HeadWatch is designed to enable the user to enjoy without any constraints on the daily life, so you can submerge up to 1 meter. Even so, we are working to increase the water resistance.
How is the HeadWatch battery charging process?
The HeadWatch battery charging is through an USB cable that could be connected to any USB charger or to your laptop.
How long does the battery last?
The HeadWatch battery is designed to last at least two days with a mixed usage as smartwatch and headset.
How many color bands has HeadWatch?
The HeadWatch will have five different colours at launch, at the end of the campaign the contributors will be involved on the fifth colour definition. For the moment we can advance the four colours already defined: black, gray, red an orange!
Are the HeadWatch bands replaceable?
The watchbands are easily replaceable. Separate watchbands will be available to you to customize your HeadWatch at your daily flavour.

story:
Made in Colombia

How we manufacture matters. All the MOVA Cycling gear is designed and produced locally, here in Bogotá, Colombia. 95% of the materials comes from Colombia. It takes us a 10 minutes bike ride to reach the factory. This is also the root of our “Política Buena Papa” for Colombia and Latin America because we would like our high-quality products to be accessible to all the cycling family.

Are these only for cycling?

Although we design everything single detail for urban cyclists, the MOVA Cycling gear is the perfect fit for every outdoor activity, and won’t let you down when you’re less outside and need more style.

The strength of our products comes from our love and experience with riding bicycles but the gear itself will help everyone, everywhere. We already have skaters, hikers, sailors, climbers, and even business mens using them.

We have no traditional investors. We believe in crowdfunding. We prefer adapt ourselves to our backers’ needs rather than to the business’ logic. The more funds we raise, the more we will implement your ideas and improve the products, as we did for our first Indiegogo.

You are our original investors. Thanks for all the love many of you have already been posting. We love you!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is MOVA’s 4th crowdfunding campaign. Our first crowdfunding campaign gathered 1.248 Backers in 67 countries. Believe it or not, we were planning with 50 people but still achieved to get our Backers happy and proud.

If we start a 4th Kickstarter now, it’s because we know we can provide you great products and are ready to make them even greater with your help.

Design and manufacturing
We spent three years perfecting our design, selecting trims, and testing samples. Prototypes and their related problems are behind us: the design is ready. We also secured production with a reputable manufacturer. We work with them for more than one year and built a trust-based relationship. Nevertheless, we planned time to cope with the unforeseen.

Shipping risks 
One of the greatest challenge of the first campaign. From our side, the process is now set. We will manly work with DHL and assume the taxes & customs upfront. Nevertheless, you should be aware that issues sometimes arise (lost parcel, wrong address...). But don’t worry, we will have your back and you will have your order no matter what.

The biggest risk is doing better 
Many “classic” risk factors are under control and monitored. But here at MOVA, we see crowdfunding as another way to do business.

The more we get, the more YOU receive. Once again, we want to involve you in the process. As our Backers always have genius and crazy ideas, it might impact the above mentioned factors but shouldn’t delay the whole project.

Our relationship with you is built on trust, reliability and a shared commitment to excellence. We are confident we will succeed in fulfilling every order perfectly. However, if any of the mentioned or forgotten risks occurs, we will be in contact with you at every step of the way.

ESPAÑOL
Conviértete en patrocinador y contribuye a cambio de la recompensa que quieras. Así es como pre-pides nuestros productos en Indiegogo. Tendrás nuestras nuevas prendas antes que todos los demás y a precio especial. Parece comercio en línea normal pero es mucho más que eso: El proyecto evoluciona a través del diseño participativo y tú estarás involucrado en ello.

No tenemos inversionistas tradicionales. Creemos firmemente en el financiamiento participativo. Preferimos adaptarnos a las necesidades de nuestros patrocinadores más que a la lógica de los negocios. Entre más fondos recolectemos más de sus ideas vamos a implementar para mejorar nuestros productos, tal y como lo hicimos en nuestro primera campaña.

Ustedes son nuestros inversionistas originales. Gracias infinitas por todo el amor y apoyo que nos han demostrado, publicado y enviado. Los queremos! 

Selecciona tu recompensa y apoya nuestro proyecto! <3
