story:
Thank you for visiting our page! This project is about financing the printing and manufacturing of tank tops for women with all-over comics designs from the famous DC & Marvel universes.

This idea came to me when a friend of mine was amused by my huge comics t-shirt collection. She was jealous that I had so many when she could only find classic Batman logo tank tops, girly/glittery t-shirts or simply t-shirts that she wouldn't wear because the cut wouldn't fit her well.

Here it was, I thought that it could be interesting to offer women who happen to like comics the opportunity to find something different.

So I launched a crowd funding here in France that allowed me to produce and ship the first collection with three beautiful Batman & Wonder Woman designs.

I then thought that maybe, in other countries as well, some ladies would enjoy nice and feminine super heroes tank tops which is why we are here on IndieGoGo.

With this new crowd funding campaign, we would like to expand the collection  by adding more designs to it and especially Marvel super heroes!

Simply because I feel that comics drawings and designs aren't always used for the art they are but only to advertise something else such as a movie, comic books or video games, when the graphics and the comics style is a real art in itself that deserves to be proudly worn.

More than that, the super heroes in these stories have values, powers and ambitions that make them icons inviting people to outdo themselves and change the world around them.

I believe that clothing can be more than something with a nice drawing on it but accessories that make you feel special, aspiring to something greater, for you and for others.

With this new crowdfunding campaign, we would like to expand our collection to Marvel characters and designs and here are a few mockups of the one we selected.

Please note that these mockups are meant to get the approval for production from Marvel and might change according to their guidelines and recommandations.

The printing process is called sublimation which allows the high quality printing we need for a product that you will want to wear every time you want to feel like a superhero. It never washes away. Never, ever. Except maybe if you dip it in acid, like the Joker in The Killing Joke.

However, sublimation printing can sometimes leave white spots and stripes on the t-shirts, depending on where the wrinkles are when the printing is done. But we don’t! We wanted to have the best quality available so selected a process to have them made without any white spots/stripes/cuts that would make the visuals imperfect.

The front fabric is a soft and light polyester that doesn't shrink or move as you wash it, perfect for this Summer! The back is in plain old cotton, to feel comfortable in these (hopefully) hot Summer days!

Because you are women and like to dress as such, it was mandatory that the cut was nice and would fit you well. This is the main reason why we decided to design the cut and make it exactly how a feminine top should look like instead of buying a bulk of ready to print apparel that fits every size but that actually don’t fit anyone.

It is a relaxed fit, a little bit fitting on the waist, perfect with rough jeans and a jacket or flip flops over your bikini on the beach.

Here is the size chart

Please note that the mockups were realized to present the visuals but the cut will be the one that you can see in the pictures of our customers, based on the first collection produced. Try to measure at least your breast to have a size that fits you well!

About selecting your size, you will receive an email at the end of the campaign to select your size and your design.

In the WHW team, there are three people:

Kathleen is the stylist, she helps me selecting the designs and helped me select the right cut for women. She studied fashion here in Paris and can design, cut, sew and is the one who says what fits and what doesn't because I surely can't.

Virginie is the PR genius. She helps me communicate about my project and contact relevant blogs and news sites thanks to which you might be here today!

And there's me, Nathanaël. I'm a comics fan and I simply feel that this is the right thing to do. For now this is nice comics tank tops but I hope I could develop it to something more elaborate like hoodies, jackets, different kind of tops, other creative universes from Sci-Fi, Heroic Fantasy, Video Games etc.

I know that for some, 30€/$40 can sound like a lot of money for a tank top so here is an explanation of the different costs of the manufacturing process:

  • Sublimation printing: sublimation printing is much more expensive than a simple inking on a white tee giving however much better results, precise printing and vibrant colors that never fade away.
  • Manufacturing: because we designed a specific cut, we cannot have "on demand" manufacturing that would keep our initial investment at a minimum and need to produce a few hundred tanks for every model.
  • Licence fee: DC & Marvel characters are extremely famous and it goes without saying that we have to thank the artists who created such amazing stories. All the products produced thanks to this crowd funding are 100% authorized and licensed.
  • Shipping: Standard worldwide shipping is included. If you want to be able to track your parcel, please add an extra 5€ to your contribution.
  • Custom fees are not included: we ship from France so all the countries in the E.U. should not have any custom fees applied to their parcel. However, destinations such as the US or Canada may have some fees applied to the parcel but we have no visibility on the exact amout so couldn't include them. Apparently, gifts with a value lower than $100 (70€) do not have custom fees applied to them.

With this 5 000 € goal we'll be able to produce the two tank tops that you see above. If we reach 10 000 € we'll be able to produce a third one. After that, we'll offer you a new cut! Who would like a boyfriend cut? Big loose armholes? A cropped top? Who said a dress? A hoodie? Oh yeah!

We ship Worldwide from France. We'll do our best to make sure that every parcel reaches destination but mistakes can happen and if you know that your address is hard to find/unreliable please contact me to see which more secure solution is available.

You can select any tank top already available from the DC collection but please note that they are in limited quantities. If you prefer to wait for the Marvel ones, you will have to vote for your favorite one. The most popular one will be produced and shipped then the second most popular then the third and so on. 

Please take into account the fact that by selecting more than one tank top in the rewards, you mechanically will have to select amongst the Batman & Wonder Woman tops if the goal doesn't allow to produce as many designs as you requested. You can also do it step by step which means take one top for starters and if the goal reached is higher than 5000€ switch for two tanks or more depending on what you wanted in the beginning. However, I would advise you to take from the start the reward you wanted as the success of a campaign is usually a matter of days after the launch.

From the very first spark of idea to today WHW went a long way and we managed to be present at a few events at which we were able to show what the whole project was and where we wanted to go.

Fées Minines Fashion Show

At this fashion show, we were able to show the first prototypes of the DC collection we funded with the first French crowd funding. Hopefully we will be there next week with a much bigger and elaborate collection!

Geekopolis

Geekopolis is pretty much the city of the geeks and regrouped different areas in which you could find all kind of geek subcultures such as steampunk, science-fiction, heroic fantasy and role gaming, japanese culture and of course comics!

These events were really nice and allowed us to meet our first backers and new clients who encouraged us to keep going in this direction. Maybe will we meet at such an event someday as well!

And, this is finally why we’re here. We know that our products can appeal to women all around the world, being comics fans or not and we want them to see that we heard them. Yes, you can wear superhero t-shirts without wearing something that makes you look like a bag of potatoes, yes you can be feminine and stylish, whether in love with the Dark Knight or simply because you think that the Joker is creepy but also such a fun guy!

So, if it’s not for you, you all know that girl who loves comics. Let her know that we are doing it.

Do not hesitate to get in touch with WHW on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest  or Tumblr!

Let’s make this happen.

Nathanaël

Merci d'avoir visité notre page! ce projet vise à produire la fabrication de débardeurs pour femmes avec des imprimés all-over des super héros connus de l'univer DC et Marvel.

Cette idée m'est venue lors d'une discussion avec une amie jalouse de ma collection de t-shirts de super héros car elle ne trouvait jamais de vêtements pour elle, autres que des t-shirts classiques avec un logo ou mal coupés ou d'une piètre qualité.

J'ai alors pensé qu'il serait intéressant de voir si cela pourrait intéresser les gens de proposer des vêtements de comics pour femmes et j'ai donc lancé une première campagne de financement participatif qui m'a permis de créer une première série de 3 débardeurs dans l'univers DC avec des visuels Batman, Joker & Wonder Woman.

Avec cette nouvelle campagne, j'aimerais pouvoir vous proposer de nouveaux débardeurs mais dans l'univers Marvel cette fois-ci!

Tout simplement parce que je trouve qu'aujourd'hui les dessins de super héros ne sont pas utilisés à leur juste valeur. Ces visuels emblématiques ne servent souvent qu'à promouvoir d'autres choses comme un film sorti récemment ou sont imprimés sur des vêtements standardisés voués à être produits en masse sans souci de la qualité du vêtement en lui-même.

Les super héros sont aujourd'hui plus que de simples personnages fictifs, ce sont devenus des véritables icônes, des symboles représentatifs d'un style, d'une époque et d'une culture. Il y a pour moi une évidence dans le mariage entre deux mondes qui s'opposent en apparence que sont la mode et les cultures de l'imaginaire comme les comics.

Dans l'imaginaire ces héros véhiculent également des valeurs fortes de courage, de respect et de force. Lorsque je porte moi-même un t-shirt de comics, j'ai toujours ce petit sourire en coin de me sentir un peu à part parce que sous mon pull se cachent Batman ou les X-Men. Cette sensation j'espère que vous la ressentirez aussi avec un débardeur What Heroes Wear et c'est tout l'état d'esprit de cette marque: des vêtements pour vous faire vous sentir comme les super héros de votre propre vie.

Avec cette nouvelle campagne, j'aimerais élargir la gamme de WHW dans l'univers Marvel avec ces deux premiers débardeurs.

Notez que ces visuels sont des mockups pour validation auprès de Marvel et peuvent changer en fonction de leurs exigences et recommandations.

Le processus d'impression est appelé sublimation et permet d'avoir des couleurs vives et précises qui sont incrustées dans la fibre et qui ne déteindront jamais et ne perdront jamais de leur éclat.

Le débardeur est en polyester léger à l'avant et coton à l'arrière pour offrir couleurs vives et légèreté à ce vêtement pour un été, on l'espère chaud et ensoleillé!

Parce qu'il est important d'avoir une coupe qui soit féminine et tranche avec les classiques t-shirts informes habituellement proposés aux femmes, nous avons travaillé avec Kathleen à la conception d'une coupe qui serait un classique et s'adapterait à toutes vos tenues.

Légèrement ajustée à la taille avec un léger décolleté, ces débardeurs seront parfaits avec un jean et une veste classique ou un short et bikini sur la plage.

Voici le guide des tailles.

Notez que ces mockups ont été réalisés pour présenter les visuels. La coupe sera par contre celle que vous pouvez voir sur les précédents contributeurs. Essayez de mesurer au moins votre tour de poitrine pour avoir une taille qui vous conviendra au mieux!

Vous recevrez également un email en fin de campagne pour choisir votre taille et visuel. Vous pouvez mélanger tailles et visuels pour offrir si vous le désirez.

Pour les premiers contributeurs à la campagne MMC: les tailles ont été changées pour correspondre aux standards donc XXS devient XS, XS devient S etc.

Dans l'équipe WHW il y a trois personnes: 

Kathleen est la styliste du projet. Elle sait coudre, découper, assembler, retoucher et m'a aidé à choisir une coupe qui soit une vraie coupe pour femme.

Virginie s'est chargée des relations presse. Passionnée de bière et de lecture elle a contribué à développer la visibilité de ce projet.

Et puis il y a moi. Je suis un passionné de comics depuis de nombreuses années et de nombreuses rencontres m'ont amené à créer WHW. Au départ un petit projet avec des débardeurs, j'espère pouvoir rapidement l'amener à un projet plus ambitieux avec des pièces plus complexes, inspirées des univers imaginaires comme les comics ou la science-fiction, les jeux vidéos etc.

30€ peut représenter beaucoup d'argent pour un débardeur donc voici une explication des différents coûts auxquels nous devons faire face avec ce projet:

  • Impression en sublimation: l'impression en sublimation nous permet d'avoir un visuel sur l'intégralité du débardeur et des couleurs vives qui ne pâliront jamais au lavage. C'est un procédé plus coûteux qu'une impression classique mais la qualité est incomparable.
  • Fabrication des débardeurs: puisque nous avons décidé dde définir une coupe de débardeur qui soit unique et féminine, nous ne pouvions pas fonctionner avec des vêtements déjà fabriqués qui ne permettent pas une impression intégrale aisément. Chaque série est donc produite en quelques centaines d'exemplaires.
  • Licence officielle: les visuels que nous utilisons sont tirés directement des univers DC et Marvel et il nous semblait évident de faire les choses comme il se devait pour remercier les artistes qui ont écrit et dessiné ces personnages emblématiques. Tous les produits WHW sont 100% officiels.
  • Expédition: Les frais de port sont inclus pour chaque contribution, en France, Belgique, Suisse et Luxembourg.

Avec cet objectif de 5000€ nous pourrons produire ces deux débardeurs. Un second plafond à 10 000€ nous permettra de vous proposer un nouveau visuel de l'univers Marvel. Au delà, nous essaierons de vous proposer une seconde coupe de t-shirts qui comblera vos attentes. T-shirt? Manches longues? A vous de choisir!

Toutes les contributions comprennent les frais de port vers l'international.

Vous pouvez sélectionner n'importe quel visuel de la précédente collection DC. Cependant, veuillez prendre en compte le fait que ces débardeurs sont en quantité limitée.

Veuillez s'il vous plaît considérer le fait que si vous sélectionnez plus de débardeurs que de débardeurs Marvel produits, vous pourrez choisir plusieurs visuels Marvel identiques ou des visuels DC pour compléter votre commande.

De la première idée à aujourd'hui, WHW est devenu un petit projet concret grâce auquel j'ai rencontré certains d'entre vous à différentes occasions.

Défilé des Fées Minines

Ce premier petit défilé nous a permis de présenter la toute première collection de WHW. Nous espérons pouvoir revenir l'année prochaine avec une collection plus fournie!

Geekopolis

Geekopolis c'est la cité des geeks séparée en plusieurs quartiers distincts. Vous y trouverez toutes les cultures de l'imaginaire comme la science-fiction ou héroic fantasy, de la culture japonaise et bien sûr des comics!

Grâce à ces événements nous avons pu rencontre un certain nombre d'entre vous et c'est très encourageant de voir que ce projet vous plaît. Peut-être nous rencontrerons nous à un événement similaire à une prochaine occasion!

Et c'est au final la raison pour laquelle nous sommes sur IndieGoGo. La première campagne de WHW nous a montré que vous êtes nombreuses à aimer ce genre de choses et nous cherchons à répondre à vos attentes du mieux qu'il puisse se faire.

Nous espérons que vous passerez le mot à vos proches afin de faire grossir cette communauté et atteindre alors cet objectif ambitieux. Que vous soyez fan de comics ou tout simplement amusée par un t-shirt de super héros n'hésitez pas à en parler autour de vous!

Rejoignez WHW sur Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest ou Tumblr!

Merci.

Nathanaël
story_txt:
Thank you for visiting our page! This project is about financing the printing and manufacturing of tank tops for women with all-over comics designs from the famous DC & Marvel universes.






This idea came to me when a friend of mine was amused by my huge comics t-shirt collection. She was jealous that I had so many when she could only find classic Batman logo tank tops, girly/glittery t-shirts or simply t-shirts that she wouldn't wear because the cut wouldn't fit her well.



Here it was, I thought that it could be interesting to offer women who happen to like comics the opportunity to find something different.
So I launched a crowd funding here in France that allowed me to produce and ship the first collection with three beautiful Batman & Wonder Woman designs.



I then thought that maybe, in other countries as well, some ladies would enjoy nice and feminine super heroes tank tops which is why we are here on IndieGoGo.
With this new crowd funding campaign, we would like to expand the collection  by adding more designs to it and especially Marvel super heroes!



Simply because I feel that comics drawings and designs aren't always used for the art they are but only to advertise something else such as a movie, comic books or video games, when the graphics and the comics style is a real art in itself that deserves to be proudly worn.



More than that, the super heroes in these stories have values, powers and ambitions that make them icons inviting people to outdo themselves and change the world around them.
I believe that clothing can be more than something with a nice drawing on it but accessories that make you feel special, aspiring to something greater, for you and for others.



With this new crowdfunding campaign, we would like to expand our collection to Marvel characters and designs and here are a few mockups of the one we selected.





Please note that these mockups are meant to get the approval for production from Marvel and might change according to their guidelines and recommandations.
The printing process is called sublimation which allows the high quality printing we need for a product that you will want to wear every time you want to feel like a superhero. It never washes away. Never, ever. Except maybe if you dip it in acid, like the Joker in The Killing Joke.



However, sublimation printing can sometimes leave white spots and stripes on the t-shirts, depending on where the wrinkles are when the printing is done. But we don’t! We wanted to have the best quality available so selected a process to have them made without any white spots/stripes/cuts that would make the visuals imperfect.



The front fabric is a soft and light polyester that doesn't shrink or move as you wash it, perfect for this Summer! The back is in plain old cotton, to feel comfortable in these (hopefully) hot Summer days!



Because you are women and like to dress as such, it was mandatory that the cut was nice and would fit you well. This is the main reason why we decided to design the cut and make it exactly how a feminine top should look like instead of buying a bulk of ready to print apparel that fits every size but that actually don’t fit anyone.
It is a relaxed fit, a little bit fitting on the waist, perfect with rough jeans and a jacket or flip flops over your bikini on the beach.
Here is the size chart



Please note that the mockups were realized to present the visuals but the cut will be the one that you can see in the pictures of our customers, based on the first collection produced. Try to measure at least your breast to have a size that fits you well!
About selecting your size, you will receive an email at the end of the campaign to select your size and your design.



In the WHW team, there are three people:
Kathleen is the stylist, she helps me selecting the designs and helped me select the right cut for women. She studied fashion here in Paris and can design, cut, sew and is the one who says what fits and what doesn't because I surely can't.
Virginie is the PR genius. She helps me communicate about my project and contact relevant blogs and news sites thanks to which you might be here today!
And there's me, Nathanaël. I'm a comics fan and I simply feel that this is the right thing to do. For now this is nice comics tank tops but I hope I could develop it to something more elaborate like hoodies, jackets, different kind of tops, other creative universes from Sci-Fi, Heroic Fantasy, Video Games etc.



I know that for some, 30€/$40 can sound like a lot of money for a tank top so here is an explanation of the different costs of the manufacturing process:



Sublimation printing: sublimation printing is much more expensive than a simple inking on a white tee giving however much better results, precise printing and vibrant colors that never fade away.

Manufacturing: because we designed a specific cut, we cannot have "on demand" manufacturing that would keep our initial investment at a minimum and need to produce a few hundred tanks for every model.

Licence fee: DC & Marvel characters are extremely famous and it goes without saying that we have to thank the artists who created such amazing stories. All the products produced thanks to this crowd funding are 100% authorized and licensed.

Shipping: Standard worldwide shipping is included. If you want to be able to track your parcel, please add an extra 5€ to your contribution.

Custom fees are not included: we ship from France so all the countries in the E.U. should not have any custom fees applied to their parcel. However, destinations such as the US or Canada may have some fees applied to the parcel but we have no visibility on the exact amout so couldn't include them. Apparently, gifts with a value lower than $100 (70€) do not have custom fees applied to them.


With this 5 000 € goal we'll be able to produce the two tank tops that you see above. If we reach 10 000 € we'll be able to produce a third one. After that, we'll offer you a new cut! Who would like a boyfriend cut? Big loose armholes? A cropped top? Who said a dress? A hoodie? Oh yeah!









We ship Worldwide from France. We'll do our best to make sure that every parcel reaches destination but mistakes can happen and if you know that your address is hard to find/unreliable please contact me to see which more secure solution is available.
You can select any tank top already available from the DC collection but please note that they are in limited quantities. If you prefer to wait for the Marvel ones, you will have to vote for your favorite one. The most popular one will be produced and shipped then the second most popular then the third and so on. 
Please take into account the fact that by selecting more than one tank top in the rewards, you mechanically will have to select amongst the Batman & Wonder Woman tops if the goal doesn't allow to produce as many designs as you requested. You can also do it step by step which means take one top for starters and if the goal reached is higher than 5000€ switch for two tanks or more depending on what you wanted in the beginning. However, I would advise you to take from the start the reward you wanted as the success of a campaign is usually a matter of days after the launch.



From the very first spark of idea to today WHW went a long way and we managed to be present at a few events at which we were able to show what the whole project was and where we wanted to go.
Fées Minines Fashion Show



At this fashion show, we were able to show the first prototypes of the DC collection we funded with the first French crowd funding. Hopefully we will be there next week with a much bigger and elaborate collection!
Geekopolis



Geekopolis is pretty much the city of the geeks and regrouped different areas in which you could find all kind of geek subcultures such as steampunk, science-fiction, heroic fantasy and role gaming, japanese culture and of course comics!
These events were really nice and allowed us to meet our first backers and new clients who encouraged us to keep going in this direction. Maybe will we meet at such an event someday as well!



And, this is finally why we’re here. We know that our products can appeal to women all around the world, being comics fans or not and we want them to see that we heard them. Yes, you can wear superhero t-shirts without wearing something that makes you look like a bag of potatoes, yes you can be feminine and stylish, whether in love with the Dark Knight or simply because you think that the Joker is creepy but also such a fun guy!
So, if it’s not for you, you all know that girl who loves comics. Let her know that we are doing it.
Do not hesitate to get in touch with WHW on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest  or Tumblr!
Let’s make this happen.
Nathanaël


Merci d'avoir visité notre page! ce projet vise à produire la fabrication de débardeurs pour femmes avec des imprimés all-over des super héros connus de l'univer DC et Marvel.



Cette idée m'est venue lors d'une discussion avec une amie jalouse de ma collection de t-shirts de super héros car elle ne trouvait jamais de vêtements pour elle, autres que des t-shirts classiques avec un logo ou mal coupés ou d'une piètre qualité.
J'ai alors pensé qu'il serait intéressant de voir si cela pourrait intéresser les gens de proposer des vêtements de comics pour femmes et j'ai donc lancé une première campagne de financement participatif qui m'a permis de créer une première série de 3 débardeurs dans l'univers DC avec des visuels Batman, Joker & Wonder Woman.



Avec cette nouvelle campagne, j'aimerais pouvoir vous proposer de nouveaux débardeurs mais dans l'univers Marvel cette fois-ci!


Tout simplement parce que je trouve qu'aujourd'hui les dessins de super héros ne sont pas utilisés à leur juste valeur. Ces visuels emblématiques ne servent souvent qu'à promouvoir d'autres choses comme un film sorti récemment ou sont imprimés sur des vêtements standardisés voués à être produits en masse sans souci de la qualité du vêtement en lui-même.
Les super héros sont aujourd'hui plus que de simples personnages fictifs, ce sont devenus des véritables icônes, des symboles représentatifs d'un style, d'une époque et d'une culture. Il y a pour moi une évidence dans le mariage entre deux mondes qui s'opposent en apparence que sont la mode et les cultures de l'imaginaire comme les comics.
Dans l'imaginaire ces héros véhiculent également des valeurs fortes de courage, de respect et de force. Lorsque je porte moi-même un t-shirt de comics, j'ai toujours ce petit sourire en coin de me sentir un peu à part parce que sous mon pull se cachent Batman ou les X-Men. Cette sensation j'espère que vous la ressentirez aussi avec un débardeur What Heroes Wear et c'est tout l'état d'esprit de cette marque: des vêtements pour vous faire vous sentir comme les super héros de votre propre vie.

Avec cette nouvelle campagne, j'aimerais élargir la gamme de WHW dans l'univers Marvel avec ces deux premiers débardeurs.




Notez que ces visuels sont des mockups pour validation auprès de Marvel et peuvent changer en fonction de leurs exigences et recommandations.
Le processus d'impression est appelé sublimation et permet d'avoir des couleurs vives et précises qui sont incrustées dans la fibre et qui ne déteindront jamais et ne perdront jamais de leur éclat.

Le débardeur est en polyester léger à l'avant et coton à l'arrière pour offrir couleurs vives et légèreté à ce vêtement pour un été, on l'espère chaud et ensoleillé!

Parce qu'il est important d'avoir une coupe qui soit féminine et tranche avec les classiques t-shirts informes habituellement proposés aux femmes, nous avons travaillé avec Kathleen à la conception d'une coupe qui serait un classique et s'adapterait à toutes vos tenues.
Légèrement ajustée à la taille avec un léger décolleté, ces débardeurs seront parfaits avec un jean et une veste classique ou un short et bikini sur la plage.
Voici le guide des tailles.

Notez que ces mockups ont été réalisés pour présenter les visuels. La coupe sera par contre celle que vous pouvez voir sur les précédents contributeurs. Essayez de mesurer au moins votre tour de poitrine pour avoir une taille qui vous conviendra au mieux!
Vous recevrez également un email en fin de campagne pour choisir votre taille et visuel. Vous pouvez mélanger tailles et visuels pour offrir si vous le désirez.
Pour les premiers contributeurs à la campagne MMC: les tailles ont été changées pour correspondre aux standards donc XXS devient XS, XS devient S etc.

Dans l'équipe WHW il y a trois personnes: 
Kathleen est la styliste du projet. Elle sait coudre, découper, assembler, retoucher et m'a aidé à choisir une coupe qui soit une vraie coupe pour femme.
Virginie s'est chargée des relations presse. Passionnée de bière et de lecture elle a contribué à développer la visibilité de ce projet.
Et puis il y a moi. Je suis un passionné de comics depuis de nombreuses années et de nombreuses rencontres m'ont amené à créer WHW. Au départ un petit projet avec des débardeurs, j'espère pouvoir rapidement l'amener à un projet plus ambitieux avec des pièces plus complexes, inspirées des univers imaginaires comme les comics ou la science-fiction, les jeux vidéos etc.

30€ peut représenter beaucoup d'argent pour un débardeur donc voici une explication des différents coûts auxquels nous devons faire face avec ce projet:


Impression en sublimation: l'impression en sublimation nous permet d'avoir un visuel sur l'intégralité du débardeur et des couleurs vives qui ne pâliront jamais au lavage. C'est un procédé plus coûteux qu'une impression classique mais la qualité est incomparable.

Fabrication des débardeurs: puisque nous avons décidé dde définir une coupe de débardeur qui soit unique et féminine, nous ne pouvions pas fonctionner avec des vêtements déjà fabriqués qui ne permettent pas une impression intégrale aisément. Chaque série est donc produite en quelques centaines d'exemplaires.

Licence officielle: les visuels que nous utilisons sont tirés directement des univers DC et Marvel et il nous semblait évident de faire les choses comme il se devait pour remercier les artistes qui ont écrit et dessiné ces personnages emblématiques. Tous les produits WHW sont 100% officiels.

Expédition: Les frais de port sont inclus pour chaque contribution, en France, Belgique, Suisse et Luxembourg.

Avec cet objectif de 5000€ nous pourrons produire ces deux débardeurs. Un second plafond à 10 000€ nous permettra de vous proposer un nouveau visuel de l'univers Marvel. Au delà, nous essaierons de vous proposer une seconde coupe de t-shirts qui comblera vos attentes. T-shirt? Manches longues? A vous de choisir!




Toutes les contributions comprennent les frais de port vers l'international.
Vous pouvez sélectionner n'importe quel visuel de la précédente collection DC. Cependant, veuillez prendre en compte le fait que ces débardeurs sont en quantité limitée.
Veuillez s'il vous plaît considérer le fait que si vous sélectionnez plus de débardeurs que de débardeurs Marvel produits, vous pourrez choisir plusieurs visuels Marvel identiques ou des visuels DC pour compléter votre commande.

De la première idée à aujourd'hui, WHW est devenu un petit projet concret grâce auquel j'ai rencontré certains d'entre vous à différentes occasions.
Défilé des Fées Minines

Ce premier petit défilé nous a permis de présenter la toute première collection de WHW. Nous espérons pouvoir revenir l'année prochaine avec une collection plus fournie!
Geekopolis

Geekopolis c'est la cité des geeks séparée en plusieurs quartiers distincts. Vous y trouverez toutes les cultures de l'imaginaire comme la science-fiction ou héroic fantasy, de la culture japonaise et bien sûr des comics!
Grâce à ces événements nous avons pu rencontre un certain nombre d'entre vous et c'est très encourageant de voir que ce projet vous plaît. Peut-être nous rencontrerons nous à un événement similaire à une prochaine occasion!

Et c'est au final la raison pour laquelle nous sommes sur IndieGoGo. La première campagne de WHW nous a montré que vous êtes nombreuses à aimer ce genre de choses et nous cherchons à répondre à vos attentes du mieux qu'il puisse se faire.
Nous espérons que vous passerez le mot à vos proches afin de faire grossir cette communauté et atteindre alors cet objectif ambitieux. Que vous soyez fan de comics ou tout simplement amusée par un t-shirt de super héros n'hésitez pas à en parler autour de vous!
Rejoignez WHW sur Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest ou Tumblr!
Merci.
Nathanaël

story:
Meet KP Tape Measure

The KP tape is a new tape measure that is going to revolutionize the way people measure. It’s ability to clip onto the KP pin or an ordinary 1/2 inch lag will allow you to measure from an exact point without the help of another person. The clip is designed  to rotate 360 degrees allowing you to measure multiple points from a spot and mark a perfect radius or circle. The tape is calibrated to measure from the exact center of the KP pin or lag so you can be assured you are getting a 100 % accurate measurement every time.

The KP tape will be made with ether Imperial markings (feet and inches) or Metric markings (centimeters) allowing it to be used worldwide. All plastic parts are made with ABS plastic and manufactured in the USA. All metal parts ( except tape blade ) are stainless steel. All the tapes are assembled in Moorpark, California. 


The KP 50 Foot and 15 Meter.  Tape case is black because it is a prototype. Production tape cases will be burnt orange in color

The KP 100 Foot and 30 Meter.

The 50 foot /15 meter and 100foot / 30 meter side by side

The KP Pin (prototype)

KP Pin with clip attached

KP Tape & Pin working upside down

KP Tape used with lag in ground

Measuring long distance

I am really excited about sharing my new tape measure with the world. With your help , I will be able to do this. I need to raise $33,000 to bring this project to life. Every single contribution will be greatly appreciated  and will make a huge difference in getting this project off the ground.

Who's it for ?

Homeowners / Do it yourself rs

Handyman

Construction Professionals

  • Landscapers, Pool builders, Concrete and flat work
  • Carpenters, Plumbers, Electricians
  • Fence and block wall builders
  • Deck and patio cover builders

Contractors /  Estimators

Excavators / Ground Work

Coaches / Sport field set up 

Farmers / Ranchers

Equestrian / Horse training

Archeologists / Geologist

Police Departments / Crime scene Investigators 

What can I do with it?

Every Day Measuring.

You can use the KP tape for your every day measuring. The ability of the clip and pin or lag to measure from a exact spot will give you an 100 percent accurate measurement every time. This will be a great asset when you don't have someone around to help you measure or if you do, they might just hold you in the wrong spot. 

Measure in the ground

The KP Tape is a great tool for measuring in the ground.  This task is made simple with the lag and clip. You will be able to measure from an exact spot in the ground without the fear of the tape blade moving or becoming unattached.   

Square something up with a right angle.

You can use the KP tape with the KP pins or lags to find a right angle. By using the KP tape for this task, your measurements will be extremely accurate and precise. You will be able to do this task with ease and without the help of another person.

The 3-4-5 rule is a great way to find a right angle because it is easy to remember and is extremely versatile. All though I used feet in the example, the 3-4-5 are actually units, which means you can use it with inches, feet, yards, centimeters, meters, miles and kilometers. You can increase the size of the right angle by multiplying each of the units by the same number. Example: say you pick 5 as the number. you would multiply 3x5=15, 4x5=20 and 5x5=25. You would have 15,20,25 as your units. 

Marking a perfect radius or circle.

If you want to mark a radius or circle, the KP tape is the tool for the job. Having the pin or lag stay firmly positioned in a spot and the ability of the clip to rotate freely, allows you to mark your radius and circle easily and accurately. No need for help from another person.

Measuring off a ladder or up high.

Say you need to measure something that takes a ladder.  With the KP tape, you can set the pin, hook the clip and move to where ever you need to measure. This saves you from having to get someones help and a second ladder. The unique ability of the clip to stay hooked on the pin with no tension on the blade and when it's windy will save you a lot of time and  aggravation.


Why a $33,000 goal ?

$15,000 injection mold cost ( 2 molds)

$15,000 first production run

$3,000 Fees

Timeline

October-November 2014: Indiegogo Campaign

December 2014: Order molds and tape blades

January 2015: Molds finished and tested, order plastic parts

February2015: Receive all materials and start assembly.

March2015: Start shipping perks

The KP Story

The journey began  on September 1, 2011.  I was in the construction industry for 30 years and after the collapse of the housing market in 2008, I knew it was time to move on. I have always loved building things and always had a ton of ideas about new products. But that's all they were, just ideas. On that September day I decided to act on one. The idea was to build a clip that would attach to a flag stick used in golf that would stay where you attached it but still had the ability to rotate 360 degrees. Like most things, easier said than done. After about 2 months and countless designs I finally figured it out. So I built a prototype out of wood.


It worked! I filed for a utility patent and started looking into producing the clip out of plastic. After showing the prototype to some friends one of them knew  a guy named Jim that made injection molds . He immediately took a interest and started working on how to make the clip out of plastic. After a few weeks of design we came up with a injection mold-able clip.  Jim  cut a prototype on his cnc machine out of a block of ABS plastic. We put it together and after some testing and tweaking , it was done. On to building the tape measure. I came up with a design and Jim again prototyped it. Put the whole thing together and tested it. It worked fantastic! I gave Jim the OK to build the 7 production molds needed while I procured the tape blades ( a story in itself). He finished the molds, we tested them, adjusted them and retested until we got them right. We took the molds to Pope Plastic in Chatsworth, Ca and ran a small production run of the parts.


Anyway, along my journey, in the back of my mind, I always thought  the tape and clip would work great in the construction industry. I started giving it more and more thought and came up with the idea of a short pin with a nail down the center that the clip could attach to. I made a prototype of the pin and tested it. WOW! It worked fantastic. It allowed me to measure things myself that before took another person to help. It is 100% accurate and I don't have to wonder if that other person is holding me in the right place. When I needed to measure something that takes a ladder, it used to take two people and two ladders, I can now measure alone with one ladder. You can even use it upside down. If you need to square something up , mark a radius or circle , the clip allows you to do this with ease and without help. Another advantage is that the clip stays attached even in windy conditions and doesn't require tension on the blade to stay attached. I then started to think about how you could measure in the ground. It dawned on me that a 1/2 ordinary lag screw would work perfect. I got one, tested it and guess what, It works fantastic.

Risks & Challenges

Although things can certainly go wrong unexpectedly, having been through the whole process with the KP golf tape from design to fulfillment and having my supply chain complete, I see the risk to be minimal. By knowing how long the process actually takes allows me to be confident that I will be able to fulfill the perks on time and as promised.
One of the challenges in creating a new product is will it actually work as you envisioned it. This takes time and testing. I have been through this process already with the golf tape and have made all the necessary adjustments and tested the tape extensively.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us get the word out by sharing our story with your friends on Facebook and Twitter

takes a ladder, it used to take two people and two ladders, I can now 
measure alone with one ladder. You can even use it upside down. If you need to 
square something up , mark a radius or circle , the clip allows you to 
do this with ease and without help. Another advantage is that the clip 
stays attached even in windy conditions and doesn't require tension on 
the blade to stay attached. I then started to think about how you could measure in the ground. It 
dawned on me that a 1/2 ordinary lag screw would work perfect. I got 
one, tested it and guess what, It works fantastic.
  Risks & Challenges 
Although things can certainly go wrong unexpectedly, having been 
through the whole process with the KP golf tape from design to 
fulfillment and having my supply chain complete, I see the risk to be 
minimal. By knowing how long the process actually takes allows me to be 
confident that I will be able to fulfill the perks on time and as 
promised.
One of the challenges in creating a new product is will it actually 
work as you envisioned it. This takes time and testing. I have been 
through this process already with the golf tape and have made all the 
necessary adjustments and tested the tape extensively.
  Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help: 
Help us get the word out by sharing our story with your friends on Facebook and Twitter

story:
Our most anticipated collection is on it's way!

Following the success of our crowdfunding campaign, the Sub Aquatic is now available to pre-order on Indiegogo!

 

Introducing the Sub-Aquatic

At Pompeak we create the watches we want to wear, focusing on beautiful design and quality components before anything else. 

By enlisting the help of our community and listening to feedback all the way from design to pre-production, we've been able to concentrate on the things that really matter to ensure we can introduce this collection at the best possible price. 

Sticking to this core value has led to features across the industry:

Further details and reviews can be found toward the end of this page

 

British Design/Swiss Movement

Our first ever dive watch has been designed, refined and tested over the last 12 months to ensure the end result is a stunning fusion of British design, high quality materials and Swiss automatic movements, with a price point to contrast the premium features.

Sounds good, right? So lets break it down.

 

Swiss Automatic Movement:

The Swiss have a world leading reputation for watch expertise. Built up over hundreds of years of innovation and consistent excellence, they continue to set the standard to which all others are judged. 

So, when looking for the perfect movement to power this watch, the choice became obvious:

The Sellita SW200-1 is recognized as one of the best work horse movements around. Often found in watches costing thousands, features include: hacking, hand winding and a quick set date function. A truly outstanding display of horology.

SW200-1 Specs:

  • Self-Winding Mechanism
  • 28,800 Vibrations per hour
  • 26 Jewels
  • 38 Hour Power Reserve

Automatic/self-winding watches are often chosen as the perfect combination of character and heritage of the mechanical watch, without the need to manually wind the movement each day.

 

The Dials:

Keeping a dive watch dial legible is key, but that doesn't mean it can't be interesting. 

Dial option 1: With bold hands and applied indices contrasting the 3D textured dial, we've added depth to what is traditionally a very generic watch face.

Dial option 2: For the stunning yet clean look, we're introducing a deep blue/black gradient dial. 

Dial option 3: A classic gloss black. You can't go wrong with this one.

 

Super-LumiNova:

Dive down (or switch the off lights) and the watch really shines thanks to the Swiss Super-LumiNova (BGW9) filled hands, indices and bezel. 

BGW9 Lume has a long lasting, blue glow at night, with a clean white look in the day.

 

The Case:

The inspirations for this case may be clear, 40mm of highly polished and brushed 904L Stainless steel, topped with a 120 click, uni-directional ceramic bezel.

Historically 904L has been reserved for a select few watches costing big bucks, largely due to the increased complications in sourcing and processing, however as the technology and machinery becomes more widely available, the cost associated also comes down and we're finally able to introduce this under £500!

904L is often referred to as a corrosion resistant super alloy due to it's exceptional, almost perfect, aging properties, even in the harshest of environments. 

 

Water Resistance

What use is a dive watch without water resistance?

In this day and age, let's be honest, frequent Scuba Divers use a digital dive computer as their main life saving tool, but who doesn't want a watch that can survive just about anywhere they can?

That's why we've doubled the minimum water resistance required for a "divers" watch with 20ATM - Up to 200m!

 

The Bezel:

The elapsed time bezel is used to measure total dive time and decompression stops - a crucial addition to any dive watch. 

With a 120 click uni-directional bezel and ceramic insert, we're combining precise timing with an almost scratch proof material, complete with a refined and elegant shine.

The uni-directional feature means the bezel will only rotate counter-clockwise and any accidental knocks will only "add" to the elapsed time. 

Whether it's the waters surface or your next meeting - It's almost always better to arrive a little early than a little late.

 

The Glass:

If you know anything about watch glass/crystal, you'll know that Sapphire Crystal is the most scratch resistant you can get. With a hardness only inferior to diamond, this is a no-brainer.

Our double domed, solid sapphire crystal is no different, with added Anti-Reflective (AR) coatings ensuring crystal clear readability in all conditions.

 

The Straps:

Choose between a classic stainless steel link bracelet with highly polished center links, complete with a sliding micro adjust clasp or an extremely durable rubber strap complete with quick release pins for easy, yet secure, on/off.

 

Technical/Dimensions

 

DIAL 3

Dial 1 & Dial 2 available with black bezel. Dial 3 available with red bezel.

Dial/Strap options do not affect pricing and are selected at the end of the campaign

 

Reviews/About us

Since launching Pompeak, we've fulfilled hundreds of orders through two successful Kickstarter campaigns alongside our web store sales. 

Sure, the road hasn't always been plain sailing, but staying transparent and prioritizing quality and our customers before anything else has ultimately helped us learn the valuable lessons to get us to where we are today.

Our past backer and customer reviews say this better than we can:

 

We're also being talked about in the industry:

 

"A timepiece that combines the best that British design has to offer with the best that Swiss engineering has to offer"

- Yanko Designs

 

"Pompeak is back with a range of stunning watches at a price point that defies its premium feature set"

- Gear Patrol

 

"For the price, it's hard to beat"

- Oracle Time

 

"A new business with big ideas"

- British GQ

 

"Something tells me a lot of folks expect good things from Pompeak"

-The Adult Man

 

Now, over to you. 

Thank you for taking the time to read this campaign, we really hope you love the collection just as much as we do.

Since the campaign has already met it's funding goal, we're about to start production, making this your last opportunity to save big and be among the first to receive your very own Sub-Aquatic!

Thank you to all of our backers, old and new, for making this happen - We wouldn't be where we are today without you!

 View more on Instagram or Website

See our Kickstarter campaign

story:
What is LensCap Buddy?

LensCap Buddy is a clever way to never lose your lens cap again. It’s different from any other solution out there as it doesn’t involve hanging your lens cap from an elastic, needing to glue magnets onto your lens cap or adding weight to your camera.

In short:

-  Never lose your lens cap again.

-  Easy to install on your camera strap, which is always on your camera.

-  Lightweight, making sure your camera is the only heavy object in your hands.

-  Available in different sizes.

-  Available in two colors to keep your Canon® and Nikon® style.

So… tell me more about LensCap Buddy

Design: LensCap Buddy has been designed with 2 colors as to fit perfectly with the straps available on Canon® and Nikon® DSLR cameras. For sure you don´t want a red lens cap on a Nikon® yellow camera or vice-versa!

Material: LensCap Buddy is made from 100% polyester for enhanced durability. It comes with red or yellow stitching.

Closing: LensCap Buddy closing is made with Velcro as to keep weight down and allow you to adjust closing size.

Toughness: LensCap Buddy is made to resist whatever you do and wherever you take your DSLR camera.

Size: We have developed LensCap Buddy in 3 different sizes per DSLR system as to perfectly fit your lens. Please see the table below in the FAQ.

Weight: LensCap Buddy is extremely light, to avoid adding any extra weight to your neck and shoulders.

The Story

I’m a passionate amateur photographer that got tired of looking for his lens cap. Why do cameras have this little plastic thing that can get lost so easily? I would easily leave mine on a restaurant table to never be seen again, or in some jacket or jeans pocket to reappear only several days later.

So I started thinking of a way to store my lens cap where it should be, close to the lens it belongs to and close to my camera! After many prototypes with the help of my wife involving materials, elastic cables, glue, magnets, etc… We came up with the idea for LensCap Buddy, a clever and simple way to store your lens cap and never lose it again!

All we need is you!

We’ve already been able to manufacture the prototypes you can see in the video with our supplier. Everything is ready for production, just waiting for your help!

Your funding will allow us to:

-  Help us make our product a reality.

-  Kickoff the production run with our supplier, who has a minimum order quantity we need to fulfill.

-  Develop a packaging worthy of you.

-  Ship LensCap Buddy to your homes so they can be where they should – on your cameras.

Your Pledge

Any pledge brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us take this cool idea to be an actual reality on each and every DSLR camera out there.

Your amazing contribution, however small, will help us reach the quantity needed to kick off the first production run.

Click on any perk on the right, or simply spread the word by sharing our page!

Other ways I can help?

Spread the word! Just by letting more people know about LensCap Buddy will help us reach our goals. We’ll be forever in your debt for making our dream a reality!


Risks and Challenges

MANUFACTURING: Even though we already designed and developed the 6 prototypes with our manufacturer, we need to ensure the quality is 100% amazing during the whole production run and our timing schedule is kept.

In designing LensCap Buddy we studied not having to develop plastic molding tools. Not only where they not necessary for this design, but would add cost and complexity to the production.

PACKAGING: We still need to develop the design of the packaging that LensCap Buddy will be shipped in. While not critical to deliver the core, packaging is there to make sure your LensCap Buddy arrives in its best condition. We still need to make it happen in these 2 months.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Some of our friends that have seen LensCap Buddy have already had some amazing ideas to make it better, like a small pouch on the front to store and extra SD memory card. If we pass the funding objective we’ll start adding YOUR suggestions to some stretch objectives.

GLOBAL SHIPPING: We’ve never done a global shipping like with LensCap Buddy. We are quick learners and have logistic consultants (i.e. friends) that will guide us along the way.

SUPPLIERS: We are working with manufacturers that have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. They have been extremely responsive along what we have already accomplished and we have no doubt they will deliver the best product for you, our LensCap Buddy backer.

FAQ

- When will I get my LensCap Buddy?

Our current schedule is:

     June 2014: Find suppliers.

     Sept 2014: Create first production prototypes.

     Nov 2014: Feedback rounds on prototypes.

     Dec 2014: Pictures and video creation for campaign.

     Jan 19, 2015: Launch Indiegogo campaign.

     March 2015: Close successful Indiegogo campaign. Kick-off production.

     May 2015: Receive bulk shipment of LensCap Buddy, send to each and every one of you, our faithful backers!

- When do I choose the size and color?

After the successful campaign we will send out a survey.

- When do I give my address?

In the same survey where you will choose the size.

- Shipping costs?

Please make sure you add shipping costs as per the perk details.

- What about sizes?

You will be able to choose a size and a color at the end of the campaign. To find which size is right for your specific lens, please refer to the tables below.

As a guidance:

Canon® S - Small size fits 52 to 58mm size lens caps (same size as lens filter size).

Canon® M - Medium size fits 67 to 72mm size lens caps (same size as lens filter size).

Canon® L - Large size fits 77 and 82mm size lens caps  (same size as lens filter size).

Nikon® S - Small size fits 52mm size lens caps (same size as lens filter size).

Nikon® M - Medium size fits 58 to 62mm size lens caps (same size as lens filter size).

Nikon® L - Large size fits 67, 72 and and 77mm size lens caps (same size as lens filter size).

- And if I have multiple lens with multiple lens cap sizes?

A bigger LensCap Buddy will always fit a smaller lens cap. i.e. a Medium size will allow you to keep any lens cap that would fit in a Small.

- I bought my camera in a kit, I have no clue what lens is on it!

Normally Canon® kits ship with an EF-S 18-55mm lens (LensCap Buddy Canon® S size) or a EF-S 18-135mm lens (LensCap Buddy Canon M size). You can read it on the front of the lens.

Normally Nikon® kits ship with a Nikkor® AF-S DX 18-55mm lens (LensCap Buddy Canon® S Size) or a Nikkor® AF-S DX 18-105mm lens (LensCap Buddy Canon® M Size).

Canon® table:

Nikon® table:

*Tables above are filled to the best of our knowledge, and we take no responsibility for any mistakes on lens/LCB sizes.

story:
Statistics indicate that the quantity of mobile app users will continue to rapidly increase. Although the project began as a website, I chose to deliver the GU platform on a mobile application to ensure it supported a wider audience that's on the go. Your support towards the goal of $50,000 gives me the green light to help place fashion at your fingertips- regardless of your location.

FEATURES

The HOTT Point system helps promote the fun of sharing fashion. Giving a HOTT Point unlocks the retail mystery to the outfit of interest! GU members will be notified upon receiving a HOTT point. 


Follow Me! feature allows you to build an audience of fashionistas.


Social Media Integration: Share your style within GU with the option to link across other social media platforms (e.g. Facebook, Pinterest). Doing so will maximize your exposure and may garner you more HOTT points.

Filter:  Tailor your app. by age and/or fashion style to customize your account.


Fashion Icons encompass the outfit details. At minimum, a member must input retail details of her top (i.e blouse, sweater) and bottom (i.e. jeans, skirt) for the outfit to upload.


Chat:  Connect with fellow fashionista's in real-time from around the world. 

GU gives you the option to upgrade to its In-App subscription. The subsciption includes all the perks of a free membership in addition to added benefits.  GU's focus is always to give back to its members. The $1.99/monthly subscription helps fund the following fun:

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Over a year ago, I initially launched the Girls United project as a website. It was thrilling to see this vision unfold but because it was self-funded, the costs associated with this venture dramatically slowed down the process.

The vision of GU stretches across the course of many years. Phase one allows members to enjoy the entire social media experience: chatting, following your favorite fashionistas, receiving HOTT points and other exciting features. Rather than complete phase one as website, a larger audience would be supported through the release of a mobile app.

Indiegogo offers the unique opportunity to release phase one, with all of its exciting features, through the support of the community.

Your support will help propel the mobile app into existence and will play a significant role in uniting women through fashion.


A COPY OF THE BOOK, 'THEY MADE ME DO IT'. This memoir unveils the driving force that propelled the passion and motivation behind the conception of GU.

GU BOOKMARK: Made using recycled paper and vegetable based ink. Because we love fashion and our earth too.

HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (women): Crafted of .925 sterling silver, this charm bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Two mini dog tag charms come custom engraved with the text: "Honorary Founder" (charm 1) "Girls United" (charm 2).  Please be sure to indicate desired length:  7", 7.5" or 8"

HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (men): This ID bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Crafted of .925 solid sterling silver and featuring 350 gauge curb links, this bracelet is available in the following lengths of 8" or 9". Front engraving: "Honorary Founder".  Inner engraving: "Girls United".

If backers support beyond the requested funding I am prepared to channel that momentum as follows:


Many thanks for supporting this project. Please share to spread the word.
