The $1.99/monthly subscription helps fund the following fun:WHY INDIEGOGO?Over a year ago, I initially launched the Girls United project as a website. It was thrilling to see this vision unfold but because it was self-funded, the costs associated with this venture dramatically slowed down the process.The vision of GU stretches across the course of many years. Phase one allows members to enjoy the entire social media experience: chatting, following your favorite fashionistas, receiving HOTT points and other exciting features. Rather than complete phase one as website, a larger audience would be supported through the release of a mobile app.Indiegogo offers the unique opportunity to release phase one, with all of its exciting features, through the support of the community.Your support will help propel the mobile app into existence and will play a significant role in uniting women through fashion.A COPY OF THE BOOK, 'THEY MADE ME DO IT'. This memoir unveils the driving force that propelled the passion and motivation behind the conception of GU.GU BOOKMARK: Made using recycled paper and vegetable based ink. Because we love fashion and our earth too.HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (women): Crafted of .925 sterling silver, this charm bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Two mini dog tag charms come custom engraved with the text: "Honorary Founder" (charm 1) "Girls United" (charm 2).  Please be sure to indicate desired length:  7", 7.5" or 8"HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (men): This ID bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Crafted of .925 solid sterling silver and featuring 350 gauge curb links, this bracelet is available in the following lengths of 8" or 9". Front engraving: "Honorary Founder".  Inner engraving: "Girls United".If backers support beyond the requested funding I am prepared to channel that momentum as follows:Many thanks for supporting this project. Please share to spread the word.

story:
Who am I and what is a Gargoyle?

My name is Rodney and I created the revolutionary Stock Gun called the Gargoyle.

Below is the first generation of the Gargoyle. 

There were 80 made and all sold very quickly at a retail cost of $675. Version two has many new features!


 I created the Gargoyle to address issues that I really didn't care for when I played the game. Essentially because I was frustrated. I really disliked having to disassemble the gun for every little issue that I encountered through out a day of play. 

Stressing out at the chrono station trying to get dialed in before the next game if my gun was shooting too low or too high. Breaking paint inside the breach, having to change springs, or just perform routine cleaning, I just knew there was a better way. It took years of searching and a whole lot of "NO's" before I found a local machine shop that was willing to build the Gargoyle and the players loved it!

With the initial success of the Gargoyle, I continued to refine its design and now I am ready to manufacture the second generation Gargoyle. It is not only ready to get manufactured, but it also has a sister gun called the Warthog that is an open class gun as well! 

Once you contribute you can qualify for our Referral Based Prizes! You must be logged into your IndieGoGo account and using IndieGoGo's share tools so you can track your referrals. You can track your referrals by looking into your IndieGoGo Profile. It's fun and easy. 



 Let's make these the first paintball guns to ever have been crowd funded!

The Gargoyle II:


The Warthog:

What is the money that is raised used for?

  1. Provide the funding to cover the initial design work
  2. Provide the funding for prototyping before mass production
  3. Provide funding for production
  4. Provide funding for polishing and anodizing
  5. Assembly of the guns
  6. Shipping material and shipping costs

What makes the Gargoyle II so different….so special?

The Gargoyle II and Warthog have numerous features that make them two of the most unique guns on the market today. 

Fit and finish are very important and I strive to make these the best looking and best feeling paintball guns you can buy. However, function is just as important and that is where all the features come into play. 

Both guns are designed to make you not only stand out in a crowd but also make the mundane things like spring changes, cleaning, and general maintenance hassle free and dare I say enjoyable?  

____________________________________________________________

The Trigger.

The trigger is an all aluminum design with a Delrin nub held in place with a small screw. This provides a smooth contact point for the sear to hit releasing it from the bolt.

There are two adjustments build into the trigger. One adjustment screw is in the front to limit travel forward, and the other positioned on the triggers back side limits travel rearward.

The trigger is captured inside the Delrin trigger cartridge providing maximum lubricity for the smoothest trigger pull possible.



___________________________________________________________

The Trigger Cartridge.

This piece is a delrin part that serves many purposes. The first one being the capturing of the trigger itself provided an incredibly smooth trigger pull. The trigger is captured on all sides which will eliminate any slop and give the Gargoyle II one of if not the best trigger in paintball.

The Cartridge by itself:


The Cartridge, Trigger, and rods with the Pump Key.



The Cartridge installed into the Frame.



The next thing that the delrin cartridge does is hold the connecting rod and guide rod snugly in place to prevent side to side movement. 

The two holes in the aluminum frame of the Gargoyle that the connecting rod and the guide rod pass through are slightly oversized. These rods are captured inside of the cartridge preventing them from ever rubbing the frame causing drag and unsightly wear marks.

Seen below as white circles.


And finally, the cartridge also houses a steel rod internally behind the guide rod.

What this does is give the guide rod something (Other than the frame of the gun) to smack into at the end of your pump stroke.

Adjusting the length of your guide rod will allow you to 'time' your Gargoyles pump stroke to bottom out just after the bolt and hammer connect with each other making for a fast and crisp engagement and feel.


The Feed Tube:

The feed tube on the Gargoyle is multi purpose. 

First it holds 13 paintballs in the gun. 

Second it holds the feed block in place when installed onto the body of the Gargoyle. 



What is the Feed Block for?

The feed block directs the paintballs into the breach of the gun. 

It also allows the user to gain access to their internal Bolt, main spring, and hammer. 

Whether your performing a simple cleaning or changing the main spring, it's so simple it's even fun to do!

In the image below, the Bolt and Barrel Adapter have been removed to show how the body mounts onto the frame. If the Barrel Adapter were to be installed it would ride over the main screw seen in the image.


Below the video of how the bolt, main spring, hammer and valve spring are accessed on the Gargoyle I and Gargoyle II. The Warthog is essentially the same however on it the feed block lifts up and forward to gain access to the internals.

Simple, Clean, and Easy. 


The Body.

The Gargoyle body is a thing of beauty. Sleek and fluid lines make it one of the best looking Nelson based guns ever created. Rather than use the traditional stacked tube method for the body, RTR machines this body out of a solid block of aluminum. Doing this provides stability and unparalleled feel for the end user. 

It's Auto Cocker threaded so that the user can use Auto Cocker barrels or Phantom barrels by using or not using the barrel adapter and the Gargoyles unique ability to modify the pump body with the larger diameter bushing to compensate for the larger diameter barrels.




The Barrel Adapter.

The Barrel adapter that comes with the Gargoyle as standard allows the user to use the very quiet and accurate CCI Phantom Barrel. The adapter is Auto Cocker threaded to mate with the body of the Gargoyle and then the user would screw the CCI barrel into the adapter.

The adapter prevents roll outs of the paintballs by using three small dimples. The ID of the adapter bore is .679 with the dimples holding any undersized paintballs at and ID of .672. These are the same dimension as the first version and owners of the Gargoyle have said that this combination works just fine.


The Feed Gate.

The feed gate has a built in fail safe for ball retention. If you lose or break your traditional paintball retainer the Gargoyles feed gate has a special slot machined into it that allows the user to simply wrap a rubber band or even a string around the feed gate which will then ride inside and across the opening of the feed gate for paintball retention.




What is different about the RTR Valve System?

The Gargoyle valve is unique in that it allows the owner to gain access to their valve spring without taking the valve off of the gun. 

Change your valve spring in seconds without a single tool! 

The spring guide you see with the diagonal grooves exists because unlike a traditional Nelson valve which is solid at the end, the Gargoyles is open. This made it necessary for an internal part for the spring to butt up against. So the fancy Spring guide which also restricts CO2 flow was born. 


What is the Pump "Key?"

The Gargoyle features a quick change pump body that allows the user to easily remove the pump without having to unscrew the connecting rods.




The Pump Body.

The Gargoyle Pump is unique in that it is threaded to eccept the barrel bushing. 

The new Gargoyle Pump has an improved design that does away with the two bushings and incorporates one long version. To do this the pump had to be slightly enlarged to allow some thickness for the bushing wall. 

The barrel bushing allows the user to not only use the included Phantom barrel made by CCI, but also allows the use of numerous after market 1" diameter barrels with auto-cocker threads that are so popular in todays game. 

And now this can be done WITHOUT removing the pump body!!

The Barrel Bushing.

The barrel bushing as seen below is a one piece threaded delrin insert that comes in two sizes. 

One is machined to allow the standard CCI Phantom barrel which comes standard with each Gargoyle.

The other available barrel bushing is for barrels with that have that 1" outer diameter and use auto-cocker threads.



The new Bucket Changer.

The Gargoyle and the Warthog will boast a new and improved bucket changer. It not only looks awesome but now has some really cool functionality built in. Even with these additional features built in, I was careful and was able to come up with a design that keeps the same overall length as in the original. 

First. At the bottom of the bucket itself you will notice there is a threaded part that has a hex cut into the bottom. This provides the user the ability to adjust for unusually sized 12 grams by rotating them up or down.


Second. The piercing pin is now a robust threaded pin that will not break and is easily removed if needed.

Third. This piercing pin pushes down onto the internal 12 gram seal which is now fully captured inside the ASA making it impossible to fall out even when it gets frozen from dumping CO2.

And lastly the piercing pin is a built in self contained check valve. Inside the pin will be a rubber ball that is pushed into place with a spring.

The piercing pin is threaded on the inside which allows a plug to be installed to hold the spring and the rubber ball in position. 

Unlike the model below, there will be standard O-Ring seal on the ASA neck.

The Pistol Grip.

The pistol grip was redesigned so that the users hand feels a nice smooth transition from the grip where it meets the frame. No longer are there the two little nubs that can make your hand hurt after a long day of play.

The screw that holds that valve body in place is captured inside the frame! 

What that means is you can take off your valve body and the screw cannot drop to the ground on you. 



The Warthog.




The Warthog is an open class pump gun that retains numerous feature of the Gargoyle. All of the abilities to get to your internals easily remains.

The trigger, grip frame, valve, are the same.

The Warthog bucket changer retains all of its function but has been redesigned to have a better appearance on the Warthog.

SO WHAT'S DIFFERENT ABOUT THE WARTHOG?

The Body.


The Warthog body has a flip up feed block that allows quick and easy access to the guns internals.



The feed block is fixed at the front with a stainless threaded pin.
This allows the feed block to be rotated up and forward when the locking rods are withdrawn. 

The feed neck is designed to receive your typical aftermarket feed clamp.




The Barrel
The Warthog will have an RTR designed custom barrel. 



The Locking Rods
The locking rods are what keeps the Feed Block securely in place. 
They do not push on the Feed Block but merely hold it in place much like the Feed Tube on the Gargoyles.



To open the Feed Block all you need to do is operate the wheel at the rear of the gun. A few rotations one way and the rods engage the Feed Block, and few rotations the other way the rods will retract back out of the Feed Block.



The wheel is captured and rotates smoothly because of precision and the use of a teflon washer on both sides of the wheel. It maintains centered because of the rod assembly moving forward and backward and it's also rotating in a pocket on the inside of the rear plate.

Here you can see the Teflon washer on the front side:



Here you can see the Teflon washer on the back side. The rod at the center of the below image rotates inside the back plate (which has been removed in this image) can also be seen:



Here is an image of the wheel having been removed. Inside you can see the piece that the wheel will move forward or rearward when the wheel is rotated which pushes or pulls the rods in or out of the feed block.



And with the plate invisible to show how it all works:




Here is an image of the other side of the rods which fit inside of the feed block.
These will be rounded off on the production run.


The Bucket Changer

The Warthogs bucket changer keeps all the goodness of the Gargoyle II's but changes its appearance to mate better with the Warthogs aggressive styling. In this rendering there is a pattern that represents knurling which will be present on the Warthog Bucket changer.



The Pump Key

Unfortunately some of you will ask "Is it the same as the other key?"

Short answer is no. I just couldn't fit everything needed using that one.

You will notice that the Main Guide Rod has a gap between it and the Key.

This is because, like the connecting rod and smaller guide rod, it too has a slippery Delrin Bushing!


Below is what the bushing looks like without the pump key visible.


And with just the Key...

With the explanation of the Warthog it is important to remember all of the features that it shares with the Gargoyle. 

It will be arguably the most user friendly open class pump gun ever built!


Allen Paintball Products is supporting the campaign with their 50 round hoppers!

A special thanks to them.



What We Need & What You Get

This campaign will help kickstart the newest pump revolution in paintball! 

In order to do this WE NEED YOUR HELP! When you fund this campaign you will be helping the entire industry regain a healthy base of players that enjoy the sport and do it by bringing back the basics of paintball. PUMP! 

The campaign will fund this batch of guns but also aims to fund the next run as well. The goal is to fund the guns for you as that is obviously very important to me, but it is also an effort to make more for the future players. 

Exceeding the campaigns financial goal will insure that RTR can pay all fees (Indiegogo, Paypal, Uncle Sam) associated with a successfully run campaign and inject the capitol into the product line for future guns.

$10 - RTR Barrel Bag.

The most innovated barrel bag on the market!

The RTR Barrel bag is actually two completely separate barrel bags combined into one! Both pockets of the barrel bag are reinforced separately at the bottom for maximum stopping power and isolation of paint to either side. 

 Simply put, if you shoot paint into your barrel bag by mistake, you only need to clean your barrel. Close off that dirty side pocket of the barrel bag with the Velcro flap and stick your barrel in the other pocket of the same barrel bag! 

Safe and Ready to get back in the game! Clean that mess up later!

With the $10 Perk you will receive:

One RTR Barrel Bag.

You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.



$35 - RTR Copper Dog Tag.

Derrick Obatake is a huge player in the game of paintball and one of the best humans you'll ever meet! Steel Flame products are some of the coolest items you can get and they have chosen to support the pump paintball community in this campaign. 

With this $35 perk you will receive:

One RTR Barrel Bag.

One solid copper RTR Dog Tag.

You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.

                                



$60 - PVC RTR Support Patch.

Each patch comes with a separate velcro pad that can be sewn on a jersey or bag which then allows the patch to be attached to it. The patch is 3" in diameter. These are high quality patches that can withstand any abuse you can throw at them. They are flexible and feel like rubber to the touch. Show your support with both and really help the paintball community in this effort!
With the $60 Perk you will receive:
One RTR Barrel Bag.
 One RTR Dog Tag.
One Velcro backed 3" RTR support patch. 
You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.

The Impact

The first generation Gargoyle took over 10 years to develop and manufacture. All that work made for a very functional and exciting new paintball gun. This current effort will fund the development and refinement of the new Gargoyle and I cannot stress enough that any and all funding is vital to the success of the campaign.

And for those who may have missed out, below is a link to the blog that showed weekly progress during the evolution of the first Gargoyles. I'm looking forward to making another one!

GARGOYLE VERSION #1

As the gallery tab at the top of this page will show, the customers that were able to get there hands on one of the first generation Gargoyles could not be happier. There was nothing more saddening to me than to get the weekly emails and forum private messages asking when new Gargoyles would be made. I had created a successful product that I could no longer make available for the players.  

Things that I want for you.

  • I want you to be able to clean your gun easily and quickly.
  • I want you to be able to change all of your springs with ease.
  • I want you to own a gun that has so much functionality it never lets you down.
  • To never miss a game because it took too long to clean your gun. 
  • To never miss a game because it took too long to adjust your gun.
  • I want the younger player to walk up to you and say "Wow! What is that?"
  • I'd like you to blow their mind and let them use your gun for a game!
  • I want you to play a part in this successful history making effort!

Risks & Challenges

  • As I've said, it took years to get the Gargoyle manufactured. My efforts never waned in the face of adversity and I did everything possible to see it through. Having said that, your support of this project should come without worry and the knowledge that I don't quit until it's done! 

THANK YOU!

Supporting our products in any way is all we can ask. There is more than one way you can contribute to our campaign to help us reach our goal. Sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets is equally valuable to us. We would like to thank you in advance for you contributions and continuing support.


Once you contribute you can qualify for our Referral Based Prizes! You must be logged into your IndieGoGo account and using IndieGoGo's share tools so you can track your referrals. You can track your referrals by looking into your IndieGoGo Profile. It's fun and easy. 
_____________________________________________________________________________

A special thanks to them.







What We Need & What You Get



 This campaign will help kickstart the newest pump revolution in paintball! 
In order to do this WE NEED YOUR HELP! When you fund this campaign you will be helping the entire industry regain a healthy base of players that enjoy the sport and do it by bringing back the basics of paintball. PUMP! 
The campaign will fund this batch of guns but also aims to fund the next run as well. The goal is to fund the guns for you as that is obviously very important to me, but it is also an effort to make more for the future players. 
Exceeding the campaigns financial goal will insure that RTR can pay all fees (Indiegogo, Paypal, Uncle Sam) associated with a successfully run campaign and inject the capitol into the product line for future guns.
$10 - RTR Barrel Bag.


The most innovated barrel bag on the market!
The RTR Barrel bag is actually two completely separate barrel bags combined into one! Both pockets of the barrel bag are reinforced separately at the bottom for maximum stopping power and isolation of paint to either side. 
 Simply put, if you shoot paint into your barrel bag by mistake, you only need to clean your barrel. Close off that dirty side pocket of the barrel bag with the Velcro flap and stick your barrel in the other pocket of the same barrel bag! 
Safe and Ready to get back in the game! Clean that mess up later!
With the $10 Perk you will receive:
One RTR Barrel Bag.
You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.


$35 - RTR Copper Dog Tag.


Derrick Obatake is a huge player in the game of paintball and one of the best humans you'll ever meet! Steel Flame products are some of the coolest items you can get and they have chosen to support the pump paintball community in this campaign. 
With this $35 perk you will receive:
One RTR Barrel Bag.
One solid copper RTR Dog Tag.
You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.
                                







$60 - PVC RTR Support Patch.

Each patch comes with a separate velcro pad that can be sewn on a jersey or bag which then allows the patch to be attached to it. The patch is 3" in diameter. These are high quality patches that can withstand any abuse you can throw at them. They are flexible and feel like rubber to the touch. Show your support with both and really help the paintball community in this effort!

With the $60 Perk you will receive:
One RTR Barrel Bag.
 One RTR Dog Tag.
One Velcro backed 3" RTR support patch. 
You will also receive updates via email on the progression of the machining process.




The Impact


The first generation Gargoyle took over 10 years to develop and manufacture. All that work made for a very functional and exciting new paintball gun. This current effort will fund the development and refinement of the new Gargoyle and I cannot stress enough that any and all funding is vital to the success of the campaign.

And for those who may have missed out, below is a link to the blog that showed weekly progress during the evolution of the first Gargoyles. I'm looking forward to making another one!


GARGOYLE VERSION #1



As the gallery tab at the top of this page will show, the customers that were able to get there hands on one of the first generation Gargoyles could not be happier. There was nothing more saddening to me than to get the weekly emails and forum private messages asking when new Gargoyles would be made. I had created a successful product that I could no longer make available for the players.  

Things that I want for you. 
I want you to be able to clean your gun easily and quickly. I want you to be able to change all of your springs with ease. I want you to own a gun that has so much functionality it never lets you down.
To never miss a game because it took too long to clean your gun. 
To never miss a game because it took too long to adjust your gun.
I want the younger player to walk up to you and say "Wow! What is that?"
I'd like you to blow their mind and let them use your gun for a game!
I want you to play a part in this successful history making effort! 
  Risks & Challenges 
As I've said, it took years to get the Gargoyle manufactured. My efforts never waned in the face of adversity and I did everything possible to see it through. Having said that, your support of this project should come without worry and the knowledge that I don't quit until it's done!  
  THANK YOU!

Supporting our products in any way is all we can ask. There is more than one way you can contribute to our campaign to help us reach our goal. Sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets is equally valuable to us. We would like to thank you in advance for you contributions and continuing support.

Once you contribute you can qualify for our Referral Based Prizes! You must be logged into your IndieGoGo account and using IndieGoGo's share tools so you can track your referrals. You can track your referrals by looking into your IndieGoGo Profile. It's fun and easy. _____________________________________________________________________________

story:
Proof is offering its logo tee in charcoal heather and black, Head Honcho snapback hat, "Been Doing It" white tee, and 9 logo stickers with an exclusive twist to "The First 48".

Backers will be rewarded with an exclusive label held in reserve for the first 48 funders willing to make a $200 donation towards the company.

These labels will be sewn to t-shirts, hats, hoodies, long-sleeves, beanies, and tanks, giving it a subtle hint of exclusivity for the general public to recognize and admire.

"The First 48" become a close member of the Proof family and an ambassador of our message. The "Proven" represent our belief with the generosity they share, and the life they live.


This label is held in reserve for The First 48, never to be offered to the general public. Ever. It is an exclusive gift from the company, validating what the company believes is true in it's supporters. Every life has a purpose, and it has been proven in these 48.

In addition to the contents of the perk package, "The First 48" will be provided with the "Proven" label on their next 15 orders of tees, tanks, and outerwear, plus, their next 15 orders of hats, and beanies.

As an added bonus, "The First 48" will receive exclusive updates and behind-the-scenes access to the internal operation of the company. They will also be credited and recognized on the official Proof Of Purpose website following the success of this campaign as a founding father figure.



The "Been Doing It" white tee informs those who suggest that you just do it you've been doing it, and you don't need to be reminded. You're doing you. And you've been doing it since the day you were born.

This standard fit guys short sleeve crew neck tee shirt features a bold letter screen print graphic on the center chest in black and exclusive "Proven" label at the bottom front hem as a badge of honor and respect.

  • Proof Of Purpose "Been Doing It" tee
  • Exclusive label on hem
  • White color way
  • Bold letter screen print chest graphic
  • Tagless for comfort
  • 100% soft spun cotton
  • Made in USA


The original logo tee proudly displays the Proof logo in smooth blue on a black short sleeve crew neck. More important than what's on front of the tee, is who's behind it.

This standard fit guys short sleeve crew neck tee shirt features a bold letter screen print graphic on the upper chest in blue and the exclusive "Proven" label at the bottom front hem as a badge of honor and respect.

  • Proof Of Purpose logo tee
  • Exclusive label on hem
  • Black color way
  • Logo screen print chest graphic
  • Tagless for comfort
  • 100% soft spun cotton
  • Made in USA


The original logo tee proudly displays the Proof logo in subtle black on a charcoal heather short sleeve crew neck. More important than what's on front of the tee, is who's behind it.

This standard fit guys short sleeve crew neck tee shirt features a bold letter screen print graphic on the upper chest in black and the exclusive "Proven" label at the bottom front hem as a badge of honor and respect.

  • Proof Of Purpose logo tee
  • Exclusive label on hem
  • Charcoal heather colorway
  • Logo screen print chest graphic
  • Tagless for comfort
  • 50/50 cotton/polyester
  • Made in USA


Top off any outfit with the big and bold Head Honcho snapback hat in boss black with a white Proof text embroidered across the front and exclusive mini "Proven" label on back. Get the respect you deserve.

  • Proof Of Purpose boss black snapback hat
  • White embroidered Proof text at the front
  • Exclusive label at the back
  • Adjustable snapback
  • Premium wool blend
  • Moisture-absorbent elastic sweatband
  • 83% Acrylic / 15% Wool / 2% Spandex


Let everyone know we out chea! Spread the word, Proof is here. Share our message and belief by slapping a Proof sticker on everything! Made of a sturdy weather-resistant vinyl for a long-lasting sticker that maintains appearance, ready to be stuck anywhere.

  • Proof logo sticker
  • Medium size sticker
  • 5" x 2"
  • Includes 4 different color combinations
  • 5 exclusive gold/black proven edition

story:
Why We Are Here

Howdy, 
My name is Zachary Kraner, I am a graphic designer living in Toledo, Ohio. My love for sunglasses began during my senior year in art school. We were tasked with re branding a company. One of my teachers suggested rebranding RayBan. After living, breathing, and dreaming about sunglasses for a semester, I was hooked.

One thing that literally drives me crazy about the sunglasses market today is the cost. These markups and perceived brand choices are just an illusion. In December of 2013 a few friends and I started Intrinsic Made. Intrinsic Made is an indie apparel brand offering low cost, high quality sunglasses, hand screen printed shirts and posters, and handmade infinity scarves.

Being an artist, I know how hard it is to get your name and work out there. The market has been tested with our first style of sunglasses, and we are now ready to move on to the next step. We would like to create Artist Print Sunglasses. These will be limited edition, signed and numbered shades. In addition to the sunglasses and some awesome packaging, we want to have artists design shirts, posters, and other swag  to create a collection.

In doing this approach we will be offering a way for artists, designers, and illustrators a way to get their work on to a new platform, make some money, and ultimately, get more marketing.

I really believe that these sunglasses will open up a great opportunity for many artists to get their work out in front of people, and by doing so will create an actual unique choice of what people put on their face.

Thank you for your time, I hope you enjoy!

- Zachary Kraner

What We Need & What You Get

Intrinsic Made is a purely passion run company. There have been no loans, no investors thus far, and we hope to keep it that way. In order for these Artist Print Sunglasses to be manufactured we need your help, by selecting a perk listed on the right hand side of this page you are essentially pre-ordering a pair of these sunglasses. We have also listed other great perks such as shirts, posters, stickers, and shout outs.

 

We currently need to raise $2,000 to manufacture the glasses, cover shipping, taxes, and the IndieGoGo fees.

 

The Sunglasses:




These Artist Print Sunglasses are the same great Squint sunglasses we offer now, just with a little something extra. Our Sunglasses are made with a highly durable Polycarbonate plastic and 100%UV protection, FDA shatter resistant lenses. These Artist Print Edition will also feature a mirrored revo coating and plorization layer on the lenses to add a crystal clear shine, and maximum viewing clearity.


Not only are these Orange/Red Revo Coat lenses better, the entire frame of the sunglasses will be printed with Zach’s custom hand drawn design. The design will be applied with a high-quality water transfer method similar to screen printing. This is the same quality and standards as the fancy pants brands without the incredibly high mark up price.


Sunglass Case Concept:

Shirt Concepts:


Each shirt will be hand screen printed in Toledo, Ohio at our Intrinsic Made HQ. The two options below feature silver metallic water based ink on 100% preshrunk combed ringspun cotton shirts. 


Stickers & Decals:


In the event that the $2,000 goal is not reached, IndieGoGo will refund your full perk amount. This is an all or nothing funding platform. Really, it is a win win for you. You either great an awesome pair of shades, or you get your money back.


Other Things

Thanks you for checking out this project. If you like what you see please pre-order a pair and tell your friends! Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter for updates and promotions. 



Check this out:


Intrinsic Made is an indie apparel company based out of Toledo, Ohio. We are a two person operation trying to bring Artist Designed Goods to the general public for an affordable price. Our eventual goal is to facilitate artist designed products such as shirts, posters, hats, skate decks, and Sunglasses. These will be original works created by artists, designers, and illustrators from all over and will help bring them new fans by exposing them to the apparel community.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you like these products and want to see them made, pre-order yours now. You can also help us out by telling your friends, coworkers, family, and any other random person you run into.

    Our goal is $2,000, this covers the manufacturing of the sunglasses, taxes, and the Indiegogo fees. This is really a win win for you because, if the goal isn't reached all of your funds will be returned to you via Indiegogo. If the pre-order campaign is successful, you will get an awesome pair of sunglasses, shirts, stickers, and more.

story:
24PI7

The next generation Automatic Mechanical SMART watch

Introducing the next generation of mechanical watches: the 24PI7 SMART watch. At your convenience, it is an easy-to-read classic mechanical watch, while combining the technologically advanced features of a smart watch. One of the features includes a modern Bluetooth watch.  A clear LCD display to keep you connected to the internet. This unique combination is offered at a special price for Indiegogo supporters. 

24PI7 is the only Hybrid Mechanical smart watch in the market with the classic traditional look. It has a 11mm thickness that gives you a feeling of wearing a luxury jewelry watch. 24PI7 is not just a watch, it's a social status.

Mechanical features

  • Smooth high grade stainless steel scratch resistance body gives Elegant classic look, which can be worn for any occasions.
  • High end Automatic Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve
  • Scratch proof Gorilla® Glass.
  •  5 ATM water resistance that lets you bath, or even swim with it.

 

Smart features

PMOLED display with vivid lifelike colors that show any screen in a sharp way. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a 1.44" inch TFT display with 128 x 128 resolution.

Has Bluetooth communication that receives instant notifications (vibration) from Android and iOS devices

  • Answer or reject incoming calls
  • Make and receive Skype calls
  • Access to Twitter, facebook,whatsapp,Twitter communications
  • Anti lost feature, you can NEVER lose your phone
  • Day-by-day weather reports
  • Flight status
  • Lock or unlock the screen
  • Answer of reject calls
  • Set Alarm and reminders
  • NFC to unlock doors, exchange contact details etc.,

Listen and control music from your mobile device or from inbuilt storage

 

Sleep monitor

 

Flight alerts

Track outdoor activities like cycling, golf, running, swimming, etc.,

 

An in-built GPS navigator that gives you accurate locations, without even using the internet

 

24-36 hours of battery life in heavy usage. 24PI7 comes with an unique USB charger

 

Tech Specifics:

  • Stainless steel 316L
  • Gorilla® Glass 3
  • 42 mm Diameter watch
  • 22/20 mm Stainless steel strap. The black leather strap is optional.
  • Mechanical movement with 28800 vibrations per hour, 24 Jewels and  42 hours of power reserve.
  • PMOLED display with 96 x 64 resolution,. Currently, we are working to further improve it to a TFT display with 128 x128 pixel resolution.
  • 360 mAh battery
  • Vibrator
  • Water resistance - 5 ATM
  • 3 Axis accelerometer
  • Android Kit kat
  • Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 BLE iOS devices.
  • Internal storage - 4GB
  • 800 MHz Single core processor with 512 MB RAM
  • NFC

Compatibility

Compatible with iOS and Android devices. It runs on the Bluetooth system 2.1+ EDR and 4.0.

Available colors

  • Stainless steel
  • 24K gold plated
Production Timeline
  • Oct'14  - Nov'14  :  Crowd funding campaign
  • Nov'14 - Jan' 15  :  Prototype manufacturing and Software programming
  • Jan'15  - Feb'15  :   Pilot production and Testing
  • Feb'15 - Mar'15  :   Final production and Shipping

FAQ

Q. Does the charger energize the mechanical movement?

A. No, charger is used to charge the battery. The battery is what powers the smart functions

Q. How do I energize the Mechanical movement?

A. It's automatic; it will energize itself when used every day.  It can also be energized using the watch crown. The watch crown can also be used to set the time.

Q. Will 24PI7 work with Blackberry or Windows Phones?  

A. No, currently it only supports most iOS and Andorid devices. However,  we are planning to develop our own OS to support Blackberry and windows phones.

Q. What are the languages it supports?

A. Currently, it supports English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic.  We will work on more languages in the future.

Q. Specifics about warranty?

A. You will have 1 year for the full replacement warranty. Shipping will be paid for by the buyer. In the future, we will try to establish service centers in all over the world.

Q. Is open source SDK available for developers?

A. Yes, we will release the open source SDK.

Q. Is there any referral programs to support 24PI7?

A. Yes, please see the referral program description below.

Q. Do you have a working prototype?

A. No, all pictures shown here are conceptual designs. we will make real working prototype after successful funding.

 

.... We will add more Q&A as more supporters contact us.

If any questions, please leave us an E-mail to support@24PI7.com


Referral Program

Help us spread the word - We need your support

  • Get 1 free watch for every 10 watches referred
  • Get  10$ off  by posting about our campaign on your Google plus, facebook and twitter.
  • Get 30$ off by posting about our campaign on your Facebook page that has a minimum of 200 friends/followers  or 1000 followers in Twitter or 200 google plus circle
  • Bloggers special - get 50$ off by posting article about our campaign in your blog or other websites (Tech related , should be followed by at least 500 persons / 1000 visitors per day to the particular article page). 

Please  use your own referral  link below our video.

Get 30$ off by posting about our campaign on your Facebook page that has a minimum of 200 friends/followers  or 1000 followers in Twitter or 200 google plus circle
Bloggers special - get 50$ off by posting article about our campaign in your blog or other websites (Tech related , should be followed by at least 500 persons / 1000 visitors per day to the particular article page). 
Please  use your own referral  link below our video.

story:
OBELISC : Simple & Automatic 

The world's most simple automatic watch. We are 2 founders who are enthusiastic about industrial design, with a gusto for minimalism and automatic movement. 

The objective is to make a simple watch enriched with the privilege of automatic movement that you can own at an affordable price. Underneath its simplicity, this watch carries a complex mechanism which transforms into a highly sophisticated self-winding system. Enable the watch to run on itself as a result of natural motion of the wearer's arm, making manual winding or battery replacement unnecessary. 

A watch movement which only found in luxury watches and expensive timepieces.

The name Obelisc is inspired by obelisk, an icon symbolizing the most fundamental and ancient time measuring system, the sun dial.

To achieve the goal, we sincerely need your pledge and support. Big or small perks mean a lot to us.

How do i get this watch? It's only USD199 now!

STEP 1: Click on " CONTRIBUTE NOW " ( the pink box )

STEP 2 : Click on "Add Perk" , and select your perk.

STEP 3 : Key in your shipping information.

STEP 4 : Click on "CONTINUE TO PAYMENT" ( another pink box )

STEP 5 : Click on " GO TO PAYPAL ", select your payment method ( paypal, credit card or debit card ).

Congratulations! You are now a proud owner of this distinctive watch. Sit back and wait for the package to be sent to your doorsteps.

*You will receive a refund if the campaign does not reach its funding goal.

What We Need & What You'll Get

We need to raise a minimum of $50,000 to bring this project to life! We are keeping the cost low without compromising on quality. Most of the funding will go to the scratch-proof sapphire crystal glass, Japanese automatic movement, 316L steel case, genuine leather strap and specially-designed hands that distinguish it from the rest.

What you'll get in return for your pledge and support is a beautifully simple automatic watch of the highest quality.

We'll also throw in a FREE brown leather strap when we hit the USD 70,000 mark, and a FREE watch pouch for every USD100,000 collected. 

You will not be charged if this project does not reach the required amount of fund.



The Impact

We love minimal watches. We also love automatic movement. We decided to put them together and are amazed with the product! To strive for minimal design, we have to say no to many yeses. At the end, we've decided to keep only the main function of a watch - which is to tell time, day and date. This results in a clean approach by hiding the complexity of a luxurious automatic movement beneath its simplicity.

 



Specs

Case Diameter: 40 mm
Case Thickness: 11 mm
Strap Width: 20mm
Sapphire Crystal (scratch resistant)
Solid Stainless Steel 316L Case and Caseback
Japanese Miyota Cal. 8205 Automatic Movement
5 ATM (50 m) Water Resistance
Genuine Strap with Leather Backing


Timeline

Quality can't be rushed. Therefore, the time required to produce this watch might take longer than usual. The production period is estimated to be approximately 2 months, with an extra month for thorough quality check on each watch. You can refer to the graph below for a clearer understanding of the production process.


We will keep you posted on the progress from time to time.


Risks & Challenges

The simplest design is the hardest to do. This is because simplicity comes from sifting through the complexities, and deducting what's unnecessary. The end result: a beautifully simple automatic watch. Just for you.

As this is our first project in Indiegogo, we spent a lot of time studying successful projects and learned what needs to be done when met with unpredictable circumstances. If there is any obstacles, we hope you will be patient with us as we do our best to overcome the challenges. We appreciate your understanding.

OBELISC - White Dial Automatic Watch


OBELISC - Black Dial Automatic Watch


The production expected time is what we think the best that assure the QC on every watches to be done, therefore we don't wish to expedite on this. We will keep you update from time to time.


Spread the word!

Have the heart but not the money? Share this project by sharing this page on social media. The more you share, the merrier will be.

A huge THANK YOU and let's make this a reality!

story:
Custom PC-12 Pilots Watch

This custom RSC Watch is a subsidiary of RSC Watches, internationally established watch producer from Antwerp, Belgium.
Number 1 worldwide in squadron watches.
 
The company produces high quality (pilot) watches, with Swiss quartz movements inside. Designer of these watches is Swiss-born Ronald Steffen, who gained an enviable reputation for introducing the “Red Star Line”, Antverpia collection and the high-end Swiss luxury line of watches that bears his own name, “STEFFEN”.

WHAT MAKES RSC WATCHES SPECIAL?

Quite simple really. Originality, quality and the exclusivity of a limited production run. Your PC-12 watch will be a one-off design, guaranteeing unsurpassed levels of exclusivity. This will be a custom designed  watch that is sure to impress. Not only will the watch face undergo customization, the reverse side of the watch can be engraved with your name too. Each individual piece is numbered, so the owner will know exactly which watch in the series he or she owns.

WHAT YOU GET

  • Custom PC-12 Pilatus Pilots watch
  • Engraved Name (if desired) we will ask you what name you want at the end of the campaign
  • Leather or Stainless Steel Watchband
  • Shipping to anywhere in the world included

IMPORTANT FEATURES

Irrespective of your specific design, a Swiss Quartz movement will drive your watch.

These Swiss made movements are reliable and durable, allowing us to give you a 3 year warranty.

High quality 316L stainless steel is used in the watch and the utilization of sapphire anti-reflection crystal means ultimate scratch resistance.

All watches are delivered inside a luxury RSC box.

 

QUALITY WATCH STRAPS

A watch band is more important than you might think. It contributes greatly to the overall look and feel of the watch, much like the rims on a car, but they also need to be durable and comfortable to wear. Our calf leather watch bands are manufactured in Germany and are exceptionally well made.
Or you can choose for a stainless steel (PVD coated) black strap.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign with your PC-12 owners and Pilot friends

Here are a few more screenshots.


Leather Strap


Stainless Steel Strap

 

* Any additional funds raised through this custom PC-12 watch will be used to further the PC-12 and pilot community.

story: We've been getting a bunch of requests for us to place an order for more Beyond Wrestling hoodies lately but they're really expensive to print up. So we've turned to IndieGoGo as an easier way of tracking pre-orders. It's super simple - if 25 people pre-order the hoodie, we'll get some made up in the next few weeks. If not, we'll wait until next year. If we do not reach our funding goal, no money will be exchanged so it's risk free.
story_txt: We've been getting a bunch of requests for us to place an order for more Beyond Wrestling hoodies lately but they're really expensive to print up. So we've turned to IndieGoGo as an easier way of tracking pre-orders. It's super simple - if 25 people pre-order the hoodie, we'll get some made up in the next few weeks. If not, we'll wait until next year. If we do not reach our funding goal, no money will be exchanged so it's risk free.

story:
Socially Conscious products that empower impoverished indigenous women of the Altiplano of Peru.

Photo by J. Scott Dugan

You can help impoverished indigenous women of the Altiplano of Peru by buying one of their handmade products.

To give the impoverished women of the Altiplano of Peru an opportunity to become financially stable. We will be working the Chijnayan artisans to create these products which they will be paid a fair wage. Our goal is to get them out of poverty, so the more money we raise, the more money they receive!!!

For the first time they will be paid a fair wage for their work, so they can begin to pull themselves out of poverty and start planning for the future!

 

We are two design students with a passion for traveling. We have big hopes and dreams to try and use our design skills and resources to help those who are not able to help themselves. Our vision is to start with a town we have a personal connection to Chijnaya, Peru.

We recently traveled to Chijnaya, Peru and spent 6 weeks living in their community. We immersed ourselves in the local culture and experienced the difficulties they go through in their everyday life. After spending time with them, we saw an opportunity to help expose their beautiful craft while increasing their income.  

 

These women are proud and do not want charity. Only YOU can help these women pull themselves out of poverty, one scarf at a time. We would like YOU to become part of the project and change the lives of the Chijnayans.

With the help of Indiegogo and supporters like YOU, we will be able to use our resources to help sell their products that will help them gain a stable income.

We have the connection with them, but we need your help to get this started. We need to secure funds for transportation of the goods and to give to the artisans immediately so they can begin to improve their lives.

We will send you picture updates while we are down in Chijnaya, and keep you posted on progress every step of the way. Nearly all of the money goes to the artisans with a small percentage used to cover transportation costs.

If we could, we would love to ship for free, but our budget doesn't allow us to do that yet! That is why we added $12 to every item to factor in shipping cost. I hope you understand! 

Your support means we can turn "PERUVIAN ARTISAN EXCHANGE" into a reality. We want to start a  non-profit organization to help these women, starting with a website (www.peruax.com) to sell their products , and share their design with the WORLD!

We will personally go down there for a few weeks to get the artisans started, then we will hire some of them to keep in touch with us once every two weeks. We will be working with the artisans throughout the whole process. This allows them to have more job opportunities and become entrepreneurs!

 


All of the products are:

  • 100% Baby Alpaca

  • 100% Handmade

  • 100% Made in Peru

  • 100% Helping People


Flowers 

Pledge $15 USD and you will receive one handmade flower. 

Scarves

Pledge $50 USD(+ $12 for shipping) and you will receive one handmade scarf. (Available colors at the bottom of the page)

Belts

Pledge $40 USD(+ $12 for shipping) and you will receive one handmade belt. (Measurements at the bottom of the page)

Purses 

Pledge $40 USD(+ $12 for shipping) and you will receive one handmade purse.

Hats 

Pledge $40 USD(+ $12 for shipping) and you will receive one handmade hat. (Available colors at the bottom of the page)

Tags

All of the products will come with a Peruvian Artisan Exchange (PAX) tag. 

Limited Edition Tag

These Limited Edition Tags will only be used on scarves purchased from Indiegogo! That means everyone will know you were one of the first people to help the people of Chijnaya and Peruvian Artisan Exchange! 

Chijnaya, Peru

Chijnaya is a small village of 200 people located Altiplano of Southern Peru. The town was made in 1963 when the community had to be relocated because of a devastating flood near lake Titicaca. The community now is a well-knit web of artisans, farmers, cheese workers, and even a lawyer.

 

The Women

These are the real faces of the women of Chijnaya, Peru. They are hardworking women with an amazing sense of humor. They have a fierce determination to improve the lives of their children and to make sure they do not have a hard life. Each woman has a story to tell. Each piece that they make is hand signed and has a description of their story. 

Photo by J. Scott Dugan

These are some of the artisan women: Paula Quispe Incahuanaco, Bilma Mamani Callata, Paulina Isidora Quispe Mamani, Louisa Llunque Pari, Zenovia Paricela, but those are just a few...

 

Product Specification

Colors to choose from (Hats and Scarves)...

These are just suggested colors, if you have a color combination that you have your heart set on, let us know and we will see what we can do!

Women Belt Sizes

  • Small: Optimum fit for 24-28" (61-73cm) waist. 
  • Medium: Optimum fit for 29-33" (74-86cm) waist. 
  • Large: Optimum fit for 34-38" (87-99cm) waist. 
  • X-Large: Optimum fit for 39-47" (100-122cm) waist. 
  • XX-Large: Optimum fit for 48-54" (123-137cm) waist.

 

For more information about us, please visit us on www.peruAX.com

story:
THE IDEA

Everyone seems to have one – that ratty black sweater sitting on the car seat, or hanging on the back of the chair at work, or carried around in the bag for a “just in case” moment.  And then there is that clumsy Snuggie – widely distributed and shamefully worn!

 Women of the universe deserve a better look and a stylish solution!   We need a movement to free the world of these unsightly garments.  Surely there must be something out there more stylish and more chic?        

 On a cool summer night in 2011, Chicagoland neighbors Kathy Brosmith and Marcia Hischke were wearing Snuggies on a lakeside dock with a group of friends. They found it difficult to get up or to reach for anything because of the clumsiness of the Snuggie!  The conversation led to how awkward, ugly, and impractical the Snuggie is.  All the women on that lakeside dock admitted to owning an “Ugly Black Sweater”.  The group decided that these products were totally humiliating.  It was agreed that women everywhere need an accessory to enhance their outfit while being stylish, fashion forward and functional – indoors as well as outdoors.  The KOEZY idea was born! 

 Kathy and Marcia decided to create a fashion statement that could be proudly worn in public yet comfortable and cozy, stylish and chic – unlike the ratty sweater or the Snuggie.  Their search was fruitless. No other women’s product  had the features they needed and wanted.  They both agreed KOEZY is the answer!  

 

  

KOEZY’s right-weight micro fleece fabric provides cozy warmth in a wide range of temperatures.  KOEZY is long-sleeved, has an adjustable closure, fits into any lifestyle and transitions easily from inside wear to outside wear.  KOEZY can be layered over an existing outfit, adding more style.  This timeless garment is lightweight, wrinkle free, washable, and reasonably priced.

 

KOEZY is available in four sizes in wearable neutrals with a splash of color: Blissful Black (with a turquoise closure), Charming Camel and Irresistible Ivory (both with a tortoiseshell closure). 

 KOEZY is great for gift giving – especially for that good friend, family member, or colleague who is always cold.  KOEZY is also an excellent corporate award/recognition product and brand identity builder.   A company logo on the wide lapel would add class to already classy product.          

 

THE LAUNCH 

The KOEZY was designed and launched in early 2011. Success followed immediately as KOEZY was chosen in “The Next Big Zing Women’s Category” for innovative products in 2012.  KOEZY was also identified as a “QVC Sprouts” winner for new products chosen by QVC shoppers.

 

      

 

 

KOEZY was test marketed and featured at the Chicago STYLEMAX show in August, 2011 as well as the Jewelry, Fashion and Accessory Show in October, 2011.  Clearly, KOEZY proved itself as a unique, innovative, and first of its kind product.

 

 

INDIEGOGO SUPPORT

Indiegogo support is needed to continue the journey.  Indiegogo support will allow women of the world to liberate themselves from ratty black sweaters and clumsy Snuggies!   The founders' personal savings and fading 401k’s have been the sole financial support so far.  More is needed.

 KOEZY has proven itself at trade shows and consumer shows.  It clearly is a viable new product that women want and need.  Now is the time to ramp up sales, increase advertising and expand the brand by adding new colors in 2013. 

 To do that, we're requesting (okay we're BEGGING) an initial grant of $5,000. We will use that money to increase manufacturing goals to increase our inventory to meet the high sales demand we anticipate.  If we exceed our goal, we'll be able to expand the line with new colors for the 2013 fashion collection.

Have you heard the shocking report?? 1 out of 12 US households has a Snuggie?  KOEZY's ambitious target: match those numbers in the US and beyond...with Kickstarter's help.  With your support, one out of every 12 women in the universe will be wearing KOEZY!!

Women of the world need KOEZY.  New styles, colors, designs are in the future.  Please help us move KOEZY into 2013 and beyond.

 

OUR REWARDS PROGRAM

Our multi- tier rearward program fits every budget. We truly appreciate any and all support.

Adhesive Vinyl KOEZY Sticker with the beautiful KOEZY Logo

    KOEZY Sticker

 


Lapel Pins for added bling!

         

           Option 1                             Option 2                    Option 3

 

Lapel pin #1-silver half moon BLING

Lapel pin option #2- retro multi beaded lapel pin

Lapel pin option #3-turquoise beads

 

Scarves to compliment any outfit (but we think they look best on KOEZY!)

                                                                        Option 1                                Option 2                               Option 3

Scarf option #1- leopard print scarf with stretch

Scarf option #2 elastic ruffle burgundy scarf

Scarf option #3-silk chiffon ombre print obong scarf

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICS

KOEZY has been designed in US women's sizes: 

Small (2-6) 
Medium (8-12) 
Large (14-18) 
XLarge (20-24)

 

GRATITUDE from the KOEZY Team

THANK YOU for checking out our Indiegogo campaign and for your generosity as a supporter. Together we can Start the movement and help women of the world "get their KOEZY on!".

 

INTERNATIONAL Supporters

We sure apprcaite your support but we need a little help with shipping costs! 

For pledges between: 
• $10 - $49: Please add $2.00 
• $50 - $299: Please add $10.00 
• $300 - $599: Please add $25.00 
• $600 and above: Please add $50.00 

Thank-you!!

 Women of the universe deserve a better look and a stylish solution!   We need a movement to free the world of these unsightly garments.  Surely there must be something out there more stylish and more chic?        
 On a cool summer night in 2011, Chicagoland neighbors Kathy Brosmith and Marcia Hischke were wearing Snuggies on a lakeside dock with a group of friends. They found it difficult to get up or to reach for anything because of the clumsiness of the Snuggie!  The conversation led to how awkward, ugly, and impractical the Snuggie is.  All the women on that lakeside dock admitted to owning an “Ugly Black Sweater”.  The group decided that these products were totally humiliating.  It was agreed that women everywhere need an accessory to enhance their outfit while being stylish, fashion forward and functional – indoors as well as outdoors.  The KOEZY idea was born! 


 Kathy and Marcia decided to create a fashion statement that could be proudly worn in public yet comfortable and cozy, stylish and chic – unlike the ratty sweater or the Snuggie.  Their search was fruitless. No other women’s product  had the features they needed and wanted.  They both agreed KOEZY is the answer!  
 
  
KOEZY’s right-weight micro fleece fabric provides cozy warmth in a wide range of temperatures.  KOEZY is long-sleeved, has an adjustable closure, fits into any lifestyle and transitions easily from inside wear to outside wear.  KOEZY can be layered over an existing outfit, adding more style.  This timeless garment is lightweight, wrinkle free, washable, and reasonably priced.
 

KOEZY is available in four sizes in wearable neutrals with a splash of color: Blissful Black (with a turquoise closure), Charming Camel and Irresistible Ivory (both with a tortoiseshell closure). 
 KOEZY is great for gift giving – especially for that good friend, family member, or colleague who is always cold.  KOEZY is also an excellent corporate award/recognition product and brand identity builder.   A company logo on the wide lapel would add class to already classy product.          
 
THE LAUNCH 
The KOEZY was designed and launched in early 2011. Success followed immediately as KOEZY was chosen in “The Next Big Zing Women’s Category” for innovative products in 2012.  KOEZY was also identified as a “QVC Sprouts” winner for new products chosen by QVC shoppers.
 
      
 
 
KOEZY was test marketed and featured at the Chicago STYLEMAX show in August, 2011 as well as the Jewelry, Fashion and Accessory Show in October, 2011.  Clearly, KOEZY proved itself as a unique, innovative, and first of its kind product.
 

 
INDIEGOGO SUPPORT
Indiegogo support is needed to continue the journey.  Indiegogo support will allow women of the world to liberate themselves from ratty black sweaters and clumsy Snuggies!   The founders' personal savings and fading 401k’s have been the sole financial support so far.  More is needed.
 KOEZY has proven itself at trade shows and consumer shows.  It clearly is a viable new product that women want and need.  Now is the time to ramp up sales, increase advertising and expand the brand by adding new colors in 2013. 
 To do that, we're requesting (okay we're BEGGING) an initial grant of $5,000. We will use that money to increase manufacturing goals to increase our inventory to meet the high sales demand we anticipate.  If we exceed our goal, we'll be able to expand the line with new colors for the 2013 fashion collection.
Have you heard the shocking report?? 1 out of 12 US households has a Snuggie?  KOEZY's ambitious target: match those numbers in the US and beyond...with Kickstarter's help.  With your support, one out of every 12 women in the universe will be wearing KOEZY!!
Women of the world need KOEZY.  New styles, colors, designs are in the future.  Please help us move KOEZY into 2013 and beyond.
 
OUR REWARDS PROGRAM
Our multi- tier rearward program fits every budget. We truly appreciate any and all support.
Adhesive Vinyl KOEZY Sticker with the beautiful KOEZY Logo

    KOEZY Sticker
 

Lapel Pins for added bling!
         
           Option 1                             Option 2                    Option 3
 
Lapel pin #1-silver half moon BLING
Lapel pin option #2- retro multi beaded lapel pin
Lapel pin option #3-turquoise beads
 
Scarves to compliment any outfit (but we think they look best on KOEZY!)
                                                                        Option 1                                Option 2                               Option 3
Scarf option #1- leopard print scarf with stretch
Scarf option #2 elastic ruffle burgundy scarf
Scarf option #3-silk chiffon ombre print obong scarf
 
PRODUCT SPECIFICS
KOEZY has been designed in US women's sizes: 
Small (2-6)  Medium (8-12)  Large (14-18)  XLarge (20-24)
 
GRATITUDE from the KOEZY Team
THANK YOU for checking out our Indiegogo campaign and for your generosity as a supporter. Together we can Start the movement and help women of the world "get their KOEZY on!".
 
INTERNATIONAL Supporters
We sure apprcaite your support but we need a little help with shipping costs! 
For pledges between: • $10 - $49: Please add $2.00 • $50 - $299: Please add $10.00 • $300 - $599: Please add $25.00 • $600 and above: Please add $50.00 
Thank-you!!

story:
Boxer Shorts was founded in 1991 in Oporto, aiming to provide essentials for men, with the best quality and luxury materials. Each Boxer Shorts is created with an intention and purpose, a versatile piece that fits for any occasion, with a classic silhouette, always using the best fabrics.

 

 

There are 42 models in four main collections, going from the classic to a more casual style, never forgetting the main goal: elegance.

 

The city of Oporto is where it all started. From a small shop in Avenida do Brasil, to an International sales e-commerce, selling to over 30 countries all around the globe.

 

            

 

Our Boxer Shorts are designed in Barcelona and manufactured in Portugal, using the highest quality materials, making them not only comfortable but also with a luxury look that has always been our trademark.

 

 

These fabrics are produced and manufactured by highly skilled professionals to create a unique style of designs to achieve a perfect balance between quality at an affordable price.

All around the globe we are looking for men, who believe in timeless fashion and admire classic, never forgetting elegance. True gentlemen enjoying every moment in their daily workspace and living life as it should be.

 

Shipping

We are looking for the gentleman worldwide. But as premium needs time to perfect, we will only ship to Europe on this first stage.

- Portugal: Free

- Spain: Free

- Rest of Europe: Free

 

Order now on www.theboxershorts.com

story:
Have you lost our Kickstarter campaign? No problem: here you have your second opportunity...

Plastic contamination, unfair clothes productions and boring running apparel have grown from topics to problems for conscious runners.

The Running Republic and its outstanding products made of recycled polyester and polyamide are the solution. 

The Running Republic® is the athletic brand for the millennial Eco Runner.

Wearing The Running Republic® is shouting loud that a different world, more sustainable and more ethical is possible, and all with an outstanding product, because sustainability and fairness can be very cool! 

Technical garments, outstanding graphic design and our sustainable DNA are just some of the great features of our brand.  

 

In this lookbook you will have the flavour of our product and our Brand DNA.

 

*Please note that colors, final compositions and patterns may slightly vary due to images seen on different screen and final setting of mass production. In no case this would mean a change in our sustainable DNA.

 

 

We prepared special perks for you, and if you lost our Kickstarter campaign you will be able to get almost the same prices in all the products. Of course our delivery time will be similar to Kickstarter delivery time in September 2019. 

So here you have your special perks:

And...

 

 

We strongly believe in sustainability and not only in big corporations Green Washing, we believe in REAL sustainability.

This is why 100% of our garments are made with recycled materials.

For us Sustainability is based on three pillars: we only use fabrics made of recycled materials, we only use fair labour to produce our gear and we work to leave the smallest possible carbon footprint. 

But why is so important the use of recycled materials and why we only use fabrics proceeding from recycled sources?

Because in terms of quality, attributes and durability there is no difference from new polyester or new polyamide to recycled one, but there's a huge difference for the Environment:

in the world less than 20% of the plastic waste is recycled and every year eight million tons of plastic waste ends up in the oceans.

This is why we had no doubt to use mostly recycled materials to produce our garments, despite the higher cost.

The two main recycled yarns that our fabric suppliers are employing to produce the fabrics that we use to make our garments are: SEAQUAL™ upcycled marine plastic and ECONYL®regenerated nylon.

 

*Please note that final measurements may slightly vary due to final setting and tolerance in mass production. In no case this would mean a change of size.

 

ABOUT US

We are a team of runners enthusiasts of Nature and life. We started The Running Republic®because we were tired to wear always the same boring running gear and most of all we were tired to look for real conscious running gear without finding a real solution. #chooseadifferentpath

 

 

This project started from scratch and as we explained in "the story so far" timetable, the idea was born a few years ago, but it's in September 2017 that we started the process defining our inspiration moodboard and developing our graphic and pattern design, thanks to the help of our great manufacture supplier.

Of course prototypes were produced and tested...three times, we failed and retry until we reached the state of art of the final samples. 

 

We believe in sustainability. We believe in real sustainability and real sustainability can't only be doing things the good way, we need to make good things too.

As you know, carbon dioxide emissions are the main cause of global warming and climate change, but reducing them during the production process as we do is not enough.

The challenge is to reduce future carbon emissions and actively remove the current excess of carbon from our atmosphere.

According to different studies, trees are the best “technology” to reduce carbon dioxide from the atmosphere and reverse global warming: this is why we decided to plant a tree for every backer is going to participate to our project with the help of WeFOREST.   

WeForest works with communities, local organizations and NGOs to develop scalable reforestation projects, demonstrating how it is possible to mobilize communities and restore degraded soils.

Among all the projects that WeForest is developing, we decided to be partners of the Amhara project in Ethiopia, one of the most beautiful and unfairly punished lands on Earth.

Amhara Project Ethiopia

In the Machakel Wereda in Ethiopia, the local community is the heart of WeForest restoration project, by planting indigenous trees on community land, gullies, riverbanks and farmland, and planting fruit and timber trees on farms.

The main goals of Amhara Project in Ethiopia are to restore native forest, restore degraded lands, promote economic development and increase food security.  

This is the project we've been working so hard in the last almost two years.

We hope you'll enjoy it as much as we did dreaming it, preparing it, and doing all our efforts to make it a reality.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our products have been conceived, designed, prototyped, tested, modified, sampled, re-tested, re-modified and finally re-sampled to achieve the state of art that present today.

We have been in the sports industry for over ten years and we built the proper network to plan different production scenarios depending on the performance of the campaign with different socially responsible suppliers between Spain, Portugal and India, making possible to produce, from ten units to ten thousands always satisfying our great sustainability standards and of course human rights.

In any case, we promise to communicate with transparency any possible production or supply issue and we promise we'll work even harder, if possible, than we did until now to guarantee that your expectations are met and any issue is solved in the shorter period of time.

story:
The Drunken Warrior Project (design)

 

The Drunken Warrior Project (description)

 

It's a simple code:

We live hard; Fight hard; Drink hard. And it doesn't matter if our buddy is stumbling, puking, or just talking too much. We ensure that they get home,s o we can do it all again tomorrow.

We are the Drunken Warrior Project and we are dedicated to everyone getting home safely...after a night out of fun. We believe that where you wake up should be as common as any other night. Safely in your bed...possibly covered in your own vomit or excrement. But hey, you do you. We are your battle buddy at your best and especially your worst. Remember when you though that the Korean Elvis statue was giving you attitude? We were there to make sure you only threw one punch before taking you to medical to get your bones set. Remember your rendition of "Don't Stop Believing" that had everyone at the karaoke bar complementing you for? We were there to make sure it was all captured on video so all your peers can enjoy it. Remember when you thought it was a great idea to go jumping into that city river and that the floating needles on the surface wasn't a problem? We were the ones who fished you out of there and explained to the police that you just happened to fall in after taking off your clothes in a fluke accident.

This is the shirt that says, "We'll be there for you. We are the Drunken Warriors and we are at each other sides through it all." As Drunken Warriors, we are dedicated to ensuring that everyone returns home safely, hassle free, and most importantly, ready to have another great night.

 

Who am I?

 

If you made it here, you may know that I'm the creator of the, loosely, Navy comic strip, "15 Turns to Nowhere". After spending a third of my life in the military, I decided to start telling stories and observations, in comic strip form, that relate to and jog the memories of those that serve or the families of those. During the past 4 years of making the strip, I have dabbled into trying to find a marketable item. 

I've always wanted to make something tangible. Something that you guys would proudly display. I've gone back and forth between shirts and posters and stickers, but nothing stuck. A lot of this had to do with trying to sell a product I knew nothing about. So I reached out to Ranger Up to help me make this shirts, as it's a brand that I follow and almost wear exclusively. By ordering these shirts from them, I know the quality that will everyone get and I know that it will last through frequent wear.

 

What I Need & What You Get

 

It's simple, I just want you to pre-order a shirt. If enough of you do this, then I will send off this design to get made and we'll ship them off to you. I have to meet a minimum order, so I will make this an all or nothing. If enough people contribute to this campaign, you'll get a shirt. If not enough people love me, then you'll get your money back. Also, if we triple my goal, I'll get a sticker made that all backers will get without any additional charge.

 

Finally, I just want to thank everyone for reading my comic strip through the years and I hope you will share this campaign and future comics. Love you guys.

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone,my name is Strahinja iam 17 and i play bass and do vocals in Serbian Black/Thrash band Riverroth.
We are playing for over a year and a half now and we wanted to do our own band T-shirts for some time but now we had to buy some equipment for band(Drum parts and bass amp) and we ran out of cash.This campaign is important to us because we would love to have our own band shirts which we could give to our friends and promote our band in one more way :)

What We Need & What You Get

We dont need much,200€ would be just enough for us to do our first 100 shirts.
If we reach our goal you can always contact us on our facebook page and we would be more than happy to send you one.But even if we dont we will make how many we can and even that would be great.
 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need money for shirts but even if you cant help us with donating money you can help us in other ways like listen to some of our songs on youtube and sharing them with your friend!! :)
