story:
The recent public discussions about online privacy have many Internet users concerned about who has access to their online activities -- and with good reason. Most of us are at the mercy of service providers and network equipment vendors who have little incentive to protect our privacy. The US government routinely collects information about Internet users’ online behavior, and content owners can compel ISPs to collect and share information about users' online activities without any proof of harm. So how can we as individual consumers and small business owners protect ourselves and the people we care about?


As security expert Bruce Schneier described recently in this article in The Guardian, the best thing you can do to protect your privacy is “hide in the network” by anonymizing your online activities and encrypting your communications with open-source software. Don’t Snoop Me Bro provides these capabilities in the DSMB Tunnel, an inexpensive, easy to use appliance that requires no configuration and is activated by the turn of a key.

Virtual Private Networks are a network security technology that has been in use for over fifteen years. When you use a VPN, an encrypted link is established between a local endpoint in (or near) your computer and a remote server. Your traffic is encrypted and routed through this link, protecting the content as well as information about its origin.  VPNs are widely used, especially by businesses, to allow employees to securely access their company network when traveling or working from home. More recently, consumer VPN services have become available. These are used to provide encrypted connections to a server in the Internet rather than a company network.



But VPN services -- even ones targeted at consumers -- can be challenging to configure, putting privacy out of reach for non-technical users.  That’s how the idea for the DSMB Tunnel was born: we wanted to make a device that would establish an on-demand VPN tunnel with no user setup.


The DSMB Tunnel is a small device that sits between your computer and Internet router using an Ethernet cable.  By placing the device between your Internet router and ISP modem you can protect all the traffic associated with your ISP account.  When you turn it on, it automatically establishes a prepaid VPN connection with a destination server in the country of your choosing.  Our goal was simplicity, and we made a network appliance with the most straightforward interface we could come up with: to protect your network, simply turn the key on the front of the device. There’s no software to install, no firewall to configure.


When the key is turned to ‘on’, the light on the front turns green and all of your traffic travels through an encrypted tunnel to a VPN server in the country of your choice.  When your traffic reaches the VPN server, it is decrypted and forwarded to its destination carrying the address assigned by the VPN service as the sender’s network address.  The unecrypted traffic no longer has the network address assigned by your ISP, removing traceable links to you or your ISP account.  

Traveling through the VPN adds a small delay when the Tunnel is ‘on’.  However, we’ve verified that we can watch streaming videos and surf the web just fine.  Nevertheless, for latency-sensitive applications like gaming, we recommend that you turn your Tunnel to ‘off’. When it’s ‘off’, the Tunnel is invisible on your network and there is no added delay. And, to protect users further, if the VPN service fails while the switch is in the secure ‘on’ position, traffic is blocked so that you will never unintentionally send out sensitive traffic without protection.


CAD rendering of production DSMB Tunnel


Our goal is to bring low-cost, easy-to-use privacy to anyone who wants it, not just skilled IT professionals. To do this, we set our fundraising goal to cover the startup costs for high-volume production.  This will allow us to sell our product at the lowest possible price.

Here’s where you come in: at less than 1,000 units, the cost for components to build each DSMB Tunnel adds up to a pretty hefty price tag. The more interest we have, the better deals we can negotiate with our vendors -- which means that we can offer Tunnels at lower prices. We want to be able to sell them at $150 (with a full year of VPN service included), and that price is possible at a quantity greater than 1000.


Our design is built around the OpenVPN application and other open-source software based on the popular OpenWRT Linux distribution.  The first prototypes (shown above) have cases made from laser-cut acrylic and an alpha version of our software running on a custom development board.  We’ve identified all the components and materials for our beta testing phase, and we’ve begun testing in-house. If this campaign is successful, this fall we will continue to refine the software, electronics, and housing to maximize stability while keeping production costs low.  Further, we will continue to explore VPN service provider alliances.  Some manufacturing, such as the housing and circuit board fabrication, will be performed by trusted vendors to keep prices as low as possible. Nevertheless, we will ensure quality control by always performing the final integration and  testing ourselves.

Each DSMB Tunnel comes with one year of prepaid VPN service. In the interest of preserving Tunnel owners' privacy, we will keep no records associating a particular unit with your identifying information. The service provider will have no knowledge of the identity of the Tunnel owner because the services are bulk purchased by DSMB. We’ve had a great experience with the VPN service provider that we have been using for the prototypes, but we have not decided on a final VPN provider for ongoing large-scale production.



At the end of the year of VPN service, users can, of course, purchase an entirely new device. Or, if you want to keep your Tunnel and simply buy another year of service, you can purchase a Secure Data (SD) card from us that is preloaded with the information for a new VPN account. Again, we will never provide the service provider the identity of the end user.  


While consumer VPN service is not a new innovation, the Don’t Snoop Me Bro approach to consumer VPN service is. The most similar device available today is a VPN router.  Typically, VPN routers do not include VPN service which, if included, would drive the price to over $300.  Further, these systems require configuration by someone with networking expertise. In contrast, the DSMB Tunnel is an affordable easy-to-use VPN appliance with prepaid service requiring no end-user setup.  We believe that we can make online privacy available to as many people as possible.


We are really excited about the possibilities of the DSMB Tunnel and technology like it, especially products that could help protect medical, legal, and proprietary information for individual consumers and small businesses. We want to make protecting your privacy is as easy as turning a key. Thank you for taking the time to explore our product, and we hope that this is the start of something awesome!


Version 1 of the Don’t Snoop Me Bro Tunnel will be simple but secure, easy to use, and with good performance:


  • Key switch interface. Easy-to-use, intuitive operation.

  • Automatic OpenVPN tunnel establishment.  Turn the key and an encrypted tunnel comes up automatically between the DSMB unit and the VPN server in the location of your choice.

  • One year prepaid VPN service.  Your DSMB unit is preconfigured to access a VPN account that has been prepaid for one year and allows you to establish tunnels to a range of US and offshore locations.  

  • Bridge mode when tunnel is disabled.  When latency is important or privacy is not needed, the DSMB tunnel can be put into bridge mode, invisible to the network.

  • Two color LED to indicate tunnel state.  A green LED indicates the tunnel is active and your privacy is enhanced.  A red LED indicates you the tunnel is not providing any protection.

  • Web-based configuration. The DSMB tunnel will work out of the box with no configuration.  But if you want to make changes, a password protected web page can be accessed on the unit.

  • Selectable tunnel endpoint location.  VPN end-points are located all over the world.  Users may select which location suits them and change as often as desired.

  • Configuration reset to factory defaults. A button is provided to return the unit to the factory configuration.

  • Connection test mode.  A diagnostic mode is provided on the configuration web page that allows a user to establish a tunnel and verify the IP address and associated geo-location of traffic emerging from the endpoint.


Below are the specifications of the functional prototype shown in the video.

  • Housing dimensions: length 5.073” x width 4.0775” x height 1.477”

  • Housing material: Laser-cut acrylic

  • Power usage: 0.5 Watts @ 3.3 Volts

  • Processor: 400mhz MIPS

  • One Gigabit Ethernet Port (1000Mbps)

  • One Fast Ethernet Port (100Mbps)

  • Power Jack

We are currently testing endpoints in the following countries: UK, Germany, Canada, The Netherlands, Switzerland, South Africa, US (several regions), Russia, Ukraine, Thailand, Singapore, Hong Kong, Japan, Brazil, Chile, and Mexico.


Don’t Snoop Me Bro is a small company working out of Somerville, Massachusetts. On this project we are collaborating with our friends at DGF Technologies, who bring a great deal of expertise in electronics, software, and fabrication.  Together, we have a variety of backgrounds, but a shared passion for privacy and security. Conversations within the group led us to the idea for the Tunnel, and we spent this summer turning our idea into a consumer product. Our range of unique perspectives has allowed us to create a product that will be usable for the widest possible audience. We’re on a mission to help you to protect your privacy, and we’re so excited to bring this product idea to you!

Video by Erik Heumiller / www.heumiller.com

Logo Design by Benj Gleeksman / www.mistergleeksman.com
story_txt:
The recent public discussions about online privacy have many Internet users concerned about who has access to their online activities -- and with good reason. Most of us are at the mercy of service providers and network equipment vendors who have little incentive to protect our privacy. The US government routinely collects information about Internet users’ online behavior, and content owners can compel ISPs to collect and share information about users' online activities without any proof of harm. So how can we as individual consumers and small business owners protect ourselves and the people we care about?





As security expert Bruce Schneier described recently in this article in The Guardian, the best thing you can do to protect your privacy is “hide in the network” by anonymizing your online activities and encrypting your communications with open-source software. Don’t Snoop Me Bro provides these capabilities in the DSMB Tunnel, an inexpensive, easy to use appliance that requires no configuration and is activated by the turn of a key.
Virtual Private Networks are a network security technology that has been in use for over fifteen years. When you use a VPN, an encrypted link is established between a local endpoint in (or near) your computer and a remote server. Your traffic is encrypted and routed through this link, protecting the content as well as information about its origin.  VPNs are widely used, especially by businesses, to allow employees to securely access their company network when traveling or working from home. More recently, consumer VPN services have become available. These are used to provide encrypted connections to a server in the Internet rather than a company network.






But VPN services -- even ones targeted at consumers -- can be challenging to configure, putting privacy out of reach for non-technical users.  That’s how the idea for the DSMB Tunnel was born: we wanted to make a device that would establish an on-demand VPN tunnel with no user setup.





The DSMB Tunnel is a small device that sits between your computer and Internet router using an Ethernet cable.  By placing the device between your Internet router and ISP modem you can protect all the traffic associated with your ISP account.  When you turn it on, it automatically establishes a prepaid VPN connection with a destination server in the country of your choosing.  Our goal was simplicity, and we made a network appliance with the most straightforward interface we could come up with: to protect your network, simply turn the key on the front of the device. There’s no software to install, no firewall to configure.






When the key is turned to ‘on’, the light on the front turns green and all of your traffic travels through an encrypted tunnel to a VPN server in the country of your choice.  When your traffic reaches the VPN server, it is decrypted and forwarded to its destination carrying the address assigned by the VPN service as the sender’s network address.  The unecrypted traffic no longer has the network address assigned by your ISP, removing traceable links to you or your ISP account.  
Traveling through the VPN adds a small delay when the Tunnel is ‘on’.  However, we’ve verified that we can watch streaming videos and surf the web just fine.  Nevertheless, for latency-sensitive applications like gaming, we recommend that you turn your Tunnel to ‘off’. When it’s ‘off’, the Tunnel is invisible on your network and there is no added delay. And, to protect users further, if the VPN service fails while the switch is in the secure ‘on’ position, traffic is blocked so that you will never unintentionally send out sensitive traffic without protection.





CAD rendering of production DSMB Tunnel


Our goal is to bring low-cost, easy-to-use privacy to anyone who wants it, not just skilled IT professionals. To do this, we set our fundraising goal to cover the startup costs for high-volume production.  This will allow us to sell our product at the lowest possible price.
Here’s where you come in: at less than 1,000 units, the cost for components to build each DSMB Tunnel adds up to a pretty hefty price tag. The more interest we have, the better deals we can negotiate with our vendors -- which means that we can offer Tunnels at lower prices. We want to be able to sell them at $150 (with a full year of VPN service included), and that price is possible at a quantity greater than 1000.





Our design is built around the OpenVPN application and other open-source software based on the popular OpenWRT Linux distribution.  The first prototypes (shown above) have cases made from laser-cut acrylic and an alpha version of our software running on a custom development board.  We’ve identified all the components and materials for our beta testing phase, and we’ve begun testing in-house. If this campaign is successful, this fall we will continue to refine the software, electronics, and housing to maximize stability while keeping production costs low.  Further, we will continue to explore VPN service provider alliances.  Some manufacturing, such as the housing and circuit board fabrication, will be performed by trusted vendors to keep prices as low as possible. Nevertheless, we will ensure quality control by always performing the final integration and  testing ourselves.Each DSMB Tunnel comes with one year of prepaid VPN service. In the interest of preserving Tunnel owners' privacy, we will keep no records associating a particular unit with your identifying information. The service provider will have no knowledge of the identity of the Tunnel owner because the services are bulk purchased by DSMB. We’ve had a great experience with the VPN service provider that we have been using for the prototypes, but we have not decided on a final VPN provider for ongoing large-scale production.










At the end of the year of VPN service, users can, of course, purchase an entirely new device. Or, if you want to keep your Tunnel and simply buy another year of service, you can purchase a Secure Data (SD) card from us that is preloaded with the information for a new VPN account. Again, we will never provide the service provider the identity of the end user.  




While consumer VPN service is not a new innovation, the Don’t Snoop Me Bro approach to consumer VPN service is. The most similar device available today is a VPN router.  Typically, VPN routers do not include VPN service which, if included, would drive the price to over $300.  Further, these systems require configuration by someone with networking expertise. In contrast, the DSMB Tunnel is an affordable easy-to-use VPN appliance with prepaid service requiring no end-user setup.  We believe that we can make online privacy available to as many people as possible. 



We are really excited about the possibilities of the DSMB Tunnel and technology like it, especially products that could help protect medical, legal, and proprietary information for individual consumers and small businesses. We want to make protecting your privacy is as easy as turning a key. Thank you for taking the time to explore our product, and we hope that this is the start of something awesome!



Version 1 of the Don’t Snoop Me Bro Tunnel will be simple but secure, easy to use, and with good performance:

Key switch interface. Easy-to-use, intuitive operation. 
Automatic OpenVPN tunnel establishment.  Turn the key and an encrypted tunnel comes up automatically between the DSMB unit and the VPN server in the location of your choice.
One year prepaid VPN service.  Your DSMB unit is preconfigured to access a VPN account that has been prepaid for one year and allows you to establish tunnels to a range of US and offshore locations.  
Bridge mode when tunnel is disabled.  When latency is important or privacy is not needed, the DSMB tunnel can be put into bridge mode, invisible to the network.
Two color LED to indicate tunnel state.  A green LED indicates the tunnel is active and your privacy is enhanced.  A red LED indicates you the tunnel is not providing any protection.
Web-based configuration. The DSMB tunnel will work out of the box with no configuration.  But if you want to make changes, a password protected web page can be accessed on the unit.
Selectable tunnel endpoint location.  VPN end-points are located all over the world.  Users may select which location suits them and change as often as desired.
Configuration reset to factory defaults. A button is provided to return the unit to the factory configuration. 

Connection test mode.  A diagnostic mode is provided on the configuration web page that allows a user to establish a tunnel and verify the IP address and associated geo-location of traffic emerging from the endpoint.




Below are the specifications of the functional prototype shown in the video.

Housing dimensions: length 5.073” x width 4.0775” x height 1.477”
Housing material: Laser-cut acrylic
Power usage: 0.5 Watts @ 3.3 Volts
Processor: 400mhz MIPS
One Gigabit Ethernet Port (1000Mbps)
One Fast Ethernet Port (100Mbps)
Power Jack



We are currently testing endpoints in the following countries: UK, Germany, Canada, The Netherlands, Switzerland, South Africa, US (several regions), Russia, Ukraine, Thailand, Singapore, Hong Kong, Japan, Brazil, Chile, and Mexico.




Don’t Snoop Me Bro is a small company working out of Somerville, Massachusetts. On this project we are collaborating with our friends at DGF Technologies, who bring a great deal of expertise in electronics, software, and fabrication.  Together, we have a variety of backgrounds, but a shared passion for privacy and security. Conversations within the group led us to the idea for the Tunnel, and we spent this summer turning our idea into a consumer product. Our range of unique perspectives has allowed us to create a product that will be usable for the widest possible audience. We’re on a mission to help you to protect your privacy, and we’re so excited to bring this product idea to you!

Video by Erik Heumiller / www.heumiller.com
Logo Design by Benj Gleeksman / www.mistergleeksman.com

story:
When women have their period one of the biggest concerns is lack of protection during times of heavy flow. We sought to change that by having a product that is reliable for absorbing liquid, making it leak-proof, while have no side effects on the body.

To maximize comfort we selected pure cotton fabrics as the foundation for our Pinky Panty period underwear. Our Panty features soft cotton texture and absorbent, leak-proof materials to keep you protected through even the heaviest periods. You can also use it with any additional sanitary products you prefer.

Whether you are lying down, standing, sitting, or even running, Pinky Panty will protect against leaks during any and all activities.

Upon receiving funding, we would like to produce our products in large quantities while being able to give our backers a special price.

If our funding goals are reached successfully on time, starting in May 2018 our products will begin to be shipped to our fist backers.

We are shipping our fine products globally to reach all women around the world.

If you like our project, please share it on your social media, get the perks, and support us by donating for more perfect products. Share our campaign with your friends.

Contact Us

Press: info@6119.mn

How many perks can I choose from?

Please check the Perk section for more details. After you purchase a perk from Indiegogo.

When I can receive my order?    

We wlll be shipped out by the end May 2018. In the meantime, we will keep you updated on our progress and your order's expected delivery date. For shipment inquires please contact info@6119.mn

Where does Pinky Panty ship?    

Due to limited fulfillment capabilities, Pinky Panty can only be shipped to 35 territories worldwide. These territories include Austria, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Macau, Malaysia, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Russia, Singapore, Spain, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Kingdom, U.A.E, and the United States.

When do we start shipping?    

We begin shipping by the end of May 2018. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you’ve placed your order. The 6119 team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

Why order now?    

We are offering a discount on all pre-orders of Pinky Panty in return for your support.

Change of address?    

If you need to update your address, please contact our customer service team: info@6119mn.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?    

Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; pinky has no control over these charges.

story:
What is "Nataly's crafts"?
Nataly's crafts is a developing brand in Lithuania. This brand was established relatively long time ago in December 2016. Every jewelry is made with love and painstakingly. I hope that my crafts will hape people feel special everyday.

Wat makes "Nataly's crafts" special? 
All Nataly's crafts are created by individual design. Every jewelry is unique and almost impossible to duplicate. Most of crafts are made from natural stones.

 

About me:

I started making my first handcrafts in 8th grade at school. Every year I tried to learn new crafting technique. Everything started with simple works made of beads. Later I began to use wool, decoupage. My first works were crafted as gifts to my friends, parents, relatives. I began posting my works on facebook and then received first orders from acquaintances.  People usually presented my craft as gifts for Christmas, birthdays and other events. At that moment I decided to start my own business. In 2016 I was actively promoting my brand. I launched facebook page “Nataly’s Crafts”. In March 2017 I first time participated in our national fair and by now I have more than 2000 followers on facebook. Currently I am studying masters in economics and I am very happy that my hobby is becoming a real business. Every day I fell more and more passion about my crafts.

story:
kevala is amongst the leaders of the Mindful Mainstream: changing consumer demand to preserve nature and humanity. Our apparel speaks for itself: from the earth, for the earth.

  • Slated to be the largest sustainable athletic apparel company on Earth.  
  • Leader in eco-friendly blanks for fitness & yoga studios. 
  • Fund 50 nonprofits in all 50 states, Washington, D.C., Canada, and Mexico. 
  • Founders of ReflectNow - mirrored inspiration. 



    • Our fabrics are made from quality sustainable materials: extremely soft, innovative, and naturally moisture-wicking. We also keep the toxics out of our garments with water-based printing. 

    • TENCEL - fabric sustainably sourced from Eucalyptus trees, a higher moisture transfer rate than most fabrics, and dries quick. 
    • Premium Organic Cotton - soft and breathable like your favorite t-shirt.
    • Water-Based Ink - we never use Plastisol (PVC) which is carcinogenic. 

          

     

    When you buy a $5 shirt, WHO pays the price? The earth, farmers, and factory workers. 'Fast-fashion' is an epidemic, although we can change demand with purchasing power.  kevala strives to be sustainable from cradle to grave. 

    Watch 'The True Cost'  trailer - a documentary which explores the impact of the global clothing industry on people and the planet, a film kevala supports!

          

    Quality, sustainable, private label athletic apparel built mindfully for elite athletes, fitness studios, and trainers who are serious about performance. 

    • Boutique Studio Specialists: Yoga, Pilates, Barre, CrossFit, Small Gyms 
    • Custom Eco-Printing: logos, slogans, any creative via Eco-Friendly ink
    • Sustainable Styles: racerback tanks, muscle tanks, and crew neck t-shirts 



    CUSTOMIZE: get your name, logo, and tagline on your tribe & out in public! 


    Our signature series ReflectNow displays inspirational words on the front of tops, written backwards to read reflected off studio mirrors for motivation. The same word is written on the back of garments to inspire. We utilize many affirmations tested by athletes, and also create custom sayings. 

                               

       

    ReflectNow Favorites: breathe | strength | love | present | fearless love | gratitude | get after it | clean slate | let go | joy | kindness | fearless | karma | dominate | give 


    Enjoy more styles, lighter fabric, and a variety of colors! Our production and design team created the perfect eco-friendly line: our fabric wicks away sweat naturally, tailored for athletes, and the feel is ultra soft - your first choice for work-outs! 

    • KV LUX Blend - Natural Sweat Wicker: ultra-soft TENCEL and Certified Organic Cotton blended to wick sweat away. 
    • Flatlock: strong stitching constructed flat on both sides preventing irritation during workouts, yes to chafe-free. 
    • Water-Based Ink: free of toxins (no Plastisol - PVC), breathable, and a crisp look and feel without gritty texture.  
    • Athlete Built: extended back paneling for downward dogs & burpees, lightweight fabric, and constructed mindfully for free range of motion.
    • Giving:  you sweat, we give. kevala funds 50 nonprofits - environmental protection, at-risk kids, cancer research and many more causes.  
                   Slated Color Palette: kevala Gray (KVG), Black, White and Light Blue.* 

                                                  

    Enjoy the new collection - ReflectNow tops, customizable eco-friendly blanks, glass water bottles, artisan bracelets, and sustainable trucker hats! FREE SHIPPING! 


    • Lightweight Fabric: 66% organic cotton, 30% TENCEL® & 4% spandex Jersey
    • Moisture Wicking: natural fibers from Eucalyptus trees wick sweat away 
    • Fit: athletic, longer back paneling & covers the body for a perfect fit
    • Flatlock Stitching: chafe-free movement, no irritation  

    • Lightweight Fabric: 66% organic cotton, 30% TENCEL® & 4% spandex Jersey
    • Moisture Wicking: natural fibers from Eucalyptus trees wick sweat away 
    • Fit: athletic, longer back paneling & covers the body for a perfect fit
    • Flatlock Stitching: chafe-free movement, no irritation  


    • Lightweight Fabric: 66% organic cotton, 30% TENCEL® & 4% spandex Jersey
    • Moisture Wicking: natural fibers from Eucalyptus trees wick sweat away 
    • Fit: athletic, longer back paneling & covers the body for a perfect fit
    • Flatlock Stitching: chafe-free movement, no irritation  


    • Lightweight Fabric: 66% organic cotton, 30% TENCEL® & 4% spandex Jersey
    • Moisture Wicking: natural fibers from Eucalyptus trees wick sweat away 
    • Fit: athletic, longer back paneling & covers the body for a perfect fit
    • Flatlock Stitching: chafe-free movement, no irritation  

      * Available apparel colors:  women's - all (limited supply), men's - gray 

    • 70% organic cotton, 30% recycled polyester
    • Curved bill & adjustable closure 
    • Color: black with white kevala lotus icon stitching 


             • 700 ML / 24 OZ
    • Borosilicate glass body for hot or cold drinks (tea, water & smoothies) 
    • Removable Adaptor Cap for easy cleaning and wide-mouthed glass option
    • Silicone sleeve for durability and temperature dissipation 
    • Dishwasher Safe, BPA free & recyclable
    • Color: black sleeve and cap with light gray kevala logo 


               

  • 100% waterproof
  • Adjustable from 2-5 inches in diameter
  • Wax-coated with iron-coated copper "P" charm
  • Color: black, gray, & light blue intertwined

    All kevala products include FREE SHIPPING! 


    • Every purchase includes an automatic donation of 5% to 50 nonprofits from the 50Give Tour - our founder volunteered in ALL 50 states, Canada, D.C., and Mexico! 

    Taste of the 50Give Crew:
    • Gabriel's Angels (AZ): pet therapy for at-risk & abused kids to enhance their emotional development for life. 
    • Farm Rescue (ND): harvesting and planting assistance to farmers experiencing a major injury, illness, or natural disaster. 
    • Give Running (KY): collect, clean, and donate new and used running and athletic shoes to NGOs.
            

    Real reviews from fitness studio owners, athletes, boutiques, and fashionistas who love our fabrics, give-back program, and the ReflectNow series! 



    Washington, D.C. 
    "We love kevala - the story alone: giving back to nonprofits, affirmations to inspire, and sustainable athletic wear - something our customers are now asking for…everybody loves the feel of the tops, and kevala is my favorite tank to work-out in! Once restocked - we want to do the blank program with our logos!" 
    -Ferrall D. (Core72 Owner - Fitness Boutique)

    San Diego, California 
    "As someone who has worked in and around the sustainable fashion sphere for over 8 years, kevala is one of those standout brands who has quickly built a cult following of conscious and active humans. Whether it's their materials, supply chain or giving arm, kevala does not sacrifice on style or ethics. The leadership and purely positive energy that their founder Keith brings to the table is all inspiring and has helped build a community of mindful consumers. kevala is a brand to watch and a brand I continue to learn from." 
    -Kestrel J. (AWEAR CEO - Sustainable Fashion Company) 

    Dallas, Texas
    "It's great to work with great people. Not only is kevala made with earth friendly products but they feel amazing inside and out. Their signature reflective messages (ReflectNow) are powerful affirmations for those wearing them and those who see them! With little reminders to be present, love fearlessly and breathe, my kevala tops stay in high rotation!  The most amazing thing about kevala, however is the creator behind them. The founder volunteered in each of the 50 states and gives back a percentage of kevala sales to each and every one of them. We are beyond inspired and grateful to partner with someone on such an amazing concept." 
    -Jenn B. (Yoga Digest Magazine CEO - Global Yoga Publication)

    Mission Valley, California 

    "I had the pleasure of meeting Keith (founder of kevala) when I dropped in on a yoga class in San Diego. After class he told me about kevala and I was immediately touched by his endeavor; I just had to be involved. I started attending more kevala Yoga Crawl classes because Keith brings such a great energy and always inspires me to help. In the short time I have known Keith I have witnessed the traits of a giving, caring, and dedicated individual."
    -Aubry W. (International Yoga Instructor) 

    Seattle, Washington 
    "Having had the chance to run, do body-pump and yoga in my new racerback ReflectNow top, I couldn't be happier. I was surprised at how nice and soft it is -- I love it now! And I love the positive feedback loop it helps create."
    -Lauren M. (kevala Customer - Runner, Crossfitter, & Yogi)

    Do you know it costs between 30% - 70% MORE to produce sustainable products over regular production?

    We require additional funding in the beginning to increase our Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) - larger orders equals price drops for you and us. We actually sold-out of the first kevala batch in under 3 months - demand is super high! Together we are creating a Mindful Mainstream in the apparel industry.  

    the kevala cycle: we consciously are making apparel that is sustainable from Cradle to Grave.  Quality is our business plan, and we start with the earth. 



    kevala has been featured in Yoga Digest for Staff Picks, highlighted by Fit Athletic for Yoga Products You Can't Live Without, and praised by Jason Mraz for our philanthropy & eco-friendly mission. Below are a few companies, global instructors and celebrities who have endorsed kevala!  

    Watch grammy-winner Jason Mraz interview the kevala founder!
          
     


    Jason is a huge advocate of nonprofits focused on the arts, equality and the environment - learn more about his endeavor: Jason Mraz Foundation. 



    kevalaween by Trilogy Sanctuary
    La Jolla, CA  //  Sat, Oct. 31st  //  7:30 PM

    • FREE Epic Rooftop Costume Party 
    • Live Music & Performances
    • Organic Vegan Cafe Food for Sale 
    ~ Suggested Donation: $10 donation or any Perk via this campaign 
    ~ Full Party Details on the official Facebook Event Page 




    FREE Print & Digital Subscription - Yoga Digest Magazine 
    Get 1 year (6 issues) of the print edition delivered to your mailbox and access to the digital edition on your computer. Claim Offer - no credit card necessary! 






    Q: What does kevala mean?
    A: kevala has many translations. It means 'absolute truth' to our team - drop judgement of others and live your life to the highest potential. 

    Q: What does Fixed Funding mean?
    A: If we don't make our goal - then your money is returned within 5 business days, so please share our campaign to make kevala global! 

    Q: How do I get my kevala gear?
    A: We will contact you via email to confirm shipping details, design, color, style, size, etc for all products. Please provide us your best email during checkout. 

    Q: What about Sizing? 
    A: We will provided sizing details after the campaign so your top fits great! 

    Q: Who founded kevala and who else is on the team? 
    A: Our founder Keith Donohue wanted to create the perfect eco-friendly athletic company utilizing his extensive experience:

    • lululemon athletica 
    • Profesional Soccer Player 
    • Business Degree 
    • Certified Yoga Teacher 
    • Athletic Event Organizer  

    Keith then rounded up the best eco-frienldy apparel designers (Prana), contracted global sustainable factories and mills (NAU), hired yoga retail experts (CorePower), and tested garments over and over with elite athletes until perfection was achieved. 

    Q: When will I get my order?

    A: We will do everything in our power to get your order within 2 - 4 months after the campaign ends. We will keep you posted along the way for progress reports. 




    Please send us any specific questions regarding wholesale, custom projects, product information, and more to this email: info@positivepresent.com 



    Connect on Social Media at: @kevalawear 

                                   


    Your support means you respect quality eco-freindly apparel, and understand the important component of giving back. Thank you and please share our campaign with like-minded friends, family, and co-workers!
story_txt:
kevala is amongst the leaders of the Mindful Mainstream: changing consumer demand to preserve nature and humanity. Our apparel speaks for itself: from the earth, for the earth.Slated to be the largest sustainable athletic apparel company on Earth.  
Leader in eco-friendly blanks for fitness & yoga studios. 

Fund 50 nonprofits in all 50 states, Washington, D.C., Canada, and Mexico. 
Founders of ReflectNow - mirrored inspiration. 



Our fabrics are made from quality sustainable materials: extremely soft, innovative, and naturally moisture-wicking. We also keep the toxics out of our garments with water-based printing. 



TENCEL - fabric sustainably sourced from Eucalyptus trees, a higher moisture transfer rate than most fabrics, and dries quick. 


Premium Organic Cotton - soft and breathable like your favorite t-shirt.


Water-Based Ink - we never use Plastisol (PVC) which is carcinogenic. 




      


 
When you buy a $5 shirt, WHO pays the price? The earth, farmers, and factory workers. 'Fast-fashion' is an epidemic, although we can change demand with purchasing power.  kevala strives to be sustainable from cradle to grave. 
Watch 'The True Cost'  trailer - a documentary which explores the impact of the global clothing industry on people and the planet, a film kevala supports!
      



Quality, sustainable, private label athletic apparel built mindfully for elite athletes, fitness studios, and trainers who are serious about performance. 



Boutique Studio Specialists: Yoga, Pilates, Barre, CrossFit, Small Gyms 

Custom Eco-Printing: logos, slogans, any creative via Eco-Friendly ink

Sustainable Styles: racerback tanks, muscle tanks, and crew neck t-shirts 

CUSTOMIZE: get your name, logo, and tagline on your tribe & out in public! 


Our signature series ReflectNow displays inspirational words on the front of tops, written backwards to read reflected off studio mirrors for motivation. The same word is written on the back of garments to inspire. We utilize many affirmations tested by athletes, and also create custom sayings. 
                           
    ReflectNow Favorites: breathe | strength | love | present | fearless love | gratitude | get after it | clean slate | let go | joy | kindness | fearless | karma | dominate | give Enjoy more styles, lighter fabric, and a variety of colors! Our production and design team created the perfect eco-friendly line: our fabric wicks away sweat naturally, tailored for athletes, and the feel is ultra soft - your first choice for work-outs! 



KV LUX Blend - Natural Sweat Wicker: ultra-soft TENCEL and Certified Organic Cotton blended to wick sweat away. 

Flatlock: strong stitching constructed flat on both sides preventing irritation during workouts, yes to chafe-free. 

Water-Based Ink: free of toxins (no Plastisol - PVC), breathable, and a crisp look and feel without gritty texture.  

Athlete Built: extended back paneling for downward dogs & burpees, lightweight fabric, and constructed mindfully for free range of motion.

Giving:  you sweat, we give. kevala funds 50 nonprofits - environmental protection, at-risk kids, cancer research and many more causes.  

               Slated Color Palette: kevala Gray (KVG), Black, White and Light Blue.*                                               
Enjoy the new collection - ReflectNow tops, customizable eco-friendly blanks, glass water bottles, artisan bracelets, and sustainable trucker hats! FREE SHIPPING! 


Lightweight Fabric: 66% organic cotton, 30% TENCEL® & 4% spandex Jersey
Moisture Wicking: natural fibers from Eucalyptus trees wick sweat away 
Fit: athletic, longer back paneling & covers the body for a perfect fit
Flatlock Stitching: chafe-free movement, no irritation

Curved bill & adjustable closure

         • 700 ML / 24 OZ• Borosilicate glass body for hot or cold drinks (tea, water & smoothies) • Removable Adaptor Cap for easy cleaning and wide-mouthed glass option• Silicone sleeve for durability and temperature dissipation • Dishwasher Safe, BPA free & recyclable• Color: black sleeve and cap with light gray kevala logo            100% waterproof
Adjustable from 2-5 inches in diameter
Wax-coated with iron-coated copper "P" charm
Color: black, gray, & light blue intertwinedAll kevala products include FREE SHIPPING! 






Every purchase includes an automatic donation of 5% to 50 nonprofits from the 50Give Tour - our founder volunteered in ALL 50 states, Canada, D.C., and Mexico! Taste of the 50Give Crew:

Gabriel's Angels (AZ): pet therapy for at-risk & abused kids to enhance their emotional development for life. 

Farm Rescue (ND): harvesting and planting assistance to farmers experiencing a major injury, illness, or natural disaster. 

Give Running (KY): collect, clean, and donate new and used running and athletic shoes to NGOs.




        



Real reviews from fitness studio owners, athletes, boutiques, and fashionistas who love our fabrics, give-back program, and the ReflectNow series! 

Washington, D.C. "We love kevala - the story alone: giving back to nonprofits, affirmations to inspire, and sustainable athletic wear - something our customers are now asking for…everybody loves the feel of the tops, and kevala is my favorite tank to work-out in! Once restocked - we want to do the blank program with our logos!" -Ferrall D. (Core72 Owner - Fitness Boutique)
San Diego, California "As someone who has worked in and around the sustainable fashion sphere for over 8 years, kevala is one of those standout brands who has quickly built a cult following of conscious and active humans. Whether it's their materials, supply chain or giving arm, kevala does not sacrifice on style or ethics. The leadership and purely positive energy that their founder Keith brings to the table is all inspiring and has helped build a community of mindful consumers. kevala is a brand to watch and a brand I continue to learn from." -Kestrel J. (AWEAR CEO - Sustainable Fashion Company) 
Dallas, Texas"It's great to work with great people. Not only is kevala made with earth friendly products but they feel amazing inside and out. Their signature reflective messages (ReflectNow) are powerful affirmations for those wearing them and those who see them! With little reminders to be present, love fearlessly and breathe, my kevala tops stay in high rotation!  The most amazing thing about kevala, however is the creator behind them. The founder volunteered in each of the 50 states and gives back a percentage of kevala sales to each and every one of them. We are beyond inspired and grateful to partner with someone on such an amazing concept." -Jenn B. (Yoga Digest Magazine CEO - Global Yoga Publication)Mission Valley, California "I had the pleasure of meeting Keith (founder of kevala) when I dropped in on a yoga class in San Diego. After class he told me about kevala and I was immediately touched by his endeavor; I just had to be involved. I started attending more kevala Yoga Crawl classes because Keith brings such a great energy and always inspires me to help. In the short time I have known Keith I have witnessed the traits of a giving, caring, and dedicated individual."-Aubry W. (International Yoga Instructor) 
Seattle, Washington "Having had the chance to run, do body-pump and yoga in my new racerback ReflectNow top, I couldn't be happier. I was surprised at how nice and soft it is -- I love it now! And I love the positive feedback loop it helps create."-Lauren M. (kevala Customer - Runner, Crossfitter, & Yogi)

Do you know it costs between 30% - 70% MORE to produce sustainable products over regular production? We require additional funding in the beginning to increase our Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) - larger orders equals price drops for you and us. We actually sold-out of the first kevala batch in under 3 months - demand is super high! Together we are creating a Mindful Mainstream in the apparel industry.  the kevala cycle: we consciously are making apparel that is sustainable from Cradle to Grave.  Quality is our business plan, and we start with the earth. 



kevala has been featured in Yoga Digest for Staff Picks, highlighted by Fit Athletic for Yoga Products You Can't Live Without, and praised by Jason Mraz for our philanthropy & eco-friendly mission. Below are a few companies, global instructors and celebrities who have endorsed kevala!  Watch grammy-winner Jason Mraz interview the kevala founder!      
 Jason is a huge advocate of nonprofits focused on the arts, equality and the environment - learn more about his endeavor: Jason Mraz Foundation.

story:
Who we are

My name is Yang Elvira, i am a graphic designer and the owner of the company Plugit LTD, Hong Kong, although a small company, my husband his friend and me, we are passionate about making a fully operational Geiger Counter for the iPhone available to the mass market. The Radomo iPhone geiger is an iddea to help promote an affordable, precise and nice designed. radioactivity messurement instrument.

We are not new in inventing something, but we are new on Indiegogo. Products developed and manufactured by us in past are for example, "plugit cable" www.plugit.hk, plugit is also our own registered trademark. Also we made the microsim cutter, you can see more info about this product at www.microsim-cutter.com, and the microsim adapter "plugit" the only adaptor available on the market without being necessary to fix it with tape.

 

About this project

Before reading more about our project please think about this words:

Radiation is something you can't feel, smell or taste!

A Geiger counter, also called a Geiger–Müller counter, is a type of particle detector that measures ionizing radiation. They detect the emission of nuclear radiation: alpha particles, beta particles or gamma rays. A Geiger counter detects radiation by ionization produced in a low-pressure gas in a Geiger–Müller tube. Each particle detected produces a pulse of current, but the Geiger counter cannot distinguish the energy of the source particles. Invented in 1908, Geiger counters remain popular instruments used for measurements in health, physics, industry, geology and other fields, because they can be made with simple electronic circuits.A geiger is not a device you need every day, but if nowdays, every one should have one.

The only problem is, that geigers counters using a GM Tube are still very expensive. Our goal is to offer an affordable device, but which is also precise, user friendly and nice designed, and all this for a price below 100 USD and this is why we need your pledge.

We need your help to make it affordable for any one in the world.

The engineering and development stage is complete. The final step before entering mass production is to reach the factory’s minimum order quantity and to get enough money to start a mold, pay the calibration and meet factory's min. order quantity, and this is where you can help us get there.


Technical specifications

  • Measuring range: 0.04-20 mSv/H
  • Power: AAA battery x 1 (not included due Fedex and IATA regulations)
  • Usage time: 200 hours
  • Weight: 70g (2.5 oz)
  • Works with follow iOS devices: iPod Touch, iPhone, iPad
  • Share your measurement results with the world, on peach tube
  • Software displays results in CPM, mSv/h or mR/h
  • Download FREE iOS software from APP Store


We believe, with our idea, concept and design we did with greatest effort, we also hope it meet your expectations. . Your opinions mean a lot to our project.

We really need your help to launch it.  THANK YOU!!!


Rewards for Indiegogo contributors

- Amount $1

you will be listed on our homepage as supporter of this project

- Amount $99

you will get 1 pcs. Radomo iPhone Geiger

Shipping

If this project will be sucesfull, we'll start shipping around 30 days later. We ship if from Hong Kong using Fedex. After getting the tracking number, you will receive your reward 2-3 days later. We want keep it affordable, so don't think too much about shipping, it's FREE !!!


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help us, can can let the world know about our product, share our project posted here in indiegogo with your friends, this may be a great help for us, too and we will list you as a contributor on our page.

 

What if we can't fund it?

Don't worry, there is no risk for you at all. We simply refund you and say a BIG THANK YOU on our home page

story:
Isambard Kingdom Brunel has long been regarded as something of a British hero.

A revolutionary engineer and designer, his ground-breaking projects in the 19th Century helped to transform and modernise life for generations.

Inspired by the legacy of his robust, functional and beautiful creations, we have set about capturing the essence of his name in a series of wonderfully crafted timepieces.

Our intention is to create a stunning range of wristwatches for all occasions but, to help us build that collection, we have begun by commissioning the manufacture of a single, fitting automatic and mechanical design as our flagship model.

Once in production we will retail this watch at £179.99 but, EXCLUSIVELY to our supporters, we are offering the first editions at an amazing £79.  A SAVING OF OVER £100!!

Created from stainless steel and complete with a beautiful stitched leather strap, The Brunel features a calendar, date and chronograph within the face.

We're producing this first collection in 4 style options:

Black face with dark leather strap

Black face with tan leather strap

White face with dark leather strap

White face with tan leather strap

There are 4 separate perks to reflect the different style options available.

We are extremely excited about beginning this journey.  Brunel has long been a passion of ours and we feel privileged to create the first of our models aimed at reflecting his extraordinary legacy.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have been fortunate enough to manufacture and produce designs for customers across the world and feel confident we will meet all of the expectations this project brings.

story:
THE SHOES 

ERGO ENTRY DESIGN

Designed for easy on and off your baby's feet.  

SIZE VERIFICATION

Don't guess. SEE if the shoe fits.  Our open-top design enables the shoe to unzip and fold to the side.

Just unzip the shoe, place your baby's foot in, and zip it up!  

ERGO ZIPPER PULL

The Buku rubber zipper pull is concave and sized for adult-sized fingertips.

STYLE

Simple and classic Patent Pending design that's stylish for both girls and boys.

MATERIAL OPTIONS

Three different styles to choose from:

STYLES AND COLORS

With your help, we will launch with the following styles and color options:

Please use these numbers (1-9) when providing us your order information at the close of our campaign.  

BONUS COLOR!!!

Rose Gold - Leather with Leather

SIZING

We will launch with three sizes ranging from 3 months to 18 months, although we've already had many requests for larger sizes of 24 months and beyond.  Once our launch is a success, we plan to launch a size 4 and 5.

HAVE A QUESTION?

Reach out to us.  We're happy to help ;)

Instagram: @bukubabies

Facebook: Buku Babies

Email: Info@bukubabies.com

Risks and challenges

Our little family business includes experience in industrial design and sourcing products from around the globe. Our shoes have minimal risks because these shoes are fairly simple and we are using already existing industry accepted manufacturing processes. We received our first prototypes a few month back. Since then, we've made several improvements and we just received the final samples and we're very happy with the final product.

Also, our supplier is already producing baby shoes for several well known U.S. brands carried by major retailers. Consumer expectations vary from consumer to consumer, but we have high confidence in our shoes and strongly believe this will be a great success.

story:
Short Summary&Team 

When the Marketing Management team(Kuba, Kornel, Sasa) comes with a crazy idea and delivers it to a passionate Multimedia Designer(Susanna) that listens to the vision proposed by the Service Management team(Lenka, Bianca, Majky) fire starts and imagination becomes reality.

Our Backpack is build from 4 exchangeable parts that are compatible with each other. First of them is what we call canvas and its the biggest piece of the backpack. The second comes the bottom of the backpack and right after them the arms and the front pocket. All parts will come in different colors and materials what allows you the ultimate fun and uniqueness of your product at all times.

What We Need & What You Get

Our 12 000 $ is going to be spend partially for finalizing the prototype and establishing the first stock of backpacks after finding suitable supplier.

For every funding above 50$ you going to be presented with the opportunity to create your own and very first Odd Mode backpack as soon as production starts and before the essential launch of it! 

The Impact

Even though we focus mainly on giving you the ability to be unique every day of your special life, we do have other reasons for you to choose our backpack!

Between 1990 and 2004, the global demand for textiles increased by nearly 20 million tons . The production of textiles to reach these demands has contributed to increasing CO2 emissions, water usage, and toxic chemical use. As a point of comparison, greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions caused by the average yearly textile consumption of one person in Denmark is equivalent to pollution generated by traveling 2,143 km by car! That is where we started to look for a helpful solution. Our backpack helps reduce this waste by prolonging its life cycle with exchangeable parts and reducing textile waste in our production.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge that our product will face in future is finding the right supplier for our exchangeable parts

There is always an aspect that this is our team first attempt to launch a product and we learn about our challenges everyday... but we learn quick!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please support us on our Odd Mode Facebook page and be patient! Its worth it!

Between 1990 and 2004, the global demand for textiles increased by nearly 20 million tons . The production of textiles to reach these demands has contributed to increasing CO2 emissions, water usage, and toxic chemical use. As a point of comparison, greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions caused by the average yearly textile consumption of one person in Denmark is equivalent to pollution generated by traveling 2,143 km by car! That is where we started to look for a helpful solution. Our backpack helps reduce this waste by prolonging its life cycle with exchangeable parts and reducing textile waste in our production.

Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge that our product will face in future is finding the right supplier for our exchangeable parts
There is always an aspect that this is our team first attempt to launch a product and we learn about our challenges everyday... but we learn quick!

Other Ways You Can Help
Please support us on our Odd Mode Facebook page and be patient! Its worth it!

story:
We are running a new campaign! 


http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/zed-absolution--2/x/4130658




Multiplayer Demo Download!

Download the Multiplayer demo on PC & OSX at http://www.zedabsolution.com/download

For a ton of information on the game, screenshots & other good things, visit www.zedabsolution.com and don't forget to vote for us on our official Steam Greenlight page and perhaps follow us on our @zedabsolution Twitter account. Thank you!


The Story (So Far...)

Meet ZED - a battle hardened seraphim warrior. Banished from the holy land, ZED vies for his salvation the only way that’s left; by competing in the Tournament of the Accord. Possessing the corpses of fallen kin, he must survive the brutal gauntlet, and work his way through progressively challenging and terrifying realms. Only by collecting the souls of the damned can he earn his way back into the Gods good graces. ZED’s only chance at redemption is to defeat the soldiers of Legion, but he is not left to his own devices. Build a massive arsenal, wield unique powers, and give special blessings to ZED’s armor in order to help him reclaim absolution.


Sounds great! What's next?

ZED takes elements from many styles of gameplay and melds them into a one of kind experience. At first glance, ZED is a top down throwback arcade shooter in the same vein as Robotron 2048 and SmashTV - albeit brought into the 21st century. But ZED has many layers beyond classics such as these, and brings many elements of gameplay you find in RPG, ISO, and FPS games. A few noticeable features of ZED include:

  • Multi-Platform Support 
  • Multiple Breathtaking 3D environments to battle Legion through
  • Full multiplayer support
  • A massive arsenal of equippable weapons and upgrades 
  • Multiple unique special powers and armor blessings 
  • Balanced Difficulties for new to experienced players
  • A full leveling system for players and weapons 
  • Oculus Rift Support (OMG HOW)







Platforms

We are currently supporting Windows, OSX, and will support Linux for release. We have hopes of being able to launch to DLC consoles as well, but that will largely be dependant on the success of the game.

Partners

We are working with Unity3D for our game engine, Photon Cloud by Exit Games for the Cross Platform Multiplayer Servers, and Buddy's core API platform for our user accounts and management.



Planning, Production & Features

You will be able to purchase weapons, items, upgrades and talents by spending Soul Tokens. You can earn Soul Tokens by finishing off foes.


Currently we have 6 environments with a focus on another six plus and accompanying online game modes for each. Secret paths & traps, dangers and greatness will cross your path.

ZED features over 100 ranks that can be unlocked as you gain souls for your salvation. Your ability to use weapons also improves with use. The more you use the pistol, the better your host gets with the pistol. While it may start out a little slow, you will be churning over hordes with a pistol faster than an assault rifle.

(Preview of the Specials you can purchase in the Armory)

Unlike traditional top-down arcade shooters, ZED features a large arsenal of weapons you can equip and modify before you enter the arena. ZED can carry up to 4 into battle, and they can easily be quick-swapped when you find yourself in trouble. As you earn souls, you might opt to upgrade the specs of your trusty pistol with mods like laser sight for increased accuracy, or fire-rate modification to deal out more damage. On the other hand, you might want to save your hard-earned souls for an automatic shotgun, which when combined with an increased gauge modification, can deliver a wide range of gibbing pleasure.


(Preview of the Blessings you can purchase in the Armory)

There are over 30 weapons currently implemented, including railguns, axes, flamethrowers, smg’s, assault rifles, and tons more to keep you armed to the teeth!  Each weapon features its own stats, including fire-rate, critical hit chance, damage per-second, and accuracy - all of which can be improved with leveling and upgrade selection. In addition to being able to throw grenades, Legion’s ghouls also drop a huge variety of powerups, ranging from spinning balls of fire to the stoppage of time.





(Sample of the Powerups you can attain from fallen foes)

Yes - multiplayer. Yes - it’s awesome.


We currently support full co-op gameplay in ZED - which brings a whole new experience to the gameplay. While Legion’s soldiers do get more challenging as more players join, each player can bring individual powers, blessings, and weapons to the arena to create any number of gameplay styles for battling evil. You can blast through a crowd of creatures with your GLX5000 after your confederate pulls them in close for intense melee combat. Stack critical hits for massive damage, or build up your health and regeneration to keep running longer. 


While co-op is currently fully supported we have plans to add deathmatch, capture the flag, and domination modes before release.


 

 

OST (Official Sountrack)

We are having the entire game scored with an original soundtrack along with a huge variety of bonus tracks added onto the official soundtrack pack. The OST is being composed by Дмитрий Демиденко - Dimitry Demidenko. A composer from Minsk, Belarus.

https://soundcloud.com/zed-absolution/


Occulus Rift Support!

A lot of people are excited, while a lot of others are confused as to how we plan on implementing the Oculus rift into our game experience. Since we don’t have one yet, and haven’t been able to definitively measure the pros and cons of different implementations, the general idea is that you will have control of what you, and ZED, are looking at. We are both very excited about the Oculus rift so I guarantee it will be getting a good amount of attention on this end.

 

That's great! Who are you?

We have 20 years combined experience in Design & Production of games, web, mobile, and video. That said, there are only 2 of us. It has been a labor of love for gaming and great game experiences, and hopefully one you will be able to share with us. Because there are only two of us, you probably already know the answer to the question below: 

 

 

Why are you fundraising?

To be honest, ZED will be released no matter what. We have dedicated countless hours and nights to developing this game, so come hell or high water, this game will be completed. That said, this funding will make that happen in a timely manner, and get additional features that we simply can’t tackle without more resources.

 

We launched ZED on Steam Greenlight October 2012 and found that there was an overall love for the style of game we are trying to build. We have been taking everything the community has had to say about it and are constantly making it better. We're hoping to find the support and community involvement to make this project a success, not only in our eyes, but to you the end user. So what will the funding go towards? We want to be 100% transparent with what these funds will be used for. There are a few things that we must cover in some way, so these items will take priority:

 

    • Rewards for backers
    • Software licensing costs
    • Server costs for multiplayer and player management
    • Once these costs are covered, we will be using our successful funding for the following:
    • SFX and soundtrack development
    • 3D modeling and animation support
    • Additional programming & server support
    • Platform licensing costs

 

We have been thinking about Stretch Goals as well. We have a rough outline of things we would like to implement into the game. We are basing what comes first on campaign funding and community voting. These are subject to change.

 

 

What do I get out of this?

Not only will you get an amazing gaming experience, we are offering the following rewards:

BETA ACCESS (Digital Item)
To show our support we are offering any backer who pledges 15$ or above a limited Beta Access key that will come available on Desura. This is different from our global multiplayer. You will be added to a list to get the entire full game beta before launch!




IN GAME VISUAL HELM (Digital Item)
An awesome way to show your support!

 

OST DOWNLOAD (Digital Item)
A digital link to download the OST when the game launches.



FACTION T-SHIRTS Physical Item)
We have faction T-Shirts available sizes range from S-XXXL.



FACTION DOG TAGS (Physical Item)
Rep your faction of choice or collect both, ILLINARI and LEGION.(Physical Item)
Each mini poster is signed and sent with love.




COLLECTIBLE CARDS (Physical Item)
Gotta collect them all!







GAME AND DEVELOPER DIARY PACK (Physical Item)
Game and Developer Diary Book



ABSOLUTE EDITION COLLECTORS BOX (Physical Item)
Everything we have to offer, and then some.

-------

Can we help other ways?

The next best way to help ZED which is just as helpful as monetary backing is social sharing. Please follow us on Twitter and Like us on Facebook if you use any of these social platforms and pass them along to friends or family :)



We could use your Vote! If you are a Steam user please take a moment and check out our official Steam Greenlight page.

That's all for now folks!, Thank you for your support!
 

Risks and Challenges

We've tried to do as much as we can to show the community how dedicated we are at what we do. We both love making games and aside from the possibility of not fulfilling our Indie Gogo Campaign, we would still find some way of finishing it on our own.

Working with contractors can sometimes be difficult with Time Zones and project management. Luckily we have both experience in studio environments as well as working from home, learning some of the best tricks to successful projects, like running daily scrum.

If we don't make our goal we are set to fixed funding. Which means if we don't raise our entire goal all the funds will be refunded to the backers registered on I/G.

story:
Our story began when a semi-young watch aficionado from Oslo sketched out the design of his grandfather’s vintage wristwatch to his friend and fellow watch enthusiast. The duo then set out to recreate what eventually crystalized into the Coucheron (named after the grandfather whose origins are French).


Emphasis has been placed on the subtle play of colors, nuances in materials and discreet but accentuated details. Small design treats that enhances the overall expression of the watch. It has all the right specs and holds a balanced mix of discreet elegance and eye-catching shapes. It’s a watch that wears well in all aspects of one’s daily life, being on a motorcycle, in a suit, at the pub with friends or at dinner with your in-laws.

  • Case body: 316L stainless steel. Case diameter is 38 mm, case thickness is 7.2 mm
  • Crown: 316L stainless steel with engraved "CW" logo
  • Movement: Miyota GL30
  • Dials: painted brass
  • Strap: black or brown 20x18 mm genuine leather and stainless steel "CW" engraved buckle
  • Glass: Scratch resistant sapphire crystal
  • Water resistance: 5 ATM (suitable for swimming, white water rafting and non-snorkeling water related work)
  • Caseback: 316L stainless steel with engraved "CW" logo


We have had some great feedback on the watches so far, however by using this platform we hope to validate our work on a broader basis, receive valuable input on our very first design as well as give us a boost in our future R&D work.



We have been working relentlessly on the watch, preferred suppliers and partners, and feel well-prepared for a full-scale commercial release. However, we acknowledge there are always unforeseeable events that may affect our planning, primarily related to production and delivery. By ensuring routinely quality controls before shipping, keeping our website up-to-date and provide for a good after-sale service, we are confident that we are able to deliver as promised. After all, Coucheron Watches means a great deal to us.

story:
RULER X1

A stylish over-engineered ruler, designed by a engineer obssesed with designing and over-engineering everyday objects.
 
Other than the standard metric and imperial units of Centimeters & Inches marks, one face of the ruler has been dedicated to the mathematical number Pi, as a tribute to one of the most widely known mathematical constants, both inside and outside the scientific community.
 
 
Constructed using solid stainless steel, the Ruler X1 has a solid and indestructable feel to it, it is ready to be passed on from generations after generations.
 
 
There are 2 types of finishing available:
  • Silver Metallic finish with black marks.
  • Satin grey finish with silver marks.

In order to make it uniquely yours, or even a great gift for your love ones, you can pledge for the SUPPORTER+E reward and your name will be engraved onto the last face.

 
 

With your help, we can create.

I need your support and vote of confidence, in order to make this product a reality.

Numerous hours of hard work have been put into designing and fabricating the prototypes. And now i would like to bring this product to life with your help. I am confident that you would be delighted when you hold the Ruler X1 in your hands. Please support by pledging or sharing, i will be eternally grateful.

Current standing

We are ready to go ahead with production once the project is funded, as all production is done in-house we have total control over the timeline, design and processes.

What We Need

We need enough quantity to get it into production at an affordable cost, all production works are done in-house locally in Singapore and with your help to reach our funding goal, we will have the confidence to move forward with this project.

The Impact

With your contributions, you will be involved in helping to startup a great company that focus on bring good design to your everyday items, your name will be placed on our website and you will be forever remembered as the pioneer contributors that made it all possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us share this project with your friends and families, every bit of help is greatly appreciated!

story:
The aim is to sell used Tshirts. We live in a world of consumption and don't know what to do with our old Tshirts. The company, La Terre's As, would like to take them, and give them a second chance. 

                           Logo of the company: La Terre's As

To do this we will buy selected  Tshirts (plain ones are best) in charity shops for around 1 Euro, and then wash them using eco-friendly methods ( steam washing was one of the ideas) 

The next process is to customize them. 

First of all we want to re-label each Tshirt on the sleeve with a print of the shape of a card (Ace of Spades is our logo) . Because each Tshirt is unique in our brand, we want them to have a story written on each of them : the origin, the date and the number in the collection. It is therefore a special limited edition of Tshirts. To start we will do a series of 50 Tshirts.

We therefore offer a FEEL GOOD factor for buying Tshirts that come from charity shops and have been recycled (good for the environment ). 

For customers who want more style, we can add a nice design for an extra 10 Euros (prices are estimates only). Duck Dijon is our first design, and we are happy to tell you we have 4 other beautiful designs ready to be printed. 

Also we can also do a customize collection using the same process.

                               The new 'Duck Dijon' Tshirt design

A printer in Le Touquet Paris-Plage, in France, has agreed to print out designs on used Tshirts. His price is 3-4 euros per Tshirt for a series of 50 prints.

Once the Tshirt is ready to be sold, we need a platform to sell them, and the different marketplaces we have in mind are all well-known websites such as E-bay, Amazon, Fnac, Priceminister, etc... As well as our own website!

The target market is young adults,  18-30 years old, who are willing to wear used Tshirts, and understand that they are recycling them. 

£2000 will cover the cost of establishing the 2 first series of 50 Tshirts and to design a high quality e-commerce platform on duckdijon.com and laterresas.com, domain which we have already acquired. 

         HELP US OUT, SPREAD THE WORD! 

               Our eco-friendly Packaging

                    (using plastic bottles and old shirts)

Also we can also do a customize collection using the same process.

A printer in Le Touquet Paris-Plage, in France, has agreed to print out designs on used Tshirts. His price is 3-4 euros per Tshirt for a series of 50 prints.
Once the Tshirt is ready to be sold, we need a platform to sell them, and the different marketplaces we have in mind are all well-known websites such as E-bay, Amazon, Fnac, Priceminister, etc... As well as our own website!
The target market is young adults,  18-30 years old, who are willing to wear used Tshirts, and understand that they are recycling them. 
£2000 will cover the cost of establishing the 2 first series of 50 Tshirts and to design a high quality e-commerce platform on duckdijon.com and laterresas.com, domain which we have already acquired. 
         HELP US OUT, SPREAD THE WORD! 

               Our eco-friendly Packaging
                    (using plastic bottles and old shirts)

story:
Who am I?

Hi, my name is Johanne and I'm a young entrepeneur from Denmark, Europe. My dream is to inspire kids and their parents around the world to be aware of the sun and reducing the risk of skin cancer. 

I came up with the idea at the beach watching parents having trouble telling their kids why sunscreen is so important. A lot of kids simply do not like the rubbing and takes of. This means, that the kids often do not have sunscreen on at all - or the coverage is very poor. That is NOT good at all. Smaller children's skin is extremely delicate compared to adults. 

By making it fun and visible I wish that most kids will find it exciting to do as the monsters tells them - and by that, saving a lot of children from getting skin cancer when they get older. 

How do these UV wristbands work?

Good question. The SUNsters wristbands is a fun toy that reacts to UV-rays. When the sun hits the bracelet, the color changes and the SUNsters "lights up" to tell that it is time to enter the shade or maybe put on some sunscreen. 

Why are they called SUNsters?

Yes you are right. The name is a mix of SUN and MONSTERS. A great family of small sun-monsters that loves children and will do anything to protect them from the sun. 

Are they harmful to health?

No, not in any way. The wristbands are made of natural silicone which have been CE approved. This means that bracelets comply with all legal requirements for CE marking. 
Please note: If you know that your kids suffers from other kinds of skin allergies, please be aware that this might include allergy towards silicone. 

What will the money be used for? 

We have joined Indiegogo to make SUNsters a worldwide success. 
For every dollar we get, we will invest 90% in marketing/sales and free products for kids and the remaining 10% will be donated to amazing people that creates great events for kids with cancer.
