story:
About the watch

When we thought of the S.Craft (standing for Sapphire Craft) and designed the “Transparency N°1”, our goal was to construct the watch in such a way that the wearer could observe the movement parts and interactions with as unobstructed a view as possible.

Quand nous avons créé la montre S.Craft (pour Saphir Craft) et dessiné la "Transparency N ° 1", l’objectif était de de fabriquer une montre de telle sorte que son utilisateur puisse observer les parties du mouvement et les interactions avec une vision la plus dégagée possible.

Sapphire case

The timepiece features a solid sapphire 40mm case that has been carefully machined from a single block of sapphire crystal. The aim, of course, is to offer full visual access to the multi-level movement, from all possible angles.

Sapphire (known in mineralogical circles as Corundum) is the third hardest material on Earth, only moissanite (9.25) and diamonds (10) exceed its hardness ranking (9) on the Mohs scale.

It is almost entirely scratch-proof, and the process by which it is made into a finished watch case is extraordinarily difficult. For watchmakers, creating a case from a block of sapphire is a true technical challenge.

It requires long and complex machining, grinding and polishing processes, and superior expertise.

La montre dispose d’un boîtier entièrement en saphir d’un diamètre de 40 mm de diamètre qui a été soigneusement usiné à partir d’un seul bloc de saphir. Le but est bien entendu d’offrir un accès visuel complet aux différents niveaux du mouvement sous tous les angles possibles.

Le saphir (connu dans le milieu minéralogique sous le nom de corindon) est le troisième matériau le plus dur sur Terre, seuls la moissanite (9,25) et le diamant (10) dépassent son classement de dureté (9) sur l’échelle de Mohs.

Il est presque entièrement résistant aux rayures et le processus par lequel il est transformé en boîtier de montre fini est extrêmement compliqué.Pour les horlogers, créer un boîtier à partir d’un bloc de saphir est un véritable défi technique.

Cela nécessite des processus d’usinage, de meulage et de polissage longs et complexes que seul les plus expérimentés et talentueux arrivent à faire.

Skeletonized movement

The eye-catching heart of this watch is the skeletonized automatic ETA movement 2892-A2, which carries a power reserve of approximately 42hours and is beyond any doubts, one of the most reliable and trouble-free movements in the industry.

This movement beats at 28’800 BPH (beats per hour) 4Hz and itis decorated with polished steel screws. It has undergone extensive skeletonizing thus reducing the bridges and main plate to a minimal see-through framework.

The same goes for the rotor which is opened like the rest of the movement to allow a clear view of the wheels and pinions interacting.

Le cœur de cette montre Suisse est le mouvement ETA 2892-A2 à remontage automatique que nous avons squelettisé, qui possède une réserve de marche typique d’environ 42 heures et est sans nulle doute, l’un des mouvements les plus fiables de l’industrie horlogère.

Ce mouvement bat à 28’800 BPH (battements par heure) 4Hz et il est décoré de vis en acier poli. Il a subi une squelettisation extensive, réduisant ainsi les ponts et la platine au maximum permettant le plus de transparences possible. 

Il en va de même pour la masse oscillante qui est découpée comme le reste du mouvement ce qui permet une vision claire des roues et des pignons en interaction.

Dial & Band

The movement seats beneath the skeletonized dial displaying the hours with blue indexes and the minutes with blue markers.

The band is purposely not made using any endangered or exotic species but rather using top grain cowhide leather with crocodile pattern embossing.

The band also features “quick-click” spring bars so the band can be easily changed (a second band color is available in the gift box with each watch).

Le mouvement est positionné sous le cadran, lui aussi, squelettisé affichant des indexes bleus pour les heures ainsi que la minuterie qui est aussi bleue.

Le bracelet n’a volontairement pas été fait avec des peaux d’espèces en voie de disparition ou exotiques mais en utilisant du cuir de vachette pleine fleur avec un motif gaufré style crocodile.

Le bracelet est également doté d’une barrette à ressort «clic rapide» afin que le bracelet puisse être facilement changé sans outils (un second bracelet de couleur différente est disponible dans l’étui avec chaque montre).

Gift box

The S.Craft “Transparency N°1” is delivered in a gift box with a second band and a magnifying glass allowing the owner to better see all the details of the skeletonized movement from any angle.

La montre S.Craft «Transparency 1» est livrée dans un étui qui comprend un second bracelet ainsi qu’une loupe permettant au propriétaire de mieux voir tous les détails du mouvement squelettisé sous n'importe quel angle.

Technical details

CASE

Diameter: 40 mm
Material: scratch-resistant polished sapphire crystal
Middle part case: scratch-resistant polished sapphire crystal
Bezel: scratch-resistant polished sapphire crystal
Back cover: scratch-resistant polished sapphire crystal
Waterproofness: 30 meters (100 feet), 3 ATM

MOVEMENT

Caliber ETA 2892-A2 Skeletonized mechanical movement with self-winding bidirectional rotor
Time setting with stop-second
Frequency 28’800 vibrations per hour (4 Hz), 21 jewels, shock absorber incabloc
Regulator system ETACHRON
Functions hours, minutes and central second.
Typical power reserve of approximately 50 hours

DIAL

Skeletonized silver color with brushed finishing
Blue hour indexes with blue minute markers
Blue Hands

BAND

Top grain cowhide leather with crocodile pattern embossing
Tool-free “quick-click” spring bars
Stainless steel prong buckle

SHIPPING

Free shipping and insurance (excluding import duty and eventual local taxes), delivery estimated 5 months after order.

WORLDWIDE MRSP

The worldwide MRSP (manufacturer retail suggested price) is CHF 12’000.-

INCLUDING INTERNATIONAL GUARANTEE OF 5 YEARS

BOÎTIER

Diamètre : 40 mm
Matériau : Saphir poli résistant aux chocs
Carrure : Saphir poli résistant aux chocs
Lunette : Saphir poli résistant aux chocs
Fond : Saphir poli résistant aux chocs
Étanchéité : 30 mètres (100 feet), 3ATM

MOUVEMENT

Calibre ETA 2892-A2 automatique squelettisé avec masse oscillante bidirectionnelle
Mise à l’heure avec stop second
Fréquence 28’800 vibrations par heure (4 Hz), 21 rubis, amortisseur de chocs incabloc
Raquette ETACHRON
Fonctions heures, minutes et seconde au centre
Réserve de marche typique: 50 heures

CADRAN

Couleur argent squelettisé brossé
Indexes des heures bleus avec minuterie bleue
Aiguilles bleues

BRACELET

Cuir de veau pleine fleur avec motif style crocodile
Barrette à ressorts “clic rapide” sans besoin d’outil
Boucle en acier avec ardillon

EXPÉDITION

Les frais d’expédition et d’assurance dans le monde entier sont gratuites (excluant les taxes d’importation et éventuelle taxe locale)

PSDF

Le PSDF (prix de détail suggéré par le fabricant) mondial est de CHF 12'000.- 

GARANTIE INTERNATIONALE DE 5 ANS INCLUSE 

The premises of the project

We started by the artistic design :

Then we did CAD drawings for the proportions and engineering of the various elements :

They were followed by the technical drawings :

Which then lead to the final look developed in 3D :

We then produced the first physical samples of the different components of the watch for testing and quality control purposes :

And finally, there it is, the finished working sample that we use to run all the quality and final testing on the watch!

Nous avons commencé par le dessin artistique 

Ensuite nous avons fait les dessins CAO pour l’ingénierie et les proportions de tous les éléments

Suivi des dessins techniques

Qui nous a amené au look final développé en 3D

Nous avons ensuite fabriqué les différents composants de la montre afin de les tester ainsi que les différents tests de qualité

Pour finir, voici, la montre fonctionnelle terminée que nous avons utilisée pour faire tous les différents tests finaux de qualité.

Campaign goals and planning

The campaign ended but the watch is still available at CHF 12’000. - (including Swiss VAT of 7.7% as well as the shipping and shipping insurance costs), you can contact us for inquiries at info@s-craft.ch

La campagne est terminée mais la montre est toujours disponible à CHF 12'000.- (TVA Suisse de 7.7% incluse ainsi que les frais d’assurance et d’envoi), en cas d’intérêt vous pouvez nous contacter à info@s-craft.ch

 

The Solutions Sàrl

ABOUT US

We’re The Solutions Sàrl, a Swiss company located in La Chaux-de-Fonds and specialized in any services related to the watch industry.

We’re a team with more than 35 years of experience bringing together all the Swiss watchmaking know-how and covering all the other aspects related to it.

WHAT WE DO

Starting from a blank sheet, we create, develop, manufacture and assemble, at the request of our customers, their new watch projects while guaranteeing them the utmost discretion.

These projects have allowed us to use and experiment with all possible materials for the manufacture of the watch cases and components using both quartz and mechanical movements.

These projects have also allowed us to create products for mass distribution as well as unique pieces or limited editions which, if necessary, can be set with precious stones in which, in their hearts, we generally use rare movements with grand complications.

CONTACT US

The Solutions Sàrl, Espacité 2 / PO Box 1414, CH-2301 La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland
info@thesolutions.ch / thesolutions.ch

QUI SOMMES-NOUS

Nous sommes The Solutions Sarl qui est une société suisse situé à La Chaux-de-Fonds spécialisé dans toutes les activités reliées à l’industrie horlogère

Nous une équipe avec plus de 35 ans d’expérience réunissant tout le savoir-faire horloger Suisse et couvrant toutes les autres facettes qui y sont liées.

QUE FAISONS-NOUS

En partant d’une feuille blanche, nous créons, développons, fabriquons et assemblons, à la demande de nos clients, leurs nouveaux projets horlogers tout en leurs garantissant la plus grande discrétion.

Ces projets nous ont permis d’utiliser et d’expérimenter tous les matériaux possibles pour la fabrication de boites et composants en utilisant aussi bien des mouvements quartz que des mécaniques.

Ces projets nous ont aussi permis de créer des produits pour de la grande distribution ainsi que des pièces uniques ou éditions limitées qui peuvent, si besoin, être serties de pierres précieuses dans lesquelles se trouvent généralement des mouvements rares à grandes complications.

NOUS CONTACER

The Solutions Sàrl, Espacité 2 / CP 1414, CH-2301 La Chaux-de-Fonds Suisse
info@thesolutions.ch / thesolutions.ch

Photos gallery

CASE

MOVEMENT

SAPPHIRE CASE

STRAP

TIMEPIECE

GIFT BOX

LIFESTYLE

story:
CHECK OUT HOW OUR SYSTEM WORKS!

Samples coming in from Senegal!

A CLOSER LOOK AT THE LIFE OF AN ARTISAN

6/22 - Our first trade show!!


The goal was clear, the plan was in motion. A fair trade, fashion forward apparel company that provides help to people who need it most. But then disaster struck and now we need your help.

Our fundraising goals are simple - to raise the minimum amount of cash needed to get back on track and launch our company. The funds serve a dual purpose: to help design, create and sell high quality gear (that rides on the crest of trend-based fashion), which in turn directly changes the lives of countless people in a ravaged Senegalese community. 

In addition to providing our artisans with workspace and equipment, as every great artist deserves, we pay fair trade wages and 10% from each good sold will be deposited into a fund where the artisan and his/her community democratically decide how to use the money best and better their way of life.  We are a socially conscious for-profit company; far more transparent than some 501-3C that takes huge management fees as salaries.

This initial fundraising campaign will kickstart our collaboration with our first artisan, Falilou Seye, featured in the above video.  We hope to surprise Fali with a new shop and equipment, have the funds necessary to create 5 jobs in the community and the investment capital to launch a first run of 500 products.  With the Wolof's culture of sharing in mind, your donation will not only create 5 jobs but directly impact hundreds of other people.

Most importantly, you are kickstarting a company that plans to transform the lives of thousands more, all over the world, along the way.

Project Wolof Artisan shop for 1 year - $6,000

New tools and equipment for artisans - $2,700 

Fair trade salary to produce first 500 products - $10,000 ($10 per hour X 2 hours per product X 500) 

Cost of materials for 500 products - $6,000 (at this quantity we estimate a cost of $12 per product including leather, fabrics, glues and misc. materials)

Cost of shipping for the first line - $3,000 (estimate based on expected weight and dimensions of 500 products)

2 tickets to fly to Dakar to launch company - $ 2,400

TOTAL GOAL - $30,100

Longer term goals you can help with right now! We added costs to the above total to show you what we can accomplish if we surpass our goal! Please help us hit these marks!

Fly our first artisan group to the U.S. to see our domestic office, meet the team and be involved in the launch of the line after product creation - $33,200

Hire a domestic distributor to help us get artisan product in mass-market retail stores - $43,000

Launch a line of 1,000 goods including salaries and materials - $47,400

Launch a line with artisan 2 (feel free to email recommendations).  These funds will help us get into the community and understand their needs and skills, research and plan the product lines and have the initial capital we need to fulfill our fair trade commitment - $56,800

Our fundraising goals are simple - to raise the minimum amount of cash needed to get back on track and launch our company. The funds serve a dual purpose: to help design, create and sell high quality gear (that rides on the crest of trend-based fashion), which in turn directly changes the lives of countless people in a ravaged Senegalese community. 








In addition to providing our artisans with workspace and equipment, as every great artist deserves, we pay fair trade wages and 10% from each good sold will be deposited into a fund where the artisan and his/her community democratically decide how to use the money best and better their way of life.  We are a socially conscious for-profit company; far more transparent than some 501-3C that takes huge management fees as salaries.







This initial fundraising campaign will kickstart our collaboration with our first artisan, Falilou Seye, featured in the above video.  We hope to surprise Fali with a new shop and equipment, have the funds necessary to create 5 jobs in the community and the investment capital to launch a first run of 500 products.  With the Wolof's culture of sharing in mind, your donation will not only create 5 jobs but directly impact hundreds of other people.
Most importantly, you are kickstarting a company that plans to transform the lives of thousands more, all over the world, along the way.

Project Wolof Artisan shop for 1 year - $6,000
New tools and equipment for artisans - $2,700 
Fair trade salary to produce first 500 products - $10,000 ($10 per hour X 2 hours per product X 500) 
Cost of materials for 500 products - $6,000 (at this quantity we estimate a cost of $12 per product including leather, fabrics, glues and misc. materials)
Cost of shipping for the first line - $3,000 (estimate based on expected weight and dimensions of 500 products)
2 tickets to fly to Dakar to launch company - $ 2,400
TOTAL GOAL - $30,100
Longer term goals you can help with right now! We added costs to the above total to show you what we can accomplish if we surpass our goal! Please help us hit these marks!
Fly our first artisan group to the U.S. to see our domestic office, meet the team and be involved in the launch of the line after product creation - $33,200
Hire a domestic distributor to help us get artisan product in mass-market retail stores - $43,000
Launch a line of 1,000 goods including salaries and materials - $47,400
Launch a line with artisan 2 (feel free to email recommendations).  These funds will help us get into the community and understand their needs and skills, research and plan the product lines and have the initial capital we need to fulfill our fair trade commitment - $56,800

story:
The XR is a stylish, easy to use key holder, made to organize and consolidate up to four keys in a single place. Its innovative design helps eliminates clutter, noise, and other hassles associated with regular keychains.


DESIGN. After many trial and errors we finally decided on a design which focused on ease of use and comfort. No sharp edges or rough corners. The XR simply feels good in your hand.

Shaped to "feel good" in the palm of your hand.

Slotted end for better thumb grip.

Designed for one hand operation, the XR allows you to browse through your keys with just a few finger movements while leaving your other hand free.

DURABLE. Made from 6061 T6 aircraft-grade aluminum, the XR is carefully cnc-machined from a solid aluminum block to its final design. Upon inspection, the XR makes its way to the anodizing tanks to get its final protective coating and color.


MULTI-FUNCTION. The XR can also have multiple uses besides a key holder, It can also be used as a hex bit driver in case of emergency. Simply remove the bottom screw to expose the hex opening, insert your hex bit, and turn!



COLOR OPTIONS. This key holder will be available in 4 anodized colors: Blue, Black, Red, and Silver.



Thank you for your interest in this project. Our goal for this campaign is to raise enough funds to fund the first production run of the XR Key holder, which will allow us to bring this product to market. To ensure that everything runs smoothly, we are teaming up with local machine shop (friend owned) which allows us to have maximum access over production and quality control. 

We really appreciate your support. Together we can make this campaign a success. Thank you backers!


PRICE POINT. In order to successfully fund the campaign and meet our minimum production numbers, we decided to keep the price of the XR below $30 for the duration of this campaign. This will get us into production! 

Risks and challenges.

-Our biggest challenge at the moment is spreading the word about this campaign since our social media network is very limited to family and close friends. Any help in this department would be greatly appreciated.

-Even though we are very confident on our ability to create and deliver the XR on time, this is our first campaign and we are trying to gear up for any speed bumps we may encounter along the way.

-Because we have teamed up with our friend who is the owner of the machine shop where these key holders will be made, we will have exclusive access to all the processes (machining, anodizing, quality control, etc). This will allow us to make sure everything runs smoothly. (We are also volunteering our time at the shop to save labor cost, and bring our backers lower prices).

Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

I just want to make some rad Supernatural enamel pins! There's so few out there, so why not put my few art skills to use to design some! 

What We Need & What You Get

Enough pre-orders to cover the cost of manufacturing! $500 is enough to manufacture a full run of 2 pins, one for Sam, and one for Dean.

Risks & Challenges

  • not reaching the funding goal

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!

story:
BareBands is a first-of-its-kind watch that mixes maximum personalization with maximum comfort. Thanks to our patent-pending process, it couldn’t be easier to mix and match different bands and “shells” to customize a watch that suits your style. Or... We can do it for you. 

Introducing the MICHIGAN edition BareBands Watch!

HAIL TO THE VICTORS!! Get your custom, Michigan BareBands watch!

For just $2,000 these watches will go into production! Over time you can add in different color shells and bands to spice things up a bit - for instance maybe a "Go Blue" set of bands? Or maybe just some wild zebra stripe ones - but keep repping the signature Michigan stripes watchface. So whether it's game day or not, you're covered. 

Prefer something a little less spirited for your first foray into BareBands? Head to our central IndieGoGo campaign and choose from one of 7 styles there. 


The Product

Each watch comes with TWO different color shells. That means you’re buying one watch, but really getting two (for the Wisconsin watch, the alternative shell will be a medium grey)! Each order also comes with the same color bands in three different sizes. We've done a lot of testing to make sure these band sizes fit just about every wrist. If you’re still worried, don’t be.We have additional sizes at the ready, and will mail them out immediately in case none of the three included sizes fits just right.  

While customization and color are obviously our calling cards, we haven't sacrificed in the least on quality. Every part of the watch has been rigorously tested and each watch is waterproof to 30m. 

Right now, we have seven core styles of BareBands. You can see them below and more details on our website. (Note that two of our watches are in need of names! If you pledge a donation on our "main campaign", you can vote on what that name will be!)

SUNSET comes with Eggplant and Pink shells, and Yellow Bands.

MAKO comes with Turquoise and Black shells, and Light Gray bands.

MONTAUK comes with Yellow and White shells, and Beige bands.

FAHRENHEIT comes with Warm Gray and Black shells, and Orange bands.

MIAMI comes with White and Glow-in-the-Dark shells, and Pink bands.

comes with Beige and Sand colored shells, and Gum colored bands.

comes with Glossy and Matte Black shells, and Black bands.


More About BareBands

I've been working on BareBands for two years now. It all started one fateful night—the night before I was set to compete in the NYC Triathlon. As luck would have it, my watch band broke just when I needed it most. In a pinch, I grabbed two bright green rubber bands off some broccoli I had in the fridge, attached them to my watch face, and, voila, I had a watch to compete in. People instantly loved the way the bright color of the bands “popped” but was still subtle. I decided to take this concept and develop the watch for real when it occurred to me that not only could BareBands tap into everyone’s desire to add a little color and self-expression through their accessories, but it could also be a means to support the causes people care about in a unique and functional way. I too was over the engravable, semi-stretchy wristband. Working with my design partner, Rux Design, we’ve built BareBands: the coolest, most customizable watch on the market.

Watch me explain how the watch came to be in a segment I did for Fox Business Network.

Fundraising Platform

If you choose to support BareBands, not only will you be supporting the creation of an awesome, never-before-seen watch, but you’ll also be helping create a new platform for fundraising that benefits from placement on the wrist and adds functionality and fashion in the process. Once we’re fully up and running, we’ll have specific watches dedicated to specific causes. For example, if you buy a pink watch to support the fight against breast cancer, a to-be-determined portion of your watch cost will go to that charity. The same would be true for a blue watch to raise awareness about prostate cancer, and so on. Or, using tools we are planning to integrate into our site with funds from this campaign, you can build your own custom watch to support your own cause/community/team. 

Or, maybe you just want to pick the coolest watch you can find. No sweat. Even when you’re not picking a charity, we’ll pick one for you. BareBands will be designating a portion of all profits to BareBands.org, a charity we’re establishing to support efforts geared towards eradicating infectious disease via wearable technology.

So Why Do We Need Your Support?

First of all, personalization. Not only do we need to make the bands in a wide range of sizes to make sure the watch fits nice and snug on your wrist, but we want to roll out technology through which you can customize every aspect of the watch.  Unfortunately, enabling all that customization costs money.

Second, there’s the issue of MOQ. If you took a second to watch my video, you got to see some great shots of the test run of the very same watch you can buy today. But for me to be able to sell these watches to you, I need to fulfill a “Minimum Order Quantity.” In my case, in order to buy one watch, I need to buy 3,000. 

“Hold up. Did you say I can get the very same watch I saw in the video?” Yes, and as soon as mid-July. That’s just in time for you to rock your new watch on the beach, at the bar, a BBQ, pool party, music festival…all summer long. 

On Board? Help Spread the Word!

Whether or not you contribute, we need your help getting the word out! 

Tweet about BareBands. Facebook about BareBands. Email about BareBands. Draw a picture about BareBands.  And then Instagram it.

We’re trying to build a fun watch that you’re going to love wearing and continuously customizing over time. And, more than that, we’re trying to build a brand that wraps all that fun and self-expression up into something meaningful. We just need your help to get there. Thank you.

P.S. Maybe you've heard of these "smartwatches" and "activity monitors"? We have, too. With your support we'll be able to look into adding those types of functionality down the road. And our modular system means that when we do, all you'll have to do is slide the old piece out and the new one in. Easy peezy.

story:
A bespoke solution for gentlemen who don't have time for the traditional shoe-making process

We believe every gentleman deserves stylish dress shoes that can be worn all day with little to no discomfort. Your pair of shoes should be made to your feet specifications, to help fix tons of footwear issues such as unequal left and right, hammertoes, bunion and corns, etc.

But not all of us can get a custom-fit footwear solution, as they are expensive and time-consuming.

We know technology could help. So with our background and advances in engineering, we sought to change

Guaranteed fit

If you get a pair of shoes from us and aren't 100% satisfied, we will make you a new pair or return your payment in full. It's that simple.

Bespoke footwear at a ready-to-wear price

Step 1. Select your perk on Indiegogo.

Step 2. You will receive a tracking code to login virusshoes.com to personalize your shoes.

 

Step 3. Download our mobile app and take 6 snapshots of your feet. We will then model your feet with 3D technology.

 

Step 4. Your handcrafted shoes are made with custom shoe lasts and Virtus' signature Goodyear construction, with a perfect adherence of the insole, sole, welt and upper.

You will receive the shoes no later than July 2018.

 

A wide range of choices and styles

Whether you are looking for a pair of shoes to be worn at ceremonies or parties; or adding a dash of sophistication to your casual dress options like chinos, a jean and a blazer, we always have some thing for you.

About Virtus Custom-fit Shoes

Our story began in 2012 with Veritas Bespoke, when we realized that nine out of ten people have different sized feet. 

Press Coverage

Scribd: Virtus Keeps Both Tradition and Innovation Alive in Every Pair

Daily Herald: Virtus – A Step Up with Footwear Innovation

IndustryWeek: Virtus can fix tons of footwear issues

Our Promise

At Virtus, we dedicate to win your heart and heels. We will ensure that every pair of shoes will be made with love and care. In case you have any questions, do not hesitate to email us at info@virtusshoes.com.

We'd love to hear from you and look forward to creating your first pair.

Sincerely, 

The Virtus team
 

 

 

Learn more:

Get our mobile app at

  • App Store
  • Google Play

Visit our website
Follow us on Facebook

story:
What is the CENTURY WATCH?

Before we started designing the Century Watch we determined the requirements for it's design. It should...

  • be a companion for any occasion,
  • feature an adaptable design, 
  • fit all age groups,
  • be worn by male and female watch lovers equally,
  • be made of high quality materials (10 year warranty)
  • and be sold at a fair price.

But most important, it should feature a continuous design, one that would stay untouched by trends and fashion over time. A design for 100 years.

Never go out of style anymore!

We wanted to create a design that lasts for a century.

A truely timeless, versatile design that would fit in the 21st century and would last at least for 100 years. So we teamed up with jewellery experts, researching throughout the past and comparing the styles of various wrist watches. As the fashion trends always changed over time, we were on the lookout for continuous design features that would never grow old.

The result is the Century Watch, combined with the nordic touch of our brand Aaron Vinley. A luxury watch for under 100€. Never go out of style anymore!

After developing the Century Watch design it was time for relentless prototyping. So we teamed up with world leading suppliers and manufacturers to produce parts and assemble prototypes. After constructing various prototypes, the final version matched our high quality standards and completed all durability and quality checks successfully.

After finishing the prototyping process we partnered directly with some of the world's leading watch manufacturers with decades of professional experience. This way we can reassure that you will receive the highest product quality at affordable manufacturing costs. Proofing this, we will back every watch with a 10 year warranty.

Genuine Italian Leather

A genuine soft leather strap in various (interchangeable) colors fits to any occasion. These straps give the Century Watch a classic and luxurious finish.

We have further colors available.

 

Interchangeable Straps

One of the most important features of the Century Watch is the adaptable design. Besides providing a wide collection of different color themes you can choose from, we implemented interchangeable straps to the Century Watch.

 

Traditional ways involve various middlemen standing in between the product and the customer. By using a disruptive, direct-to-consumer model we cut out distributors, wholesalers and retail stores.

Furthermore traditional brands artificially inflate the price by high marketing expenditures and mark ups. At Aaron Vinley, we do things differently.

This way, by avoiding all the middlemen and minimizing artificial expenditures and mark ups, we can offer you the Century Watch for an acceptable price.

Besides having its versatile and timeless design, a 'Century Watch' should be made of the best quality components.On the other hand it should have a competitive price to make it accessible to everyone. We combined the two keeping durability and practicability in mind. 

As Aaron Vinley is a brand that was born on a trip throughout Scandinavia, we dedicated the Century Watch to the most beautiful cities of Scandinavia. Catching the diversity of the simplistic and truthful lifestyle of the Nordics. Here is our Century Watch collection:

Constructed by King Christian from 1670 to 1673 Nyhavn was the most important gateway into the buzzling city of Copenhagen for cargo, fisherman and travellers. Today it attracts tourists from all over the world as the towns historic landmark and is a meetingpoint for the laid back people of Copenhagen. This is the Copenhagen series:


Copenhagen (Black / Black) 99€

  • 40mm Silver Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Black Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty
 

 

Copenhagen (White / Black) 99€

  • 40mm Silver Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Black Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty
 
 
 
 
The capital of Sweden is an ancient and yet modern buzzling Scandinavian city. Due to its remarkable old town (gamla stan) and its beautiful waterfronts, it is often referred to as the Venice of the Nordics. We dedicated the Stockholm series to this gorgeous city. This is the Stockholm Series:
 
 
 

Stockholm (Black / Dark Brown) 99€

  • 40mm Gold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Dark Brown Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty
 

Stockholm (White / Dark Brown) 99€

  • 40mm Gold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Dark Brown Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty
 

 Stockholm (White / Grey) 99€

  • 40mm Gold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Grey Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty

 

The second biggest city in the beautiful country Norway is Bergen. Right next to the north sea between various islands, Bergen is truly iconic. Bergen's harbour is amoungst the most important harbours in Europe for cargo and tourists and used to be a kontor of the Hanseatic League. This is the Bergen series:

Bergen (Black / Dark Brown) 99€

  • 40mm Rosegold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Dark Brown Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty


Bergen (White / Dark Brown) 99€

  • 40mm Rosegold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Dark Brown Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty

 

 

Bergen (White / Grey) 99€

  • 40mm Rosegold Slim Case (Height: 6mm)
  • 20mm Strap Size (Grey Italian Leather)
  • Sapphire Crystal Glas (Scratch Proof)
  • 50 Meter Waterresistant
  • 316L Stainless Steel
  • 10 Year Warranty

 

Your Century Watch will be delivered in our premium Aaron Vinley packaging.

Including:

  • Certificate of Authenticity
  • 10 Year Warranty Card
  • Instructions
  • Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

Each additional ordered strap will be shipped in a beautiful handmade storage case.

We offer you the Century Watch as a limited edition (300 pieces). This 'Founders Edition' features a serial number as well as the writing 'Founders Edition' on the caseback.

 

Hello Backers! Thank you so much for your support!

We are Yannick and Andy, two young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts from Germany. The idea for Aaron Vinley and the Century Watch was born on a journey throughout Scandinavia last summer. On this journey we discovered the buzzling and modern metropoles of Norway and Sweden, and set out to the far north to explore the unspoiled beauty of nature.The diversity of this simplistic and truthful lifestyle left unforgettable memories in us. That is why we dedicated the Century Watch collection to the beautiful cities of Copenhagen, Stockholm and Bergen. For our first watch we wanted to develop an innovative watch design, something timeless that we could keep with us every day for the years to come. On that very day the idea for the 'Century Watch' was born. Now lets make this idea become reality!

If you would like to see how we are doing at the moment, check out our social media profiles!

Make sure to click that Like button!

Make sure to follow us on Instagram!
story_txt:
What is the CENTURY WATCH?Before we started designing the Century Watch we determined the requirements for it's design. It should...
be a companion for any occasion,
feature an adaptable design, 
fit all age groups,
be worn by male and female watch lovers equally,
be made of high quality materials (10 year warranty)
and be sold at a fair price.
But most important, it should feature a continuous design, one that would stay untouched by trends and fashion over time. A design for 100 years.Never go out of style anymore!We wanted to create a design that lasts for a century.A truely timeless, versatile design that would fit in the 21st century and would last at least for 100 years. So we teamed up with jewellery experts, researching throughout the past and comparing the styles of various wrist watches. As the fashion trends always changed over time, we were on the lookout for continuous design features that would never grow old.The result is the Century Watch, combined with the nordic touch of our brand Aaron Vinley. A luxury watch for under 100€. Never go out of style anymore!After developing the Century Watch design it was time for relentless prototyping. So we teamed up with world leading suppliers and manufacturers to produce parts and assemble prototypes. After constructing various prototypes, the final version matched our high quality standards and completed all durability and quality checks successfully.After finishing the prototyping process we partnered directly with some of the world's leading watch manufacturers with decades of professional experience. This way we can reassure that you will receive the highest product quality at affordable manufacturing costs. Proofing this, we will back every watch with a 10 year warranty.Genuine Italian LeatherA genuine soft leather strap in various (interchangeable) colors fits to any occasion. These straps give the Century Watch a classic and luxurious finish.We have further colors available. Interchangeable StrapsOne of the most important features of the Century Watch is the adaptable design. Besides providing a wide collection of different color themes you can choose from, we implemented interchangeable straps to the Century Watch.

 

Traditional ways involve various middlemen standing in between the product and the customer. By using a disruptive, direct-to-consumer model we cut out distributors, wholesalers and retail stores.Furthermore traditional brands artificially inflate the price by high marketing expenditures and mark ups. At Aaron Vinley, we do things differently.This way, by avoiding all the middlemen and minimizing artificial expenditures and mark ups, we can offer you the Century Watch for an acceptable price.Besides having its versatile and timeless design, a 'Century Watch' should be made of the best quality components.On the other hand it should have a competitive price to make it accessible to everyone. We combined the two keeping durability and practicability in mind. As Aaron Vinley is a brand that was born on a trip throughout Scandinavia, we dedicated the Century Watch to the most beautiful cities of Scandinavia. Catching the diversity of the simplistic and truthful lifestyle of the Nordics. Here is our Century Watch collection:Constructed by King Christian from 1670 to 1673 Nyhavn was the most important gateway into the buzzling city of Copenhagen for cargo, fisherman and travellers. Today it attracts tourists from all over the world as the towns historic landmark and is a meetingpoint for the laid back people of Copenhagen. This is the Copenhagen series:

The capital of Sweden is an ancient and yet modern buzzling Scandinavian city. Due to its remarkable old town (gamla stan) and its beautiful waterfronts, it is often referred to as the Venice of the Nordics. We dedicated the Stockholm series to this gorgeous city. The second biggest city in the beautiful country Norway is Bergen. Right next to the north sea between various islands, Bergen is truly iconic. story:
Why you should pledge?

If you pledge for genuine leather bag, you stay away from fungal attacks, dust mites and dry abrasion. It is durable and everlasting if properly cared for. You may find it expensive when compared with synthetic bag, but is a long lasting piece of grace and elegance.

What benefits?

  1. Durability: It is resistant to harsh weather condition and will not peel off or crack and due to this, there is a negligible chance that it will get damaged or torn unless damaged forcefully.
  2. Everlasting: Sophistication and classiness that it offers. And will remain trendy forever.
  3. Elegance: It will add a touch of style to your personality. Elegance of leather is a plus. If you have a business or corporate meeting, accessorize your look with leather satchel.
  4. Resistant: On our leather bag it is unlikely to attract dust mites or fungus and makes it safe for you to carry at any corporate events or for daily use.
  5. Eco-friendly: Being a natural fabric, no chemical is used in the creation, therefore, unlike synthetic leather satchels, these cause no skin rashes. And since leather is considered to be biodegradable it won’t harm the environment in any way.
  6. Maintainance: Easy to clean and maintain. Time to time sponging and polishing is enough to maintain its look.

About the bag.

Business messenger bags are usually dull, boring and expensive, and with past experience I took enough time to design a bag that is spacious and durable. This leather briefcase is spacious, incredibly soft and secure, easily holds your 15” laptop and sits nicely with all your essentials for daily needs. Keep your things organized and within reach at the time when you need the most.

Quality stitched, made of 100%, genuine leather. Have a padded laptop slot, interior zipped pocket, one front pocket, brass accessories and removable shoulder strap. Carry it as cross body, on shoulder or as hand held.

Features:

  • 15” L x 11” H x 4” W (inches) / 39 L x 29 H x 8 W (cm).
  • Fits up to 15” laptop. 
  • Top handles for comfortable hand carry.
  • Interior zippered pocket for valuable items.
  • Padded laptop separator. 
  • Removable and adjustable shoulder strap with leather shoulder pad.
  • Front exterior pocket, perfect for newspaper or file.
  • Exterior flap .
  • The dimension provides ample space to carry your files, laptop, chargers, phone and other essentials.

Back of the bag,

Leather: We took to high quality full grain leather as it adds a aesthetic and robust look to the bag, is soft and durable, easy to clean, gives a stylish and luxurious appeal.

Carry your everyday essentials.

Full length front pocket for newspaper, wallet and other stuffs.

Top zipper closer for extra security.

Removable shoulder strap brass clamp.

Nylon fabric inner lining.

Push button flap closure.

 

Our Story.

It all started when my first gifted leather bag broke after a year and half, it was pricey and felt shattered at how weak it was. You expect to use an expensive leather bag at least for some years. In quest for new bag which is inexpensive and also durable looked around but was frustrated with the price tag.

And it is how I went about looking for a solution to producing a bag which is both durable and inexpensive, thinking there may be more like me going through the same frustration.

Our aim is to make every professional and business men/ women happy without costing them a fortune.

We took enough time to design a bag that is spacious, durable and fits the professionals and business travelers need, looks stylish and luxurious, but fits within their limited budget, and that can be carried on a daily basis.

 

Compliments Every outfit.

This bag is cross body and classic messenger style briefcase which makes it perfect for the majority of outfit. The dark brown colored leather adds a squeeze of retro appeal to your overall contemporary look whether it’s a formal wear or a Friday casual wear, blends well with your personality.

Formal wear.

 Friday casual wear.

 

Leather Wallet

Features

3 Credit card slots on the right.

1 zipper pocket on the left.

1 coin pocket with flap closure on the left.

2 currency slots.

Size: 4"L x 3.5"W ( 11 L x 9 W cm) folded.

Color: Black

Internal View

Currency slot

 

Leather Passport Cover

Features:

10 card slots.

1 Zipper pocket.

3 back pocket.

1 Large pocket Slot.

Size: 4"L x 5"W ( 10L x 14W cm) folded.

Color: Black

Back view

Internal View

 

The project.

We have realized the need for durable and inexpensive leather bags. With inputs from our customers and well wishers over the time, I felt the need to improve upon our existing line of products and to create new designs that suits the need of people in terms of practicality and use.

After lot of effort and hard work we have zeroed on the design and new product line which we are ready to produce.

With your pledge and support I will be able to bring this project to life and support the need and demand of people and the community.

 

What Others say about us.

Click to the testimonial page.

 

Rewards

 

Early Bird - Leather wallet - $35

 

Early Bird - Leather Passport Cover -$45

 

Early Bird - Leather Messenger Bag - $129 

 

Early Bird - Combo offer: - Leather Satchel + Leather Wallet - $164

 

Early Bird - Combo offer: - Leather Satchel + Leather Passport Cover - $174 

 

Early Bird - All Three:- Leather Satchel + Leather Wallet + Leather Passport Cover - $ 209

 

Why support us.

I am looking for your pledge to make this project come to existence. I have already invested a lot of my time and hard work, and your backing will help us in starting the production of these bags. Best of all the backing community will be the first to receive our new product at a much cheaper price than the actual selling price.

You will be getting long lasting product, that is easy to maintain.

You can carry it with style whether as a cross body, on shoulder or as hand carry.

A bag that will tell its own story when you get old.

 

Risk and challenge

Quality and design are the most important part of the work. I do not see enough challenge but as with all projects there are some risks involved with manufacturing process. The actual constraint is the time and stream lining the production supplies from supplier to deliver the rewards as per the date announced.

I am confident in delivering the rewards on time and overcome the obstacles if any as have been working with suppliers over a period of time for our other leather products.

I will be working hard and will be constantly updating our suppliers on supplies needed and do not foresee any future blocks, but if by chance any future delays in production or procuring of supplies happens we will inform you about the issue and the new delivery date with your due acknowledgment.   

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share with friends and family to get the word out and help make some noise about this campaign.
  • Please Use the share buttons at the top right.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
shake your head off

YOUR SUPPORT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US ¡¡¡ TU COLABORACION ES MUY IMPORTANTE PARA NOSOTROS ¡¡

Replicate Poyen's model in Brazil, Morocco and the rest of Africa, besides ofstrengthen our entrepreneurship in Chile.

Replicar nuestro Modelo Poyen en Brazil , Marruecos y el resto de Africa , ademas de fortalezer nuestro proyecto en Chile.

We have two collection where you can choose the special hats in reward of your contribution :

Te entregamos las mejores recompensas Poyen a cambio de tu contribucion 

Basic Collection is handmade with hipoalergenic wools and acrilics,Green Collection is handmade with only green materials and process like baby alpaca , linen , 100% naturals wools with special washed for maximum softness , organic cotton.

Help us add more hands and love,

Besides, in the language of chilean indigenous people, the mapuche,

P O Y E N     M E A N S     L O V E 

The world must know about it so you can help us to achieve our goal:

EL MUNDO DEBE SABER ACERCA DE NOSOTROS ¡¡ AYUDANOS A LLEGAR A NUESTRA META ¡¡

 

Hi , I'm Isabel Voigt, founder of Poyen, we've been with you 6 years since we were born like Poyen in Chile, time has flown by, like many things we've been through, I will not lie, it was not easy but not going down the wings and make me want to move them harder to reach more people and show them the world if you can improve by changing little things

  We live in a highly industrialized world, it seems that machines can do everything for us, and we have forgotten the true meaning of things, I want to show them that technology more beautiful, productive and efficient is another, are the hands of a woman

We have created a community of women who have sustainable income for their families, women who because of their age, geographical location or family, illness of their children, or simply not have good opportunities in their lives need to work from home.

And we produce cute and designed hats, with the excellent quality that a community of women workers can generate, a revolutionary model, where we are the excuse for a greater good.

 We created a revolutionary model that demonstrates that there is another way, a much better way

We want to be the means to provide work for thousands of women who cannot  work outside the home, and we give you well designed products , contribute a bit to the world and  will provide all the protection and shelter with a unique design and functional.

We have flown this last time by trying to show the world what we do and we have had very good results, however we compete with rock-bottom prices, labor exploitation results in distant countries against which it is almost impossible to compete.

 Almost, because I believe that if you can change the world with small and great contributions.

 Many of the problems we as a society can be improved by empowering more women, a mother.

 We need to strengthen our concept in Chile, helping more women and also reach countries where they need us, to design summer collections, show them and establish distribution points in North America and Europe to not  increase in shipments  our products, and keep our project in time,

So increasing the number of women working to earn a living that would otherwise be impossible, and only with your help I can do it.We have these first 38 days to show the world who support US, and so they have the confidence to believe in US too so we can start this revolution

It is fast, remove them about 10 minutes of your time, but for our team will be extremely valuable, but contribute the least, for us is very important.

 And we are on the empowerment of women, because through it we can generate the necessary changes to improve our world

 Hope you like it and be able to thank each of you

Thank you for believing in us!

Maria Isabel Voigt Villalon

Founder of Poyen 

www.poyen.cl

Ahora en español¡¡¡

Algunos me conocen , otros no tanto , soy Isabel Voigt , fundadora de Poyen , ya llevamos 6 años junto a ustedes ,  el tiempo ha pasado volando, al igual que muchas cosas por las que he pasado, no voy a mentir, no ha sido fácil, pero no voy a bajar las alas ya que me dan ganas de  moverlas más fuerte para llegar a más gente y mostrarles que el mundo si se puede mejorar cambiando pequeñas cosas ¡¡

 

Vivimos en un mundo extremadamente industrializado, parece que las maquinas pueden hacer todo por nosotros, y hemos olvidado el real significado de las cosas, Yo les quiero demostrar que la tecnología más hermosa, productiva y eficiente es otra, son las Manos de una mujer ¡¡

 Hemos creado una comunidad de mujeres que llevan ingresos sustentables a sus familias, mujeres que por su edad, ubicación geográfica o familiar, enfermedades de sus hijos, o simplemente por no tener buenas oportunidades en sus vidas necesitan trabajar desde sus casas.

 Y  Producimos lindos y diseñados gorros, con la excelente calidad que una comunidad de mujeres trabajadoras puede generar, un modelo revolucionario , donde nosotros pasamos a ser el medio o la excusa para un bien mayor.

 Creamos un modelo revolucionario que demuestra que existe otro camino, un mucho mejor camino ¡¡

 Nosotros queremos ser el medio para dar trabajo a miles de mujeres que no pueden trabajar fuera de sus casas , y entregarles a ustedes diseñados productos que además de contribuir con un granito de arena a esta sociedad te entregar toda la protección y abrigo con un diseño único y funcional.

 Hemos volado este último tiempo por el mundo tratando de mostrar lo que hacemos y hemos tenido muy buenos resultados, sin embargo nosotros competimos con precios bajísimos, resultados de explotación laboral en países lejanos contra los cuales es casi imposible competir.

 Casi,  porque yo creo que si se puede cambiar el mundo con pequeños grandes aportes ¡¡

 Muchos de los problemas que vivimos como sociedad se pueden mejorar empoderando mas a la mujer, a una madre.

 Durante 38 días tenemos nuestro proyecto en una red mundial de Crowfunding,  y necesitamos llegar a nuestra meta y traspasarla con creces ¡¡

 Nosotros necesitamos fortalecer nuestro concepto en Chile , ayudar a más mujeres y además llegar a países donde la ellas nos necesita, diseñar colecciones de verano, para así generar una continuidad para ellas ,  mostrarlas y establecer bases de distribución en America del norte y Europa , para no encarecer en envíos nuestros productos , y así mantener nuestro proyecto en el tiempo , Asi aumentar la cantidad de mujeres que trabajen para ganar un sustento que de otro modo sería  imposible y solo con su ayuda puedo lograrlo.

 Yo tengo estos primeros 10 días para demostrarle al mundo quienes  me apoyan, y así ellos tendrán la confianza para creer en mí también y así poder comenzar en esta revolución  ¡¡¡

 

No es rápido, les quitara unos 10 minutos de su tiempo, sin embargo para nuestro equipo será  extremadamente valioso, aunque contribuyan con lo mas mínimo, para nosotros es muy importante.

Y vamos por el empoderamiento de la mujer, ya que a través de ella podemos generar los cambios necesarios para mejorar nuestro mundo ¡¡

 

Espero les guste y poder darles las gracias a cada uno de ustedes ¡¡¡

Un abrazo enorme

EL MUNDO DEBE SABER ACERCA DE NOSOTROS ¡¡ AYUDANOS A LLEGAR A NUESTRA META ¡¡


 







Hi , I'm Isabel Voigt, founder of Poyen, we've been with you 6 years since we were born like Poyen in Chile, time has flown by, like many things we've been through, I will not lie, it was not easy but not going down the wings and make me want to move them harder to reach more people and show them the world if you can improve by changing little things
  We live in a highly industrialized world, it seems that machines can do everything for us, and we have forgotten the true meaning of things, I want to show them that technology more beautiful, productive and efficient is another, are the hands of a woman


We have created a community of women who have sustainable income for their families, women who because of their age, geographical location or family, illness of their children, or simply not have good opportunities in their lives need to work from home.

And we produce cute and designed hats, with the excellent quality that a community of women workers can generate, a revolutionary model, where we are the excuse for a greater good.
 We created a revolutionary model that demonstrates that there is another way, a much better way

We want to be the means to provide work for thousands of women who cannot  work outside the home, and we give you well designed products , contribute a bit to the world and  will provide all the protection and shelter with a unique design and functional.
We have flown this last time by trying to show the world what we do and we have had very good results, however we compete with rock-bottom prices, labor exploitation results in distant countries against which it is almost impossible to compete.
 Almost, because I believe that if you can change the world with small and great contributions.

 Many of the problems we as a society can be improved by empowering more women, a mother.

 We need to strengthen our concept in Chile, helping more women and also reach countries where they need us, to design summer collections, show them and establish distribution points in North America and Europe to not  increase in shipments  our products, and keep our project in time,


So increasing the number of women working to earn a living that would otherwise be impossible, and only with your help I can do it.We have these first 38 days to show the world who support US, and so they have the confidence to believe in US too so we can start this revolution

It is fast, remove them about 10 minutes of your time, but for our team will be extremely valuable, but contribute the least, for us is very important.
 And we are on the empowerment of women, because through it we can generate the necessary changes to improve our world

 Hope you like it and be able to thank each of you


Thank you for believing in us!
Maria Isabel Voigt Villalon
Founder of Poyen 
www.poyen.cl
Ahora en español¡¡¡
Algunos me conocen , otros no tanto , soy Isabel Voigt , fundadora de Poyen , ya llevamos 6 años junto a ustedes ,  el tiempo ha pasado volando, al igual que muchas cosas por las que he pasado, no voy a mentir, no ha sido fácil, pero no voy a bajar las alas ya que me dan ganas de  moverlas más fuerte para llegar a más gente y mostrarles que el mundo si se puede mejorar cambiando pequeñas cosas ¡¡
 
Vivimos en un mundo extremadamente industrializado, parece que las maquinas pueden hacer todo por nosotros, y hemos olvidado el real significado de las cosas, Yo les quiero demostrar que la tecnología más hermosa, productiva y eficiente es otra, son las Manos de una mujer ¡¡
 Hemos creado una comunidad de mujeres que llevan ingresos sustentables a sus familias, mujeres que por su edad, ubicación geográfica o familiar, enfermedades de sus hijos, o simplemente por no tener buenas oportunidades en sus vidas necesitan trabajar desde sus casas.
 Y  Producimos lindos y diseñados gorros, con la excelente calidad que una comunidad de mujeres trabajadoras puede generar, un modelo revolucionario , donde nosotros pasamos a ser el medio o la excusa para un bien mayor.
 Creamos un modelo revolucionario que demuestra que existe otro camino, un mucho mejor camino ¡¡
 Nosotros queremos ser el medio para dar trabajo a miles de mujeres que no pueden trabajar fuera de sus casas , y entregarles a ustedes diseñados productos que además de contribuir con un granito de arena a esta sociedad te entregar toda la protección y abrigo con un diseño único y funcional.
 Hemos volado este último tiempo por el mundo tratando de mostrar lo que hacemos y hemos tenido muy buenos resultados, sin embargo nosotros competimos con precios bajísimos, resultados de explotación laboral en países lejanos contra los cuales es casi imposible competir.
 Casi,  porque yo creo que si se puede cambiar el mundo con pequeños grandes aportes ¡¡
 Muchos de los problemas que vivimos como sociedad se pueden mejorar empoderando mas a la mujer, a una madre.
 Durante 38 días tenemos nuestro proyecto en una red mundial de Crowfunding,  y necesitamos llegar a nuestra meta y traspasarla con creces ¡¡
 Nosotros necesitamos fortalecer nuestro concepto en Chile , ayudar a más mujeres y además llegar a países donde la ellas nos necesita, diseñar colecciones de verano, para así generar una continuidad para ellas ,  mostrarlas y establecer bases de distribución en America del norte y Europa , para no encarecer en envíos nuestros productos , y así mantener nuestro proyecto en el tiempo , Asi aumentar la cantidad de mujeres que trabajen para ganar un sustento que de otro modo sería  imposible y solo con su ayuda puedo lograrlo.
 Yo tengo estos primeros 10 días para demostrarle al mundo quienes  me apoyan, y así ellos tendrán la confianza para creer en mí también y así poder comenzar en esta revolución  ¡¡¡
 
No es rápido, les quitara unos 10 minutos de su tiempo, sin embargo para nuestro equipo será  extremadamente valioso, aunque contribuyan con lo mas mínimo, para nosotros es muy importante.
Y vamos por el empoderamiento de la mujer, ya que a través de ella podemos generar los cambios necesarios para mejorar nuestro mundo ¡¡
 
Espero les guste y poder darles las gracias a cada uno de ustedes ¡¡¡
Un abrazo enorme

story:
What is Rompi?

Rompi are handmade slippers that focus on high quality, craftsmanship, design, historical background and ultimately on functionality - providing comfort and warmth for anyone wearing them. They come in two styles - Rompi High and Rompi Low, respectively for men and women. They also are available in six different colors of textured lambswool. The thick wool is not only very warm, but it also shapes to your feet with time, so the longer you wear your Rompi, the better they will feel :)

Who are we and why are we making slippers?

Tsvetan is a design engineer, working in the automotive industry (the German one at the moment). He is a car enthusiast, a passionate skier and has a developed a vocation for independent projects - they are fun, they are meaningful, and allow for plenty of creativity.


Rumen is still a high school student, who is a keen basketball player and will soon join higher education where he wants to pursue business studies. He comes with dozens of fresh ideas about the project (including the name Rompi).


Why slippers? I (Tsvetan) have spent the last 10 years studying and working in England, The Netherlands, and Germany. I've always lived in houses with hardwood, tile, or stone floors and honestly these get cold not only in winter. I always bought some random slippers until I realized that something more special will be much nicer to wear. I then shared the idea with Rumen and he decided to help me in this enterprise. 


We then chose to start the project in the town of Sliven for a few reasons - this is where the industrial revolution in Bulgaria started (I'm an engineer and I like this stuff) and the first ever factory in the country was making textile. Seems like the perfect place for the Rompi, right? Today Sliven is a small town with high unemployment rate and we would like to help as much as we can - if we are successful our designer will train some local people, so that they can help in manufacturing and ultimately benefit from the project.


Why are Rompi special?

Rompi slippers are an exclusive product, developed with passion, care about the detail and the community. They are made using a traditional sewing machine, traditional cut-out methods, and wool by lambs from the Stara Planina mountain in Bulgaria, which was woven and colored in a family ran factory in Sliven.


The traditional manufacturing methods, combined with the low volumes that can be achieved ensure immense attention to detail and superb quality control.


Every single pair of Rompi that will be shipped to you will be personally inspected by their designer and by us and no compromises will be made. 

Rompi's Styles

The Rompi slippers come in two distinctive styles. To avoid any confusion we gave them the evident, simple names Rompi High and Rompi Low. Both styles are available in any of the six colors that we have selected - blue, brown, beige, natural, orange, and pink. They are all woven in a fish-bone pattern (the natural is not colored, so there is no distinctive pattern there).


Click on the videos below to see a preview of the colors that we have and 360 degree views of the two distinctive styles.




Why do we need your support?

We need your support in order to finance a limited production of Rompi. We need a minimum funding in order to purchase the wool fabric (there is a minimum length of fabric per colour that we can order). Besides that we need to purchase additional sewing machines and to train personnel to allow us for smoother process, so that we can meet the set deadlines.

At last, a successful project will help us build the confidence that we need in order to turn the Rompi into a brand specializing in woolen home-wear .

Risks and Challenges

We have spent significant time on the development of this project, successfully creating the first six sample pairs of Rompi (and they are perfectly functional as far as comfort, warmth, and robustness go). This proved to us that our concept is working fine, that our suppliers are reliable and trustworthy, and that our manufacturing and quality control are excellent (handmade is the best ;) ).


We decided to launch our project on Indiegogo to reduce the financial risk for us and because such a platform seems like the perfect place for a start up like this.


The risks that we see in this campaign, although reduced as much as possible by us, are the possible delays on the supplier chain. This is wool and then weaving and coloring it. However the factory that we work with typically has a buffer stack up of supplies, so we do not think that we will have any problems.


The other risk is shipment. We will ship your Rompi (free of charge to any point in the world) using a tracked international postage. Although post services are generally reliable, there still is a chance of delays. This unfortunately is beyond our control.


We want to be as punctual as possible and if any delays arise, we will inform our backers asap. Our aim throughout the project will be to keep you well informed and to answer any questions you might have quickly and accurately. 


FAQ
No questions have been asked so far.

story:
Risks and Challenges

__our prototypes are finished and our suppliers are set. our products are ready to be manufactured. 

__a challenge will be to select the final production site for the sewing of our bags. we are in contact with two sites. one in poland and one in portugal. we are evaluating both places on quality, sustainability and ethics. we can start production as soon as the campaign is backed.

__we’re ready to start production of our rucksacks as soon as this campaign ends and we have ordered all the materials. but as with any physical product there are challenges to getting it right and there is always the possibility of delays (sometimes outside of anyone's control). in our efforts to avoid delays and manufacture the best rucksack possible, we are very selective in how we choose our partners, conservative in setting our timelines, and we intend to spend a large amount of time in person at the factory.

__quality control remains a major focus for us. with our partners we are implementing systems to catch as many product issues as possible before our product makes its way into your hands.
