story:
“We've gotten a lot “smarter” with our technology, its time there was a bag that could keep up. This is why Bad Wolf Outfitters is prototyping The Pandora Carryall, to revolutionize the way we work with our equipment by making it work for us.”

                                        -Ryan Dawson, Bad Wolf Outfitters Founder

Bad Wolf Outfitters & The Pandora Carryall: A Short Summary

What It Is...

The Pandora Carryall, with all its features and function, is outfitted to be the leading example in digital survival in this technical age. For every possible daily obstacle, the Pandora Carryall comes equipped with a highly technological (and covert) solution. 

  • To prevent unexpected power downs, our carryall comes equipped with a back-up battery and a solar panel to revive fading electronics.
  • USB ports and a complimentary thumb drive store back-up data and connect to your gadgets to prevent loss of important work. 
  • An audio jack hooks up to speakers and can be activated via Bluetooth for impromptu office parties or an after-work dance session.
  • A screen installed inside the bag gives the user information on battery life, data storage, and audio.
  • And a bluetooth locator dongle on the bag lets the owner locate it from their smartphone, in case its location is forgotten after a long night of networking.

In addition to function, The Pandora Carryall will be miles ahead of its competitors in form and design.

Because The Pandora Carryall is still in the prototypical phase of production, Bad Wolf Outfitters is offering backers an opportunity to not only fund The Pandora Carryall, but to customize your ideal carryall. 

 “We cannot stress enough how much we want feedback from backers and potential users in order to make The Pandora Carryall the highest quality and most ideal “smart” satchel.” -Rebecca Chappell, The Pandora  Carryall Project Manager 

Visit www.badwolfoutfitters.com and take the survey to help impact the future of The Pandora Carryall, and help us reach the first round of funding today.Currently, we have invested in the initial design phases with our engineer and we are in the process of selecting a manufacturer. The project needs to raise a minimum of $25,000 before Bad Wolf Outfitters can begin manufacturing The Pandora Carryall. 

Who We Are ...

Bad Wolf Outfitters is the production team of Bad Wolf Syndicate, a social media marketing and campaign consulting company. Bad Wolf Outfitters is comprised of a great team of techies, Walking-Dead fanatics, fashionistas, adventures, writers, designers, dog-lovers, festival goers and brainy creative folk. 

Our goal is to provide gear for the urban explorer. We know what this technical age and digital world is like in both its positive aspects and the negative. This is why the diverse and creative group at Bad Wolf want to find solutions for these technical tragedies and inconveniences. We'll find the solution so you can be the better explorer, mathlete, barista, drummer, or Batman you ought to be.

Senior Team (Ryan D - Co-Creator | Joey DeLoach -Co-Creator | Rob Irwin - Engineer | Rebecca Chappell - Project Manager)

For more photos and full bios, please visit our website badwolfoutfitters.com

Sitting Down With The Pandora Carryall's Creators: Joey DeLoach and Ryan Dawson

J:"Ryan and I were both born adventurers. Neither of us are ever satisfied with our immediate environment, and finding the proper tools to keep up with such a lifestyle is very difficult. I bike everywhere I go, and subsequently need an awesome bag to keep with those demands as well."

R:"The idea for The Pandora was born out of an almost annoyance. Joey and I were tired of buying things that were cool but not nearly as cool as they could be.  We're both from a paramedic background so we are big on multi-functional things - that is, if it doesn't have at least 2 uses it not worth carrying. Joey is a bike messenger now and I'm  a geek/yogi - all of which share common ground in the venn-diagram of needing a bag like The Pandora Carryall."

 J:"When Ryan first brought up the topic, I was ecstatic. No bag has ever met the standards set by my lifestyle. Now was the chance to make that perfect bag to be my personal "MacGuyver". Really when I think of the potential of this bag, I think of Batman's utility belt. It has to function as a mobile home base. When you're constantly moving and don't have time to return home for the essentials, is your bag going to be there for you?"

J:"All of the options in this bag are for surviving in our modern world. Whether it be hiking, climbing, biking, or even something as simple carrying what is required of you at your job. This bag is born of necessity, and I hope it fills all the needs of people who need such a thing in their lives."

Where We're At...

We have compelted the intial design phases with our engineer Rob Irwin. We are currently in the process of selecting a manufacturer for new prototypes.

How We Plan to Spend:


Did You Know...

The Pandora Carryall is the ONLY "bag" that will be on the market that literally carries it all.

Check Out All The Super-Crazy-Cool Features and Pictures Below....


System Update Available: Your backpack has detected new hardware updates. Install now.

Owning a laptop bag or backpack is so 20th century - time to bring it into the 21st century and upgrade to a carryall!

This carryall is not merely a carrier for technology, this carryall IS technology. With a myriad of technological functions and impeccable organizational space, this carryall is about to revolutionize the "computer bag" industry. What makes the Pandora different is its supreme style and function. In addition to being a lightweight, style-conscious, and convenient bag, it’s also a docking station for all your technology. Never get caught with a dead device or missing data again!

Current Sketches for Prototype

Update: Carryall Functionality

  • Carries your laptop, phone, and anything in organized inner pouches. 
  • Made of Eco-Made Cordura fabric so there is no place too gnarly your carryall can't handle
  • Dual-functioning strap allows carryall to hang on your side as a classy messenger, or straddle your shoulders as a backpack. 
  • Convenient openings on the long and short side of the carryall.
  • Optional accessory for the shoulder strap to made of survival cord, for all survival needs.

    Messenger Prototype

Update: Carryall Technology

Your current backpack may make you smile when you find five dollars in that nearly function-less front pocket, but it’ll make you crazy when you realize your phone charger or flash drive is missing at a crucial moment. Find random cash AND never have a technological panic attack with The Pandora Carryall.

The Pandora Carryall comes standard with:

  • Built-in USB ports and USB drive so you’ll never have “where'd I put that thumb drive” panic again. 
  • Built-in screen displays battery life to prevent an unforeseen power-down Built-in solar panel for recharging batteries. 
  • Speaker for impromptu block parties. 
  • A bluetooth locator sends the bag’s location to smartphone for fast tracking when you can’t quite remember where you were last night. 
  • Rechargeable battery for last‐minute phone, laptop, and robot charging needs.

    Update: Carryall Organization  

Let’s face it; succeeding in our fast‐paced environment requires hardware, software, and brain-ware. But you will get “no-ware” without organization. Never helplessly flail your hand around the bottom of a bag again. The Pandora Carryall has you covered:

  • Numerous, conveniently sized pockets that separate important documents, writing utensils, and technology. 
  • Double-sided Velcro phone compartment: Once you stick your phone in the bag, it stays there. 
  • Secret- X‐ray proof compartment for convenient storing of secrets.
  • RFID blocking compartment 
  • Carryall retractable lock for securing contents. 

    Update: Carryall Versatility

“But I've had this bag for like, EVER!” 

Yes, well, it’s also tie‐dye. And it’s not your friend. It’s a bag. So it won't be offended when you give it the boot for a carryall that better suits your needs. You have a smart-phone, a smart-car, a smart-computer, and a smart-self. It’s time for a carryall that’s equally as smart.

Fund Now to Accept All Upgrades.

How You Can Help Us Out: 

Join our Word of Mouth Campaign, share our website, our campaign, our Facebook, or our Twitter and you will help us get the word out about this product! We can't wait to see what people think and what they have to say about The Pandora Carryall, and you can help us learn more about what people want by sharing today!

Want to help spread the news about The Pandora Carryall? Check out our infograms and share them with your friends! 

Features Infrogram

See Who's Talking About Us

Join the Campaign


More Possibilities:

Future Designs


If Bad Wolf Outfitters is able to raise $50,000 through this campaign we would like to begin production of The Pandora Carryall: Sideswept Prototype - a triangle satchel, with the same features for the hardy adventurer. 

Press: 


Risks and Challenges:

Bad Wolf Outfitters recognizes that when it comes to fulfillment, every project has potential obstacles; from production delays to permits to collaborator mishaps; and that's why we have taken it all into account:

Production: 

Our engineer has been great through this initial design phases. As with any great endeavor, we are still working out feasibility when it comes to features, final price, and warranty.

Manufacturing:

In our search for manufacturers, we are looking for optimal production and distribution times. This is something that we are still engaged in doing. We realize that manufacturing The Pandora Carryall in bulk would be most beneficial to our needs and the needs of our customers, That is why we are working to ensure we build a relationship with a manufacturer who can not only produce a quality product but who can deliver in a timely manner. 

Time and Deadlines:

We may find as we go into production of The Pandora Carryall, that certain aspects of the carryall's unique features may take more time to put together. We are working incredibly hard to ensure that this product is available for our backers by November/December 2013 and full market distribution by January 2014. Hopefully by prototyping our first round we will be able to iron out any production issues from the get-go. 

The Reality:

We are here asking for your help to take this project closer to reality, and more than that, we are here looking for your input! The Pandora Carryall isn't about just being a great bag for you, it's about being the best bag built for you and by you. We also make you a pledge to keep you in the know with the latest news about our carryall. We will post a project update (which is emailed to all backers) detailing the steps of the project as we move to completion.You are more than a dollar amount, you are a part of a revolutionary jump forward in how we handle our "smart" gear!

FAQ's:

What stage of production are we at? 

We have completed the initial design phase with our engineer and are in the process of selecting a manufacturer for new prototypes.

Is the design final? 

No way! One of the best aspects of being at the fundraising/pre-production phase is that we can tweak the design according to feedback from backers. If you have any suggestions for new features or a change in design, please contact us or take our survey to offer your feedback! 

What sets The Pandora apart from other “smart” carryall products? 

The strongest feature we’re offering with The Pandora isn't any specific technical aspect--it’s that The Pandora is the only product both on the market and in the crowdfunding sphere that offers this combination of technology, design and functionality. Other carryalls have solar panels, speakers, sleek design and locator apps--but none of them have it all. Pair that with the customizable nature of being in pre-production and backers essentially have the option of building their product. 

When will it be available for public consumption? 

For backers... estimated December

For consumers 2014 

What if I can't donate money but want to help in other ways? 

Exposure is just as important when it comes to crowdfunding so you can help by featuring us and our campaign on your website, blog, or even on Facebook or Twitter. 

What technology is it compatible with (Apple, Windows, Ubuntu, etc)? 

Short answer - yes. 

What’s the battery life like? 

Back up battery will be around 13,000+ mAH which will give up to an extra 3 1/2 hours  extra time and double the battery life of smaller electronics The solar panel feature will allow continuous powering... so if it’s sunny then the battery life is theoretically whatever the half life of the lithium core is... so like a really long time 

What’s the coolest thing about The Pandora? 

The coolest thing about the Pandora is it has everything you could possibly need and if it doesn’t have it just tell us...

However our favorite feature ...

There are a lot of awesome aspects to the carryall, but probably the coolest part is that it has a SECRET COMPARTMENT that is x-ray resistant... you know to “protect” things like, um, undeveloped film...!

To prevent unexpected power downs, our carryall comes equipped with a back-up battery and a solar panel to revive fading electronics.
USB ports and a complimentary thumb drive store back-up data and connect to your gadgets to prevent loss of important work. 
An audio jack hooks up to speakers and can be activated via Bluetooth for impromptu office parties or an after-work dance session.
A screen installed inside the bag gives the user information on battery life, data storage, and audio.
And a bluetooth locator dongle on the bag lets the owner locate it from their smartphone, in case its location is forgotten after a long night of networking.

In addition to function, The Pandora Carryall will be miles ahead of its competitors in form and design.
Because The Pandora Carryall is still in the prototypical phase of production, Bad Wolf Outfitters is offering backers an opportunity to not only fund The Pandora Carryall, but to customize your ideal carryall. 
 “We cannot stress enough how much we want feedback from backers and potential users in order to make The Pandora Carryall the highest quality and most ideal “smart” satchel.” -Rebecca Chappell, The Pandora  Carryall Project Manager 
Visit www.badwolfoutfitters.com and take the survey to help impact the future of The Pandora Carryall, and help us reach the first round of funding today.Currently, we have invested in the initial design phases with our engineer and we are in the process of selecting a manufacturer. The project needs to raise a minimum of $25,000 before Bad Wolf Outfitters can begin manufacturing The Pandora Carryall. 


Who We Are ...
Bad Wolf Outfitters is the production team of Bad Wolf Syndicate, a social media marketing and campaign consulting company. Bad Wolf Outfitters is comprised of a great team of techies, Walking-Dead fanatics, fashionistas, adventures, writers, designers, dog-lovers, festival goers and brainy creative folk. 
Our goal is to provide gear for the urban explorer. We know what this technical age and digital world is like in both its positive aspects and the negative. This is why the diverse and creative group at Bad Wolf want to find solutions for these technical tragedies and inconveniences. We'll find the solution so you can be the better explorer, mathlete, barista, drummer, or Batman you ought to be. 
Senior Team (Ryan D - Co-Creator | Joey DeLoach -Co-Creator | Rob Irwin - Engineer | Rebecca Chappell - Project Manager)
For more photos and full bios, please visit our website badwolfoutfitters.com



Sitting Down With The Pandora Carryall's Creators: Joey DeLoach and Ryan Dawson
J:"Ryan and I were both born adventurers. Neither of us are ever satisfied with our immediate environment, and finding the proper tools to keep up with such a lifestyle is very difficult. I bike everywhere I go, and subsequently need an awesome bag to keep with those demands as well."

R:"The idea for The Pandora was born out of an almost annoyance. Joey and I were tired of buying things that were cool but not nearly as cool as they could be.  We're both from a paramedic background so we are big on multi-functional things - that is, if it doesn't have at least 2 uses it not worth carrying. Joey is a bike messenger now and I'm  a geek/yogi - all of which share common ground in the venn-diagram of needing a bag like The Pandora Carryall."
 J:"When Ryan first brought up the topic, I was ecstatic. No bag has ever met the standards set by my lifestyle. Now was the chance to make that perfect bag to be my personal "MacGuyver". Really when I think of the potential of this bag, I think of Batman's utility belt. It has to function as a mobile home base. When you're constantly moving and don't have time to return home for the essentials, is your bag going to be there for you?"
J:"All of the options in this bag are for surviving in our modern world. Whether it be hiking, climbing, biking, or even something as simple carrying what is required of you at your job. This bag is born of necessity, and I hope it fills all the needs of people who need such a thing in their lives."
Where We're At...

We have compelted the intial design phases with our engineer Rob Irwin. We are currently in the process of selecting a manufacturer for new prototypes.

How We Plan to Spend:



Did You Know...
The Pandora Carryall is the ONLY "bag" that will be on the market that literally carries it all.



Check Out All The Super-Crazy-Cool Features and Pictures Below....

System Update Available: Your backpack has detected new hardware updates. Install now.
Owning a laptop bag or backpack is so 20th century - time to bring it into the 21st century and upgrade to a carryall!
This carryall is not merely a carrier for technology, this carryall IS technology. With a myriad of technological functions and impeccable organizational space, this carryall is about to revolutionize the "computer bag" industry. What makes the Pandora different is its supreme style and function. In addition to being a lightweight, style-conscious, and convenient bag, it’s also a docking station for all your technology. Never get caught with a dead device or missing data again!

Current Sketches for Prototype

Update: Carryall Functionality

Carries your laptop, phone, and anything in organized inner pouches. 
Made of Eco-Made Cordura fabric so there is no place too gnarly your carryall can't handle
Dual-functioning strap allows carryall to hang on your side as a classy messenger, or straddle your shoulders as a backpack. 
Convenient openings on the long and short side of the carryall.
Optional accessory for the shoulder strap to made of survival cord, for all survival needs.
Messenger Prototype



Update: Carryall Technology
Your current backpack may make you smile when you find five dollars in that nearly function-less front pocket, but it’ll make you crazy when you realize your phone charger or flash drive is missing at a crucial moment. Find random cash AND never have a technological panic attack with The Pandora Carryall.
The Pandora Carryall comes standard with:

Built-in USB ports and USB drive so you’ll never have “where'd I put that thumb drive” panic again. 
Built-in screen displays battery life to prevent an unforeseen power-down Built-in solar panel for recharging batteries. 
Speaker for impromptu block parties. 
A bluetooth locator sends the bag’s location to smartphone for fast tracking when you can’t quite remember where you were last night. 
Rechargeable battery for last‐minute phone, laptop, and robot charging needs.
Update: Carryall Organization  


Let’s face it; succeeding in our fast‐paced environment requires hardware, software, and brain-ware. But you will get “no-ware” without organization. Never helplessly flail your hand around the bottom of a bag again. The Pandora Carryall has you covered:

Numerous, conveniently sized pockets that separate important documents, writing utensils, and technology. 
Double-sided Velcro phone compartment: Once you stick your phone in the bag, it stays there. 
Secret- X‐ray proof compartment for convenient storing of secrets.
RFID blocking compartment 
Carryall retractable lock for securing contents. Update: Carryall Versatility


“But I've had this bag for like, EVER!” 
Yes, well, it’s also tie‐dye. And it’s not your friend. It’s a bag. So it won't be offended when you give it the boot for a carryall that better suits your needs. You have a smart-phone, a smart-car, a smart-computer, and a smart-self. It’s time for a carryall that’s equally as smart.


Fund Now to Accept All Upgrades.


How You Can Help Us Out: 

Join our Word of Mouth Campaign, share our website, our campaign, our Facebook, or our Twitter and you will help us get the word out about this product! We can't wait to see what people think and what they have to say about The Pandora Carryall, and you can help us learn more about what people want by sharing today!
Want to help spread the news about The Pandora Carryall? Check out our infograms and share them with your friends! 
Features Infrogram
See Who's Talking About Us
Join the Campaign



More Possibilities:
Future Designs



If Bad Wolf Outfitters is able to raise $50,000 through this campaign we would like to begin production of The Pandora Carryall: Sideswept Prototype - a triangle satchel, with the same features for the hardy adventurer. 
Press: 




Risks and Challenges:

Bad Wolf Outfitters recognizes that when it comes to fulfillment, every project has potential obstacles; from production delays to permits to collaborator mishaps; and that's why we have taken it all into account:
Production: 
Our engineer has been great through this initial design phases. As with any great endeavor, we are still working out feasibility when it comes to features, final price, and warranty.
Manufacturing:
In our search for manufacturers, we are looking for optimal production and distribution times. This is something that we are still engaged in doing. We realize that manufacturing The Pandora Carryall in bulk would be most beneficial to our needs and the needs of our customers, That is why we are working to ensure we build a relationship with a manufacturer who can not only produce a quality product but who can deliver in a timely manner. 
Time and Deadlines:
We may find as we go into production of The Pandora Carryall, that certain aspects of the carryall's unique features may take more time to put together. We are working incredibly hard to ensure that this product is available for our backers by November/December 2013 and full market distribution by January 2014. Hopefully by prototyping our first round we will be able to iron out any production issues from the get-go. 
The Reality:
We are here asking for your help to take this project closer to reality, and more than that, we are here looking for your input! The Pandora Carryall isn't about just being a great bag for you, it's about being the best bag built for you and by you. We also make you a pledge to keep you in the know with the latest news about our carryall. We will post a project update (which is emailed to all backers) detailing the steps of the project as we move to completion.You are more than a dollar amount, you are a part of a revolutionary jump forward in how we handle our "smart" gear!

FAQ's:
What stage of production are we at? 
We have completed the initial design phase with our engineer and are in the process of selecting a manufacturer for new prototypes.
Is the design final? 
No way! One of the best aspects of being at the fundraising/pre-production phase is that we can tweak the design according to feedback from backers. If you have any suggestions for new features or a change in design, please contact us or take our survey to offer your feedback! 
What sets The Pandora apart from other “smart” carryall products? 


The strongest feature we’re offering with The Pandora isn't any specific technical aspect--it’s that The Pandora is the only product both on the market and in the crowdfunding sphere that offers this combination of technology, design and functionality. Other carryalls have solar panels, speakers, sleek design and locator apps--but none of them have it all. Pair that with the customizable nature of being in pre-production and backers essentially have the option of building their product. 
When will it be available for public consumption? 
For backers... estimated December
For consumers 2014 
What if I can't donate money but want to help in other ways? 
Exposure is just as important when it comes to crowdfunding so you can help by featuring us and our campaign on your website, blog, or even on Facebook or Twitter. 
What technology is it compatible with (Apple, Windows, Ubuntu, etc)? 
Short answer - yes. 
What’s the battery life like? 
Back up battery will be around 13,000+ mAH which will give up to an extra 3 1/2 hours  extra time and double the battery life of smaller electronics The solar panel feature will allow continuous powering... so if it’s sunny then the battery life is theoretically whatever the half life of the lithium core is... so like a really long time 
What’s the coolest thing about The Pandora? 
The coolest thing about the Pandora is it has everything you could possibly need and if it doesn’t have it just tell us...
However our favorite feature ...
There are a lot of awesome aspects to the carryall, but probably the coolest part is that it has a SECRET COMPARTMENT that is x-ray resistant... you know to “protect” things like, um, undeveloped film...!

story:
Be the difference!


Wer wir sind

Jo'n'Em Fashion, dass ist der Name ihrer neuen Marke wen es um Mode geht. Sie ist jung, sie ist frech und etwas ganz spezielles. Jo'n'Em arbeitet nach einem simplen aber sehr effektiven Prinzip und dass ist das Prinzip der Einfachheit. Bei Jo'n'Em gilt ganz klar weniger ist mehr. Das ist der Trend den die Zukunft einschlagen wird. Man kann dies überall beobachten, zum beispiel auf einem Mobilfunk oder PC Betriebssystem. Sowohl Apple wie auch Google und weitere setzen für ihre neusten Versionen auf Einfachheit. Alle Symbole, alle Darstellungen werden einfach gehalten und auf minimalistische Designdarstellung gesetzt und die Welt liebt es.

Jo'n'Em sieht diesen Trend und setzt diese nun auch in der Modebranche um.

Wir sind nicht die, die der Mode hinterher laufen, nein, wir sind diejenigen die, die Mode der Zukunft (mit-)beeinflussen werden.



Hintergrund Informationen

Jo'n'Em Fashion ist eine Marke mit qualitativ hochwertigen Produkte. Nicht nur die Firma wurde in der Schweiz gegründet. Auch alle Produkte werde in der Schweiz Designet, eingekauft und hergestellt. Jo'n'Em Ist also komplett "Swiss made".

             

Jo'n'Em wurde von 2 Jungen Männern ins Leben gerufen ist, um in der Modewelt etwas neues zu erschaffen, das jede Frau und jeder Mann tragen kann. Der Name Jo'n'Em leitet sich ab von den Gründern "Joel and Emmanuel,"

Das Rad kann niemand neu Erfinder, aber man kann das bestehende weiter verwenden und verbessern, so auch Jo'n'Em.

Alle Motive werde selbst von Hand skizziert und gemalt, dies verleiht ihnen eine Einmaligkeit die sonst nirgendswo auf der Welt vorhanden ist.

Die Marke Jo'n'Em versucht nicht der Mode hinterher zu rennen, nein, sondern geht ihren eigene Weg und gibt vor was Mode ist.

Wer mit Jo'n'Em Fashion durch die Gegend läuft, wird schnell den unterschied merken und diese Einmaligkeit genießen.



Die Zukunft von Jo'n'Em

Zurzeit bietet Jo'n'Em ein Hand voll Kleider an, dies wird sich im laufe der Zukunft ändern. In kürze werden wir unser Angebot erweitern mit Langärmel-Shirts, Kappen, Pullover, Jacken und Jeans. Über längere Zeit werden auch Accessoires wie Brillen, Gürtel, Schuhe und Schmuck ins Sortiment einfließen.

                           

Natürlich werden wir auch International aktiv sein und uns nicht nur auf den Nationalen Markt bewegen. Somit kann jede Person zum Genuss der Marke Jo'n'Em kommen. 

                                                                                                     Die Aktuelle Kollektion der Jo'n'Em bringt die Künstlerischen Fähigkeiten von unserem Mitgründer auf den Stoff. Sie ist bereits jetzt schon einmalig und unverwechselbar, jede Person wird etwas finden, mit dem sie oder er sich identifizieren kann und dies ist erst der Anfang. Bereits werden im Hintergrund Pläne geschmiedet für die Nächsten Kollektionen, bei der wir eine noch grösseren und einmaligeren Wiedererkennungswert aufbauen werden.


Wir Zählen auf euch :)

Um all diese großen und weiten Ziele zu erreichen Braucht mann natürlich ein gewisses Start Kapital. Dies ist auch der Grund warum wir hier sind. Wir sind in gewissen Massen auf eure Unterstützung und Mitwirkung angewiesen, wenn wir mehr erreichen wollen. 

Dazu kommt, dass unser Genialer Designer nicht mehr bei uns ist und einen neuen Freiarbeiter zu finden ist nicht leicht, weshalb wir uns nun entschieden haben einen Designer Fest ein zu stellen. Mit diesem Startkapital möchten wir nicht nur den Lohn bezahlen, sondern auch unsere Einkäufe tätigen. Auch müssen damit diverse Prototypen bezahlen, bevor wir eine neue Kollektion in Serie Produzieren.

Desweiteren ist es auch ein Ziel den ersten Jo'n'Em Fashiondesign Laden zu eröffnen, da wir uns nicht nur auf den Onlinestore konzentrieren möchten.




Diverses

Wen Sie mehr sehen Wollen, besuchen Sie doch unsere Hompage: www.jonem.ch

Für weitere Fragen können Sie und eine nachricht Hinterrlassen an die E-Mail Adresse: info@jonem.ch


Ausserdem finden Sie uns auf Folgenden Sozialen Medien:

Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/pages/JonEm-Fashiondesign/413586522074793?ref_type=bookmark

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Jonem_Fashion


Ein Dankeschön aus tiefstem Herzen <3

Wir Danken allen aus Tiefstem herzen für Eure tatkräftige Unterstützung. Wir danken nicht nur für Eure kleine oder große spende, sondern auch wen ihr dieses Projekt weiter teilt, auf Sozialen Medien veröffentlicht, es weiter erzählt und unsere Fanpage liked.

Aus mangelnder Englischkenntnisse können Wir dieses Projekt leider noch nicht auf Englisch veröffentlichen. Wer also etwas gutes tun möchte, aber nicht Spenden will oder kann, dem danken wir genauso sehr für eine Englische Übersetzung des gesamten Textes.


                                     Thank You =)

story:
The Brand Image

The central idea of the Germany based Lionstone watch brand is to offer high-quality watches, without the ridiculously inflated price tag that usually accompanies great timepieces.

We think that in today's time, everyone should be able to afford a beautiful, modern and timelessly elegant watch, that is built to last.

Why Ceramic?

Ceramic material offers the perfect combination of superior qualities for your wrist. Because of its hardness and high chemical resistance, nowadays ceramics are commonly used in aerospace engineering and military applications. Ceramics are 3-4 times harder than steel and therefore extremely scratch and wear resistant. It also gives watches a unique and outstanding, silky shimmering appearance. The material’s low density makes the watch light and comfortable on your wrist. There is no other material that can replace the comfort of a ceramic watch.

The Perks

Make sure to check them properly!

Check out the right-hand column for all of the watch options we have available. The earliest supporters of our campaign can receive specially discounted prices on both the Superslim and the Superslim Ceramic watches. But pledge now, because these prices are limited to only the first few backers!

We have also included special perk offers for couples. Check out our “Lion & Lioness” perks to save up to $120 on watch pairs that are perfect for every couple.


The SUPERSLIM CERAMIC

Our SUPERSLIM CERAMIC is truly the pinnacle of the Lionstone Superslim Collection. Made from a High-Tech Ceramic it is as durable as it is magnificent to behold. This watch makes a majestic impression regardless of the setting.

And the restraint of its design is the very key to its beauty.

The Superslim Ceramic is available in Jet Black in both, men and women's sizes.

And for women exclusively, we additionally offer it in Alpine White with rosé coloured details.

The SUPERSLIM

The Lionstone Superslim is everything that you want in a watch and will make it hard if not impossible, to wear any other watch from the moment you first put it on your wrist.

It is the delicately grooved case, the antique-inspired curved lugs, the sword blade shaped hands and the subtle reflecting sunray dial, that make the Lionstone Superslim such an alluring and desirable timepiece.

All of our watches are made from the best materials.

The Superslim is made from 316L surgical grade stainless steel and features a premium, 20mm wide, hand made, genuine leather strap with accentuated white stitching. This kind of strap is commonly found on watches in the 1000€+ price range.


The Superslim is available in Classic Silver and Midnight Black / and it will be, for whatever outfit you choose, absolutely perfect.

Our Core Principles

We are so convinced of the quality of our products that we decided to give you a 3-year limited international warranty on all 1st Edition watches that can be purchased through this crowdfunding campaign.

It is important to stress that we, at Lionstone Watches, are sworn enemies of planned obsolescence.

We would rather receive a mail from you in 10 years from now, thanking us for our still fully functioning watch, then have you return in 2 years to buy a new one.

Lionstone Watches is here to stay. 

After a successful campaign we will continue to develop and produce beautiful and durable watches.

We feel that only the highest quality is good enough for our customers and we did not compromise any of it when choosing the materials and components.

We will leverage increasing sales numbers only to invest back in our watches for your benefit. What we mean by that is explained in our stretch goals.

The Warranty

The hands, dial, and watch movement are the only components covered under the warranty. If the watch proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use, it will be repaired or replaced free of charge. A return shipping and handling fee will apply to all warranty service.

The warranty does not cover:

  • Battery, case, crystal, strap, or bracelet.
  • Damage resulting from improper handling, lack of care, accidents, or normal wear and tear.
  • Water damage unless marked water-resistant.

THIS WARRANTY IS VOID IF THE WATCH HAS BEEN DAMAGED BY ACCIDENT, NEGLIGENCE, UNAUTHORIZED SERVICE, OR OTHER FACTORS NOT DUE TO DEFECTS IN MATERIAL OR WORKMANSHIP.

The Schedule

The timeline below illustrates our approximate schedule.

We planned everything as accurately as possible but unforeseen circumstances can always occur and we hope for your understanding in case of delays.


The Team

Lionstone Watches is a startup watch brand based in Ingolstadt, Germany. It was founded in 2014 by Daniel Kampf and Fabian Hofmann, who always had a passion for watches and horology. This passion results in a constant desire to improve the current luxury watch market by making quality and elegant timepieces more affordable. The team has spent months experimenting with various designs and working with leading manufacturers in order to offer a modern, quality ceramic watch at a low price.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges lie in the gathering of a critical mass that helps to kickstart our project. We believe that our concept and our products can change the luxury watch market for the better. All we need now is to reach as many people as possible in order to inform them about us.

We researched and experimented a lot and we finally found a manufacturer that is reliable, professional and has a very good reputation in the watch industry.

We will do our utmost possible to keep our schedule and deliver the watches on time, but there can of course be unforeseen circumstances which could extend this period. This is the case with every crowdfunding project but we are confident in the partners that we chose and their ability to keep their schedule.

Other Ways You Can Help

Select the amount you would like to contribute using the boxes on the right, and choose the quality watch that you want to make your statement. We also completely understand if you cannot help us financially right now, but you can still help to spread the word! Here are a few other ways you can help:

  •  Share this project with your friends using the social links to the left of the video
  • Pledge any small amount to our project to receive Lionstone updates and show support for us as we pursue our dream

We sincerely hope you join us in the pursuit of perfection,

Your Lionstone Team

The SUPERSLIM CERAMIC





Our
SUPERSLIM CERAMIC is truly the pinnacle of the Lionstone Superslim
Collection. Made from a High-Tech Ceramic it is as durable as it is
magnificent to behold. This watch makes a majestic impression regardless of the setting.

And
the restraint of its design is the very key to its beauty.




The
Superslim Ceramic is available in Jet Black in both, men and women's
sizes.


And
for women exclusively, we additionally offer it in Alpine White with
rosé coloured details.








The SUPERSLIM

The Lionstone Superslim is everything that you want in a watch and 
will make it hard if not impossible, to wear any other watch from the 
moment you first put it on your wrist.

It is the delicately grooved case, the antique-inspired curved lugs, 
the sword blade shaped hands and the subtle reflecting sunray dial, that
 make the Lionstone Superslim such an alluring and desirable timepiece.

All of our watches are made from the best materials.
The Superslim is made from 316L surgical grade stainless steel and 
features a premium, 20mm wide, hand made, genuine leather strap with 
accentuated white stitching. This kind of strap is commonly found on 
watches in the 1000€+ price range.

The Superslim is available in Classic Silver and Midnight Black /
 and it will be, for whatever outfit you choose, absolutely perfect.







Our Core Principles 

We
are so convinced of the quality of our products that we decided to
give you a 3-year limited international warranty on all 1st Edition
watches that can be purchased through this crowdfunding campaign.
It is important to stress that we, at Lionstone Watches, are sworn enemies of
planned obsolescence. 

We
would rather receive a mail from you in 10 years from now, thanking
us for our still fully functioning watch, then have you return in 2
years to buy a new one.
Lionstone
Watches is here to stay. 
After a successful campaign we will
continue to develop and produce beautiful and durable watches. 

We
feel that only the highest quality is good enough for our customers
and we did not compromise any of it when choosing the materials and
components.
We will leverage increasing sales numbers only to invest back in our 
watches for your benefit. What we mean by that is explained in our 
stretch goals.

The Warranty

The hands, dial, and watch movement are the only components 
covered under the warranty. If the watch proves to be defective in 
material or workmanship under normal use, it will be repaired or 
replaced free of charge. A return shipping and handling fee will apply 
to all warranty service.The warranty does not cover:

Battery, case, crystal, strap, or bracelet.
Damage resulting from improper handling, lack of care, accidents, or normal wear and tear.
Water damage unless marked water-resistant.

THIS WARRANTY IS VOID IF THE WATCH HAS BEEN DAMAGED BY ACCIDENT, 
NEGLIGENCE, UNAUTHORIZED SERVICE, OR OTHER FACTORS NOT DUE TO DEFECTS IN
 MATERIAL OR WORKMANSHIP.
The Schedule
The timeline below illustrates our approximate schedule.
We planned everything as accurately as possible but unforeseen 
circumstances can always occur and we hope for your understanding in 
case of delays.

The Team


Lionstone Watches is a startup watch brand based in Ingolstadt, Germany. 
It was founded in 2014 by Daniel Kampf and Fabian Hofmann, who always had a passion for watches and horology. This passion results in a constant 
desire to improve the current luxury watch market by making quality and 
elegant timepieces more affordable. The team has spent months 
experimenting with various designs and working with leading 
manufacturers in order to offer a modern, quality ceramic watch at a low
 price.
Risks & Challenges



The challenges lie in the gathering of a critical mass that helps to 
kickstart our project. We believe that our concept and our products can 
change the luxury watch market for the better. All we need now is to 
reach as many people as possible in order to inform them about us.
We researched and experimented a lot and we finally found a 
manufacturer that is reliable, professional and has a very good 
reputation in the watch industry.
We will do our utmost possible to keep our schedule and deliver the 
watches on time, but there can of course be unforeseen circumstances 
which could extend this period. This is the case with every crowdfunding
 project but we are confident in the partners that we chose and their 
ability to keep their schedule.
Other Ways You Can Help

Select the amount you would like to contribute using the boxes on the
 right, and choose the quality watch that you want to make your 
statement. We also completely understand if you cannot help us 
financially right now, but you can still help to spread the word! Here 
are a few other ways you can help:
 Share this project with your friends using the social links to the left of the video
Pledge any small amount to our project to receive Lionstone updates and show support for us as we pursue our dream
We sincerely hope you join us in the pursuit of perfection,
Your Lionstone Team

story:
You can also get information on our website

Versión en: ESPAÑOL

AkuaHelp provides the safest and most comfortable aquatic sports experience. It was designed for beginners and experts who are passionate about  aquatic activities!


What is AkuaHelp?

We have designed AkuaHelp with the purpose of improving  the needs and solving problems for people practicing aquatic sports. We have been working on this project for a year focusing specially on children’s safety so they  can enjoy aquatic sports. Statistics presented by the World Health Organization explain that  every hour 42 people die in situations involving water This product aims to alleviateparent’sconcerns when their children are practicing aquatic sports.

AKUAHELP is a neoprene suit of 3 and 1 mm that posses four inflatable chambers. This division is aimed to prevent malfunctions of the chambers in case one of them is broken, in order to offer more security. The system of activation of these chambers can be automatic or manual.

The automatic system was designed for children under 7, for people with disabilities or elderly people. When the suit gets in contact with water, the inflatable system activates the CO2 cartridge. Moreover, the automatic system emits a signal that can be received in smartphones, communicating that the person using the suit is in contact with water. 

On the other hand, the manual system was designed for teenagers or people dexterous in water.   This systems creates support in situations of emergency such as, an athlete suffering  a heart attack or a strong concussion  due to the nature of the sport practiced. The activation of the inflatable chambers eases the rescuing process since the buoyancy of the person using the suit would increase.

The manual system has to be activated by the person using AkuaHelp through a valve, located on the bottom right part of the suit. (This system could be relocated on the bottom left side if requested by the customer, since we acknowledge that there is 10% of left handed people in the world, who would feel more comfortable if the valve was on the opposite side.)

IMPORTANT INFORMATION: THE 16GR. CARTRIDGES OF CO2 USED BY THE SUIT CAN BE FOUND IN ANY SPORTS SHOP, WEAPON SHOP OR BREWERS ACCESSORIES SHOP. WHICH FACILITATES THE PROCESS OF RECHARGING THE SUIT. 

AKUAHELP has a little ring located on one shoulder. This has a keyring-whistle-compass aimed to help the user in distress. The whistle can be used when searching for help in case of emergency and the compass provides orientation.

Moreover, AkuaHelp will have and additional device on both shoulders that will allow the adjustment of a GoPro, HERO4 Session or Polaroid CUBE camera. This will allow athletes to record their movements while practicing their favorite sports.

Because of hight risk of shark attacks for people who practice aquatic sports around the globe, we have equipped AkuaHelp with a magnetic system of four components. These are located around the torso of the suit in order to offer more security to our clients. Sharks have electric receptors called ampullae of Lorenzini; when a magnet of specific characteristics is near the electro receptors, it bothers the sharks, keeping them away from the person using AkuaHelp. This system of protection is more efficient when there is a group of people using AkuaHelp on the same zone. 


Places around the world where shark attacks are common

In addition to all the features presented above, AkuaHelp also has a neon filament, The same that can be turned on manually by the user, this allows the person to be more visible in situations of darkness or fogginess. There are two types of lighting that the filament offers, one permanent and oneintermittent. 

Besides being an excellent system for locating users in emergency situations, it can also work as an original accessory for beach parties and raves.It can be chosen in a variety of colors.

AKUAHELP IN DE MEDIA




AKUAHELP suits will have eight different presentations. There will be four different models, which subdivide in either manual (M) or automatic (A) systems. This offers a variety of options to our sponsors and their needs.

AKUAHELP Standard M.- This suit includes just the four inflatable chambers operated by the manual system. This is ideal for people who seek support in water when learning how to swim. This user doesn’t  practice any risky aquatic sport or  need the suit to swim in deep waters.



AKUAHELP Standard A.- This suit includes the four inflatable chambers working with the automatic system, linked to a smartphone. It is ideal for children under the age of 7 who don’t know how to swim or people with disabilities. It can be used in places like a pool or the sea.


AKUAHELP Pro M.- This suit is provided with the four inflatable chambers, using the manual system, plus the neon light system. This model was designed for people who seek  support when learning how to swim but desire to use it at  night or in places with low lighting.


AKUAHELP Pro A.- This suit is provided with the four inflatable chambers, using the automatic system, plus the neon light system. It was designed to protect children under 7 who don’t know how to swim or people with disabilities. This suit can be used at  night or in places with low visibility.


AKUAHELP Plus M.-  This suit includes the four inflatable chambers (manual system), and the anti-shark magnetic system. It is ideal for people who practice extreme aquatic sports in places where shark attacks are common.


AKUAHELP Plus A.- This suit includes the four inflatable chambers (automatic system), linked to a smartphone, plus the anti-shark magnetic system. It is ideal for people who practice extreme aquatic sports, in places where shark attacks are common, and are exposed to dangerious situations  where severe injuries could occurr  that could prevent the activation of the manual system.


AKUAHELP Full M.- This suit includes the four inflatable chambers (manual system), plus the neon light system and the anti-shark magnetic system as well. It was designed for people who practice extreme aquatic sports, where shark attacks are common and visibility is hard.


AKUAHELP Full A.- This suit includes the four inflatable chambers (automatic system), plus the neon light system and the anti-shark magnetic system as well. It was designed for people who practice extreme aquatic sports, where shark attacks are common and visibility is hard. Moreover it is ideal for people who might be exposed to severe injuries that could prevent using the  manual system.



Who are we?


After our campaign.

November 2014.- Many  scenarios can be  encountered during a family vacation on the beach.  Kids are running around near pools or the sea unprotected.  This product offers securty and confort for parents and children  in this type of environment.   

January- October 2015.- We worked on our product prototype.  . We analyzed different ideas and evaluated the challenges of creating such product. We encountered problems when creating the design of our suit and also financial difficulties to manufacture it. This is when we found out about the crowdfunding campaigns, which reopened the door to our idea. 

With the help of family and friends we improved our design, listening to all the suggestions they made and the key benefits  when looking for a product like AkuaHelp.

October- November 2015.- we started to advertise our product through social media. The message that we sent across was the importance of having a product that offers security for our family and ourselves when we want to enjoy aquatic environments.

November- February 2016.- once we have reached our crowdfunding goal, we will test our design in order to satisfy the high standards of quality that we aim to reach at an international level. We hope to be in touch with enterprises that manufacture  some of the pieces we need in order to make AkuaHelp.

February- October 2016.- during this time we will be manufacturing AkuaHelp with the help of our sponsors who are willing to negotiate with us, offering their products. For reasons out of our control,  the time to fabricate our product could be one or two months later than expected.

November 2016.- Eureka! AkuaHelp will be distributed worldwide so you can enjoy with your family the advantages that our product offers.  


ESPAÑOL


  AKUAHELP es la forma más segura y cómoda de disfrutar en el agua. ¡Diseñado para acoplarse tanto a principiantes como a expertos que les apasiona los distintos deportes acuáticos!


¿Qué es AkuaHelp?

Hemos diseñado AkuaHelp, para solventar todas las necesidades y dificultades a las que están expuestas todas las personas que realizan deportes acuáticos.

Venimos trabajando desde hace casi un año, pensando en todas las preocupaciones que los padres enfrentamos cuando tenemos niños pequeños, por lo que nos hemos planteado brindar seguridad de manera especial a los niños y tranquilidad a sus padres, tomando en cuenta las alarmantes cifras mundiales de personas que mueren (42 personas por hora, según datos de la OMS) y otras tantas sufren lesiones por ahogamiento. Dichas cifras cada vez van en aumento. 

AKUAHELP, en un buzo de neopreno de 3 y 1 mm. combinado con un sistema de cuatro cámaras inflables, para ofrecer mayor seguridad en caso de que alguna de ellas sufriera daño; el sistema de inflado puede ser automático o manual.

El sistema automático está diseñado para niños menores de 7 años, personas con capacidades especiales o adultos mayores, el cual hace que al contacto con el agua se dispare el sistema del cartucho de CO2, inflando las cuatro cámarasy emitiendo una señal hacia su Smartphone, para comunicarnos que esa persona se encuentra en el agua.

Por otra parte, el sistema manual está diseñado para ser usado por adolescentes o personas diestras en el agua, solventando un apoyo en situaciones emergentes, como por ejemplo calambres, infartos o impactos producto de los deportes que realizan, lo cual facilitara la espera y las labores de rescate al aumentar la flotabilidad de quien lo usa.

El sistema manual es accionado por el portador del AkuaHelp, a través de una válvula, ubicada en la parte inferior derecha. (Este sistema podría ser colocado en el costado izquierdo, bajo pedido, en vista de que existe un 10% de personas zurdas en el mundo, a quienes también hemos tomado en cuenta) 

NOTA IMPORTANTE: LOS CARTUCHOS DE 16 gr. DE CO2 QUE UTILIZA EL AKUAHELP, SE ENCUENTRAN A DISPOSICIÓN EN CUALQUIER TIENDA DE ARTICULOS DEPORTIVOS, ACCESORIOS PARA BICICLETAS, TIENDAS DE ARMAMENTO O TIENDAS DE ACCESORIOS CERVECEROS. LO CUAL OFRECE A NUESTROS CLIENTES FACILIDAD PARA RECARGAR SU AKUAHELP.

El AKUAHELP, posee una pequeña argolla colocada en el hombro. En esta se acopla un llavero-silbato-brújula, el silbato brinda soporte al buscar ayuda en caso de emergencia y la brújula proporciona orientación.

Adicional el AkuaHelp tendrá en ambos hombros unas pequeñas bases que permiten el acople de cámaras GoPro HERO4 Session o Polaroid CUBE, para que tanto deportistas extremos como aficionados puedan realizar los videos de sus hazañas.

Frente a los crecientes ataques de tiburones a las personas que realizan distintos deportes acuáticos alrededor del mundo, el AkuaHelp, está equipado con un  sistema magnético de cuatro componentes, distribuidos en el entorno del torso de la persona para brindar mayor seguridad. Los tiburones tienen sensores eléctricos llamados ampollas de Lorenzini; cuando un imán de ciertas características está cercano a estos electro-receptores, este produce malestar en los escualos, manteniéndolos alejados y brindando seguridad a quienes portan el AkuaHelp, mientras mayor sea el número de personas que utilicen este sistema de protección, el campo de acción se vuelve más seguro. 


Además el AkuaHelp posee un filamento de neón, que es encendido de forma manual por el usuario, permitiéndole ser más visible en caso de oscuridad o nubosidad, dicho sistema dispone de dos tipos de encendido, permanente o intermitente.

Este además de ser un sistema de emergencia para localización, puede ser usado como elemento distintivo o decorativo en las fiestas playeras o raves. Y cuenta con una amplia de colores.

AKUAHELP EN LOS MEDIOS



El AKUAHELP tendrá ocho tipos de fabricación. Son cuatro modelos diferentes, que poseen un sistema manual (M) o automático (A) en cada caso. El sistema manual es ejecutado por el usuario, mientras que el sistema automático es ejecutado al contacto con el agua y además envía una señal a uno o varios teléfonos celulares, dependiendo de la configuración asignada por cada persona.

Por tanto nuestros patrocinadores podrán elegir el AkuaHelp que más se adapte a sus necesidades.

AKUAHELP Estándar M.- está provisto solo del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma manual. Es ideal para aquellas personas que solo buscan obtener seguridad en el agua y utilizar el AkuaHelp como un sistema de ayuda para aprender a nadar. No realizan deportes extremos o pesca en sitios apartados.


AKUAHELP Estándar A.- está provisto solo del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma automática y enlazado a un Smartphone. Es ideal para la protección de niños menores de 7 años, personas con capacidades especiales o adultos mayores; en lugares como piscinas o en el mar siempre y cuando no existan peligros de tiburones o falta de visibilidad.


AKUAHELP Pro M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma manual, más el sistema de luces de neón. Está diseñado para aquellas personas que solo buscan obtener seguridad en el agua y utilizar el AkuaHelp como un sistema de ayuda para aprender a nadar. No realizan deportes extremos y lo utilizan para pescar o nadar en la noche o en sitios donde exista baja visibilidad.


AKUAHELP Pro A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma automática y enlazado a un Smartphone, más el sistema de luces de neón. Está diseñado para la protección de niños menores de 7 años, personas con capacidades especiales o adultos mayores; en lugares donde puedan existir problemas de visibilidad como lagos nubosos o en el mar, siempre y cuando no existan peligros de tiburones.


AKUAHELP Plus M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma manual, más el sistema magnético para protección en caso de tiburones.  Es ideal para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones.


AKUAHELP Plus A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma automática y enlazado a un Smartphone, más el sistema magnético para protección en caso de tiburones.  Es ideal para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones y están expuestos a golpes o riesgos que pudieran evitar el accionamiento manual del AkuaHelp.


AKUAHELP Full M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma manual, más el sistema de luces de neón y el sistema magnético de protección contra tiburones. Está diseñado para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones y exista poca visibilidad o desean ser notorios al realizar sus acrobacias en la noche.


AKUAHELP Full A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado de forma automática y enlazado a un Smartphone, más el sistema de luces de neón y el sistema magnético de protección contra tiburones. Está diseñado para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones y exista poca visibilidad o desean ser notorios al realizar sus acrobacias en la noche. Además pudieran estar expuestos a golpes o riesgos que pudieran evitar el accionamiento manual del AkuaHelp.




¿Quienes somos?


Después de nuestra campaña.

Noviembre 2014.- después de unas vacaciones en la playa, y frente a las preocupaciones de tener niños pequeños en entornos de mar y piscinas. Nace la idea de crear un sistema de protección que nos ofrezca seguridad y comodidad, todos los productos que ofrece el mercado brindan una escasa movilidad, dificultando el disfrute y aprendizaje de la natación o los deportes en el agua.

Enero – Octubre 2015.- durante este periodo de tiempo, fuimos trabajando en varias ideas, algunas eran posibles y otras no. Después de varias dificultades encontradas y frente a las ocupaciones de cada uno de nosotros, incluso pensamos en abandonar la idea. Tomando en cuenta no solo los problemas de diseño, sino principalmente los financieros que se debe enfrentar para colocar nuevos productos en el mercado. Fue en este contexto que descubrimos la existencia de los sistemas de crowdfunding, los cuales hacen más fácil el desarrollo de nuevas ideas y productos.

Con el apoyo de familiares y amigos que siempre creyeron en nuestro proyecto, fuimos mejorando y superando las dificultades, sobre todo acogiendo sus acotaciones y sugerencias, las cuales fueron un gran aporte para que AkuaHelp sea una realidad.

Octubre – Noviembre 2015.- empezamos la difusión de AkuaHelp, con la esperanza y la convicción de lo importante que es la seguridad de nuestros seres queridos y de nosotros mismo. Y con el firme propósito de poder transmitir la idea a muchas personas para convertir este proyecto en una realidad.

Noviembre – Febrero 2016.- una vez alcanzada la meta, realizaremos todas las pruebas para asegurarnos de cumplir con altos estándares de calidad y cumplir con normativa internacional para satisfacer a todos nuestros patrocinadores, cuando AkuaHelp llegue a sus manos. Hemos conversado con algunas empresas fabricantes, de algunos de los componentes que serán utilizados en el AkuaHelp, ya que cuentan con una vasta experiencia y cumplen con normas internacionales y altos estándares de calidad.

Febrero – Octubre 2016.- este es el tiempo en que las empresas con las que hemos tomado contacto y serán las proveedoras de algunos de los componentes del AkuaHelp, nos han ofrecido entregar dichos implementos. Por motivos o dificultades ajenas a nuestra voluntad este periodo podría alargarse uno o dos meses.

Noviembre 2016.- ¡Eureka!, usted tendrá el AkuaHelp en sus manos y podrá disfrutar con toda su familia de la seguridad y las bondades de nuestro producto.

manufacturing AkuaHelp with the help of our sponsors who are willing to negotiate with us,
offering their products. For reasons out of our control,  the time to fabricate our product could be one
or two months later than expected.
November 2016.- Eureka! AkuaHelp will be distributed
worldwide so you can enjoy with your family the advantages that our product
offers.  ESPAÑOL
 
AKUAHELP es la
forma más segura y cómoda de disfrutar en el agua. ¡Diseñado para acoplarse
tanto a principiantes como a expertos que les apasiona los
distintos deportes acuáticos!

¿Qué es AkuaHelp?

Hemos diseñado AkuaHelp, para
solventar todas las necesidades y dificultades a las que están expuestas todas
las personas que realizan deportes acuáticos.
Venimos trabajando desde hace
casi un año, pensando en todas las preocupaciones que los padres enfrentamos
cuando tenemos niños pequeños, por lo que nos hemos planteado brindar seguridad
de manera especial a los niños y tranquilidad a sus padres, tomando en cuenta
las alarmantes cifras mundiales de personas que mueren (42 personas por hora,
según datos de la OMS) y otras tantas sufren lesiones por ahogamiento. Dichas
cifras cada vez van en aumento. 

AKUAHELP, en un buzo de
neopreno de 3 y 1 mm. combinado con un sistema de cuatro cámaras inflables,
para ofrecer mayor seguridad en caso de que alguna de ellas sufriera daño; el
sistema de inflado puede ser automático o manual.

El sistema automático
está diseñado para niños menores de 7 años, personas con capacidades especiales
o adultos mayores, el cual hace que al contacto con el agua se dispare el
sistema del cartucho de CO2, inflando
las cuatro cámarasy emitiendo una señal
hacia su Smartphone, para comunicarnos que esa persona se encuentra en el agua.




Por otra parte, el sistema
manual está diseñado para ser usado por adolescentes o personas diestras en el
agua, solventando un apoyo en situaciones emergentes, como por ejemplo
calambres, infartos o impactos producto de los deportes que realizan, lo cual
facilitara la espera y las labores de rescate al aumentar la flotabilidad de
quien lo usa. 

El sistema manual es
accionado por el portador del AkuaHelp, a través de una válvula, ubicada en la
parte inferior derecha. (Este sistema podría ser colocado en el costado
izquierdo, bajo pedido, en vista de que existe un 10% de personas zurdas en el
mundo, a quienes también hemos tomado en cuenta) 



NOTA
IMPORTANTE: LOS
CARTUCHOS DE 16 gr. DE CO2 QUE UTILIZA EL AKUAHELP, SE ENCUENTRAN A DISPOSICIÓN
EN CUALQUIER TIENDA DE ARTICULOS DEPORTIVOS, ACCESORIOS PARA BICICLETAS,
TIENDAS DE ARMAMENTO O TIENDAS DE ACCESORIOS CERVECEROS. LO CUAL OFRECE A
NUESTROS CLIENTES FACILIDAD PARA RECARGAR SU AKUAHELP.

El AKUAHELP, posee una pequeña argolla colocada en el hombro. En esta se
acopla un llavero-silbato-brújula, el silbato brinda soporte al buscar ayuda en
caso de emergencia y la brújula proporciona orientación.
Adicional el AkuaHelp tendrá
en ambos hombros unas pequeñas bases que permiten el acople de cámaras GoPro
HERO4 Session o Polaroid CUBE, para que tanto deportistas extremos como
aficionados puedan realizar los videos de sus hazañas.
Frente a los crecientes
ataques de tiburones a las personas que realizan distintos deportes acuáticos
alrededor del mundo, el AkuaHelp, está equipado con un  sistema magnético de cuatro componentes,
distribuidos en el entorno del torso de la persona para brindar mayor
seguridad. Los tiburones tienen sensores
eléctricos llamados ampollas de Lorenzini; cuando
un imán de ciertas características está cercano a estos electro-receptores,
este produce malestar en los escualos, manteniéndolos alejados y brindando
seguridad a quienes portan el AkuaHelp, mientras mayor sea el número de
personas que utilicen este sistema de protección, el campo de acción se vuelve
más seguro. 



Además el AkuaHelp posee un
filamento de neón, que es encendido de forma manual por el usuario,
permitiéndole ser más visible en caso de oscuridad o nubosidad, dicho sistema
dispone de dos tipos de encendido, permanente o intermitente. 
Este además de ser un sistema
de emergencia para localización, puede ser usado como elemento distintivo o
decorativo en las fiestas playeras o raves. Y cuenta con una amplia de colores.


AKUAHELP EN LOS MEDIOS










El AKUAHELP tendrá ocho tipos
de fabricación. Son cuatro modelos diferentes, que poseen un sistema manual (M) o automático (A) en cada caso. El sistema manual es ejecutado por el usuario,
mientras que el sistema automático es ejecutado al contacto con el agua y
además envía una señal a uno o varios teléfonos celulares, dependiendo de la
configuración asignada por cada persona. 
Por tanto nuestros
patrocinadores podrán elegir el AkuaHelp que más se adapte a sus necesidades.
AKUAHELP
Estándar M.- está provisto solo del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma manual. Es ideal para
aquellas personas que solo buscan obtener seguridad en el agua y utilizar el
AkuaHelp como un sistema de ayuda para aprender a nadar. No realizan deportes
extremos o pesca en sitios apartados.



AKUAHELP
Estándar A.- está provisto solo del sistema de cuatro cámaras de
inflado de forma automática y enlazado a
un Smartphone. Es ideal para la protección de niños menores de 7 años,
personas con capacidades especiales o adultos mayores; en lugares como piscinas
o en el mar siempre y cuando no existan peligros de tiburones o falta de
visibilidad.



AKUAHELP
Pro M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma manual, más el sistema de
luces de neón. Está diseñado para aquellas personas que solo buscan obtener
seguridad en el agua y utilizar el AkuaHelp como un sistema de ayuda para
aprender a nadar. No realizan deportes extremos y lo utilizan para pescar o
nadar en la noche o en sitios donde exista baja visibilidad.



AKUAHELP
Pro A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma automática y enlazado a un
Smartphone, más el sistema de luces de neón. Está diseñado para la
protección de niños menores de 7 años, personas con capacidades especiales o
adultos mayores; en lugares donde puedan existir problemas de visibilidad como
lagos nubosos o en el mar, siempre y cuando no existan peligros de tiburones.



AKUAHELP
Plus M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma manual, más el sistema
magnético para protección en caso de tiburones. 
Es ideal para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor
intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones.



AKUAHELP
Plus A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma automática y enlazado a un
Smartphone, más el sistema magnético para protección en caso de
tiburones.  Es ideal para aquellas
personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se
hayan producido ataques de tiburones y están expuestos a golpes o riesgos que
pudieran evitar el accionamiento manual del AkuaHelp.



AKUAHELP
Full M.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma manual, más el sistema de
luces de neón y el sistema magnético de protección contra tiburones. Está
diseñado para aquellas personas que realizan deportes acuáticos de mayor
intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido ataques de tiburones y exista
poca visibilidad o desean ser notorios al realizar sus acrobacias en la noche.



AKUAHELP
Full A.- está provisto del sistema de cuatro cámaras de inflado
de forma automática y enlazado a un
Smartphone, más el sistema de luces de neón y el sistema magnético de
protección contra tiburones. Está diseñado para aquellas personas que realizan
deportes acuáticos de mayor intensidad en sitios donde se hayan producido
ataques de tiburones y exista poca visibilidad o desean ser notorios al
realizar sus acrobacias en la noche. Además pudieran estar expuestos a golpes o
riesgos que pudieran evitar el accionamiento manual del AkuaHelp.







¿Quienes somos?



Después de nuestra campaña.



Noviembre 2014.- después de unas vacaciones en la playa, y frente a las preocupaciones de tener niños pequeños en entornos de mar y piscinas. Nace la idea de crear un sistema de protección que nos ofrezca seguridad y comodidad, todos los productos que ofrece el mercado brindan una escasa movilidad, dificultando el disfrute y aprendizaje de la natación o los deportes en el agua.
Enero – Octubre 2015.- durante este periodo de tiempo, fuimos trabajando en varias ideas, algunas eran posibles y otras no. Después de varias dificultades encontradas y frente a las ocupaciones de cada uno de nosotros, incluso pensamos en abandonar la idea. Tomando en cuenta no solo los problemas de diseño, sino principalmente los financieros que se debe enfrentar para colocar nuevos productos en el mercado. Fue en este contexto que descubrimos la existencia de los sistemas de crowdfunding, los cuales hacen más fácil el desarrollo de nuevas ideas y productos.
Con el apoyo de familiares y amigos que siempre creyeron en nuestro proyecto, fuimos mejorando y superando las dificultades, sobre todo acogiendo sus acotaciones y sugerencias, las cuales fueron un gran aporte para que AkuaHelp sea una realidad.
Octubre – Noviembre 2015.- empezamos la difusión de AkuaHelp, con la esperanza y la convicción de lo importante que es la seguridad de nuestros seres queridos y de nosotros mismo. Y con el firme propósito de poder transmitir la idea a muchas personas para convertir este proyecto en una realidad.
Noviembre – Febrero 2016.- una vez alcanzada la meta, realizaremos todas las pruebas para asegurarnos de cumplir con altos estándares de calidad y cumplir con normativa internacional para satisfacer a todos nuestros patrocinadores, cuando AkuaHelp llegue a sus manos. Hemos conversado con algunas empresas fabricantes, de algunos de los componentes que serán utilizados en el AkuaHelp, ya que cuentan con una vasta experiencia y cumplen con normas internacionales y altos estándares de calidad.
Febrero – Octubre 2016.- este es el tiempo en que las empresas con las que hemos tomado contacto y serán las proveedoras de algunos de los componentes del AkuaHelp, nos han ofrecido entregar dichos implementos. Por motivos o dificultades ajenas a nuestra voluntad este periodo podría alargarse uno o dos meses.
Noviembre 2016.- ¡Eureka!, usted tendrá el AkuaHelp en sus manos y podrá disfrutar con toda su familia de la seguridad y las bondades de nuestro producto.

story:
INTRODUCING WOLAN: high quality glasses with smart lenses that naturally adapt to the changes of luminosity. They are darkened by the sun, so your eyes will always be protected from the UVA and UVB rays, invisible but always present, inside and outside the office.

 

       

 

Photochromic lenses are eyeglass lenses that are clear indoors and darken automatically when exposed to sunlight.

The molecules responsible for causing photochromic lenses to darken are activated by the sun's ultraviolet radiation. Because UV rays penetrate clouds, photochromic lenses will darken on overcast days as well as sunny days.

Wolans darken in just a few seconds.

 

 

A single lense protects inside and outside thanks to the ability to become clear again once the sun's UV rays disappear.

 

 

 

 

LENSES WITH MORE COLOR BASES ARE AVAILABLE FOR THE DARING

 

 

 

 

 

 

Wolan Smart Glasses provide optimal protection for the eyes inside and outside through better absorption of UV radiation, they have 100% UV400 protection and total protection against glare in all conditions and in any climate and time of year (indoor, rain, sun..). They are light, transparent, with high resistance to breakage. They also guarantee a healthy vision. They have a silky surface and a static electric effect that repels dust and lint, making them easier to clean.

 

FORGET ABOUT USING CLIP-ONS TO TRANSFORM YOUR GLASSES INTO SUNGLASSES

 

 

 

 

 

MOMA

COLLINS

 

OLD SCHOOL

 

AVIATOR

 

YOU CAN CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE LENS COLOR

CUSTOMIZE THEM AS YOU WANT

 

*Wolan eyewear lenses that are completely transparent will darken only in grey and brown tones.

*Wolan colored glasses come in light base colors and they darken even more with the exposure to the sun.

You can choose your favorite model and your favorite lens color as you want. Please take note that if you need prescription only brown and grey tones are available.

 

 

                        

 

MEASURES

 

We have our own assembly workshop in Barcelona where all the Wolan glasses are manufactured, thus controlling the entire manufacturing process, without depending on anyone.

We are the founders of Thunder Optical, low cost optics located in Barcelona. We produce in Barcelona, just where we have our logistics center, that makes much easier to deliver on time anywhere in the world

PACKAGING

 

 

 

CAN I ADD PRESCRIPTION?

 

Yes, we are prepared to provide our backers with their specific prescriptions lenses requirements (only monofocal and grey and brown tones). 

Once the campaign ends, we will send you a survey so you can choose your favourite model, colour and whether you need prescription lenses or not. We will also need your pupillary distance.

If you want prescription lenses, just add €25 to your pledge (for a pledge of multiple eyewear add €25 for every eyewear that needs prescription)

IMPORTANT NOTE: Stock range for prescription is

Astigmatism (Cylinder): +2.00, -2.00

Myopia & farsightedness (Sphere): +6.00, -6.00

If anyone wants to have a higher prescription than this, we could go higher than +/-6 on Sphere and any other Cylinder, but we will charge +10€. Total extra = 35€.

Prescription details needed:

Diopters for both Sphere & Cylinder

 Axis (in case there are some diopters on the cylinder)

Pupillary distance

Any questions, do not hesitate to reach us at hello@wolaneyewear.com or by clicking on the messenger chat below.
