story:
Sunglasses with Built-in Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker Suitable for Activities at the Most Reasonable Price 

 

 

 

Co-Branding partnership with Essilor® Sun Solution™  - IronPeak is able to offer the best performance lens at such an affordable price.

For further information on Essilor® Sun Solution™ please refer to these links below.

NXT® Link

Essilor® Sun Solution™ Link

 

 

Having our own direct sourcing line of supplies allows us to offer the reasonable price. We’ve manufactured ourselves, all the way to your door. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Now enjoy your audio and still hear your surroundings.
It is specifically suitable for outdoor activities, providing clear sounds in high decibel with open ear, keeping exposed to the ambient simultaneously.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Essilor is world leader in ophthalmic optics. 

No compromise NXT® sun lenses, from Essilor® sun solution™ protect your eyes under the most intense sunlight conditions. They are an essential accessory for combining optimal protection and unparalleled vision quality

 

As the chart above illustrates, NXT® offers incomparable quality in lense industry,
therefore exists in it’s presence within the very upscale price point.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The structure of this wearable is designed with 6 curvature to grab around your head itself instead of just sitting on your nose like other regular sunglasses, allowing stable fit while in active gestures so It will stretch a bit as well. How it operates can be likened to a bow with tension 

 

 

Cushioned Stable and Non-Slip Secure

 

As a manufacturer of eyewear industry, we insist that the inner side of the temple should not have any parts sticking out, to ensure comfort and stability in wearing experience. Having that even surface on the inner side of the leg will block transducer from constant contact to your skin prevent inconvenience and resistance. 

 

 

 

 

Nowadays Sports Sunglasses needs to stay in fashion as well. Even with all different functions who wants to put ugly pair of shades on?

Temple is kept in it’s elegant form, with sensual Steel-line Design, Asymmetrical sides - unique and constructed with moderate design tech. Glamour and Classy look will go well with any daily look of the day, will help you make the statement every time. 

 

 

 

 

As for the prescription power operations, adjunct professor with certified opticians are working closely to craft the lenses for best quality eye protection. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From the drop-down menu for lens selection, select the last option ‘colors: Upgrade add-on’ - Right after you choose Frame & Lens option, and Press ‘Continue to Payment’ - next page will lead you to detail page before you check out which at the bottom* it will show ‘perks you may also like’ Please add the perks that you wish to upgrade!

 

 

 

 

 

It's for everyone, 
it's for those who like playing sports, 
it's for those who ride cycles, 
for those who like skateboarding, fashion etc.

 

 

 

EUROPEAN FIT IS ALSO SAME FIT FOR USA, CANADA, UNITED KINGDOM ETC

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meet our people who makes it happen
Our Team finds true satisfaction in bringing quality product to life. 

 

CEO & Optometrist ​Ryan Lee 

With over 10 years of background in the optical field, we came to realize and understand the
correlation of our daily life and the eye wear. I started looking at how we can create wearables
and keeping optical identity at the same time.

Our intense focus for more than 3 years was solely on developing wearable technologies by applying
our traditional business. 
And they’re finally combined to work together in harmony without compromising integrity. 
IronPeak is going to re-define wearable as a practical and keeping it essential.

 

Manager Jiyeon Lee 

How great of a product can our technology allow to create? 
All suffered last step has not been a technical problem, rather about compatibility. 
We were finally able to succeed in reaching the goal with featured strengths of our company. 
I believe will present a new aspects of life! 

 

Associate Mi Jang

Good People Make Good Stuff. 

Our Team has developed this product with such zeal and affection which has influenced me and I am confident it will bring influence beyond satisfactory to you as well. 

 

Designer Yong An

As the fundamental concept of “Fashion look But Sports Oriented” 
I was constantly striving to create attractive designs for majority of audience.  
The “Coast” has truly proved to be the result of our steady efforts ! 

 

Production Manager

As for me I believe that there is no big hidden secret to a successful product development.
Only the countless tests and simulations should be repeated based on technical knowledge 
and experience. These are my specialty! 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We believe that there exist set of rules for manufacturing. Should have “Technologies, Facilities, Experts, Trusted partners, Patience along with Passion”.

 

I am confident that we have abundant experience that can combine these criteria  to work properly in unity. There were also many challenges establishing these systems. However, one thing has never changed. It’s the credibility to our customers and we can call it dignity at our side. This goal has never been changed since then.

 

1. Sun Lens & Prescription Lens

You can trust the quality of our sun lenses and prescription lenses as we’re partnered up with the leading company in the optical industry. 

Essilor® Sun Solution™ lenses are geared with high protection against sun glare, made from some of the best materials in the world. 

Also, our lenses offer the best combination of optical clarity and high resistance.

 

2. Certification & Testing

Efforts and passion can prove nothing. All the related parts and the products must undergo considerable number of  tests and pass the standards and regulations by the ‘ Officially authorized organizations ’ that grants the legitimacy of the product. Some are finished and some are proceeding now. It shows where we are and when we can ship!

 

3. Manufacturing

Manufacturing can always face unexpected circumstances.10 years of manufacturing experience in the optical industry give us great confidence and guidelines.

 

4. Supply Chain Risk

We were active in the sports sunglasses industry in Korea til now. And we feel really assured with the quality of product when it comes to domestic production . Sometimes it’s inefficient and unmanageable when producing aboard. 

Most of the new parts for this project is also controlled by domestic companies and already finished assessment.

 

5. Wraparound ergonomic design

 We constantly made revisions on way to approach "Wrap-around Ergonomic Design" which is the subject in its own right. Wearable device should be comfortable just like your ordinary sunglasses. It was also the great challenge for us to make wearable by keeping its essential properties. We finally achieved our goal after tons of moke-ups being made and tested out.

Some are finished and some are proceeding now. It shows where we are and when we can ship! 3. ManufacturingManufacturing can always face unexpected circumstances.10 years of manufacturing experience in the optical industry give us great confidence and guidelines. 4. Supply Chain RiskWe were active in the sports sunglasses industry in Korea til now. And we feel really assured with the quality of product when it comes to domestic production . Sometimes it’s inefficient and unmanageable when producing aboard. Most of the new parts for this project is also controlled by domestic companies and already finished assessment. 5. Wraparound ergonomic design We constantly made revisions on way to approach "Wrap-around Ergonomic Design" which is the subject in its own right. Wearable device should be comfortable just like your ordinary sunglasses. It was also the great challenge for us to make wearable by keeping its essential properties. We finally achieved our goal after tons of moke-ups being made and tested out.

story:
Our Story

In 2014, the Peshawari Chappal became the focus of a worldwide fashion debate when British designer Sir Paul Smith created a similar shoe, retailing at £300, which caused thousands of complaints on social media saying the shoe appropriated the culture and craft of its original Pakistani makers. After a strongly supported petition towards the designer and UK government, the shoe’s description on the website was changed to say it was “inspired by Peshawari Chappal”.

As a British-born Pakistani, I want to combat the disrespectful stealing of cultural ideas in fashion without any due credit. The Peshawari Chappal is a sandal that I have fond memories of wearing throughout my life, at celebrations like Eid and family weddings as well as day to day. It’s my dream to modernise this traditional sandal: by maintaining the cultural heritage of Pakistan and introducing the shoes to women around the world who would love to wear them too. 

We’re putting this dream into action through everything we do as a business; right down to our name, Çaplait. The Peshawari Chappal is called “saplay” by the local people in the region of Pakistan where the sandal originates. We wanted to honour Pakistani heritage by keeping the traditional name, while adding our own modern and fashionable twist with a French translation.

 

Ethical Fashion Matters

From the off, we are placing the Peshawari Chappal artisans at the heart of everything we do. The Peshawari Chappal would not exist without the multi-talented Pakistani artisans who craft them. This is not fast fashion. Our major motivator for this campaign is to ensure that the artisans are working in ethical conditions, are properly credited and fairly paid for their creations.

Handcrafted footwear is a dying trade. The artisans in Pakistan that we’re working with are worried that their craft, which has been passed down across the generations, is losing out to large commercial factories. By supporting Çaplait Shoes, you’ll be financially helping the Pakistani artisans to continue creating these beautiful shoes.

 

Rewards and Stretch Goals

None of the work we’re aiming to achieve will be possible without the support of our Kickstarter backers, so to show our gratitude we’ve got some fantastic rewards on offer! Here are the rewards you’ll be receiving by pledging to support our Kickstarter campaign.

If we raise over and above our £10k target, here’s what we’ll be able to achieve: 

  • Travel to Pakistan to see our vendors in person and begin working on our Spring/Summer 2018 collection 
  • Build a larger team of passionate individuals to work in the Çaplait Shoes team 
  • Expand into a collection of men’s sandals, as we’ve already had many enquiries about this!

 

Testimonials

We’ve already had brilliant feedback from the designers, stockists and customers who have seen prototypes of our shoes and learnt about our company mission.

"It's fresh! Very chic, comfortable and affordable all at once with a very beautiful story to tell." - Jessica Beecham, Luxury Footwear Designer 

"A passion for ethical production and appreciation of good design is rare in the fashion industry, Çaplait Shoes are a unique company" - Alice Selwood, Textile Designer

"In the current world of fast-fashion, handcraft skills are quickly being forgotten. I believe it is so important to hold onto these skills and introduce quality products back to the western market. I’m extremely proud to be a part of Çaplait as the goal is not only to create a brand of beautiful items, but also to give back to the communities in Pakistan who are blessed with these incredible skills." - Charlotte Crombie, Textile Designer 

"You just cannot ignore the brilliant creativity and imagination shown by Çaplait’s design team - a blend of modern and traditional design, while never forgetting the heart and soul of the Peshawari sandal." - Anser Wasim, Director at Quadri Group

story:
CAMPAIGN ENDS at 1st of june 2015 


Live stream of 2015 European Youth Ultimate Championships in frankfurt

EUF youth committee and the tournament director Robert Pesch wants to livestream the European Youth Ultimate Championships in Frankfurt/Main Germany.

Coverage will be done by frisbeesport.playo.tv,  who covered the last two eucf  with 5 HD cameras, lots of replays and a native speaking and ultimate experieced commentator.

See examples for the qualitee on frisbeesport.playo.tv

To cover friday and the final day with 3 finals we need to collect at least 3000 Euro.

That is the supposed streaming- schedule:

friday, 7th of august 2015:

  • 10:00 tbd
  • 12:00 tbd
  • 14:00 semifinale  tdb
  • 16:00 semifinale tdb
  • 18:00 Final U17 open
saturday, 8th of august 2015:
  • 12:00 Final U17 girls
  • 14:00 Final U20 Women
  • 16:00 Final U20 Open

Your ways to support that project:

  1. Spend 3,- Euro as a spectator and you will get a free ticket for the hole live coverage on friday and saturday. You can watch all games as video on demand after the tournament lifelong.  The regular price for that ticket is 5,- Euro, so youre saving is 2,- Euro.
  2. Spend 50,- Euro as a team, country, federation and you will get 20 free single tickets for the hole live coverage on friday and saturday. You can watch all games as video on demand after the tournament lifelong.  The regular price for that ticket is 5,- Euro each , so youre saving is 50,- Euro.
  3. Spend 300,- Euro or more as a company and you will get two 20sec. commercialspots at each covered game. For more details contact: robert.pesch@gmail.com
  4. Spend as much as you want as a real supporter to make the livestream and high quality video coverage happen.
Thanks a lot to all supporters in advance.

Robert Pesch and the EUF Youth Ultimate Committee

story:
Introduce Origami wallet made from a single piece leather

We created a wallet requiring no stitching but something that was practical and durable as well as stylish and minimalistic.



The wallet contains the essentials: 
- slots for multiple cards.
- 2 compartment for money.
- secret compartment.







Ideal for a special occasion gift!




Functional minimalist wallet comfortable for everyday carry 






Wallet is crafted from quality leather. Combining rugged durability with a minimalist aesthetic a wallet without stitches cut from a single piece of leather,  held together securely via tuck.




100% quality leather 

Origami will serve you for many years        





 

   10 cm x 7 cm 



When creating our wallet, we were inspired by Japanese origami arts.
Our vision is
- Simplicity and minimalism
- reliability and durability
- The use of quality materials







Origami is very simple to manufacture. Therefore, we are confident that we will not have problems with the production of origami. We'll make it yourself on our equipment. Your origami will be sent certified mail. We are in full readiness. And we are ready to start producing and shipping immediately after completion of the project!

story:
SUNZs:  Amazing High-Tech Watch Buckle!  

      by SUNZs Inc.


SUNZs is a watch buckle which you can get the easy connects with your smart phone. let your life nice and cool. Sunzs can be used to unlock phones, open specific app , and quick UI…


This is the evolution to improve your traditional watch!!

It perfect fit in 20-24mm watchband, and 6 standard colour are available. You can mix and match your own cool style. Let’s use sunzs becomes smart guy, enjoy the life of cool, stylish and high security!


SUNZs Apps


Colourful Lock Screen 

                  SUNZs Gallery Lock                                    SUNZs File Lock

    

SUNZs QUICK UI

Open your favourite apps


Many many apps…….


No charging required, high security!

SUNZs never need to charge!


The SUNZs's Components

SUNZs adopted the high quality NFC chip –NTAG 203 which is compatible with most of Andriod smart phone.

For more, you can check if your phone or tablets carries NFC from this list: http://www.nfcworld.com/nfc-phones-list/

High Quality nfc chip NTAG 203

12mm WIDTH x 19mm HIGH x 0.3mm Thin 

And, SUNZs is made of well quality PC plastic which is light weight and durable.

SUNZs without Logo


Our Story

We love our plastic watch, especially pebble watch, and want to add some incredible value on it and don't want to affect the original design. So, we undertook some researches and developments for the SUNZs arround 6 months, and started prototyping on a 3D printer for many times, finally we seek a best way to improve our life without cost a lot.  

This is SUNZs ,it totally fit our goal!   

The simplest ,The most powerful!

SUNZs was created to unlock phone, protect private data easily and open your favourite apps. We all fall in love with this, we hope you like it also!!


Our Goals

We are very excited to share our stretch goals!


USD 34K -  The band new SUNZs with six standard colours and Unlock screen, Lock private file apps and QUICK UI.       

USD 45K  -  New 3 special colour provide for backers choice, let our customer easy to mix and match your style 

USD 62K -   Launch Extra Size sunzs choice for backers, compatible with bigger watchband.

USD 83K  -  We plan to provide complete functional app for Iphone 6 or Win phone, we look forward with it!


SUNZs's Schedule



The Future What's Next?


We focus on NFC technology, as we believe it is an amazing technology. And, we also are exciting for the iphone 6 with NFC function. We are pleased to develop more and more NFC products for improving our life. Wearable device also is our target, we are looking forward that you will use our product every days and share with others.

When we develop SUNZs, we encountered three main challenges. 

One is nfc chip ,two is manufacturing and final one is apps designing. 

We found so many factories, as we need a nfc chip whose size can install in SUNZs, fortunately we found it although it is more expensive but we want to provide good quality product to our customers so we chose it. As we know that your satisfactory is our motivation.

Another challenges is how to control the quality of manufacturing,

We have a meeting with many factories, they suggested many ways to assembly this product. finally we chose the most expensive way because product quality is our most concern.

The final challenge is apps. We want to provide attractive and convenient user experience to our customers so we made this wonderful lock screen and we also know privacy is the most concern of our customers, so we provide gallery lock and file lock.

Nowadays people like to use smart phone with large screen, so we want to make something which can let our customer use their phone more easily and efficiency. The QUICK UI aim for it, when you use SUNZs tap behind your smart phone ,the QUICK UI will pop up immediately, you can default eight apps into two pages as your favourite. 


FAQ

story:
The FABLED, FOREST PLUM, GILDED, and TWILIGHT GLOW Stags will start the campaign, the TWILIGHT GLOW Stag is only available with a purchase of the complete 4 pin set! 

The pins (if any remain after the campaign) will be sold for a few dollars more post-IndieGoGo so backers are getting a discount (PLUS any unlocked bonus items that every physical reward backer gets for free!)

 

The Pins

All the pins will be (unless noted otherwise):

•Black Nickel metal 

•Soft enamel 

•Approx 2.25 inches 

•with double posts, rubber clutches, and backing card included

•Logo & artist signature engraved on the backside

•Limited edition sequential numbering

 

Stretch Goals & Other Artwork

Loving the new designs? Depending on how well our campaign goes, we have stretch goals for even more variants! Pledge early and keep your eye on the stretch goals that are achieved for even more options. If these stretch goals are unlocked, there will even be additional stretch goals if the campaign gets to that level! 

We greatly appreciate your time and support and please share this campaign on your social media accounts and spread the word – remember, more pledges means more variants and more options for you! 

Thank you again and see you on the festival fairgrounds!

 

Risks & Challenges

This isn't our first rodeo – We have worked with the same manufacturer who has always been not only very quick with deliveries but prints top-quality pins. We are always extremely happy with their work! 
However, we understand there are always risks. Pin shipment being delayed due to unforeseen circumstances or manufacturing problems, etc. 
Though these occasions do occur in pin printing we assure you if any problem does occur, we'll make sure to update all backers straight away and work diligently until the problem is corrected.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! If you'd like to support our projects you can:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you again all so much and I hope you enjoyed visiting our campaign!

story:
A BLEND OF PASSION & LUXURY WITH A WATCH 

 

 

CHICK & ELEGANT LIKE A PARISIAN STYLE

 

THE DESIGN

 

 

DETAIL, ELEGANT & LUXURY

 

 

OUR COLLECTION

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

 

True love stories never have endings.....

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Launching a watch on crowdfunding terms lowers the overall cost even further as the production quantities of each model are set before manufacturing even starts, thus eliminating overproduction and reducing the marketing cost significantly. We have spent countless hours in the preparation of this campaign and have chosen carefully our partners to guarantee a seamless timeline to deliver your watch from the factory to your home without any luxury retail markup. But sometimes forecasts don’t always work as initially planned. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know and solve the problem immediately. Furthermore, we promise complete transparency, and we will communicate on a regular basis with our backers.

 

Distributors & Retailers

  • If you are interested in collaboration with Antonio Bogggati feel free to send us your proposal at info@antonioboggati.com

story:
★★★ISPO BRANDNEW FINALISTS 2016-2017★★★

                                      

★★★The Easy Life Belt is made of very durable military cotton webbing, minimal shaped metal buckle, stylish leather label and finally for this belt specially developed durable elastic which is main part of this product. This part in front of the belt is flexible at exactly determined area which means that it is gently stretched at each body move (e.g. at seating, folding, sheltering, …). That’s why the belt is breathing together with you and your body in all your activities!

  • HOW IT WORKS!


  •  How do you measure your waist?

 Making Sure you are NOT wearing a belt while doing this, put a measuring tape through your pant/skirt loops and wrap it around your waist. Because you don’t want your new belt to interfere with your breath, inhale deeply and then measure your girth. Where the tape end meets the rest of the band, you will read your bodily circumference. That will be the size you need to provide when ordering your new belt.


  • OUR STORY 

Behind the name GIPSY AND CLOWN stands Jaka one of the last qualified tailors in Europe and his girl Janja.

Janja is fashion designer and adores sewing and designing of the clothes.

 Jaka started his education in early age and he earned his first snowboard and motocross bike when he was only seven years old in a home workshop, where he energetically drew knowledge. 

They are very well educated textile designers, lovers of extreme sports, nature and animals. In free time they also love to paint and create music.

Idea about Easy Life Belt was born when Jaka had enough feeling that classic belt limited him in his work and sport activities. Than they found out that people sit more and more each day - some of them even 14 hours a day. Based on this finding they immediately started to work. After a number of trials they created unique Gipsy and Clown belt – Easy Life Belt. 

This belt is the only belt in the world, which has inserted the elastic part. The elastic part is located at the front of the belt, because in that part of the body the physical workload is the biggest.

Jaka found manufacturer of high quality military cotton webbing and experts who helped him to develop unique durable elastic part of the belt (which was developed for this belt only). He and his friends tested this belt for more than one year. They were impressed about it and they would not replace it any more for the ordinary belt. When the belt received first positive feedback and fans, it was time for a design. The belt is designed with a lot of sense and love for street wear.

EASY LIFE BELT breathes with the user. The belt has positive effect on a daily life, user´s feelings and emotions. You can use it during work, sport or any other free activity you like!

  •  SUPPORT us and become a part of our circus!  

You will get the first belt that breathes with you! Try Easy Life Belt and you'll see. You'll never replace it anymore. Breathe with us!

  • SPECIAL THANKS!

  VIDEO   : KREATIVINE - MARKO PIRC

   FOTO    : DARKO PAVLOVIC, MATIJA OVSENEK

  MUSIC   : LAREN POLIC

  SOUND  : GREGA SVABIC

   ACTORS: GIPSY AND CLOWN

 ★★★THANKS FOR SHARING★★★


Risks and challenges

We already have some experiences with crowdfundings and from now everything worked well so don't you worry! :) But if any of issue happens we will definitely take care that you will be informed at the right time and we'll do all necessary that you'll  get your belt as soon as possible. We will stay in close touch with you the whole campaign and the whole time of production and delivery! :)
story_txt:
★★★ISPO BRANDNEW FINALISTS 2016-2017★★★                                      ★★★The Easy Life Belt is made of very durable military cotton webbing, minimal shaped metal buckle, stylish leather label and finally for this belt specially developed durable elastic which is main part of this product. This part in front of the belt is flexible at exactly determined area which means that it is gently stretched at each body move (e.g. at seating, folding, sheltering, …). That’s why the belt is breathing together with you and your body in all your activities!HOW IT WORKS!



 How do you measure your waist? Making Sure you are NOT wearing a belt while doing this, put a measuring tape through your pant/skirt loops and wrap it around your waist. Because you don’t want your new belt to interfere with your breath, inhale deeply and then measure your girth. Where the tape end meets the rest of the band, you will read your bodily circumference. That will be the size you need to provide when ordering your new belt.







OUR STORY 
Behind the name GIPSY AND CLOWN stands Jaka one of the last qualified tailors in Europe and his girl Janja.
Janja is fashion designer and adores sewing and designing of the clothes.

 Jaka started his education in early age and he earned his first snowboard and motocross bike when he was only seven years old in a home workshop, where he energetically drew knowledge. 
They are very well educated textile designers, lovers of extreme sports, nature and animals. In free time they also love to paint and create music.

Idea about Easy Life Belt was born when Jaka had enough feeling that classic belt limited him in his work and sport activities. Than they found out that people sit more and more each day - some of them even 14 hours a day. Based on this finding they immediately started to work. After a number of trials they created unique Gipsy and Clown belt – Easy Life Belt. 


This belt is the only belt in the world, which has inserted the elastic part. The elastic part is located at the front of the belt, because in that part of the body the physical workload is the biggest.
Jaka found manufacturer of high quality military cotton webbing and experts who helped him to develop unique durable elastic part of the belt (which was developed for this belt only). He and his friends tested this belt for more than one year. They were impressed about it and they would not replace it any more for the ordinary belt. When the belt received first positive feedback and fans, it was time for a design. The belt is designed with a lot of sense and love for street wear.
EASY LIFE BELT breathes with the user. The belt has positive effect on a daily life, user´s feelings and emotions. You can use it during work, sport or any other free activity you like! SUPPORT us and become a part of our circus!  You will get the first belt that breathes with you! Try Easy Life Belt and you'll see. You'll never replace it anymore. Breathe with us!SPECIAL THANKS!  VIDEO   : KREATIVINE - MARKO PIRC   FOTO    : DARKO PAVLOVIC, MATIJA OVSENEK  MUSIC   : LAREN POLIC  SOUND  : GREGA SVABIC   ACTORS: GIPSY AND CLOWN ★★★THANKS FOR SHARING★★★Risks and challengesWe already have some experiences with crowdfundings and from now everything worked well so don't you worry! :) But if any of issue happens we will definitely take care that you will be informed at the right time and we'll do all necessary that you'll  get your belt as soon as possible. We will stay in close touch with you the whole campaign and the whole time of production and delivery! :)

story:
What are we doing?

We’re developing the software that allows the technology in a smartphone to function as a panic button or personal alarm. It will serve purpose to anybody who could be liable to an emergency that may not be with someone at the time or able to contact someone for help.

The launch version of the app will have two key features:

  • Panic Button - at the touch of a button, you can send a pre-written SMS to a family member, friend or carer.

  • Check-up - you set a check-up time, which could be 3 hours for example. If the phone hasn't sensed in movement in that time, the app will send you a push notification to check up on you. If you fail to dismiss this notification after a minute, an SMS will automatically be sent to your emergency contact.

The app will cost £1.99 when launched. Everyone who contributes to this page will receive it for free.

If you contribute £8 or more, you will receive access first.

How losing my grandmother inspired this.

Losing a family member to a stroke put this medical emergency close to my heart. My nan became incapacitated, and due to human-error when someone tried to check on her, she spent over 12 long hours in an arm-chair whilst she should have been receiving medical attention. The permanent neurological damage was too severe and she died three days later.

We will never know how different the outcome could have been if emergency services were contacted sooner.

Strokes are hereditary which means my family and I are more at risk of experiencing this in our lifetime.

There are a huge range of personal alarm systems available, but if you hadn't experienced any warning signs in the past, you’d probably find it difficult to justify the huge cost.

How can a smartphone help?

The technology in our phones is greater, in some respects, to that of personal alarm systems. These can cost in excess of £1000 once you take into account installation and ongoing fees. This is not a justifiable impulse-buy for a seemingly healthy human-being and is often out of reach of those who are in need.

Ownership of smartphones has increased dramatically amongst 45+ groups to 34% and 18% for 55+ groups. That has nearly doubled in two years.

In theory, people could be suffering life-threatening circumstances whilst already in possession of the hardware that can save them… I find that an extremely sad estimation.

We've made these awesome t-shirts to reward our key supporters with. Think high-quality American Apparel material, available in all sizes between XXS up to 3XL.


Smart Alert Tee available in black or white


Five-Year Plan

We’re brimming with future ideas for follow-up versions and even hardware. You won't just be investing in the launch of this app, but the entirety of our future. Here's our five-year plan:

Year 1 - Launch Smart Alert app as described above.

Year 3 - Introduce accompanying hardware / wearable items.

Year 5 - Build response call-centre to help deal with emergencies.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk this project faces is not hitting its funding target. Sounds like I'm stating the obvious, doesn't it?

Our research speaking to people and professionals from stroke survivor groups to the leading charities, there's a huge appeal for this app to be made.

Launch date: we've allowed extra time for testing to ensure that we're launching the most robust application possible. There's always a chance that projects can overrun, we hope that this contingency period will cover any unforeseen circumstances.


Product changes: the two main features of the app outlined are what we call our 'minimal viable product'. We've set our funding target relatively low to use this as a stepping stone. There are a huge number of other features that we'd love to launch with, but they may have to wait until future versions. Who knows, if this project exceeds its funding target, we may well add exciting new features to the launch!

story:
FINAL MATCH® is a designer brand by Sungmin Kim. He thinks we always face the final matches that are related to our profession. FINAL MATCH supplies accessories for you to win all the matches.  "Never back down" is the brand motto. Please support us, we will show you something special. 

 

Designer will touch VS up 

VS backpack you are seeing on this campaign is considered final prototype. It is very close to the finished product you’ll receive. But the minor details of design may be subject to final alterations and/or modifications based on our passion to supply designer engineered products.

These will be modified.  Date: 7-10-2018

  • Delete the white FINAL MATCH logo calligraphy on the top of side V.  Because it is too strong looking. We will replace it with our official logo and reduce the size and move it to the proper position.

 

 

 

"Change without changing backpack"

 

 

 

 

VS is the most stunning convertible backpack we’ve ever seen before. We can skip the steps that we change backpacks. No more repetition. VS is one but two backpacks. It takes only three steps to change without taking any stuff out. Now we save time, energy, necessities and more with VS.  

 

Two designs in one backpack

VS is designed to switch the front of the backpack, so it can be V or S design backpack. We don't need to change it at home anymore. We are able to match them for our outfit whenever and wherever we want. 

 

 

 

Two different fabrics & colors

Nobody knows until you tell them VS is one backpack. Fabrics of V and S is absolutely different. We also can see the Black and dark navy color in V and S. They are going to match with most of our outfits.  If side V doesn't match with your outfit, just flip to side S on the way you go.

 

Available Colorway

(*Side V is solid black)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We don't need to take anything out

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

We Change without changing backpacks.

It is VS.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Features 

 

  • MEASUREMENTS

12(w) x 19(h) x 6.7(d)inch / 31(w) x 49(h) x 17(d)cm  

  • FABRIC

Outer: Nylon Twill / Inner: Nylon Satin

  • Weight

30.16 oz / 855g

 

ㆍVS system™ : Innovative features to switch backpacks’ design to another with three steps.

 

ㆍExterior front zipper pocket ( V and S share the same compartment, so we don’t need to flip again to take stuff out) 

ㆍFabrics of side V and S are water-repellent and waterproof coated to prevent accidental damage from rain or beverage pouring.  (*Don't try to put it in water. Wipe out all the water on fabric with a towel. We don’t guarantee the damage from water. )

 

ㆍMulti-function adjustable Top handle : 

  1. Adjust strap not to slip on the shoulder
  2. Use as carrying handle
  3. Slide over the luggage handles to move freely on travel.

 

ㆍEarphone & Sunglasses holder on the shoulder strap

 

ㆍ U-shape puller for a comfortable grip.

 

  • Padded adjustable shoulder strap
  • Padded air mesh back panel

 

Interior features

  • Spacious main compartment with dual zip closure
  • Padded and soft fabric laptop compartment for up-to a 15.6″ laptop
  • Padded and soft fabric for a Tablet PC pocket
  • Three open pockets for a wallet, laptop power adapter, External battery and so on.

 

ㆍAll the zippers and sliders from YKK brand which supplies the best quality of zippers to the world. 

 

VS backpack is Made in Korea

Korea is as known as one of the best quality bag manufacturing countries. The artisans have unbelievable technics and pride in craftsmanship. VS has very complex structures, so VS will be made by their hand. There are geographical benefits either. BAGPERCENT company is placed in Bucheon city where next to the factories. We can constantly proceed the quality check to make high-end quality on VS backpack.

  

 

 

 

The story of VS backpack

 
 

Background

I have many things to carry, so I always bring a backpack. I have four more at home. I asked myself. Why do I have five backpacks? Because I have the various "me" like a bag designer at the workplace and a fashionable man out of office. Backpacks are my identity and taste, so I want to wear different designs as I change my clothes.  Changing backpack was not a big deal before I realize some problems. The worst thing is every single time I change it, I repeat the same actions. Take out all the stuff and repack. Again and again. Through my life, I spent too much time and energy on changing them. Moreover, USB, documents, keys, a wallet or pens should be in the backpack, yet they were at home. That wouldn’t happen if I didn’t do it. So I began to draw a design of backpack that can solve the problems. VS is the result of the concept, and I put all of my experiences into VS as a bag designer.

 

 Backpacks become fashion accessories. We change them to use for a suitable occasion or to match our outfit for the day. 

 

 

 

but still, this is not changed.

 

 

 

 

Again!

Again!

Again!

 

 

 

 

We lose the most valuable things. They are our time and energy. To change backpack, we take stuff out and put them in the new backpack. And we double check in case we miss something. We get stress and lose our psychological and physical energy while we are doing it. All these processes take about 30 seconds to 10 minutes to accomplish. Even though we think it's done, we forget important things like USB, documents, a charger, pens, medicines or books. When we really need them, they are at home.    

 

 

No more repetition.

Change your backpack on the go.

 

It's VS backpack.

 

 

 

Satisfaction guaranteed

We are experts in bags. We will put all of our experiences and passion into VS backpack. Thank you very much for your supporting.  When you have it, you feel this is the perfect bag you've been waiting for.   

 

Shipping

We ships VS backpack to worldwide. When we start to shipping, it will take 2-7days to get your country. It may take a little longer by the customs. We will give you the tracking numbers.

 

Local Duties, Taxes, and Fees 

VS backpack is shipped from South Korea. Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes. Please note that contributors are responsible for any taxes and duties related to their shipping country.

 

Warranty

We offer 1-year warranty on VS backpack against manufacturing defects. In the unlikely event of defects appearing in VS backpack, we will promptly repair or replace it. E-mail us with photos of the defect and the receipt to finalmatch@finalmatch.style, and we will let you know the next step. We will consider exchanges only on a case-by-case basis. This warranty doesn't cover accidental damage, normal fading, and product damage that are a result from abuse of the product, or improper use.

 

Return Policy

We do not offer refunds or returns on VS backpack that were received as a Indiegogo perk. As you've known, Indiegogo rewards are a thanks for supporting project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. 

 

 

 

 

Links to FINAL MATCH│VS backpack

story:
NEVER WAS SO EASY TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR EARPHONES

Everyone in the world loves music, it inspires, excites and takes us to other places. For you, music lovers, taking care of your earphones is essential and we know that it can be a big deal because of the dust, water and other factors and specially, the irritating tangle.

That’s why you will love BAGEE. It will manage to keep your earphones in order, untangled, clean and safe from water and other liquids and the best part is that it fits into your pocket or almost anywhere. You will do anything you want without worrying about the protection of your earphones.

ALWAYS WITH YOU

BAGEE is so simple, small and flexible, it easily adapts to your lifestyle. No matter what kind of things do, you can take BAGEE with you inside your pocket, your backpack or anywhere to everywhere.

And the best part is that it is waterproof, so you won’t have to worry if it is raining or that kind of stuff.

IT IS FAST AND SIMPLE

We designed BAGEE in simplicity. Just wrap the cable of your earphones around three fingers, take the speakers into the BAGEE’s-pocket and then take the whole wrapped cable into your BAGEE and close it with the paracord knot. When you want to listen to music just open your BAGEE and pull your speakers out, you will see your earphones going out untangled.



Designed to last. Waterproof + paracord knots

BAGEE is made of waterproof cloth, it has lightweight and strong paracord which has 80 lb. safe working load, so it can resist in any condition.

Why BAGEE?

We started this project because we saw and tested other similar products but they were complicated and slow to use, they were missing something. The majority only offers you to keep untangled your earphones but they sacrifice their protection and even worse: when you wrap them you may break the cable because it can be too tight. So we decided to change that and design the solution and that’s when BAGEE appeared. We are sure that you will love BAGEE as much as we do.

BAGEE soul


Testimonials

Project timeline

story:
** PRE-SALE**

20% AW2012 on Heritage1960

 

 

 

** WORLD HUMANITARIAN DAY**

CLAIM $20 - receive the NEEDLE Pendant

Unisex - White silver 

Add Shipping : $5.15 US / $17 International

 

** NEW PERKS **

CLAIM $90 - Receive the TABOURET RING

Unisex - White silver two finger ring + Wood

Add Shipping : $5.15 US / $17 International

 

CLAIM $50 - Receive the COWRIS RING

Unisex - White silver adjustible ring

Add Shipping : $5.15 US / $17 International

 

Help Loza Maléombho New York "re-brand" African-made apparel and empower Ivorian women

 

Loza Maléombho New York is a women's contemporary fashion line based in New york and producing in Côte d'ivoire (W. Africa) We deliver quality and culturally eclectic garments to an international fashionista.

 

OUR VISION →

1. Redefine the quality of W. African's products in the eyes of the rest of the world

Loza Maléombho's signature is the exclusive structured jacket. These jackets are fabricated in 50 - 100 pieces only and are the rendition of detailed craftsmanship. The patterns are professionally made by experienced pattern makers in New York City and sent out to our workshop in Côte d'Ivoire where we conduct ongoing training programs on cutting, sewing and pattern assembly.

Loza Maléombho also includes a line of seperate: Pants, skirts and dresses as shown above, which fit within a contemporary price range.

2. Empower Ivorian women in order to levitate their social and economic conditions.

When a lower class african woman is provided with a job she re-invests in her children's education and improve the quality of life in her home and community. Also, to remunerate ONE African is to feed an average of SEVEN people. (The average African household)

Backing ourselves with this consensus, Loza Maléombho New York will find social and economic solutions for development in Côte d'Ivoire. 

 

OUR METHOD →

1. HIRE WOMEN FULL TIME // Because of limited funding (Out of my own pocket..lol) All of our women have been working on a freelance basis. However in order for our vision to be efficient and long lasting we need to provide them with a full time salary.

2. PROVIDE FAIR WAGE // Keep in mind ONE person feeds SEVEN so in theory, providing 10 women with a paid job will feed 70.  There is no room for under paying solutions!!

3. MAINTAIN ETHICS // NO CHILD LABOR and safe and enjoyable working conditions. An ethical working environment promotes enthusiasm and ambition.  

 

OUR GOAL → 

Our ULTIMATE goal is to raise $100,000 which will provide for

  • 12 PROFESSIONAL SEWING MACHINES
  •  PRODUCTION COST FOR SPRING 2013
  •  FULL TIME PAYROLL
  •  WORKSHOP RENOVATIONS
  •  NY SHOWROOM

Our SHY goal is to raise $25,000 which will provide for

  • 12 PROFESSIONAL SEWING MACHINES
  •  PRODUCTION COST FOR SPRING 2013
  •  FREELANCE PAYROLL  

 

YOUR PERKS →

Claim $200  and receive the NOMAD TROUSER

Help Loza Maléombho New York "re-brand" African-made apparel and empower Ivorian women
 

Loza Maléombho New York is a women's contemporary fashion line based in New york and producing in Côte d'ivoire (W. Africa) We deliver quality and culturally eclectic garments to an international fashionista.
 

OUR VISION →

1. Redefine the quality of W. African's products in the eyes of the rest of the world

Loza Maléombho's signature is the exclusive structured jacket. These jackets are fabricated in 50 - 100 pieces only and are the rendition of detailed craftsmanship. The patterns are professionally made by experienced pattern makers in New York City and sent out to our workshop in Côte d'Ivoire where we conduct ongoing training programs on cutting, sewing and pattern assembly.


Loza Maléombho also includes a line of seperate: Pants, skirts and dresses as shown above, which fit within a contemporary price range.
2. Empower Ivorian women in order to levitate their social and economic conditions.

When a lower class african woman is provided with a job she re-invests in her children's education and improve the quality of life in her home and community. Also, to remunerate ONE African is to feed an average of SEVEN people. (The average African household)
Backing ourselves with this consensus, Loza Maléombho New York will find social and economic solutions for development in Côte d'Ivoire. 
 

OUR METHOD →

1. HIRE WOMEN FULL TIME // Because of limited funding (Out of my own pocket..lol) All of our women have been working on a freelance basis. However in order for our vision to be efficient and long lasting we need to provide them with a full time salary.
2. PROVIDE FAIR WAGE // Keep in mind ONE person feeds SEVEN so in theory, providing 10 women with a paid job will feed 70.  There is no room for under paying solutions!!
3. MAINTAIN ETHICS // NO CHILD LABOR and safe and enjoyable working conditions. An ethical working environment promotes enthusiasm and ambition.  
 

OUR GOAL → 

Our ULTIMATE goal is to raise $100,000 which will provide for

12 PROFESSIONAL SEWING MACHINES
 PRODUCTION COST FOR SPRING 2013

 FULL TIME PAYROLL

 WORKSHOP RENOVATIONS
 NY SHOWROOM

story:
Mission


About


We are a team of designers with a fresh take on industrial waste. We give the leftover materials from industrial production a new lease of life by designing products from what would normally be thrown away. Interested in ecology and the stories behind products, we think it’s essential to be part of the solution to a growing problem. So we do what we believe in: we save materials, produce beauty and deliver happiness. That’s Contiqua. 


Perks


Card Sleeve


A great companion designed to fit in the inner pocket of your jacket or the back pocket of your jeans. Easily swallows six credit cards and a pack of business cards. It’s so minimalist that many gents replace their wallets with it. If you tend to carry a gazillion cards that don’t fit in your wallet, this is a perfect solution.

  • Made of organic premium quality leather
  • Six separate card slots
  • One compartment for business cards or extra notes
  • Size: 95 x 76 mm




iCover


Give your phone a bit of style and some extra protection. This cover is specifically designed for the smaller of the two phones, the iPhone 6. And if you’re used to hitting the streets with nothing more than your phone, the small pocket for a few banknotes comes in handy.

  • Fits iPhone 6
  • Made of organic premium quality leather
  • One compartment for notes or anything foldable
  • Size: 85 x 115 mm






Classic Wallet


Contiqua’s Classic Wallet is a timeless piece with a modern twist. Our designer set out on an unique mission: create a wallet from a small bit of leftover leather. She pushed her creative limits and came up with something unexpected.

It’s a gem, an example of state-of-the-art craftsmanship designed to hold cards and bank notes. The classical lines of the wallet are enhanced by details such as beveled corners and contrasting inner colours.

  • Made of organic premium quality leather
  • Compartment for notes (fits all currencies, no divider)
  • Ten separate card slots
  • Two handy compartments hidden behind the card slots (for extra cards or anything you want to keep private)
  • Size: 97 x 208 mm




Coin Wallet


Contiqua’s coin wallet is another timeless piece that complements the Classic Wallet. If you’re tired of coins rattling in your pocket, here’s the solution: dump your change in the coin tray, slide the credit cards in the slots and you’re still left with plenty of room for bank notes and things you want to keep private. And enjoy the enhancing details like beveled corners and contrasting inner colours.

  • Made of organic premium quality leather
  • Compartment for notes (fits all currencies, no divider)
  • Five separate card slots
  • Neat coin pocket
  • Size: 97 x 208 mm




Leather Waste

These are bits of leather left over from manufacturing state-of-the-art furniture. It’s perfect, top-quality material that’s just too small to be used.

We had a choice - trash it or save it. We choose the latter. By turning it into new leather products like wallets, card sleeves or phone covers. Are you with us?



Design

Mili Havrlantova | Designer



Coffee anytime, anywhere for Early Birds


Being one of the Early Birds means more than a good feeling and a unique thing in the hand. Whenever you bump into someone of our team -- and show them something with our ‘No 1’ sign, a wallet, for example -- they’re obliged to have a coffee with you.


Budget






Fulfillment Timeline





Pricing

Colour Choice


As soon as our campaign is finished, we’ll send you an email to ask in which colours you’d like your products.  For now, you can have them in black or black-blue. As we reach the stretchgoal, new colours will be added.


Technicalities


Free Worldwide Shipping

That is all there is to say about it.

Delivery

We’re creating very precise products for you. It’s a demanding process which might be [somewhat] delayed from time to time -- for example when a third party deliveries aren’t on time. But don’t worry, we have enough spare time in our schedule to meet the guaranteed delivery by the end of July.

VAT & Taxes

We are at home in Prague, the Czech Republic, in the very heart of Europe. That means our prices include the VAT.


Stretchgoals


$20 000 New Colour


A new colour combination for everybody to choose from. We will held a populatity vote on our facebook page and you will pick the next colour we add. The options are: dark brown, black-red, black-grey, dark brown-orange, lighg brown and more.
$30 000 Neat Packing


Fine design packing for every wallet, iCase or card sleeve. Minimalistic cut with silver logotype and magnetic fastening.

$40 000 | $50 000  | $60 000... New Colours

Plus one colour option for everyone.


Join us

www.contiqua.co


                    

Special thanks to:
David Brada, Zdenek Rudolsky, Zdenek Brisuda, Petr Vitek, Lucie Fenclova, Viktoriia Rozsokha, Salwa Benaissa, Martin Andrle, Mili Havrlantova, Petr Vagner, Martina Fialkova, Josef Fialka...
Team members of Impact HUB Prague, Brno and Ostrava

$40 000 | $50 000  | $60 000... New Colours

Join us

story:
Who are we? A fashion brand founded a year ago by Hilla Yachimoviz Kadmon and Ido Kadmon.

The concept behind this Tel Avivian brand is simple: offering a solution for women who are seeking a clean, tailored look without those awkward bulky layers.


It all started when Hilla, a fashion journalist stood in front of her closet one day and thought to herself: "Girl, this wardrobe really needs a change". 

As one who loves playing mix and match with her items (which fashionista doesn't?) she was looking for this little twist that will make the difference. The idea popped into her head: collars are the perfect solution – a little addition that can change the whole look, that can be very stylish yet super neat. 

Hilla has started to develop this unique product, grabbing her husband Ido to walk with her in this new entrepreneurs path and be a part of the journey. As most men, he didn't quite understand what is this weird shirt that his wife insist to call "the next best thing' , but quickly he got the hang of it and became in charge of the logistics and financial departments in the venture. 



So basically, we're reinventing the Dickey. Collar bibs have been around for over 120 years, and were very popular in Europe and the US – known as detachable collar, Chemisette, and of course a Dickey.

What makes NEAT unique is the design: In the past a collar was worn like an apron, but each Neat Collar is dressed as a vest – making it the perfect fashion accessory to wear under a shirt, to combine high fashion and maximum comfort.


Delivered worldwide, you can find these collars on business women, lawyers, religious women and fashionistas – the one product offers different solutions to customers all around the globe.

NEW COLLECTION >>

A fresh new line of collars, to be worn like a sport bra – has three different looks that you can play with. You can wear it with or without a bra, closed, semi open or even backwards. 

Neat is also planning to expand - designing a men collection and a teen collection.


Perks

We are proud to offer our loyal backers wholesale pricing on our collar vests.







FAQ

When will I receive my Neat Collar? Assuming that the campaign will reach its goal - and we're optimistic of course, we will begin production and deliver the perks as soon as the campaign is over (September 15, 2016). Shipment will start at September 2016. 

How do I specify the size and style of my Neat Collar perk?

After your purchase we will ask you via e-mail your size, color and design of your preference.

Can I get more than one perk? 

Each purchase of a perk is a new transaction, so all you need to do is to click on the perk, fill in your info, and buy it. Then, go back and select the other perk you wanted, and repeat the process.

EXCHANGE POLICY

If you follow the size chart carefully, then the collars should fit you. Still, if you wish to exchange your item for any reason, we’ll happily do that - you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Returns: You'll not get a refund on items that we're purchased on Indiegogo.

story:
What is CAUSe?

 

Our Values

*CAUSe bags come with their own dust bag for safe storage*

Dimensions: 6.69” (H) x 6.69” (W) x 0.95” (D)

Features: Magnetic closure card pocket, Secure phone pocket, Adjustable strap, Easy Metal adjustment knob, External slip pocket. 

 

Dimensions:  8” (L) x 8” (H) x 3” (D)

Features: Tote- style handle, Removable cross body strap, Zip closure, Interior phone pocket.

 

Dimensions: 11” (L) x 6.5” (W) x 3” (D)

Features: Adjustable strap, Metal buckle closure, Front quick access pocket, Exterior zip pocket, Interior accessory compartments (x2), Interior zipper compartment.

 

Dimensions: 9” (L) x 17.5” (W) x 8” (D)

Features: Removable shoulder strap, Exterior card pocket, Exterior quick access pocket, Shoe compartment, Conjoining handle button closure, Waterproof lining.

 

*Colours displayed are representations of the official colourways*

 

Our Materials

 

With your support...

 

Launch Timeline

How can you help?

 

REWARDS

 

Risks and Challenges

CAUSe is a new venture that is made of a team of determined individuals who have their own simplistic uniqueness. The CAUSe team is working with professional establishments and factories in preparation for our launch to provide the best possible versions of our bags. We know that there will be obstacles and challenges along the way and we are ready to face them head on. With a our new venture we are consistently testing our products to make they are not only stylish but functional! We are reaching the end of our prototyping stage and are making the final changes to our simplistically unique bags. The CAUSe team is prepared to receive and fill orders and cannot wait to share our bags with our early supporters!

 

Schedule changes

Our team works with punctual and professional factories that  are prepared for us to place our purchase orders. We have a scheduled timeline that allows us to launch between mid May 2020 to June 2020 week 1. We have created this time period to allow for our team to process, organize, and package orders to maintain our brand standards before sending our bags to our backers. At CAUSe we treat all of our supporters like family and we value honest communication. We are excited to communicate with our backers to share our journey and will continuously provide updates in regard to potential delays in production or shipping.  

 

Design changes 

In preparation for our official launch we are finalizing the design of our bags which includes expanding on the colour palette and designs of our bags. The CAUSe team is working to make sure that our bags are ready and at their best for our backers. We will not be making major changes, the bags will be as represented above. Our bags come in a wide range of colours and it is important for backers to consider the colour representations of our bags shown above. Customers will have the chance to choose their chosen colourway and confirm before orders are shipped out. Also note that "Web exclusive colourways" are not available for the prelaunch period but can be found on our site Causeishere.ca when the site is officially launched in MAY 2020.

 

Duties & Taxes

CAUSe is a brand that is based in Canada, which is the location which our orders are shipping from. Duties fees or taxes may be applied from your delivery carrier in relation to where our backers live. In the case of any duty fees or charges, they are the responsibility of the backer who must contact their corresponding delivery carrier upon arrival of your package.

 

Returns & Exchanges 

Unfortunately at this stage we will not be processing any returns or exchanges on product purchased/ received from the prelaunch period or the webs launch. However, the CAUSe team is a small family that wants to work to inspire our backers and we are available to communicate in the case of an issue with a product. We strive to provide the best version of our bags for our backers but if any questions or issues occur we would be glad to chat. Feel free to email us at connect@causeishere.ca

See you this Summer 2020!

story:
Our Story

Community Shields/SHLD is a collaborative effort to support our community through innovation and design. Our team is comprised of highly skilled fabricators and machine shop operators with over 50 years of combined experience in crafting technical solutions to complex problems. We've also had 2 successful Kickstarter campaigns. The Air Lever and the Stompump.

We first started making plastic face shields over 3 months ago to address the nation wide PPE shortage. Since then we have fabricated and shipped over 15,000 face shields nationwide free of charge to essential medical workers. We launched this Indiegogo campaign to obtain funding to create designs and die-cut units to quickly and easily produce more needed PPE.  As we transition to the next phase of re-opening, we are committed to ensuring that essential workers, schools, businesses, and communities have the protections they need to reopen. 

3 Unique Face Shields for any Life Situation

We're offering 3 face shields that can protect you and your community. With the state of the world, it's more important to protect ourselves and stay safe than it ever has been.

 

3/4 Face Coverage, for adults and kids -

Covers nose, mouth, and eyes. Easy to wear and put on/take off.

 

 

 

 

Full Face for Glasses-

Works with glasses and has full coverage for more protection. 

 

Full Face Coverage, Medical Issue -

For use in situations where you want maximum coverage and protection.

We've Done This Before -

Projects like this are nothing new for us. We've created or been involved with hundreds of consumer products and a couple of successful Kickstarter campaigns. We're also part of a group of volunteers that spent time and money to get PPE to Medical staff and Frontline workers. We helped flatten the Curve in our community. 

 

Product Development is our Bag -

It takes time and plenty of revisions to get a product right. To get a consumer product ready for release takes time and experience. The key to our Face Shields is their simplicity and ease of use. We've based these products on a low cost and scaleable model. We really want to make sure that essential protection is available to all.

 

We're Committed to our Communities

We're so committed to our communities that we're willing to donate 1 Face shield for each one sold to a School or Medical facility in need. To us, this is key to keeping our communities safe and connected.

 

We have stock and are Shipping Now!

We know that protections for our communities are needed now. That's why we've tooled up and made our Shields available and ready for shipping!

 

Risks and challenges

We've opened tooling and will begin production shortly after the launch of this campaign. Our goal is to begin delivering Face Shields within days of our campaign closing. This requires some creative forecasting by our team and our suppliers. Over the last 10 years, the crew at SHLD/Communityshields.com has been involved in the development of hundreds of products you may use every day. With each product, there are always unforeseen challenges. We have tried to mitigate as many challenges as we could predict. SHLD has spent the last 6 months getting our line of face shields ready for production. This includes engineering, designing, prototyping, testing, and tooling for the product. The Face Shields we've come up with have been universally praised by our testers, early reviewers, and doctors & medical professionals. We have sourced only the best materials for our Shields. We have engaged contract manufacturers with a strong history of hitting timelines and exceptional quality control. Most importantly, We have existing relationships and proven track records with these suppliers. While we are thoroughly confident in our process, each product carries unique risks and challenges. For SHLD, this includes: - Potential for packaging and or tooling modifications - Packaging or shipping delays SHLD Inc. has a sum of 35 years of delivering exceptional products to end-users and clients. We will not sacrifice quality. If we encounter any issues with our product, we will immediately communicate with our backers, providing them all information about the delay and options available. Our experience and history of delivering successful products to market illustrates our ability to deliver to all our backers within the defined timeline while maintaining exceptional service, quality, and support. Our commitment to you, as our backers, is frequent and transparent communication throughout this process, and the assurance you are completely thrilled with the product.

Reusability and recyclability

Our Face Shields easy to clean and maintain. Furthermore, they are made with PET plastic that is highly recyclable and used in many post-consumer products. Check with your local refuse service to understand how best to recycle PET Plastics.
story_txt:
Our Story
Community Shields/SHLD is a collaborative effort to support our community through innovation and design. Our team is comprised of highly skilled fabricators and machine shop operators with over 50 years of combined experience in crafting technical solutions to complex problems. We've also had 2 successful Kickstarter campaigns. The Air Lever and the Stompump.
We first started making plastic face shields over 3 months ago to address the nation wide PPE shortage. Since then we have fabricated and shipped over 15,000 face shields nationwide free of charge to essential medical workers. We launched this Indiegogo campaign to obtain funding to create designs and die-cut units to quickly and easily produce more needed PPE.  As we transition to the next phase of re-opening, we are committed to ensuring that essential workers, schools, businesses, and communities have the protections they need to reopen. 

3 Unique Face Shields for any Life Situation
We're offering 3 face shields that can protect you and your community. With the state of the world, it's more important to protect ourselves and stay safe than it ever has been.
 
3/4 Face Coverage, for adults and kids -
Covers nose, mouth, and eyes. Easy to wear and put on/take off.

 


 

 

 
Full Face for Glasses-
Works with glasses and has full coverage for more protection. 




 
Full Face Coverage, Medical Issue -
For use in situations where you want maximum coverage and protection.




We've Done This Before -
Projects like this are nothing new for us. We've created or been involved with hundreds of consumer products and a couple of successful Kickstarter campaigns. We're also part of a group of volunteers that spent time and money to get PPE to Medical staff and Frontline workers. We helped flatten the Curve in our community. 


 
Product Development is our Bag -
It takes time and plenty of revisions to get a product right. To get a consumer product ready for release takes time and experience. The key to our Face Shields is their simplicity and ease of use. We've based these products on a low cost and scaleable model. We really want to make sure that essential protection is available to all.

We have engaged contract manufacturers with a strong history of hitting timelines and exceptional quality control. Most importantly, We have existing relationships and proven track records with these suppliers. While we are thoroughly confident in our process, each product carries unique risks and challenges. For SHLD, this includes: - Potential for packaging and or tooling modifications - Packaging or shipping delays SHLD Inc. has a sum of 35 years of delivering exceptional products to end-users and clients. We will not sacrifice quality. If we encounter any issues with our product, we will immediately communicate with our backers, providing them all information about the delay and options available. Our experience and history of delivering successful products to market illustrates our ability to deliver to all our backers within the defined timeline while maintaining exceptional service, quality, and support. Our commitment to you, as our backers, is frequent and transparent communication throughout this process, and the assurance you are completely thrilled with the product.
Reusability and recyclability
Our Face Shields easy to clean and maintain. Furthermore, they are made with PET plastic that is highly recyclable and used in many post-consumer products. Check with your local refuse service to understand how best to recycle PET Plastics.

story:
Nowaday, the world is flooded with fake, and clone products everywhere. Repetitive boring industrial products seem outgun and outnumber true art. So I decided to make an exclusive designed accessory that represents your unique personality.

I’m bringing to Indiegogo not just 1 but 3 designs of the exclusive 100% pure red copper mask pendant with a genuine leather strap of your choice. The product has its own oxidized patina with the aesthetical appeal in dark brown. The patina can provide a protective covering to materials that would otherwise be damaged by corrosion or weathering. The oxidized patina of copper by nature brings a unique antique look with sheen under sun light.

The nature of pure copper itself makes it standout between bronze and brass.  Copper offers a few key advantages over brass and bronze:

1st copper is one of the few materials that will truly stand the test of time. Copper and copper alloys provide strong resistance to atmospheric exposure, such as roofing and other architectural uses, hardware, building…

2nd The second advantage of copper over brass, bronze is the true sustainability of the material from an eco-friendly perspective. Copper is the more likely material to end up being recycled AND the material holds its intrinsic value time after time, a key to true sustainability.

3rd Pure copper is more expensive and lightweight than brass and bronze.

Read the following for the comparison between copper, and brass, bronze: http://www.doityourself.com/stry/how-to-tell-the-difference-between-bronze-brass-and-copper#b

#1 Indy

The product was inspired by THE NORTHEN INDIAN MASK that associates spiritually to the wearer. For his protection, the wearer is required to follow certain sanctioned procedures in his use of the mask. He plays the role of an actor in cooperation or collaboration with the mask. Without his performing dance and posturing routines, which are often accompanied with music, the mask would remain a representation without a full life force. After putting on the mask, the wearer undergoes a psychic change and as in a trance assumes the spirit character depicted by the mask.

I found another way of wearing a mask without putting it on. Just like the real mask itself, the wearer of Indy shows a strong personality, courage and confidence of a warrior in modern age of course with the authentic aesthetical appeal.

Product dimension: 2.1 L x 2.1 W x 0.5 D (inch) and weight only 3.5 oz


#2 EIH: (EASTER ISLAND HEAD)

Many archaeologists suggest that "the statues were thus symbols of AUTHORITY and POWER, both religious and political. But they were not only symbols. To the people who erected and used them, they were actual repositories of sacred spirit. Carved stone and wooden objects in ancient Polynesian religions, when properly fashioned and ritually prepared, were believed to be charged by a magical spiritual essence called mana."Archaeologists believe that the statues were a representation of the ancient Polynesians` ancestors. The statues face away from the ocean and towards the villages as if to watch over the people. The exception is the seven Ahu Akivi which face out to sea to help travelers find the island. There is a legend that says there were seven men who waited for their king to arrive.

Hence, the EIH itself represents POWER and AUTHORITY. The pendant supposes to carry thus same spirit to enrich the prosperity of its wearer.

Product dimension: Product dimension: 2.9 L x 1.57 W x 0.7 D (inch) and weight only 3.3 oz


#3: Chief

The product was inspired by Native American Indian Chiefs, war leaders, warriors – the leading hawks of the tribe. Thus, the pendant brings to its owner a grasp of power, courage, heroism, and the greatest honor in name of the very Native American Indian Chiefs.

 Product dimension: 4.3 L x 1.96 W x 1.1 D (inch) and weight only 3.5 oz

IMAGES



About the product

Product dimension:  As mentioned above 

On the inside of the pendant, we will engrave:

  1. Our Brand name
  2. The production date
  3. The sequence of your order: example 1/200 (1 out of 200)
  4. Your name ($5 dollar value) - optional
  5. Your message ($5 dollar value) – optional & no longer than 10 words.
From a copper plate to a mask pendant without mold casting requires a very unique technique similar to one had been used by our ancestors. The process takes time and patience to put the copper plate into a specific shape if not will just crack it down into pieces by the increasing heat.



Time line

October 24 - November 24: Project time

November 24 – December 24: production, packaging, and shipping

December 24: Santa Clause is here in town. Prep your socks.

***NOTE: We will start production whenever we hit the projected goal REGARDLESS of the expiration date of our Kickstarter campaign to make sure that your Xmas presents can make it to Santa Clause on time.

Why us?

-Unique copper shaping technique.
-Limited quantities.
-Exclusive designs.
-100% pure red copper, no alloys.
-Our tremendous hunger for success.


Risks & Challenges

This is our first Indiegogo campaign. We researched well and ran through Indiegogo guidance that should make this campaign much easier. We set a very aggressive timeline to catch up with Santa Clause in Dec 25. However, if we are flooded with your huge love in term of your support, we hope that you will be a little bit more understanding for any delay in plan. In return, we definitely will inform you every bit of the progress and where your item is. Nonetheless, we just want you to know that we will work our ass off to make it on time.


    Please help us to spread the word

    Like us on .............................................http://tinyurl.com/kp9yzf2

    Pin us on ............................................http://tinyurl.com/n6o8k72

    Follow us on.......................................http://instagram.com/simon.hdang


    Why do I need your support?

    I spend tons of time to make sure that every design comes out unique, perfect, and artistic. I need funds to purchase large quantity of materials for wholesale prices, creates more tools, pays artists FOR grinding, chiseling, shaping, carving, and so on… Also funds will come to packaging and shipping the products to you my very honored customers.
