story:
At Matador, we believe that attractive and well-made briefcases should sell for sensible prices

  • Our collection combines high quality materials and construction with a tactical, military-inspired style for a set of briefcases and wallets that are designed for business and built to last
  • Our direct-to-consumer model allows us to sell our products at sensible price points by eliminating the middleman

The Flagship - Top-Zip Briefcase:

Selling Price: $145

The Outpost - Flapover Briefcase:

Selling Price: $145

The Garrison - Business Backpack:

Selling Price: $159

The Ballistic Wallet:

Selling Price: $49

Military Styling Makes for a Bold Look:

Tactical styling elements give our products a distinctive look and feel that sets them apart from anything else on the market. No other bag incorporates military features into high-end, full-featured business briefcases. 

It's an awesome look, no doubt. But there's more to Matador than good style.

Brand Inspirations:

  • We are inspired by the sacrifices our men and women in uniform make each and every day. It's truly awe-inspiring. 
  • On a more personal level, my Grandfather was a Paratrooper in the US Army during World War II. I've always felt a deep pride knowing how important his service was and what it meant to him.
  • In years past, I worked in financial services serving companies in the defense industry. I had the privilege to work alongside a number of ex-military folks who started their own businesses. Seeing the work they put into building and growing awesome companies has always stuck with me.

The Matador Advantages:

Selling direct to the consumer allows us to cut out the middleman and sell our products at sensible price points

  • Our products are produced by our carefully selected manufacturing partners, ensuring the highest quality build for every item we make
  • After production is completed, our products will ship directly to a fulfillment center where they will be housed and orders will be processed
  • Products will then be delivered directly to our customers

No middlemen. Minimal overhead. Sensible prices.

The Flagship - Open for Business

We use high-end materials and construction techniques, so our products are built to last

  • We use 1050d Cordura ballistic nylon, giving our products a smooth, professional look and feel while also ensuring incredible durability
  • Every bag uses YKK Zippers, so they’ll never get snagged and always seal up tight
  • Each bag is lined with a durable rip-stop fabric, housing your gear in a soft, but protective, shell
  • Our bags' handles are leather bound for increased comfort. Our wallet has a durable nylon exterior and a smooth leather interior

The Outpost - Packed and Ready

We infuse traditional business accessories with military-inspired design elements

  • We combine modern briefcase styling with tactical design elements for bold products that look great in an office or anywhere else your work takes you
  • Our styling is influenced by the Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment used by the US military. This can be seen in our subtle use of nylon webbing on the exteriors of our bags
  • Our bags are produced by a manufacturer that specializes in military gear. So all of our products are built to the highest standards of quality

Our collection is designed for business and built to last.

The Garrison

Our Bags:

Each bag has a secure compartment for a 15 inch laptop with plenty of room for additional files and accessories.

There are specialized slots for business cards, smart phones, tablets, and more.

Our briefcases have detachable shoulder straps and comfortable, leather-lined handles.

And each bag slides over a luggage handle so you can easily take it with you when you travel.

The Flagship:

  • Selling Price: $145
  • Dimensions: 16"L x 12.5"H x 4"D
  • Handle Drop: 3.5"

The Outpost:

  • Selling Price: $145
  • Dimensions: 16"L x 12.5"H x 3.5"D
  • Handle Drop: 1.75"

The Garrison:

  • Selling Price: $159
  • Dimensions: 18"H x 14.5"W x 8"D
  • Handle Drop: 1.5"

The Ballistic Wallet:

Ballistic nylon with leather trim

Smooth leather interior with a subtle Matador icon

Plenty of room for cards and cash

  • Selling Price: $49
  • Dimensions: 4.5"L x 3.5"H x 1/3"D (closed & empty)
  • 4 credit card slots, 2 hidden slots for extra cards, 1 ID Window
  • 2 slots for cash

Every item in our collection costs substantially less than competing products without sacrificing quality or style.

Well Made, Sensibly Priced

Wounded Warriors - The 10% Promise:

We're about more than making great products. We want to make an impact.

  • If we hit our goal, we will donate 10% of our funds to the Wounded Warrior Project. 
When you pre-order a bag or wallet or make a contribution, you're not just getting an awesome product, you're helping to make a difference. 

Want to learn more about the Wounded Warrior Project? Check out their mission statement:

"To foster the most successful, well-adjusted generation of wounded service members in our nation's history."

This is a mission we can all get behind.


This is the Final Step to Launch:

This funding will allow Matador to complete the last step of the startup process:

The Production of Inventory

To date, we have:

  • Scoured the Earth for the right suppliers, culminating in the selection of two incredible manufacturing partners
  • Designed and tested multiple prototypes to ensure every product meets our high standards of functionality, quality, and style
  • Partnered with a leading fulfillment company to ensure that our products will be shipped seamlessly to our customers

With the help of early adopters who place pre-orders and give donations, we will be ready to complete initial production runs of our collection.

Production orders placed upon the completion of our campaign will allow us to complete the production of inventory in late April. At that point, products will be shipped to the United States, processed at our fulfillment center, and delivered to our backers in May.

Matador's Long-Term Vision:

To build a carefully curated line of sensibly priced business accessories with our unique style signature 

We’ll start with briefcases and wallets and build out from there.

But none of this is possible without your support.

We hope you believe in what we're working towards and that you want to join us in building a great company. Become an early adopter and help us bring this vision to life.

Want to see more?

Like us on Facebook.

Check out our Instagram page for some additional shots of our products in the wild.

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help us reach our goal?

  • Any donation or pre-order will go a long way towards helping us succeed 
  • Share our campaign with your friends! 
  • Like our Facebook page and share it with others!
  • Don't need a bag or a wallet? Buy a tee shirt:

The Matador Logo Tee:

Have any questions? Reach out and let us know!

Post-Campaign Details:

We spent months searching for the absolute best manufacturing partners for our brand. 

Our suppliers are responsive and open with us. Through our intensive and extensive prototyping process, we've built great products and strong relationships. When you pre-order a Matador briefcase, backpack, or wallet, you're ordering a finalized product.

I am a firm believer in planning and preparation, and we have done substantial work to prepare Matador for this next phase. When we reach our goal, we'll be ready to go to place our production orders, have our inventory produced, and deliver our products to our backers.

In this first production run, we're limiting orders so as to not overwhelm our manufacturers. That way, we can be confident that our suppliers can easily meet the orders we place upon the completion of our campaign.

We have a great fulfillment partner who will work with us to ensure that our goods are carefully shipped from our manufacturers to our warehouse in the US. They will ensure that our orders are smoothly processed and that our products are delivered to our backers on a timely basis.

As we progress through our campaign and subsequently work towards production and delivery, we'll keep our backers posted on all notable updates. But don't worry, we won't spam you with junk, we value your contributions and your time and we'll work to keep you up-to-date on all major Matador milestones.

Additional Photos:

Instagram Shots:

At that point, products will be shipped to the United States, processed at our fulfillment center, and delivered to our backers in May.Matador's Long-Term Vision:To build a carefully curated line of sensibly priced business accessories with our unique style signature We’ll start with briefcases and wallets and build out from there.But none of this is possible without your support.We hope you believe in what we're working towards and that you want to join us in building a great company. Become an early adopter and help us bring this vision to life.Want to see more?Like us on Facebook.Check out our Instagram page for some additional shots of our products in the wild.
Other Ways You Can Help
Want to help us reach our goal?
Any donation or pre-order will go a long way towards helping us succeed 
Share our campaign with your friends! 
Like our Facebook page and share it with others!
Don't need a bag or a wallet? Buy a tee shirt:
The Matador Logo Tee:Have any questions? Reach out and let us know!Post-Campaign Details:We spent months searching for the absolute best manufacturing partners for our brand. Our suppliers are responsive and open with us. Through our intensive and extensive prototyping process, we've built great products and strong relationships. When you pre-order a Matador briefcase, backpack, or wallet, you're ordering a finalized product.I am a firm believer in planning and preparation, and we have done substantial work to prepare Matador for this next phase. When we reach our goal, we'll be ready to go to place our production orders, have our inventory produced, and deliver our products to our backers.In this first production run, we're limiting orders so as to not overwhelm our manufacturers. That way, we can be confident that our suppliers can easily meet the orders we place upon the completion of our campaign.We have a great fulfillment partner who will work with us to ensure that our goods are carefully shipped from our manufacturers to our warehouse in the US. They will ensure that our orders are smoothly processed and that our products are delivered to our backers on a timely basis.As we progress through our campaign and subsequently work towards production and delivery, we'll keep our backers posted on all notable updates. But don't worry, we won't spam you with junk, we value your contributions and your time and we'll work to keep you up-to-date on all major Matador milestones.Additional Photos:Instagram Shots:

story:
Welcome to the Indiegogo campaign for SAS Watch Company Ltd. We are a small watch company located in Ireland, producing professional grade watches. On offer here is our new model the SEA-02

As we progress with the production we will add photos of the new model. There is more information about us at the end of this page and if you have any questions about us or the new model, please feel free to email us sea2@saswatchco.com


We would like to introduce our new anti-magnetic professional diver: the SEA-02, the long awaited follow up to the SEA-01.


The SEA-02 encompasses everything that the SEA-01 was and more, from a more ergonomic design and a slightly smaller case size, the SEA-02 is the perfect everyday watch. We got a lot of emails from people looking for a smaller version of the SEA-01 so, we set out with the case and reduced it from 44mm diameter to a 42mm diameter, reduced the lug width from 24mm to 22mm and we have incorporated a double domed sapphire crystal.  

Every element of this watch is designed by us using the latest technology, it is manufactured to the highest standards and assembled here, in Ireland, by hand. Every watch is also regulated and tested thoroughly before it leaves.




We are offering two versions of this watch: a black dial version or a blue dial version. 

The black is a matt black and the blue is nice dark navy blue.

Both will have a metal bracelet, a rubber strap and a tool for swapping the straps.

The recommended retail price for this watch will be €900,(€1,107 incl. VAT - EU only)

but we are offering it here for €550 (€676.50 incl. VAT - EU only)

or get both for €1000 (€1,230 incl. VAT - EU only)

(*the prices are set in Euro but I believe you will see them in your currency)



Best of both worlds.  

The SEA-02 is the first Irish Made Professional divers watch on the market. This is something we have been working towards for the last number of years. But we know you want more, so on the inside we are using trusted Swiss movements.


This is our first Indigogo campaign and we want to do something special so we are keeping this special edition a limited run. We are only making this version available here and you say how many are in the limited edition.  

Once we pass the targeted amount we will only produce the amount backed. So if there are only 200 backers then we will only produce 200, or if there are 2000 then that is the amount we will make.

The caseback will be engraved with “Special Edition” and will have the serial number starting at 0001/???? (the ???? will be replaced with the final amount when the campaign finishes). To make it as fair as possible we will give the serial number in the order of when it was backed.


The case diameter is 42mm x 49mm with 22mm lugs. The height is a very comfortable 13.5mm from the bottom of the caseback to the top of the domed sapphire crystal. The strap width is 22mm. 

The case is made from 316L stainless steel and is finished in a brushed effect and has a polished top edge. The underneath is curved to sit comfortably on your wrist and the edges rounded for maximum comfort.

The crystal is a double domed sapphire. We are using a double dome to eliminate distortion when the watch is viewed from an angle and we are using sapphire crystal for its hardness and scratch resistant properties.  The crystal also has an anti-reflective coating.


The crystal is held in place with a screwed-in locking ring to prevent it popping out during decompression on commercial saturation dives. 






The rotating bezel is the most important feature for divers. It is used to time dives and is used as a back up to computers. The bezel rotates anticlockwise and with 120 clicks it is easy to line up with the hour hand. 

We design everything to be tough and durable and this especially goes for the bezel. We have deep etched the top and coated this area with black PVD. This means no matter how tough you are on your watch the bezel will always be easily read. 


We have changed the design very slightly over the old model, we have added minute marks all the way around to make it easier for divers to time their dives.


Accuracy and durability matter so we have chosen the outstanding Swiss made SW200 movement. This movement is the work horse of the Swiss watch industry and parts are easily obtained, meaning it can be serviced long into the future by any good watchmaker.  

The SW200 is a 26 jewel automatic mechanical movement, it runs on the movement of your wrist, and it has a 38 hour power reserve.



This watch uses a mechanical movement and all mechanical movements are prone to magnetism. Elements such as the hair spring can get magnetized and cause the watch to run inaccurately, so to combat this we have incorporated a shield around the movement made of Mu-metal. Mu-metal is a soft iron that is commonly used in magnetic shielding. 




This watch is capable of reaching depths of 500 meters, and can be used by both scuba divers as well as professional commercial saturation divers. We use Viton rubber seals to ensure there are no leaks.



We use sandwich construction on the dial. The dial is made up of 2 parts, the top section that has the cut-outs and a bottom section that contains the luminescent material. We use Superluminova BGW9 which is one of the brightest on the market, it is white during the day and gives off a blueish green glow at night.  

The design is based on our previous model the SEA-01 but we have removed the date to give the dial a more balanced look. This version is limited and it is only available here on Indigogo.

We are offering two colour options: a matt black dial and a deep blue dial.

This photo is from our SEA-01 model



The hand designs are a direct descendant from the SEA-01 and use the same BGW9 lume as the dial. They are easily read, both during the day and during the night. They are made from silver to catch the light and the centre section is black to match the dial to give the hands a floating effect around the dial.  


Every detail is scrutinized right down to the hundredth of a millimeter, including the exact length of the hands and the placement of the point of the minute and second hands on the minute track. 


The bracelet is an important element in the design, it has to be strong, comfortable, adjustable and look good from the depths of the ocean to the board room. We are using a “beads of rice” style band and a clasp that incorporates a ratcheting diver’s extension.  




This is a 22mm version of our popular premium rubber strap. The strap is made from natural rubber and is sourced from the leading manufacturer in rubber straps. The straps are designed by us and are inspected at every stage by us to ensure quality and suppleness.  



At SAS we want you to keep your watch and know that the weakest part of any watch are those little spring bars that hold the strap on to your watch. We hate them, they are unreliable, weak and when one breaks your watch is on the floor, or worse, the bottom of the ocean. 



So we use screwbars, 1.9mm thick bars with Allen key heads. These make changing straps easy and secure, using the provided tool. 


Every watch comes with a two-year warranty. 



The watch is presented in our leather bound box and includes the watch, metal bracelet, rubber strap, tool for changing straps, cleaning cloth and warranty card. 


We are SAS Watch Company Ltd http://saswatchco.com. We launched our first model the SEA-01 back in 2008. The SEA-01 was a 1000 meter professional divers watch and was a great success and launched us into the watch world.  

It was followed up by the AIR series which used the same case design but without the rotating bezel to give it a more elegant look.

We also set up a second brand name Míleata http://mileata.com, this is a striped down military watch. It’s tough and durable and designed to meet the requirements of military personnel.

We are very much about form and function while focusing on strength and durability. We design all the components of the case, dials, crystals, etc. and do not use off the shelf cases that you will find in a lot of other small brands.


Risks
We have a proven record of producing top quality watches, evidence of this can be found on our testimonials page http://saswatchco.com/testimonials and on our customer photos page http://saswatchco.com/news/gallery/

We have a great relationship with our different suppliers, and manufacturers, and many of the details of this watch have already been discussed and worked out, so we can get started straight away.

So with all our suppliers in place and our proven track record of producing top quality watches we can say this is a very low risk investment.


Challenges
The only challenge is the production time frame. Producing everything from scratch and the extra time involved with molds and machining can give us a longer production time, but we will keep you updated as we progress, and try to make the time fly.


All the images of the new watch are computer generated, the reason for this is we have no prototypes at this stage, we only have the computer models.
The computer models that we generate are taken from the same files that we use for the production, so they are a good representation of the finished watch. The photographs that you see are taken of our previous model the SEA-01, as they share many of the same components and give a good guide to the new model. As we progress, we will add photographs of the new components.

Thank you for reading this far :-) and thank you for your interest in our brand.



To learn a bit more about us here are a few photographs of our previous watches.

story:
Who am I?

My name is Tineke, and I'm setting up my own clothing brand. My concept: I want people to feel good about who they are and what they look like, to grow more confident, and not be afraid to speak up. To achieve this, I will need your help. More specifically, I have designed quirky cat prints, and I need money to fund them with. I am in touch with a printing company that works with several well-known Belgian fashion designers, and figured out they will charge approximately €18/m - €22 VAT included.

What We Need & What You Get

For my project, as I mentioned, I need about €1800 for 70m of fabric. On this fabric, I will have one print printed, and I will be able to make about 60 tops out of it. I will make several types of tops, and put them in my store on speakupfashion.be. If you decide on funding me, I can tell you that I will make one contribution of €60 count as a pre-order. You will be able to get one free top or T-shirt from my store, according to the models I have drawn. Of course, if you contribute €120 or another multiple of €60, you will get a multiple of free shirts. If you have any questions, you can tweet me at @SpeakUpFashion, or post on my Facebook wall. I am still in the process of having my E-mail address configured.

If I don't get to reach my goal, you will get your money back, and I will have to find a different way to get my prints printed, as my margin is too small for what this website is charging me in return for partial fund payments. It's all or nothing :-)

Also, if you decide to contribute less than €60, I'll give you a store discount and a shoutout! I need some capital for my startup, meaning in the end, I should be left with more than enough to refund all of you.

The Impact

I want to see confident people, happy kids, and smiles on everyone's faces. Customers will be able to choose their own models, according to the way they are built (I can give some advice, when desired for), so they can flaunt their figures and show off what they have. Feel beautiful. Be beautiful. Have the confidence to speak up!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk, to me, is not finding customers. I hope, by offering discounts and free T-shirts, to get people excited about my project, build up clientele, gain publicity, and get started. There are no risks for you; if I don't get to reach my goal, you will get a full refund.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share my campaign and my cause on your Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Google + and whatever more social networking websites you may be a member of. Help me make some noise!

THANK YOU

story:
- Proto is a combination of gadgets that you choose to carry with you throughout the day. Each one is different. Each one can be customized. How you build your wallet is up to you.





              We're constantly coming up with cool inventions that we use personally everyday. So we thought maybe other people would like them too? "Proto" is an idea that came to us when we were trying to solve the problem of every gadget coming in its own shape and bulky size. 
            
              If I wanted to carry a charger for my phone, a bottle opener, or something for my keys then I would probably run out of space in my pockets. That's where our idea came in. We designed gadgets - from the ground up - to all be the same size and as thin and durable as possible.





Proto is unlike anything on the market. It gives you the ability to choose what you want to carry, and when you want to carry it. Not going to a place where you need your keys? Leave the key holder attachment at home. Don't need your wallet with you? Simply detach it and toss it aside. With the many color choices available, your Proto Wallet is completely customizable and tailored to your lifestyle







Each attachment features four strong magnets located on the four corners of the gadget. The top of each plate has a pivot point that protrudes slightly from the surface. The bottom of each plate has an exact same point that sinks into the surface (much like a LEGO). These features, along with the magnets, allow the gadgets to snap together and stay perfectly aligned. The entire thickness of all four modules connected together is only 3/4 of an inch. 

The Multi-Tool is the only gadget that does not have magnets on the four corners. This can be done because of a special type of stainless steel that is magnetic. 

Weight Comparison: The four modules connected together weight in at approximately 7.1 oz. (201.3 g).

-Magnets: To learn how the magnets won't affect your credit card or phone, check the FAQ at the bottom of the page










The whole purpose of a portable phone charger is to be able to charge your phone on the go. So why should you have to carry around a four foot phone cable with it? We didn't think you should, which is why the phone charger we designed has its own cable built into the device. It will be able to accurately and quickly recharge your phone from its lithium-ion rechargeable battery. We have designed two models - one with an Apple Lightning Connector, and one with a Micro-USB Connector. We've also included an ultra bright LED flashlight on the opposite end of the charger, just because we could. 

Size: 4 x 2.375 x 1/4 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 6.35 mm)

Shell: Anodized aluminum

Battery: Lithium Polymer

Battery Capacity: 2000 mAh +

Connection Type: Micro-USB (compatible with all Android phones) 

or Apple Lightning Connector (compatible with iPhone 5, 5S, 6) 

Weight: approx. 2.3 oz. (65.2 g)



Forged out of strong stainless steel and given a close brushed finish, the Multi-Tool not only adds functionality to your everyday carry but also elegance in its design. Featuring a bottle opener, ten hex nut fasteners (five in metric and five in english), a protractor, and a straight edge with both centimeter and inch markings - the Multi-Tool will be sure to impress. Think of something you'd like to see included on the Multi-Tool? Be sure to let us know and we'll consider adding it to the design!

Size: 4 x 2.375 x 1/16 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 1.59 mm)

Material: Stainless Steel (Magnetic)

Finish: Brushed with laser engraved markings

Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g) 


CNC machined from anodized aluminum, the key holder proves to be a unique alternative to carrying your keys - allowing you to quickly add and remove the keys that you use on a regular basis. The four machined key slots on the ends of the key holder provide an easy means of storing the keys you use everyday. The design of the key holder and the strength at which it will hold the keys you place into it means that you are no longer sacrificing functionality for personality. 

Size:4 x 2.375 x 3/16 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 4.76 mm)

Shell: Anodized aluminum

Key Capacity: Four standard keys 

Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g)




The Proto wallet combines what everyone wants to see in a minimalist, functional product. Using high quality elastic paired with anodized aluminum plates, the Proto wallet ensures that your valuables remain safe while keeping its sleek profile. Designed to expand, the wallet will be able to hold one card as easily as it holds many. The unique shape means that accessing your money and cards is as easy as sliding them out after breaking the magnetic connection. 

                                                           



Size:4 x 2.375 x 1/4 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 6.35 mm)

Shell: Anodized aluminum

Internal: Three high-quality elastic bands 

Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g)



    Our Team


    We are a team of mechanical engineers with a goal of developing exciting new products for consumers. We are located in Toledo, Ohio and attend the University of Toledo. We have spent nearly a year in the design and preparation stage of our product in order to make sure everything runs as seamless as possible. With your help, we will pay for manufacturing costs and make this product a reality. 


    Where The Funds Are Going

    $20,000 seems like a huge number, but we need every bit of it to get the best possible pricing for our backers. The more we raise, the better the quality and price of our product will be. That being said, you're probably wondering where its all going? Here's the current breakdown of what we're going to use the funds for:

    • 4% to Indiegogo. They have to make money too. About $800 will be paid to Indiegogo for allowing us to use their site to reach backers. 
    • 86% to manufactures for tooling costs and parts. Some of our products require little to no tooling costs, however, the ones that do are expensive. About $17,200 will be paid to manufactures for tooling costs and initial product costs. 
    • 10% for shipping. $2,000 will be paid for shipping charges and warehouse costs. We're outsourcing our shipping so that our product can reach backers as quick as possible.


    Frequently Asked Questions


    How do I select what color I want?

    We will contact you at the end of the campaign to record your color choices. The Multi-Tool is the only attachment that does not have a color choice. This is because it is stainless steel so it can't really be colored.

    Can I change my perk?

    Unfortunately, not during the campaign. Each contribution made is recorded as a separate contribution with a separate perk. If you would like to receive a new perk, you can do this in a separate contribution.

    I forgot to pay for international shipping. What should I do?

    No problem. We've teamed up with BackerKit to get your product to you as fast as possible. After the campaign, they will email you to finalize the details. If you owe any remaining balances, they will notify you. 

    Can I get multiple perks?

    Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want. Once BackerKit emails you to finalize information, you can also choose to add additional perks from the email. 

    How do I select which connector I want for the phone charger?

    At the end of the campaign we will ask each backer what phone charger model they want. The Micro-USB or the Apple Lightning. 

    How strong will the magnets hold the attachments together?

    The magnetic strength contained in the rare earth magnets we use is very strong, but only when the magnets come into contact with each other. This makes it hard to pull the attachments straight off, but rather easy to twist them off. 

    Will the magnets damage my phone or credit card?

    The short answer: no they won't. The magnets are strong when connected to other magnets, however, by themselves they don't emit a strong enough magnetic field to be destructive. Phones are only destroyed by magnets if they are industrial sized magnets (these small magnets don't even come close). [http://blog.first4magnets.com/will-a-magnet-dam...]

    Credit cards are a different issue. For a credit card's information to be wiped it would have to come into direct contact with the magnet and actually be rubbed until it was unreadable. All together your credit cards will be perfectly safe inside the wallet as the magnets are not strong enough to get past the aluminum casing they are pressed into. 


    Risks And Challenges 

    As with any creative project there are going to be risks and challenges that arise. With our team of engineers and well qualified manufactures, we believe that we are more than able to tackle any obstacles with this project that we come across. We don't expect any delays but will notify backers immediately if something comes up. Your support of this Indiegogo project is much appreciated. Thank you!
story_txt:
- Proto is a combination of gadgets that you choose to carry with you throughout the day. Each one is different. Each one can be customized. How you build your wallet is up to you.









              We're constantly coming up with cool inventions that we use personally everyday. So we thought maybe other people would like them too? "Proto" is an idea that came to us when we were trying to solve the problem of every gadget coming in its own shape and bulky size. 

            

              If I wanted to carry a charger for my phone, a bottle opener, or something for my keys then I would probably run out of space in my pockets. That's where our idea came in. We designed gadgets - from the ground up - to all be the same size and as thin and durable as possible.
Proto is unlike anything on the market. It gives you the ability to choose what you want to carry, and when you want to carry it. Not going to a place where you need your keys? Leave the key holder attachment at home. Don't need your wallet with you? Simply detach it and toss it aside. With the many color choices available, your Proto Wallet is completely customizable and tailored to your lifestyle






















Each attachment features four strong magnets located on the four corners of the gadget. The top of each plate has a pivot point that protrudes slightly from the surface. The bottom of each plate has an exact same point that sinks into the surface (much like a LEGO). These features, along with the magnets, allow the gadgets to snap together and stay perfectly aligned. The entire thickness of all four modules connected together is only 3/4 of an inch. 
The Multi-Tool is the only gadget that does not have magnets on the four corners. This can be done because of a special type of stainless steel that is magnetic. 
Weight Comparison: The four modules connected together weight in at approximately 7.1 oz. (201.3 g). 
-Magnets: To learn how the magnets won't affect your credit card or phone, check the FAQ at the bottom of the page












The whole purpose of a portable phone charger is to be able to charge your phone on the go. So why should you have to carry around a four foot phone cable with it? We didn't think you should, which is why the phone charger we designed has its own cable built into the device. It will be able to accurately and quickly recharge your phone from its lithium-ion rechargeable battery. We have designed two models - one with an Apple Lightning Connector, and one with a Micro-USB Connector. We've also included an ultra bright LED flashlight on the opposite end of the charger, just because we could. 

Size: 4 x 2.375 x 1/4 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 6.35 mm)
Shell: Anodized aluminum
Battery: Lithium Polymer
Battery Capacity: 2000 mAh +
Connection Type: Micro-USB (compatible with all Android phones) 
or Apple Lightning Connector (compatible with iPhone 5, 5S, 6) 
Weight: approx. 2.3 oz. (65.2 g)


Forged out of strong stainless steel and given a close brushed finish, the Multi-Tool not only adds functionality to your everyday carry but also elegance in its design. Featuring a bottle opener, ten hex nut fasteners (five in metric and five in english), a protractor, and a straight edge with both centimeter and inch markings - the Multi-Tool will be sure to impress. Think of something you'd like to see included on the Multi-Tool? Be sure to let us know and we'll consider adding it to the design!


Size: 4 x 2.375 x 1/16 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 1.59 mm)
Material: Stainless Steel (Magnetic)
Finish: Brushed with laser engraved markings
Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g) 







CNC machined from anodized aluminum, the key holder proves to be a unique alternative to carrying your keys - allowing you to quickly add and remove the keys that you use on a regular basis. The four machined key slots on the ends of the key holder provide an easy means of storing the keys you use everyday. The design of the key holder and the strength at which it will hold the keys you place into it means that you are no longer sacrificing functionality for personality. 

Size:4 x 2.375 x 3/16 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 4.76 mm)
Shell: Anodized aluminum
Key Capacity: Four standard keys 
Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g)





The Proto wallet combines what everyone wants to see in a minimalist, functional product. Using high quality elastic paired with anodized aluminum plates, the Proto wallet ensures that your valuables remain safe while keeping its sleek profile. Designed to expand, the wallet will be able to hold one card as easily as it holds many. The unique shape means that accessing your money and cards is as easy as sliding them out after breaking the magnetic connection. 

                                                           

Size:4 x 2.375 x 1/4 inch (101.6 x 60.33 x 6.35 mm)
Shell: Anodized aluminum
Internal: Three high-quality elastic bands 
Weight: approx. 1.6 oz. (45.4 g)










Our Team


We are a team of mechanical engineers with a goal of developing exciting new products for consumers. We are located in Toledo, Ohio and attend the University of Toledo. We have spent nearly a year in the design and preparation stage of our product in order to make sure everything runs as seamless as possible. With your help, we will pay for manufacturing costs and make this product a reality. 





Where The Funds Are Going
$20,000 seems like a huge number, but we need every bit of it to 
get the best possible pricing for our backers. The more we raise, the 
better the quality and price of our product will be. That being said, 
you're probably wondering where its all going? Here's the current 
breakdown of what we're going to use the funds for:


4% to Indiegogo. They have to make money too. About $800 will be 
paid to Indiegogo for allowing us to use their site to reach backers. 
86% to manufactures for tooling costs and parts. Some of our 
products require little to no tooling costs, however, the ones that do 
are expensive. About $17,200 will be paid to manufactures for tooling 
costs and initial product costs. 
10% for shipping. $2,000 will be paid for shipping charges and 
warehouse costs. We're outsourcing our shipping so that our product can 
reach backers as quick as possible.

We will contact you at the end of the campaign to record your color choices. The Multi-Tool is the only attachment that does not have a color choice. This is because it is stainless steel so it can't really be colored.

Can I change my perk?
Unfortunately, not during the campaign. Each contribution made is recorded as a separate contribution with a separate perk. If you would like to receive a new perk, you can do this in a separate contribution.

I forgot to pay for international shipping. What should I do?
No problem. We've teamed up with BackerKit to get your product to you as fast as possible. After the campaign, they will email you to finalize the details. If you owe any remaining balances, they will notify you. 

Can I get multiple perks?
Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want. Once BackerKit emails you to finalize information, you can also choose to add additional perks from the email. 
How do I select which connector I want for the phone charger?
At the end of the campaign we will ask each backer what phone charger model they want. The Micro-USB or the Apple Lightning. 
How strong will the magnets hold the attachments together?
The magnetic strength contained in the rare earth magnets we use is very strong, but only when the magnets come into contact with each other. This makes it hard to pull the attachments straight off, but rather easy to twist them off.

Phones are only destroyed by magnets if they are industrial sized magnets (these small magnets don't even come close). [http://blog.first4magnets.com/will-a-magnet-dam...]
Credit cards are a different issue. For a credit card's information to be wiped it would have to come into direct contact with the magnet and actually be rubbed until it was unreadable. All together your credit cards will be perfectly safe inside the wallet as the magnets are not strong enough to get past the aluminum casing they are pressed into. 


Risks And Challenges 
As with any creative project there are going to be risks and challenges that arise. With our team of engineers and well qualified manufactures, we believe that we are more than able to tackle any obstacles with this project that we come across. We don't expect any delays but will notify backers immediately if something comes up. Your support of this Indiegogo project is much appreciated. Thank you!

story:
INLU creates playful shoes handcrafted by exceptionally talented Portuguese artisans. Did you know almost all the top-end brands manufacture in Portugal? Nature was our inspiration, together with a promising material: the highly versatile cork. 

Our first collection is composed of men’s derbies and women’s mules and boots. With several variations and a multitude of colours, INLU shoes are perfect for those who love their style to exude personality.

MAN DERBIES

These versatile lace-up derbies fuse premium Italian leather with fine Portuguese cork fabric. Wear them with or without fringes depending on your look of the day. The soles are made of a lightweight microfibre combined with an outsole grip of 100% rubber for more traction and resistance in everyday wear.

WOMAN MULES

Our pointed toe slip-on mules are handcrafted in Portugal. A trendy style that seamlessly combines premium leather with vibrant coloured cork fabric, as well as soft suede and an innovative new material made out of cork sand and silver glitter. They also come with a leather contrast color lining and cushioned insole for extra comfort. Heel height: 1cm.

WOMAN BOOTS

These timeless round toe medium heel boots will grant you a standout look. The fun combination of materials and contrast colours make these boots impossible to miss. They are finished with a fine leather sole and elegant gold zipper closure on the side. Heel height: 5cm.

 

Designed to be a classic round toe low heel ankle boot with a refreshing twist, our bootie boots are the perfect balance between flair and simplicity. They have a gold zipper closure and INLU's statement contrast color lining. Heel height: 1cm.

If you are looking for shoes that are stylish, comfortable, affordable that use high-end raw materials, INLU is your perfect match.

1. NATURAL AND RECYCABLE MATERIAL - CORK

Combining cork with leather gave us the opportunity to present shoes with a modern twist. Cork is light, durable, soft and recyclable. Our top Portuguese partner knows how to explore cork’s true potential and to create our unique colors. 

2. 1 PAIR OF SHOES = 1 TREE

Back in the summer of 2017, Portugal had a tragic year concerning summer fires where more than 750 thousand acres of forest were lost and more than 100 people’s lives were taken. INLU made the commitement of planting one tree per each pair sold, and so joined Plant a Tree, a Portuguese NGO that develops a volunteer program dedicated to promoting and conserving the Portuguese native forest, as well as the indigenous plant species. 

3. FAIR TRADE + TRANSPARENCY

Our values are clear: collaboration, respect, trust, quality, kindness. We want to do the right things in the right way. Not the cheap way, nor the fast way. We are actively part of the #FashionRevolution international movement, showing you not only the hands but also the faces of our Portuguese talent. 

Skilled artisans create our shoes in Portugal. We stand for a high standard of ethics, fair salaries, and humanism in the workplace, so we joined the #FashionRevolution movement.

These are the faces of our dream team – all strong and determined women totally committed to the brand.

Inês Lebre has an extensive background in Consultancy and Entrepreneurship. The concept of INLU came from a deep desire to create a brand based on offbeat designs using unique materials, and crafted in her home country, Portugal.

Ana Fatia is an industrial designer; she thrives on the art of transforming raw materials. Ana was recognized as a young talent in 2012 during Milano Design Week and at "Now! Le off!," the Cité de la Mode et du Design on Paris Design Week.

As Rita Pinho puts it, “all I know is how to make shoes.” Rita makes sure her father's craftsmanship legacy stays alive and that their factory incorporate the most innovative processes and machines. Her international clients, with no exception, value the consistency in their quality, and so does INLU.

It took us 9 months to get here. After all, developing a new idea and bringing it to life is never easy. Once we get the funds from Indiegogo and your email with the order specifications, we can focus on the production. March 2019 is the latest date we expect to ship. Our partner is DHL express so once we send it from Portugal you can count on a delivery from 1-2 working days. Fast right?

The more you back, the more environmentally friendly we can be. If we reach $ 250,000, then 16,000 trees will be planted. Can you imagine? And for each stretch goal, we have compelling surprises, such as more variations and colours, an exclusive pair of socks and the ability to vote on the models of the '19 collection. 

The earlier you buy, the bigger is the discount you get. If you can grab one of the first 120 limited super early birds you get 50% off retail price. If you couldn't grab the first 120, you can always buy early bird at an also interesting 35% off. A very cool option is to join a friend and get 40% off for 2 pairs or if you convince your entire family or group of friends to get the 45% or the 50% for 4 or 9 pairs. Go ahead, don't be shy. 

All of our shoes fit true to size. If you take a half-size, please go up to the nearest whole size.

     

                         

We understand that is tricky to ask for trust when a brand is new in the market. But with this campaign we are not starting from scratch. We have already been successfully crowdfunded at Kickstarter and with those funds we already started production. We still go conservative on the delivery dates as we would rather give you a good surprise and deliver earlier than break our promisse. We rely on our dream team to produce a perfect product and we are all on board to make sure that everything goes as planned. We will be in touch with you regularly (and will send photos)! We can´t wait. :)

A very cool option is to join a friend and get 40% off for 2 pairs or if you convince your entire family or group of friends to get the 45% or the 50% for 4 or 9 pairs. Go ahead, don't be shy. All of our shoes fit true to size. If you take a half-size, please go up to the nearest whole size.

We have already been successfully crowdfunded at Kickstarter and with those funds we already started production. We still go conservative on the delivery dates as we would rather give you a good surprise and deliver earlier than break our promisse. We rely on our dream team to produce a perfect product and we are all on board to make sure that everything goes as planned. We will be in touch with you regularly (and will send photos)! We can´t wait. :)

story:
We are F&W Style, a small start up luxury leather handbag company based in Atlanta, Georgia, founded by wife, and mom of two, Alexandria Alli. We create well-crafted, colorful, luxury handbags for women without the $1000 price tag. For seven years now F&W Style handbags has become the go to brand for busy women on the go!

We have created an innovative collection called the Sade Mini Bag. This mini bag is made with a unique hand woven Nigerian “Aso Oke” fabric. We married the use of this traditional fabric with the craftsmanship and structure of a modern designer handbag. We are excited about this new Sade mini bag and the opportunity to continue making women’s life easier by providing unique, well crafted bags at an affordable price. 

The Sade Mini Bag is uniquely crafted with hand woven batches of Nigerian Aso Oke fabric and genuine pebble grain leather. To date we have sold a small batch as a test on our site with amazing response. With your help and support we can bring this unique handbag to women everywhere.

Core Features  

- Cross Body Strap which makes it perfect for day to night  

-The best grade gold tone hardware

- Best quality YKK Zippers

- Metal feet so the bag never touches the floor

- Hot pink interior, which is a dose of happiness in every bag

- Interior Phone Pocket and Zipper Pocket

- Dimensions: 5.9 H x 8 H x 2 D

- Hand Woven Aso Oke Fabric

- Luxe pebble grain leather 

DIMENSIONS:

• Dimensions: 5.9 W x 8 H x 2 D

• 45” cross body strap

• Weight 5lb

• 2.5” Top Handle

MATERIALS:

• Hand woven “Aso Oke” Fabric

• Luxury Peeble Grain Leather

• Magnetic Leather Flap

• Premium YKK zippers

• Gold Tone Hardware

The Sade mini bag is the perfect unique mini bag to take you from work to play. The cross body straps make it easy to carry as you run errands during the day. The mini shape makes it perfect to use for a date night or a night our with the girls. 

The Indiegogo Collection

The Sade bag is made in four unique color patterns ( Black, Red, Gold, Stripe), and is priced favorably just for Indiegogo. All of our handbags arrive in our hot pink F&W Style dust cover and box packaging!

 EVERYONE THAT ORDERS OUR SADE BAG AS A GIFT  TO THE WOMEN IN YOUR LIFE, WILL RECEIVE A NICE CHRISTMAS GIFT CARD THAT READS "THIS IS YOUR CHRISTMAS GIFT"

Shipping

Shipping to the United States is 100% free!

International shipping costs: 

Duties: Please note that you may encounter duties if you are ordering outside of the United States. Because this is quite variable, you will be responsible for covering any duties required by your home country.

Begin funding period: October 30th 2017  

End funding period: Nov 28th, 2017  

Bag production: December -January  

Bags delivery: February Ship to Backers

 

 

With this innovative new design and the support of backers from Indiegogo, we are excited to provide women with a bag that is unique, functional, and that will make them feel like royalty.

Why Indiegogo

With the support of our clients, we call them F&W Girls, we have been able to grow our small business and continue to provide well crafted, colorful handbags at an affordable price, for busy women on the go. This new Sade Mini Bag is a new area for us, and with your support we will be able to fulfill our mission  to promote our African culture to the world by using this innovative handbag that merges our core traditional fabric with a modern design. We want your feedback and support, to fund this next exciting category for F&W Style.​

F&W Style owner, Alexandria started her passion for fashion at age ten, when she persuaded her mother to let her be an assistant at her Fashion Design Studio everyday after school. At that young age she learned a lot about design and running a fashion business. At the age of thirteen her family moved from Nigeria to Atlanta, Georgia and she started her modeling career. She modeled for major companies throughout the South. As her modeling career advanced she fell in love with the beauty and glamour of the industry, she fell in love with the well crafted luxurious Items specifically handbags that she got to wear as a model. But soon she realized that most women including her could not afford the luxurious accessories and clothing that she modeled in magazines and on the runway. After earning her Masters Degree in Business Administration in 2008, she decided to put her educational background with her years of experience in the fashion industry and create a luxurious brand for the busy woman on the go. With the support her husband Alfred Alli, F&W Style was born. F&W Style handbags are in several boutiques nationwide, and featured in several publications including Modern Luxury, Black Enterprise, Jezebel Magazine, Atlanta Magazine, CBS, Essence magazine and more.

Risk and Challenges 

F&W Style has been designing and manufacturing well crafted luxury leather handbags for seven years. However this  Sade Mini bag is a brand new category for us; Because of the hand woven Aso Oke fabric that is produced by the Yoruba people of western Nigeria. 
Because this is a new category for us, we need your feedback and help to fund this project!​

Shipping to the United States is 100% free!
International shipping costs: 
Duties: Please note that you may encounter duties if you are ordering outside of the United States. Because this is quite variable, you will be responsible for covering any duties required by your home country.

Begin funding period: October 30th 2017  
End funding period: Nov 28th, 2017  
Bag production: December -January  
Bags delivery: February Ship to Backers

 
 

With this innovative new design and the support of backers from Indiegogo, we are excited to provide women with a bag that is unique, functional, and that will make them feel like royalty.
Why Indiegogo

With the support of our clients, we call them F&W Girls, we have been able to grow our small business and continue to provide well crafted, colorful handbags at an affordable price, for busy women on the go. This new Sade Mini Bag is a new area for us, and with your support we will be able to fulfill our mission  to promote our African culture to the world by using this innovative handbag that merges our core traditional fabric with a modern design. We want your feedback and support, to fund this next exciting category for F&W Style.​

F&W Style owner, Alexandria started her passion for fashion at age ten, when she persuaded her mother to let her be an assistant at her Fashion Design Studio everyday after school. At that young age she learned a lot about design and running a fashion business. At the age of thirteen her family moved from Nigeria to Atlanta, Georgia and she started her modeling career. She modeled for major companies throughout the South. As her modeling career advanced she fell in love with the beauty and glamour of the industry, she fell in love with the well crafted luxurious Items specifically handbags that she got to wear as a model. But soon she realized that most women including her could not afford the luxurious accessories and clothing that she modeled in magazines and on the runway. After earning her Masters Degree in Business Administration in 2008, she decided to put her educational background with her years of experience in the fashion industry and create a luxurious brand for the busy woman on the go. With the support her husband Alfred Alli, F&W Style was born. F&W Style handbags are in several boutiques nationwide, and featured in several publications including Modern Luxury, Black Enterprise, Jezebel Magazine, Atlanta Magazine, CBS, Essence magazine and more.

Risk and Challenges 
F&W Style has been designing and manufacturing well crafted luxury leather handbags for seven years. However this  Sade Mini bag is a brand new category for us; Because of the hand woven Aso Oke fabric that is produced by the Yoruba people of western Nigeria. Because this is a new category for us, we need your feedback and help to fund this project!​

story:
the KILN

Detects. Prevents. Corrects.

It is the world's first Portable Guitar Dehumidifier that employs 3 key principles of wood drying

Most guitar lovers simply enjoy playing their guitars without knowing the creeping effects caused by high moisture content in wood. We are guitar lovers therefore we understand the problems with "WET" acoustic guitars. We spent years seeking for a simple yet dedicated solution but we found none. Only limited privileged individuals who can afford up-scaled treatments are immune from it. Therefore dealing with "WET" acoustic guitars has become our obsession. Eventually we created the KILN.

"the KILN" Website: http://www.thekiln.sg/

The KILN is the world's first guitar dehumidifier that employs 3 key principles of wood drying:

  • Constant heat supply

  • Heated environment

  • Air circulation


Using the KILN is as easy as ABC!

Simply insert the KILN into your guitar soundhole (not for offset soundhole guitars), turn on the power, and leave it over night (8 hours) and it will be done!

See the illustrations below and you will be amazed with how simple the KILN works!

See step by step illustration below.


The KILN will not mark your beloved guitars

Protective felt layers have been strategically placed on the KILN so that it leaves no marks on your beloved guitar.


The KILN dehumidifies by three key wood drying principles

First Principle - Constant Heat Supply

The KILN supplies constant heat to your guitar soundbox. The gradual heat gently heats up the air within your guitar soundbox throughout the entire dehumidification process.

Second Principle - Heated Environment

With constant heating of the air in the guitar soundbox, the air will be able to absorb moisture from your guitar.

Third Principle - Air Circulation

Heat transfer through convection takes place naturally thus air saturated with moisture will be replaced by dryer air. No removal of guitar strings, just place your guitar in a well ventilated space for such air circulation to take place.


The KILN is compact and portable yet packs with smart designs and features that make sense!

Temperature and Relative Humidity Display

The KILN gives LIVE temperature and relative humidity readings as the dehumidification process is underway. You can be rest assured that the KILN is doing what it says.

Indicator Light in Guitaring Passionately's Logo

When the KILN is in operation, you can see the indicator light turned on. It blinks rhythmically when operation has ceased.

Temperature & Humidity Sensors

The temperature & humidity sensors are strategically located to detect the on-going ambient conditions in your guitar. The temperature sensor also acts as the primary detector for any unwanted heat surges. It is the constant monitoring that allows the creation of the ideal dehumidification environment within your guitar.

Heating Plate

The heating plate is made of high grade aluminum. It conducts heat from a heater within the KILN thus heating the air in your guitar soundbox.

Handling Fin

This small but essential handling fin aids the user in manipulating the KILN into its ideal position with ease.


The KILN is created by guitar lovers for guitar lovers! It is equipped with smart functions to make dehumidification SAFE & EASY!

8-hour Auto Cut-Off

The KILN has been programmed to cut-off its operation after 8 hours. Our researches and experiments have determined 8 hours to be the optimal dehumidification duration.

Temperature Control

An onboard temperature sensor monitors the air temperature in the guitar. Both upper limit and lower limit ranges of temperature have been determined. When in operation, the temperature in your guitar soundbox is maintained within these limits.

Temperature Auto Cut-Off

In the event when the upper temperature limit is breached, the KILN will cease operation all together and no further heating will take place.


The KILN is PORTABLE!

The KILN will hardly take up space in your home or your luggage. Bringing your guitar dehumidifier is so easy because the KILN weighs less than 280 grams!


The KILN's Promises

1. Reduce wood moisture content to healthy range ≤12%

2. Reduce string height for up to 1mm

3. Very low power consumption

4. No disruption of lifestyle

5. Easy to operate

6. Compact and portable

7. Audible tonal quality improvement

We obtained the above outcomes through repeated experiments, tests and fieldworks. High confidence level of sucess is guaranteed. However there are a myriad of factors that affect structural and functional properties of acoustic guitars. Outcomes may vary among various guitars.


Birth of "the KILN" to present…

Emergence of "the KILN"

Adam is one of the founding members of Guitaring Passionately who has been repairing and restoring guitars in Singapore for more than a decade. He discovered that acoustic guitars in regions of high humidity will carry a problem called "WET" acoustic guitars. Excessive moisture in guitars resulted in bulging guitar tops that diminished playability and tonal qualities of guitars.

Larry whom is close to Adam became his sounding board. Both of them were very passionate solving "WET" guitar issues and they were in constant discussions of numerous possible methods. Suffice to say that Larry's influences were important in establishing the cornerstone of this pursuit.

In his attempt to help guitar enthusiasts to counter this chronic issue, he has found no dedicated solutions for it. While many guitar enthusiasts contributed their ideas in guitar forums, these methods were only at best means of improvisation. Henceforth, searching for dedicated solutions to tackle this problem has been his obsession. Eventually "the KILN" is created…

Proof of Concept

The first prototype was made to validate the design concepts. Using ice cream sticks and adhesive tapes, the geometry of "the KILN" was conceived. The overall shape and form must meet these requirements,

  • Inserting the prototype into acoustic guitars without contacting any parts of guitar or removal of strings
  • Prototype's geometry must have provision to position heating element directly beneath guitar's bridge area
  • Prototype's geometry must possessed self-balanced property
  • Prototype can be tucked under guitar strings


In satisfying the requirements, "the KILN" has taken on an asymmetrical U-shaped side profile.

Sizing the Heating Element

Guitars are bought but to guitar enthusiasts their guitars are usually priceless. It was imperative to avoid inflicting damages to any guitars. Great length was taken to make sure that wouldn't happen. The efforts have resulted in these major considers being taken during the design stages,

  • Dehumidification temperature range
  • Acceptable temperature fluctuation range
  • Size of heating element
  • Heat characteristics
  • AC or DC power source

Repeated validation tests were conducted to determine the "right size".

Initial Prototype Making

From May 2010 to May 2012, four graduating prototypes have emerged. They were derived from numerous experiments and repeated tests.

Adam was very concerned about effectiveness of "the KILN" and safety of end-users' guitars. Most acoustic guitars were held together by either hide or synthetic glue. Such glues will weaken at about 65ºC. Therefore "the KILN" mustn't produce such heat level.

Dehumidification needs heat energy. To be effective, items to be dehumidified should be within environment of 40ºC to 48ºC. Therefore "the KILN" must delivered that temperature range.

After consulting experts in electrical design, Adam has decided on DC powered heating elements. He went on to hand built prototypes to validate the effectiveness of "the KILN". Through repeated iterations, the prototypes have delivered the expected heat characteristics.

Each stage brought "the KILN closer to fruition. It was then, "the KILN" was poised to enter into Industrial Design phase.

Industrial Design

Adam teamed up with Samuel Chan who is the other founding member of Guitaring Passionately to embark onto Industrial Design phase. A team of Industrial Designers were appointed and in October 2012 project "the KILN" was kick started.

Trimming the divergence of ideas into a few preferred forms.

The preferred ones…

Arguably laying out the electrical components was one of the toughest challenges we faced thus far. The team would like "the KILN" to be compact and slick. These requirements have created challenges in finding space to house the electrical components. The team of Industrial Designers were fully stretched.

Adam and Samuel recognized that visual impression is critical to users' acceptance to the product. The team of Industrial Designers have spared no efforts in creating rendered images to create the necessary visual impact. Below are four of many rendered images to aid them in visualizing the product appearances.

Brain-storming continued. Adam and Samuel worked with the team of Industrial Designers to narrow the best suited and workable designs. Below are two final proposals and Adam and Samuel have selection the design on the left which is proposal 1.

Among guitar enthusiasts, the love for guitars is often communicated through the beauty extroverted from the curves and shapes on guitars. Invariably, certain visual cues were incorporated that speak to guitar enthusiasts. The team want these features to give feelings of familiarity and comfort to guitar enthusiasts. Below are some examples of such features.

Apart from aesthetic quality, the team wanted to ensure "the KILN" ease of assembly during production phase. The matings of parts within were carefully designed with many technical and manufacturing considerations.

Finally, Adam and Samuel have narrowed down to Design Proposal 01. The path towards the selected design was indeed exciting.

A well designed product will not go without quality packaging. Likewise, the Industrial Designers maintained their high standards of delivery.

Finally the Industrial Design phase was concluded in December 2013. The final design embodied the KILN's operating principles, functional features, ergonomics design and aesthetics value. The team was delighted with the outcome.

Full Functional Prototyping

Adam was well aware of guitar enthusiasts' love for their guitars. Therefore no compromise was allowable. The team went ahead to make fully functional prototypes to validate our design concepts.

Certain issues were surfaced when prototypes were made. The heat produced by the heating element was sufficient to soften the plastic housing. Immediately the Industrial Designers switched to plastics of higher heat resistance properties. To facilitate injection molding, the team made design changes to some plastic parts. There were others… the team tackled them one at a time with opened minds.

After a few prototypes, the team managed to eradicate the detected issues. The prototypes were subjected to further validation tests. Picture below is prototype 001.

The above and below two pictures showed prototype 001 being subject to validation tests.

Multiple sensors were positioned within and outside the test guitars. We were delighted with the temperature and humidity readings. We concluded that prototype 001 has arrived.


"the KILN" Production Forecast

Accompanied by a few appointed Industrial Designers, Adam and Samuel have visited potential manufacturers in Malaysia. It was after a process of needs analysis that the supply chain was established. "the KILN" has arrived to turnkey stage. The only ingredient current is adequate funding.

This campaign is planned for 55 days. Here is our estimated schedule of production and delivery of our promises.

1. At the end of this campaign, the first-batch production requires 14 to 16 weeks to complete.

2. Shipping out our promises will take 1 to 3 weeks.

3. It should take from 23 to 26 weeks to get your rewards. We will expedite the process whenever we can.

In relating the production milestones to funding quantum, here is a brief summary,

1. USD $77,000 will be able to make all the essential toolings

2. USD $155,000 will be able to kick start the first-batch production cycles to fulfill our promises.

3. USD $210,00 will be able to create more "the KILN" to reach out to more guitar enthusiasts in the world.

We definitely need your support to materialize our plans and dreams. Please contribute in anyways you can.


Handcrafted Perks

We value your contributions. The founder of Guitaring Passionately will undertake the entire crafting of these perks personally. Assuredly no effort will be spared to make them good.

Handmade Guitar

The picture below depicts a handmade guitar made by Adam. If you become a contributor of this perk, you will be receiving a guitar of the like.

Wood Picks

The wood picks will be made from blackwood and maple. They are built to last yet aesthetically pleasing. Again they will be handcrafted by Adam.

story:
The objective of this project is to build a solar power kit to enhance the enjoyment of novice windsurfers in light winds, by "green propulsion", and make it affordable for the average surfer. Raising awareness of green technologies and incorporating them into sporting and human activities is our team’s broad agenda. Your participation as a backer or a consumer of our future products will help the entire food chain of green industries.


The Team:

Radek Sobczynski, Ph.D.: Dad, mad scientist, inventor and passionate windsurfer for the last thirty years: 

Linda: Daughter, windsurfing novice, tree-hugger, senior biology and political science double major at Vanderbilt University , former intern at the EPA, and former intern at the Pew Center on Global Climate Change.

Gene Marino III : Dad’s friend, will put an artist touch into our giveaway rewards

 

This campaign is set as ‘ALL or NOTHING’ if it fails, your pledges will automatically go back to you.  


Your interest including even a small level of donation will show that you care about going green with renewable sources of energy.  Not a single drop of oil needs to burn to have lots of fun in the water.

The key feature is to have a system, which can be integrated into a typical windsurfer board and sail.

This system would include:

  • Light, durable, detachable, saltwater-resistant solar panels, with the option to scale up its power
  •  A small 12V motor, with the thrust of around 30lbs force, which can be attached to existing surfboards in place of the fin
  •  An efficient battery in a sturdy, water-tight enclosure with an innovative charging coupler placed under the mast foot, again using  the existing  standard mounting rail on the board
  • And, convenient control buttons under your feet or on the boom.
As governed by the fixed time rules we need to raise $35K by January 1st, 2012 in order to make a prototype and perform first stage of the evaluation that summer on Silver Sands Beach, Milford, CT. Also we need to cover for some of the more valuable rewards. The cost of making flexible custom solar panels with thin steel reinforcement, designing the printed circuit boards for smart charging, water resistant switches and controls, and the water tight battery compartment is high.

Although this project looks simple from the outside it is complex on the inside. But, we have already plenty of experience from our other trials with the EGASC technology (created and funded with our own monies)– please see our EGASC cleaning water on YouTube EGASC123 channel.  

 

We will also seek supplemental funding from various agencies, but your contributions are an important part of the process. Finally, we hope to make the Photovoltaic Surfer kit available through e-commerce sites and the retail channels.   Creating a green sports cult is our ultimate agenda.

Nothing will happen without your help.  The more people we have on board with green sport technology the more affordable these technologies will become. Please spread the word.

story:
My Story

Hey Everybody!  You’ve either landed on this page either by mistake or accident,you have an interest in fashion or you are following a link from my youtube channel  http://www.youtube.com/clothespindolls  or website http://sugarplumdolls.com

Over the last couple of years I began posting “how-to” arts and crafts videos to show people how easy it is to make things! If I say the response has been overwhelming that would be an understatement. After getting  over  1,000,000 video views  and gaining thousands of subscribers I knew it was time to take the next exciting step! The “SugarplumDolls.com Sew Simple Pattern Project”  

 

I am now ready to take a leap forward and launch my own line of super easy sewing patterns. My plan is  to create super easy sewing patterns, I hope to have my first pattern available for sale online before Christmas  2012 in my etsy shop. http://www.etsy.com/shop/clothespindolls I need to raise money to help offset the cost of having my pattern digitized, graded, and  printed !

 

Why this is important

This project is important to me because “I really want everyone” to experience the joy of actually making something with their own two hands”! To create and make is simply human nature! I want  everyone who wants to learn how to sew  to be able to  purchase a pattern, take it home and actually make something cute!  Beginners who want to sew should be able to create something they are proud of without having to have a fashion degree!  So many times people purchase sewing patterns and never end up making anything or start a project and never seem to finish it.  

 I started researching this project and I've looked at hundreds of sewing patterns, design books made sketches, and samples and finally I have created a few super easy sewing patterns that anyone can make into beautiful children's clothes!  For now I am focusing on children's clothes because they don't required an expensive amount of fabric or materials and most items can be made in an afternoon. With my patterns and basic or little sewing skills almost anyone something very wearable.  Based on the popularity of my youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/clothespindolls , many people have learned how to make things and gone on to even create their own small home based businesses, selling hair bows, tutus or dolls.  Another perk with my patterns is that people who purchase a pattern can make multiple items to sell as long as they include one of my  labels into each item! This will allow people who are starting their own business the opportunity to produce a quality product and not worry about the high cost licensing fees and it also will help to supplement my creating more fabulous patterns.

 

What the money is for

After speaking with printers, I have learned that print house minimums are 1,000 pieces per style. While the cost per pattern isn’t that high, when you multiply it times 1,000 pieces, it gets expensive really quickly! And that’s just the printed patterns! I also need the instruction sheets and illustrations, as well as photos of the finished items for people to see what they’ll be making. Once totaled, it will cost about $3,500 per design to launch a commercially available SugarplumDolls.com Sew Simple Pattern  sewing pattern.

For the SugarplumDolls.com Sew Simple Pattern Project , I’m hoping to raise $3500, which is enough for me to launch the first  of hopefully an entire collection of sewing patterns! Now, on the off chance that you help me get beyond the first $3500, each additional $3500 raised equals another pattern design. So if I am so lucky as to make my goal, it doesn’t have to end there!

No donation is too small!

 

 

The Perks

What better perk can you get  other than the actual pattern?  Depending on your pledge level you will receive  a pattern professionally printed  , a set of paper doll dresses which emulate and give you a sneak peak at my entire collection of patterns, and everyone who donates gets a hand written thank you note from me, as well as acknowledgment on my website.

And just to let you know how serious I am about  my SugarplumDolls.com Sew Simple Pattern Project If i do not make my goal I will not  keep any of the money, as without the money I cannot create any of the patterns or  the perks!

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP!:

I have had success, inspiration and motivation  with my youtube channel  http://www.youtube.com/clothespindolls  (please check out my videos and read the comments) but coming up with enough money to launch sewing patterns is beyond my financial means. I am basically a one woman operation. I do all the sewing, creating, crafting, designing, and more all by myself, and while I’ve been doing all the sewing and crafting  for the last few years, I maintain a day job to keep things afloat. I know it’s too much for one woman to do, but I love it and am ready to see it to the next level!

No donation is too small, honestly! And while I do need your help with donations, I also need your help to spread the word. Below the video are links you can use to embed the video on your blog, “like” it on your facebook page, or email it to your friends. Super easy, just cut and paste and help spread the word!

In addition to my undying gratitude, I’ve created some thank you gifts in exchange for your donation! 

If you've made it all the way to the end of reading this page, THANK YOU! Thanks for reading this, watching my video, spreading the word, and donating to kick start my line of sewing patterns. 

 

Other ways you can help!

I understand that not everyone has the same kind of money. Right now what money I have goes to all activities of daily living and some left over for crafting.  EVERYONE can help though.  One thing I do know is that publicity is worth way more than people think  If you can tell people about this project, you will help me to make a make a difference!

Share this on Facebook, Tweet it, tell or just tell your friends who you know  who like interesting causes and project. It all helps!

And the more often people talk about this project the more likely I will reach my goals and their will be a lot of well dressed children running around in beautiful clothes made with love!

1. Facebook: Support Sugarplumdolls.com and my campaign to launch a line of sewing patterns! Check out my  page and the great incentives! http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/122552?a=703926

- Like my facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/sugarplumdolls2012

2. YouTube:  Watch, learn, follow and subscribe to my youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/clothespindolls

 

 

Thanks so much for your time! Have a lovely day.

My Story
Hey Everybody!  You’ve either landed on this page either by mistake or accident,you have an interest in fashion or you are following a link from my youtube channel  http://www.youtube.com/clothespindolls  or website http://sugarplumdolls.com
Over the last couple of years I began posting “how-to” arts and crafts videos to show people how easy it is to make things! If I say the response has been overwhelming that would be an understatement. After getting  over  1,000,000 video views  and gaining thousands of subscribers I knew it was time to take the next exciting step! The “SugarplumDolls.com Sew Simple Pattern Project”  
 
I am now ready to take a leap forward and launch my own line of super easy sewing patterns. My plan is  to create super easy sewing patterns, I hope to have my first pattern available for sale online before Christmas  2012 in my etsy shop. http://www.etsy.com/shop/clothespindolls I need to raise money to help offset the cost of having my pattern digitized, graded, and  printed !
