story:
We created a patent-pending system to give you access to a personal tailor and luxury products at an affordable price and fast delivery time. The Selfie-Measurement System allows you to get measured with a guaranteed accuracy of within one quarter of an inch in seconds with virtually no possibility of errors.


Once you have pledged, you will receive an e-mail with a link to access the free app. With the app, you will be able to customize your shirt(s) and place your order in seconds simply by creating an account, completing your personal profile (height and weight), and choosing your design(s) and features (collar, cuff, button, and thread).



After you place your order, you will receive a complimentary Fitting Jacket. With the Fitting Jacket, you will be able to customize your measurements in minutes just by adjusting the jacket to your personal fit. 


Once you have adjusted the Fitting Jacket to your measurements, you will get selfie-measured in seconds by taking a series of selfies using the App.


The selfies will be sent to a central system that analyzes the images, extracts key features, and translates the data into accurate and precise measurements. Then a Manstery stylist reviews the measurements and propose adjustments.


After you receive the shirt(s), your measurements are kept on record for future purchases and, should your measurements or style change, all you would have to do is readjust your Fitting Jacket and take another series of selfies.













*NOTE: Standard monograms are included. To request hand-embroidered monograms add $25/shirt. 

 























We combine nearly three decades of experience in the made-to-measure industry. Simone Olibet, Creative Director and Master Tailor, follows the traditions and techniques behind the most elaborate made-to-measure creations. Graziano Meloni, Founder and CEO, teamed up with Olibet to design and develop the technology in 2013, and they started Manstery in New York two years later.


We are a high-end American fashion company developed in the tradition of Italian craftsmanship. Based in New York, we use a ground-breaking technology to make customizable luxury made-to-measure accessible to everyone. Manstery combines two elements we value most in our work: Man and Mastery. For us, that means being able to help everyone express their identity and pursue perfection.

story:
Too thin & rips easily

 

Slips off your heel

 

Not really no-show

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Fabric

Specter No-Shows are made with a special blend of bamboo, polyester, and nylon, built to be ridiculously comfortable without compromising durability and strength. Our functional design maximizes the life of each sock and allows users to wear them longer, making them an essential everyday sock.

The organic bamboo in our socks are absorbent and breathable, naturally repelling odor and keeping your feet fresh and clean. Beyond comfort, bamboo provides eco-friendly benefits. Bamboo requires less resources and water to produce, making it a more sustainable alternative to cotton.

For the first production of these socks, we wanted to keep it simple with one style - black and white. In the future, we will be adding more unique colors and styles, so stay tuned and follow us for updates!

 

Sizing

Our socks feature an elastic fabric that stretches to fit almost any size, making them one size fits most (US 7-13).

 

 

Shipping

We will ship out the socks via USPS as soon as production is complete. We expect to have the socks out by December, just in time for the holidays. However, we set January 2020 as the estimated delivery date in case of delays due to production. 

International Backers: We ship internationally to select countries. All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and administration fees which you are responsible for paying.

 

 

Thanks so much for checking out our project. We hope you like our campaign, and we appreciate every single pledge.

We promise that we will do everything we can to make sure you receive your socks on time. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us here on Indiegogo.

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram to get the latest updates and be the first to receive new products! 

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, My Name is Gaku Fujita. I am a Japanese International High School Student studying in Canada,BC. I am the Founder & CEO of NOMAH. NOMAH is an Anti-Asian Hate Apparel Brand! Our goal is to spread awareness about the reality of Asian Hate and eventually eliminate it. We are going to donate all our profit to a non profit organization that supports Asian Hate Victims. Please help us so that we can spread awareness and eliminate All Asain Hate!!

 

What We Need & What You Get

$10,000 raised will be used over a 4month period and will be used for Advertising Fees to spread the awareness and Collaboration Fees. All the leftover money will be directly sent to a non profit organization that supports Asian Hate Victims.

As we sell T-Shirts, Hoodies, and Tank-Tops our perks are going to be these three.

$10       → Thank you Letter

$30    → NOMAH Logo T-Shirt ✖️1

$30   → NOMAH “Hate Has No Place” T-Shirt✖️1

$40   → NOMAH Logo Hoodie ✖️1

$50   → NOMAH Logo T-Shirt✖️1 & Hoodie✖️1

$100 → NOMAH Logo T-Shirt✖️2 & Hoodie✖️2

 

The Impact

This action makes a huge impact on the Asian Hate Movement going around the world. There used to be a huge Asian Hate protest movement around the world. However, as the situation of COVID-19 gets worse people Started to refrain from those protest movements. NOMAH is committed to do protest movements Covid safe since it does not contain numerous people gathering in one place. As the NOMAH Logo represents, “hundreds of people putting their small fists together makes one tremendous fist”. Each individual making a small movement of wearing NOMAH Products makes a huge difference in the community.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge of our project is spreading the awareness of Asian Hate. Spreading awareness of any kind of thing is not an easy thing to do, as such we need your help!! We are constantly posting posts that show the reality of Asian Hate on social media so that many people can see it in daily life time. And with your help by funding us and wearing our products, we are sure that our logo will be seen around the world and numerous people will visit our website and social media and understand the reality of Asian Hate and take action to eliminate Asian Hate.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The best way to support NOMAH is by funding us but there are other ways that you can help us!

1. Visit our Instagram and Follow, Like, and share our posts!!

2. Visit our Website and purchase our products!!

3. Share this webpage with your friends, family, and post it on your SNS!!

story:
Short Summary

Quinnten Fuller,the sole founder, attended Northern Kentucky University studying entrepreneurship as a minor and business management as an area of concentration which is central to the operations of the proposed business. He brings tremendous strength and personality. During college Quinnten played college basketball, worked in the Marketing Department at Hollywood Casino at Dayton Raceway, and began an in-home personal training business. 

This campaign is very important. Our business donates hats to children suffering from the effects of cancer and often donates a % of sales proceeds to children's cancer research. 

With these contributions we are going to meet milestones that have been set which include: legal (attorney,incorporation $5,000,) Operations: (accounting software/hardware Quickbooks) Inventory, rent (6 months) professional website development and hosting, shipping and packaging set up making it easy for customer friendly return shipping) and lastly marketing: signage, social media advertisement Facebook/Instagram Adworks to reach 20,000 plus audience daily for 6 months), trade shows at Qualcomm stadium (Wednesday's) and Kobey's Swap Meet Friday-Sunday (6 months) tenative schedule.Contributions will enable us to donate to children's cancer research and make hat donations. 

PERKS 

Shopping at www.topshelf.online helps you save over 60% on your favorite hats. Hats are highly overpriced ranging from $27-$35 and even reaching as high as $60. Why pay full price for one hat that you will wear continously when you can purchase 3 or 4 for the same price. 35,000 children are suffering from the side effects of cancer. We make it a priority to help these kids in need. Every month our Top Shelf experts will sort through inventory and give back to these wonderful kids. This will last as long as we are alive. 

Its unfortunate to see young kids suffer from anything but eating too much candy at one time. Help us put a smile on their faces, give them a sense of hope, and self worth. Be apart of something great! The milestones we have created are described in our business plan and follow a specific order of steps. If we do not meet our goal, we will use the money to pursue a working model that will allow our company to begin trade shows and generate revenue that can be used directly to help fund the completion of our initial funding process. 

The Impact

 Hats are presumed to be a 7 billion dollar global industry by 2020 with the consciousness of skin cancer and sun protection awareness. Our company helps people of all income levels protect their heads, feel stylish, and increase self esteem with our high quality prices. Everybody should be able to enjoy fashion, sports, and the great outdoors without regretting an expensive impulse buying decision. 

Risks & Challenges

 While we have no current knowledge of such plans, it is possible that a competitor could launch a new hat providing service that would more directly compete with us than current offerings do. The kind of offerings that would threaten us most would be an industry leader such as Lids implementing a we buy hats concept and selling back to consumers as well. We would be particularly threatened by this because the industry leader has a bigger inventory of New Era which accounts for 66% of sales in the hat industry.

Other Ways You Can Help

WE APPRECIATE ALL YOUR EFFORTS TO SPREAD THE WORD ABOUT OUR UNIQUE CONCEPT AND OUR PHILANTHROPY MISSION TO RAISE 35. (35,000 HATS TO KIDS WITH CANCER.

 Please share using theIndiegogo share tools! Thank you and God Bless!

story:
MILSPEC Professional Diver 165 Fathoms...Born to Dive...Go Explore and Discover 

A Brief Introduction about me, my background and the Company:

About Me

I am Darren Mcgonigle, a London born entrepreneur, watch enthusiast, collector and founder of the newly formed SWC (Seapro Watch Company) created 2020. I formerly worked within Asset Management in London. I am also a proud father of two young, beautiful children and reside in the leafy suburbs of London.

The Company

SWC is incorporated in England and has a presence in both London & Geneva; brands include SEAPRO and MILSPEC.  The SWC MILSPEC Navy Diver is our first Dive Watch and is designed by SWC in Geneva, a presence that I will be building upon over the next few years. SWC currently manufactures Swiss Made and non Swiss Watches in Geneva and London. This Project is the Launch of our 165 Fathoms, born from our Navy Clearance Diver that was successfully funded on Kickstarter. More details on SWC's products can be found on our website http://WWW.DIVER.NAVY

MILSPEC Professional Diver 165 Fathoms

The MILSPEC© 165 Fathoms Professional Navy Diver is a project follow-on from our last successful campaign. The 165 Fathoms is born into the successful elite ‘Clearance Diver’ family and retains the vintage looks synonymous to the classic dive watches from the 1960’s that we all love. There have been some modifications: replacement red minute hand, green ceramic 120 click bezel and upgraded Swiss Style Tropic watchband not to mention the much requested blue dial, this watch is still truly modern yet vintage.   

Production and Funding

Currently SWC will only manufacture a limited number of the MILSPEC©️ ‘Professional Diver’ in both blue and black dialed. Therefore production numbers will be low during 2021 but manageable and our rewards outlined herein reflect this with limited numbers set. Our pledge is set low, we are not bound by having or needing to meet a minimum order because we control our own production cycle and our partners are well established. Our Professional Divers range is designed and assembled in London, our dials, watchbands and boxes are UK supplied and we use 3rd party suppliers for case and movements.

MILSPEC Professional Diver 165 Fathoms

The MILSPEC© 165 Fathoms Professional Navy Diver is a project follow-on from our last successful campaign. The 165 Fathoms is born into the successful elite ‘Clearance Diver’ family and retains the vintage looks synonymous to the classic dive watches from the 1960’s that we all love. There have been some modifications: replacement red minute hand, green ceramic 120 click bezel and upgraded Swiss Style Tropic watchband not to mention the much requested blue dial, this watch is still truly modern yet vintage.   

165 Fathoms 300m/1000ft

The MILSPEC Navy 'Professional Diver' has a depth capability of 165 Fathoms 300m/1000ft waterproofness from a 316L 41mm casing with screw down case back and ISO screw down crown, We are so confident from the testing, the watches are all backed by a 2 year warranty.

 

Unidirectional 120 click Ceramic bezel

Being part of the elite 'clearance diver' retaining the Unidirectional 120 click Ceramic bezel with ZERO play is certainly an indicator to the quality and reliability we continue to manufacture!

Dual Lume

Markers having blue Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 for better eligibility in low light condition or poor diving water conditions, and during design I decided to use Swiss C3 green lume for the hands to really bring out the distinction between time and time elapsed when diving or operating in poor light conditions.

Automatic Movement

The heart of the watch is powered by the powerhouse of bulletproof movements from the renowned maker Seiko, NH35A a legendary dive watch manufacturer. Which in my honest opinion can go 15 years without a service, a reliable workhorse that certainly won’t let you down.

Watchband

As with any dive watch, rubber straps offer superior comfort over steel. As standard all our MILSPEC©️ watches come with our own classic recreation of the original Swiss tropic iconic dive strap, these can be seen in more detail on our Swiss website  http://WWW.SEAPRO.CH

 

Watchcase

The Watch comes with an IP67 waterproof case supplied by our trusted partners in Germany. The case is dust and waterproof and comes as a carry case. This case can be used to transport the watch, so there is a reusable purpose to the packaging.

MILSPEC 165 Fathoms Specifications

Back us and what can we offer in return?

Firstly, and most importantly, we are asking for backers to join us on this exciting journey in creating this 2nd generation of a great modern yet vintage professional and functional dive watch - a chance to own it and be part of its making!

...What are the PERKS for backing this project?

The PERKS are relatively straight forward. Here we set out all the rewards and pictures of the actual product, what you see is exactly what you get. We only have two watch propositions with blue or black dial variants.

PERKS £265 

x1 MILSPEC©️ Diver in either Blue or Black dial - limited to 20 pieces for early bird early delivery

- x1 SWC MILSPEC© 165 Fathoms Automatic Dive Watch (Dial Option Select Color)

- x1 Yellow IP67 Waterproof Carry Case

- x1 Quick Release Rubber Watchband 

- Instructions and a MILSPEC© Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

PERKS £525  

x2 MILSPEC©️ Divers BOTH dial variants -  Limited to 5 Sets 

- x1 SWC MILSPEC© 165 Fathoms Automatic Dive Watch Green Bezel Blue Dial

- x1 SWC MILSPEC© 165 Fathoms Automatic Dive Watch Green Bezel Black Dial

- x1 Yellow IP67 Waterproof Carry Case

- x2 (X1) Olive Green + (X1) Blue Quick Release Rubber Watchbands

- Instructions and a MILSPEC© Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

story:
Slickon wallets in variety of vibrant colors


THE WALLET

Colorful. Lively. Practical. These are words we often use to describe Slickon



Old School

Gone are the days of stuffing our pockets with boring and bulky billfolds. Slickon offers a sleek alternative that is stylish -and- comfortable to carry in your pants pocket. 

 Solution

This slim silicon wallet is designed to carry everything you could possibly need for the day away from home (including a debit card and a few credit cards, a photo ID and a few folded bills). Need extra room for business cards? Grab an extra Slickon. Your cards will always be easily accessible and it'll still take up less space than a traditional wallet. 


Convenience

Whenever you need a card, it's there at the ready. The easy access window allows you to use your thumb to slide your cards out, and the magnetic button keeps them securely in place between uses (magnetic button does not interfere with credit card strips; we've made sure of that).




Material

Slickon wallets are made out of Silicon.Slickon wallets will be available in wide 6 colors. We will add more colors with stretch goals.
Slickon wallets are unisex and are for all occasions.
The wallets are waterproof, can withstand extreme heat, and will not deform or degrade. The material is also easy to clean and recyclable. 
Slickon wallets are animal friendly and has not been tested on animal.

Warranty
We are so certain of the wallets' durability that each and every Slickon sold comes with a 5-year warranty. If your wallet is damaged at all during this 5-period, even if the damage happens because you stuffed it with more than the recommended six cards,just send us the picture and cause of the damage, and we will send you a new one at no cost (only a small shipping fee apply).

THE STORY:

Hello Kickstarters, my name is Ary and my partner Bob who also is my brother.We have background in designing products such as bicycles and fashion accessories, and our love is creating products that are simple,comfortable, easy to use, minimalist, mixed with touch of vibrant colors. 


With a combined 25 years of design and manufacturing experience between us, it was clear that we didn't need to deal with the impractical, bulky wallets much longer. We could design and produce the perfect wallet. And that's exactly what we set out to do. Through trial and error, we finally landed on a design that is perfect for minimalists, like ourselves, who like to carry the necessary and ditch the bulk. After finalizing the design, We made some samples that we gave away to family and friends. It's over a year later, and everyone is still as happy with the prototypes today as they were when they first saw them. We've even heard the Slickon samples are great conversation starters – because everyone wants to know where they can get one of their own.

THE PLAN

The funds raised through this project will be used for tooling , produce the Slickon wallet line, which includes 6 different wallet styles. 
Funding will help us produce a large-scale production run, including supply costs.
We have good relationship with the manufacturer and supplier of silicon
material and are confident that our supplier is capable of producing 
Slickon wallets even if we get over funded for larger scale of production.
Shipping of large quantity is going to be fulfilled with professional fulfillment  center .

Risks and challenges 

The challenges of Slickon Wallets will be getting the word out, and convincing crowdfunders to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, We hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs, to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

Help us to spread the words on facebook, twitters and friends and for us to reach the goal and for you to get the products.

story:
Our journey begun in 2012, when both of us were living and travelling around Asia. After those intense but life-changing months, we both agreed that mainstream society is loosing its essence, its traditions and customs. So we asked ourselves, why not create a reminiscence of our origins for this globalized world?  

But let us take you back a couple of years, before designing our Ethnic Watches, as without going through this process, we wouldn't be able to guarantee that we have the best specs in the market for quarz watches and the lowest prices. During these years we have attended watch fairs, sold different watch qualities and asked our customers for their feedback which has alllowed us to offer the perfect timepiece. We are true believers that Luxury doesn't have to be expensive, and that top quality is a must. 

In 2016 we put together, both our professional and personal experience to create a timepiece that the world hadn't seen before. A luxury watch that combined modern elegance with traditional colors and patterns. A timepiece that would remind us of our origins, traditions, customs and specially of those that are fighting to preserve them. We took inspiration from indigenous people and ethnic tribes and decided to speak out for them. Thanks to our NGO partners Survival International and Kubuka we are able to help them and protect them against fierce governments which are taking away their land and way of living. 

We believe that everyone should have the right to be who they are, without being forced into a society or group where they don't belong. For this reason our motto is "Be Your True Self". 

We have chosen the best specs in the market to be able to offer a 10 years warranty with every Ethnic Watch. Our ultra-thin 316L Stainless Steel case is the perfect fit for both men and women. These are our top-notch materials: 

- Plated 316L Stainless Steel case, buckle and crown which are polished until they gleam.

- Swiss Ronda 762 movement, to ensure it's perfect functioning

- Anti-Scratch Sapphire Crystal with Anti-Reflecting coating which protects your watchs' surface and enhances its durability. Sapphire is one of the hardest and most durable materials in the world.

- Indexes and hands are polished in Gold, Silver and Rose Gold

- 5 ATM / 50 meters Water Resistance

- Sony Baterry

- Interchangeable Italian full grain vegetable tanned leather straps with 100% cotton handcut ethnic textile

Our ethnic straps are made out of the finest full grain Italian leather which offers a longer durability and a higher resistance to moisture. We use vegetable tanning, which is chromium free and has no harmful chemicals, having therefore a neutral effect on humans. This tanning method doesn’t only provide a more natural and organic texture, it also offers a higher durability and strength. The ethnic textile which is made out of first-class cotton is hand cut, making every strap unique. Unique fashion jewellery.

Are you a true Zulu? The Zulus feel attached to their traditions, they are spiritual and put in the community’s needs before their own. If you feel like you identify with the Zulu tribe, this watch is for you.

Are you a true Cherokee? The Cherokees are people of dialogue, they always try to reach consensus amongst their members. They are open minded and therefore adapt to any kind of circumstance. We absolutely love the way they are and how they confront life.

 Are you a true Samburu? The Samburus are undoubtedly authentic, constantly fighting to maintain their ancient traditions. They are known for their beauty and their distinct complements. They have definitely inspired us. Have they inspired you?

 Are you a true Kalam? The Kalams are very friendly and build strong relationships with the other members of their tribe. They all live together as one big family. They are also in love with nature. So are we!

 Are you a true Ndebele? The Ndebeles are superstitious, creative and independent. Their unique way of expressing themselves through art makes them one of a kind. Be unique with this exclusive collection.

 

But we aren’t only a watch brand, we care about others!

In mainstream society, when we talk about “progress" and “development", we unconsciously see it as something positive. But, we have to ask ourselves, is it always a positive change? Perhaps we should ask those people who are watching their land, rights, customs, values and local economies be destroyed in the name of progress. Industrialised societies forcing development and progress on tribal groups does not make them happier or healthier. In fact, the effects are disastrous and can lead to reduced life expectancy, starvation, obesity, depression, suicide, HIV/AIDs and addiction.  

From the very beginning, it was clear to us that we wanted to help those who are constantly fighting for their ancestral lands and way of life. We decided for our first collection to take action and donate a % of our sales  to several NGOs who support them. However, we hope to contribute even more after our kickstarter campaign. 

Please feel free to check out their sites and learn more about their wonderful projects:    

- Survival International, the global movement for tribal peoples’ rights https://www.survivalinternational.org  

- Kubuka: http://www.kubuka.org/en/kubuka-2/

We know that you have heard it before and from other Kickstarter Projects that "Quality doesn't have to be expensive", but we would like to explain why we can honestly offer such a low price for a luxurious timepiece.  

INTERNET! That's basically it! We are able to cut out of the equation all the middle men, allowing us to offer our products at a lower price. For instance, if you have your own store, you have to pay rent, bills and a shop assitance which are a lot more expensive than having an online store. Also, if we only sell on our online store, we don't have to pay distributors nor wholesalers allowing us to reduce the final price of our watches. 

Pledge for the Perfect Father's Day Gift and send us a private message to receive your personalized Gift Card

We are passionate about our watches and we want you to feel the same way. However, we do understand that sometimes not everyone’s expectations are met. For this reason, and because we want our backers to feel proud of wearing their Ethnic Watch, we guarantee a 30 day return policy. 

Sounds fair, right? We are sure that you will fall in love with your Ethnic Watch, but if you aren’t 100% satisfied, please send us an email to thetribe@ethnicwatches.com so we can sort out everything for you. 

We have years of experience in the watch industry, and we have teamed up with top-notch experts in order to meet our customer’s expectations. We have overcome the most ridiculous situations that emerged during the early days, so we can confidently say that now, nothing will go wrong with your order.

We would like to point out however, that in case there is a slight delay in the timeline due to any unforeseen issues, we will keep you updated at all time and we will put in blood, toil, sweat and tears to comply with our timings.

We have overcome the most ridiculous situations that emerged during the early days, so we can confidently say that now, nothing will go wrong with your order.We would like to point out however, that in case there is a slight delay in the timeline due to any unforeseen issues, we will keep you updated at all time and we will put in blood, toil, sweat and tears to comply with our timings.

story:
Beautiful, slim high-quality watches, fashionable, versatile and affordable with a genuine leather strap.

In my own search for a beautiful watch of good quality materials, lots of luxury and affordable, I found nothing that I would buy. Therefore, I have spent the last 9 months working on a slim bauhaus watch with a genuine leather strap. After many thoughts and rage-quits, I was finally satisfied with the sketch. The design of the watch with specified high-quality material criteria was shown to different suppliers and manufactures in the search for the best partner. After experimenting with various suppliers and manufacturers, I am at last ready to offer my watches, exclusively on Indiegogo!


The Design Process

When i started designing my watches I used my own criticism towards watches. When you analyze a watch, you initially take a glance at it, then you look at it more closely, and at least you examine it with your hands.

Therefore made a top-3-goal-list

  • Appearance (to satisfy the glance)
  • Quality (to satisfy the hands)
  • Affordability (to satisfy your wallet)

I spent numerous hours designing and redesigning the watch, finding out what was working and what was not. After several adjustments and modifications, I finished the sketch and I was extremely happy with the outcome.

The case plays a major role in a beautiful design. Therefore, the case must not be too large or too small. It has to be just right. I found that 40mm is the perfect case diameter for men and women. Large but not clumsy, small yet readable. 


To achieve the beautiful design to satisfy the glance, I decided that it was best to choose a genuine leather strap. Leather straps go well with most watches and feel incredibly pleasant to wear. Furthermore, leather is known for its versatility and its use in luxury fashion. Leather straps can be worn on any occasion. Weather it is for casual or formal use, leather will sit comfortably on the wrist. 

From top til button (black, brown, alligator black and light brown)

As for the style, I found inspiration in miscellaneous timepieces in my search for the classic timeless design. I drew a lot of different models and received feedback from family and friends to help me decide on a particular direction.

A critical element of bauhaus watches is their simplicity. Therefore, I added very few details to the dial and used an ultra slim movement to realize the slim look. I was able to maintain a case thickness of just 7mm while keeping the watch water resistant up to 5 ATM .

With my final sketches done, I sent them to my chosen manufacturer, who converted the drawings into molds that will be used to produce the watch case and other components of raw stainless steel. The watch comes with an exclusive and elegant watch box.


The different parts of the watch are plated and polished for a great looking finish. The manufacturer has created a complete set of prototypes for me to inspect and validate. When I received the prototypes, I was very pleased with the outcome, I love them!

The final design


You can choose between 4 colour combinations of each watch size:

  • Silver case & white dial
  • Gold case & white dial
  • Silver case & black dial
  • Gold case & black dial

Furthermore you can choose your favorite strap:

  • Black
  • Brown
  • Alligator black
  • Light brown

Specifications

  • Case diameter: 40 mm 
  • Case thickness: 7 mm
  • Lug width: 20 mm
  • Glass: sapphire crystal
  • Movement: Swiss movement Ronda 762
  • Strap wide: 20 mm genuine leather
  • 5 ATM  water resistant 


Production plan

I have already verified the quality and workmanship of the particular manufacturer who built the prototypes you see in the pictures, and I plan on having the watches produced by this manufacturer. So far they have provided me with a service and quality that suit my brand. They will be manufacturing the whole watch apart from the Swiss movement that will be bought from ETA SA, which is the one of the world’s largest manufacturers of watches and movements.

The same factory will make the straps and they specialize in working with genuine leather. They have delivered the gorgeous prototypes and they are ready to produce my series of watches in as small or large a quantity as I require. 

Once the watches are produced, I will inspect each and every one of them thoroughly. Because of the inspection the watches will have no defects when they are prepared for shipment. I already have business accounts set up with most shipping companies, and I will use the safest and most cost-efficient courier depending on the destination.



I need your support!

I am ready for production, I have the final prototypes, the technical drawing, and I have the manufacturer ready to begin production. The only thing missing is the initial order fee. I need to order a minimum of 300 watches to keep the price reasonable, and that is where you come in. By becoming a backer for my project, you will help me pay for the first production run, and in exchange you will receive an awesome watch at a highly discounted price!

By pledging today, you are pre-ordering a Meanuere watch from the first production run and making sure you receive it as early as possible. You will offered the special Indiegogo price:

The backers will get a watch for $59

If you want two watches, then the backers will get two watches for $110 ($8 discount)

My reach only goes as far as my network. Liking me on Facebook or sending a few quick emails to friends and family can go a long way to help me ensure success!



I hope that you love my watches as much as I do and pledge your support in order to receive one of the very first production models from Meanuere!

Thank you so much for being a part of this project!

Risks and challenges

I realize creating and delivering a product is a complicated process which often comes with unexpected hiccups. That is why I have been preparing.

I have spent the past several months making sure my supply chain is in check. I have a well-established relationship working with a reliable watch manufacturer. I have experience and I have a contingency plan for all the steps that are out of my control. 

I am going to keep my backers informed during the production process. I will do this with regular updates and by sharing pictures as often as possible, for example when the watch cases are finished, after plating, during final assembly, when the final packing is printed, etc.

If somewhere along the way, I find that there is a setback in production, or that I cannot make the timeline, I will be as open as possible and keep all of my backers informed.

In the end, I want to make Meanuere a long-lasting brand of affordable luxury watches. I will do whatever it takes to fulfill my promises and to deliver watches that will exceed my backers’ expectations.

P.S. 
Inspriational sources: 
Rossling and co's campaign on Kickstarter
Casio
Timex
Daniel Wellington
Seiko
